1b1(phal chen): //bam po brgyad cu lta ba/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/byung
1b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar
1b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu spyod cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
1b4(phal chen): snying po byang chub la 'khod do//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed
2a1(phal chen): /cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do//ngan song thams
2a2(phal chen): cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do//'jig rten gyi khams
2a3(phal chen): thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod//
2a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdani song ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub
2a5(phal chen): la 'khod do//yid na mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog tsong /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po
2b1(phal chen): byang chub la 'khod do//ji ltar 'thun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongasu ston cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams spring
2b2(phal chen): po byang chub la 'khyod do//rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying
2b3(phal chen): po byang chub la 'khod do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dgagra pa'i grwanas yang dag par len
2b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do//bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'thus 'gro ba thams cad
2b5(phal chen): byin gyis rlob cing /byang chub sems dpa' rnamos snying po byang chub la 'khod do//kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
2b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub
3a1(phal chen): /mchog la khyod nas k+Shad/dman+dArar+ya rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'bruste/bcu ga shAn/
3a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni
3a3(phal chen): bzlogs pa'i de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/phyag
3a4(phal chen): g.yos pa brkyang zhing /kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig chos gsung rjod de/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung
3a5(phal chen): ba'i chos dang po'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchogo la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gi shugs
3a6(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad dgongs po dang /byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis
3b1(phal chen): pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
3b2(phal chen): 'ongs te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon por sgrub pa ste/'di ni ngo mtshar
3b3(phal chen): rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/'jig rten gyi khams thams
3b4(phal chen): cad kyi rtse dang /gel ba dang /sdong po dang /nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod kau lta ste/snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/
3b5(phal chen): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' nga'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed
3b6(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ting nge 'dzin de thob ma tha gau tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/
3b7(phal chen): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod
4a1(phal chen): /pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas yog par 'gyur te/'di na
4a2(phal chen): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la
4a3(phal chen): mchod pa dang /rim gror bya ba shin tu chen po rnams/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du
4a4(phal chen): 'byung ste/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mcho ga la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes
4a5(phal chen): mche gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /dbang po dang /spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o//kye
4a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin du rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te//ting
4a7(phal chen): nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu na mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang /dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung
4b1(phal chen): chos dgu 'o//kye rgyal ba'i seMs snying hU~M byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyis las/dus thams cad la yang dag par
4b2(phal chen): gzhol zhing /ye shes chen po cha gas pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes bcu pa'o//kye rgyal
4b3(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/byang chub sems dpa'i snying po byang chub mchog lo gnas
4b4(phal chen): pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur pa dag go/kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnams bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag pa ro mthong nas/snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i
4b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na/'thab mo dang /
4b6(phal chen): gr-i yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to//
4b7(phal chen): yid gnyis dang /the tshom du gyur pa'i mdang /lha rnams kyi yid gnyis da the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//bdud kyi sde yongasu smin par
5a1(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//'thab mo dang gsul la mos pa'i lha dang /mi rnams kun nus bsdu ba dang /kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang
5a2(phal chen): mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongasu bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//sems can
5a3(phal chen): gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi
5a4(phal chen): bdud kyilas yongasu bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lom thams cad las 'das pa yongasu bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//nyon mong
5a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs kyis nyam smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang /byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan
5a6(phal chen): pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to//kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/byang
5a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to//kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na/byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul po ston to//
5b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/bcu gang zhe na/kye rgyal
5b2(phal chen): bo'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'o rnams bdud dang /las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongasu
5b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa yin/byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par brtse ba yin/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byom klas pa thams cad
5b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin/chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bsngags pa yin/chos snang ba rnam par dpyang par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba
5b5(phal chen): yin/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang /dbyangs su ldan pa yin/
5b6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyi rlabs pa yin/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
5b7(phal chen): gsungs dang /thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yi/skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam por 'tshang rgya ba yin/shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
6a1(phal chen): 'dzin kyang rab tu zab pa san/de bzhin ga sh+laugs pa'i stabs dang ldan pa yon tu/'di ltar gnas dang gnas pa yon bya'o mas
6a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin+da/zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi skyabs dang ldan pa yin te/kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin
6a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/stobs bcu pa de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/de bzhin gshegs pa
6a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i glung su 'gro'o//kye rgyal ba'i spos de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6a5(phal chen): ni/chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang
6a6(phal chen): dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sku rje suM bsgrags pa dang /bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu btags pa dang /sangs rgyab kyi rnam par ther bu rtsubs
6a7(phal chen): bamed pa'i rjesu song ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba du thugs pa med cing blta bar da la so
6b1(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang /sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang /bskal pa grangs
6b2(phal chen): med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'tshod pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dong /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /
6b3(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o//kye rgyal ba'i sros sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnams pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos
6b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo skor//kye rgyal bri sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud
6b5(phal chen): la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang /mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs
6b6(phal chen): dang /snying rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs dang /sems can gyi khams thams cad ma gtong ba dang /ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
6b7(phal chen): du ston pa dang /dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang /rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang /dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang /
7a1(phal chen): lus kyi dbang zil gyi mi non pa dang /tshigagi dbang dmigs par dkung ba dang /ye shes kyi dbang srog/bzhin du khong du chud par byung ba
7a2(phal chen): kyekyi rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'kho
7a3(phal chen): lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang /mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyuraro//kye rgyal ba'i sras/sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rdzogs
7a4(phal chen): par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbong gzigs nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'dul ba
7a5(phal chen): chen po ston te/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongasu bstan pa dang /'dus byas thams cad yid brtan
7a6(phal chen): du mi rung bar bstan pa dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'dzegs pa dang /bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'brel ba yang dag par bstan
7a7(phal chen): pa dang /gzugs kyi lus la zhon pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang /chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar
7b1(phal chen): dang /rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mi ldogs par yang su bstan pa dang /'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang sgyur du med pa yongasu brtan pa dang
7b2(phal chen): sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu me'i rnam pa lta bur yang su bstan pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang/
7b3(phal chen): dag par bstan pa dang /kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongasu bstan pa dang /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis
7b4(phal chen): kyang de bzhin te/sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/dgongs pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te//'dul
7b5(phal chen): ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen
7b6(phal chen): bokhor yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
7b7(phal chen): rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yong su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongasu ston to//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongasu sbyor ba zhes
8a1(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o//don tshud med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o//mkhas
8a2(phal chen): pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod po dang /smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o//sems can gang gis
8a3(phal chen): 'di thos par gyur te/thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang /mos por gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub po de dag thams cad myur du bla na med
8a4(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kye rgyal ba'i sras/de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan
8a5(phal chen): lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yino//kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8a6(phal chen): pi nan tan la gnas pas/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/don
8a7(phal chen): rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang
8b1(phal chen): / par 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad tshulam dang bral ba/'gro ba thams cad dang thun mangs ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgra snang bar byed pa
8b2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'bel bar byed pa 'di/rim gror byas te mnyan par bya'o//blangs par bya'o//
8b3(phal chen): yongasu gzung bar bya bo//yongasu bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongasu sbyang ba dang /smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o//kye rgyal ba'i
8b4(phal chen): sras de ltar brtson po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yino//'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i
8b5(phal chen): le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/phyogs
8b6(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas
8b7(phal chen): shing gsal bar gyur to//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/kye rgyal
9a1(phal chen): ba'i bu legaso leg so//ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgor
9a2(phal chen): le'u/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba/ye shes
9a3(phal chen): kyi sgo la 'jug pa/'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro
9a4(phal chen): ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
9a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod/chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byung ba ste/rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyis
9a6(phal chen): rlabs dang //mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de/nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngagaso//de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegapa pa
9a7(phal chen): thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngagaso//kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma
9b1(phal chen): thos pa'o chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyis byin
9b2(phal chen): gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur boltas te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//
9b3(phal chen): gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa//gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras//gang
9b4(phal chen): rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'go pa//dpe zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan par byos//gang dag sangs
9b5(phal chen): rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang //gang
9b6(phal chen): rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa/de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya//gang
9b7(phal chen): rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang //gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po//gang rnams
10a1(phal chen): de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes thasmra bsam bzhi zhing rab zhi ga/'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brdud par bya//gang
10a2(phal chen): rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa//'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston//sems
10a3(phal chen): bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jigs pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa//de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/
10a4(phal chen): srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzer ba dang //'chi dang mya ngani ngag gis btses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong
10a5(phal chen): nas//de drug thar par bya phyir snying rje rgya tshon bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa//de dag yon tan shin tu dpe ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan
10a6(phal chen): par byos//sbyin+da dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson g+has dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rten//shes rab thobs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams pa
10a7(phal chen): snying rje lhags pa'i bsam pa dang //dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing gtang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgya re yang spyod spyad pa//de dge spyod ldan yon tan
10b1(phal chen): ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag nyon//gang rnams de dag byang chub gtor phyir bye ba khrag khrig skyong gi lus snyoms pa//gang rnams byung chub zhi pa tshol zhing
10b2(phal chen): srog lnga lbu ba med par gyur pa dang //gang rnams de dag sems can ngan phyir rtag brtson bdog gi bde ba mi tshul ba//byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag
10b3(phal chen): kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya//rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyis//de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du
10b4(phal chen): brjod byas kyang //dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang //sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba
10b5(phal chen): mnyan par byos//gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang //mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms
10b6(phal chen): par yod mi 'gyur//'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing skyong ste//ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin//
10b7(phal chen): byams brlan yin snying rje rje pa dga' ba sdong po brten bsdom pa ste//zeb ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma mye tog yon ta nA tsa naM//sangs rgyas 'od kyi rab tu rgyas byas
11a1(phal chen): blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa//de dang de drug pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gros 'gro ba rnams la snang //sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams
11a2(phal chen): dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste//sdong po shes rab thabs ni yol ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga//bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes
11a3(phal chen): 'bras bu ste//chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs//rims kyis dkar yangs yongasu spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/
11a4(phal chen): dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnams par grol ba dge/stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te//de dag seng ge
11a5(phal chen): lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed//'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te//bdud kyi bya ma
11a6(phal chen): rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur ba//lam na rab skor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni//lam gyi mthar
11a7(phal chen): khrid 'dzegs pa mid pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god//'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing //yun ring nas ni
11b1(phal chen): 'dus byas sdug bsngal dgra la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba//sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa'i nad pa kun gso zhing //nad rnams zhi bar byed
11b2(phal chen): pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston//rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dag raM byed 'gro la chos ston pa//sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas
11b3(phal chen): yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces//rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba//rgya che ni byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de
11b4(phal chen): drag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor//tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon//ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud
11b5(phal chen): kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa//chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag spangs rgyas bskor ba yin//'khor lo mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu
11b6(phal chen): stegs thams cad 'joms//ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan//byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes
11b7(phal chen): par bka'//thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhags bsam dge/de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas
12a1(phal chen): zad par mi 'gyur//'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa//bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'bal ye
12a2(phal chen): shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa ma skul ba//gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur//de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab
12a3(phal chen): rab brtan 'gro bu kun gyis bltos//lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun tham
12a4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i spyod las bsam pa mi phyed de//bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa//de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa
12a5(phal chen): nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las bzlog par byed//byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i klog chen rgyu zhing ldog/thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul
12a6(phal chen): gnas pa'i dbyungs kyi 'brug sgra'i byin cing rab tu s+hog/tha de yang dag shes dang tshul khrims yan lag brjid ldan tshwa'i tshwa re 'bebs pa//de dag de da
12a7(phal chen): sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags//shes rab dga' dang khrel yod dag na phobs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng //ye shes shing
12b1(phal chen): thogs yon to thar pa'i sgro byo dran pa de dag sgo ba yin//bden pa rnams ni lam tshon bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa//sring po gsum na bdud sgo dag
12b2(phal chen): gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston//thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dugA rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan//gshog pa thabs kyi
12b3(phal chen): stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yino//ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thu bo med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra//srid pa'i mchis
12b4(phal chen): nus 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'dra' bu'i mchog la 'god//tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang bre'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes//
12b5(phal chen): 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed//stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad+mo yongasu rgyas byed
12b6(phal chen): pa//de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung //chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis bzhin mdzes pa ste//
12b7(phal chen): nyan thas rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan//sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par
13a1(phal chen): stan//de dang de dag yo shesu zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa na mkha'i mtha'//chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan
13a2(phal chen): dag gis brgyan//ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mag ste chos la dbang chen sgyur gnas pa//lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang ba sna chags kun gyis blta ba'i dbang
13a3(phal chen): bo ste//chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin//srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dab dang nyon mongs las las rab 'dus kun dbang po//
13a4(phal chen): byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos//srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa//de dang
13a5(phal chen): dode dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel//'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang //phyir ldog mi 'gyur/
13a6(phal chen): blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la//chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldeg mi 'gyur ba//thams cad mkhyen gyi
13a7(phal chen): yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang //na mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba//'gro ba
13b1(phal chen): kun du bya ba nyams lon khyu mchog tsI la'ang gnas pa med pa so//'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa//de dang de dag ye shes dag
13b2(phal chen): zhing dge ngas shes rab ni mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra//de dang de dag shin tu skye chen thabs ldan kyi 'gro kun gyi gsos//chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon
13b3(phal chen): mongs me ni rab tu sel//de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal//ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na
13b4(phal chen): rab tu rgyu//de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel//de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun du 'joms//de dang de dag yon
13b5(phal chen): tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed//ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin//de dang de dag me tog lta bur
13b6(phal chen): yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtswa//phreng ba lta dror de dang de dag smon lam pa cings shing 'jig rten mo go la gnas//de dang dri dag tshul khrims mnyams skyon mod
13b7(phal chen): rnams dag drin dri rob zhim//de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyong
14a1(phal chen): bar byed//ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mdo'i do dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol//de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dun sna tshogs yid 'ong ye
14a2(phal chen): shes kun tu 'phags//gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed//theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yos de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum
14a3(phal chen): las 'byin//de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas//de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtes ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'//
14a4(phal chen): klu'i dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs//de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum par mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon//dpa' bo lta bu de
14a5(phal chen): dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrugs//mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu'i de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud//de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur
14a6(phal chen): mun pasel cing sems can thams cad lam yid ston//de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan dred cing lam rgyun rjesu 'gro/de dang de dag zam pa lta bur rig pa med
14a7(phal chen): rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol//gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed//de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la
14b1(phal chen): 'god//de dag bskyed mos tshul gyi dga' ba rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston//de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhol med khang dag pa//mkhas pa
14b2(phal chen): de dang de dag sman stor nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel//sman gyis rgyas pa'i gnas ji lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gan so//de dag sangs rgyas lta bur
14b3(phal chen): ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel//yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed//de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar
14b4(phal chen): 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas//de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs//zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags
14b5(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la ston//de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes//de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med//
14b6(phal chen): de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes//gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa//kun
14b7(phal chen): tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjesu song zhing ming dbyangs rjesu song ba yin//gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston//de
15a1(phal chen): drug mthun 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam par kun du brjod par mi nuso//gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas
15a2(phal chen): shing //yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can//thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min//
15a3(phal chen): de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshag+masanA bya//chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas//mkhas pas
15a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed//sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i//byang chub sems
15a5(phal chen): dpa' ma nor yid can rtsi cig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags//lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston//sems med yid
15a6(phal chen): med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston//khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs pacig rnam par brjod byed kyang //'gro ba dag gos
15a7(phal chen): sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod//nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sgyur to//brjod du med pa'i rdul gyis
15b1(phal chen): zhi ba togs shing sa rnams thams cad rab tu ston//de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal namakha' mtshungs par yang dag shes//'gro ba kun la bya ba rnams pa sngarak+Sha/
15b2(phal chen): sgrosgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston//de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med lus kyang de dag ston pa byed//'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthu gnas pa
15b3(phal chen): ji snyed pa//thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med//rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshigs rnam pa ste/
15b4(phal chen): mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing //me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil sbyin gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams//thams
15b5(phal chen): cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing //mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston//
15b6(phal chen): mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi//'khor rnams kun na spang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed//chos kyi dam pa thos nas
15b7(phal chen): ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing //blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam/par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med//'phro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab
16a1(phal chen): skye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin//sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang bya 'gro ba kun la ston//sna tshogs gzugs dang
16a2(phal chen): sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston//'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med//'gro dron rjes 'gro de dag
16a3(phal chen): la la dag tu thog ma'i semasu 'gro ba ston//la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston//la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson
16a4(phal chen): 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams//lA lar tshangs pa'i lom sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston//mkhas pa rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs
16a5(phal chen): shing bzod pa thob pa ston//le lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba//la lar nyan thos gzugasu gyur cing la la dag tu rang
16a6(phal chen): rgyal gzugasu gyur//bye ba khrag khrog mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bras spyod las ldog pa med//de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs
16a7(phal chen): par 'gyur//de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskoro la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston//la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yod zhi la la ra rgyal po dbang phyug
16b1(phal chen): 'gyur//la lar chos kyi dra byar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston//la lar bud med sgyu cal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur//
16b2(phal chen): la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing lnga lar bsam gtan thub pa byed//la lar mya ngan 'da' de nga tshe'i sA dang la l-ir rgan dang byis par ston//de dag
16b3(phal chen): spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur//la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston//la lar
16b4(phal chen): monga' zhugs la la ro rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor//la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob//la lar bud med tshogs
16b5(phal chen): kyi dpung gnas la lar ting 'dzin lo lar pad+mo rab 'byung //la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs//la lar 'khor
16b6(phal chen): lo rab tu skor zhing lA par sna tshogs chos rnams yongasu tshol//la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams phye ba bor+m+mar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang //byang chub
16b7(phal chen): don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams lnga byi phyir ldog ma yin no//bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pos bskal pa bye bo phrag brgya dag/
17a1(phal chen): mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed//'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i
17a2(phal chen): yul rnams thams cad ston//stsogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston//gang phyir rgyal ba nyes rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs
17a3(phal chen): med kun na bzhugs pas na//'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul cig steng du mthong //sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems
17a4(phal chen): can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong //de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur//de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi
17a5(phal chen): sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes//sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams//de dag 'gro ba
17a6(phal chen): gcig dang mi lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed//bslab pa 'di'i phyogs la pha rol phyin to ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed//dbang po rnon po dang
17a7(phal chen): ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas//'gro bar bskal pa yod dang bskal pa med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bskor ba byed//dbang po re re
17b1(phal chen): la yang dbang ba thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang //dbang po'i dngos pa prA ba n+d+ra pA dang klung dag dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab tu shes//do ltar khams dang zacu
17b2(phal chen): dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag tshugs rnams kyang shes//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sems spyod da myur byung ba'ang de bzhin te//sems can kun gyi
17b3(phal chen): spyod pa'i phyirarol byin kyang 'od dang 'gro ba yod ma yin//ma nor skyid pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dmo bston pa byed//de ltar sems kyi sems spya de sna rgyog
17b4(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag/sems gcig la nI khong du tshu de nas byang chub mchog mkhyen rnams sangs rgya//sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba
17b5(phal chen): rnams phyi rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas//sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gnol pos ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god//rdzu 'phrul mchog thob pa
17b6(phal chen): shes khyos chog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags//sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du 'dra 'gro/
17b7(phal chen): de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang //sgro rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med//'tsho ba'i don
18a1(phal chen): du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang //sgyu ma kun btsal gzugasu mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang
18a2(phal chen): dmigs pa med//de ltar mr-i khas pa yi shes thabs dang shes rab rgya tshon sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams//sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par
18a3(phal chen): byas shing rab tu ston//nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'pho gas pa'i rnams//ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma
18a4(phal chen): yin//de ltar chas nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams//'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang
18a5(phal chen): 'dres ma yin//la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed//lo ni bya ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad//de ltar
18a6(phal chen): chosde nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs ku ni ston te//skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur//ri'i dbang
18a7(phal chen): po ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra//kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med//de bzhin chos kyi rang
18b1(phal chen): bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag/rnyog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston//dpyod zla dag go smog
18b2(phal chen): rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas//de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing rde bas ji skom rnams 'phel ba//de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems
18b3(phal chen): can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams//shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel//gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te
18b4(phal chen): tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra//'du shes thams cad mig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra//sems ni sgyu 'dra sgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu
18b5(phal chen): skyon//de ltar phung po dgod pa sbyin kyang dbang sur dag ni de la gnas pa med//skye mchod stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang meda'i khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang //khams
18b6(phal chen): ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston//dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston//de ltar
18b7(phal chen): de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med//'ong ba med cing phyog su 'gri ba mad la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi//nyom mongs rgyu las byung ba'i
19a1(phal chen): las drang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du//rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi//yang
19a2(phal chen): dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston//skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston//'did
19a3(phal chen): dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs skyon pa byed//sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston//thams cad mkhyen pa
19a4(phal chen): nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin stan//gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin//khams dang mos
19a5(phal chen): ba dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa//mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag/sangs rgyas stobs
19a6(phal chen): bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med//sangs rgyas thams cad rjesu dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de//nyon
19a7(phal chen): mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med//'byung ba thugasu chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad//'di'i
19b1(phal chen): gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med//'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang ma mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste//mos
19b2(phal chen): dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams med pa//thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum
19b3(phal chen): mkhyen mnga' ba//'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med bsnyes pa//chos sgro gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog/
19b4(phal chen): de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya//de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te//'on kyang ji ltar
19b5(phal chen): sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya//sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams spyod pa//mchog dang ldan
19b6(phal chen): zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnams gnon cing //tshul khrims mi g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par byed//lung bstan rab tu
19b7(phal chen): thob nos rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed//sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed//bskal pa'i dus
20a1(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med//gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag za dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal//
20a2(phal chen): bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi pa rnam pararo 'tshang yang rgya//sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed//snying
20a3(phal chen): rdorje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan//brtson pas pha rol phyo ni rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas//khyu mchog
20a4(phal chen): mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub ngom pa mngon 'tshang rgya//mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa//yon tan
20a5(phal chen): thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyugs mchog tu 'gyur//dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs//ye shes
20a6(phal chen): mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sbrul sgrub cing byang chub zhi pa nye bar 'gro//mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyi ni rab tu thob//zab
20a7(phal chen): la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams//ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin//
20b1(phal chen): spyodas par 'jug pa'i yo shos yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'chang yang rgyu//ye shus rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shos pas rnam par rno//dog
20b2(phal chen): po'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral pos 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra//gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po//'gro ba kun la
20b3(phal chen): rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo bo med//bsam pa shin du shes pas bstan po rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bso//mkhas pa dag ni dag cing
20b4(phal chen): sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis//'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra//ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi
20b5(phal chen): zod don du spyod pa chen po spyod//de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas//shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa
20b6(phal chen): med//byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas//sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zab thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/
20b7(phal chen): rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pa na//zhing rnams kun dang chog gi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas//
21a1(phal chen): lus dang smon ldum spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te//'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston//
21a2(phal chen): mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse//khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med//
21a3(phal chen): mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu rkyen//sangs rgyas sras ngag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang
21a4(phal chen): ldan//de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed//dam pa
21a5(phal chen): de dag sems bskyed cig las sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston//rgyal po'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas//bsam
21a6(phal chen): pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur//mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston//bag chags
21a7(phal chen): thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin//nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya//bsam pa rnam par spangs
21b1(phal chen): nas de dag skyon mod gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob//mkhas pa 'di lam shin+da tu bsgrubs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nus grags//mtha' yas soms kyi yul ldan
21b2(phal chen): gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed//ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin du ston//spyod pa lhag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa
21b3(phal chen): stolho yin snying po ye shes mchog/snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin//shes rab mgo ste chos rtog mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni
21b4(phal chen): rna ba yin//tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te//spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes ngom pa yin//
21b5(phal chen): spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin//tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yulo//gang gis de
21b6(phal chen): dge snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul//sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings
21b7(phal chen): sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsres pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang //bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang sgyur ba ni bsam
22a1(phal chen): /gtan dam pa yin//rgyu bla mu tsong namakha' 'dra ba shos rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren//sgyu med skyong rje rnam dag chos ni dag banyan
22a2(phal chen): mongs gnas las btang yang sgyums//don ni zhi bo chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'grel bsngos//ye shes tshigs nI ril gri rnon pa lta bu snang ba
22a3(phal chen): chen po reg pa ste//'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med//nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas
22a4(phal chen): bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad//rgyal ba rnams kyi phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin//nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spang ste
22a5(phal chen): rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed//bdud rnams byin gyis rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis 'phags//chos kyi byin gyi
22a6(phal chen): rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'tshong ba lha'i gnas su 'dong //lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro//skye bo mchog ni
22a7(phal chen): nye bar bstan chos mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed//mkhas po de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston//chags pa med
22b1(phal chen): par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyun kyang byed//stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skyo zhing yang dag bskul ba byed//bdud rnams btul te byang chub go//
22b2(phal chen): 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud//gang gis mkhas po bskal
22b3(phal chen): pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas//sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang //rnam pa kun du sems can mi
22b4(phal chen): gnas chos la ma yin spyod lam yin pa'i//de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to//de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog
22b5(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse//zhing rnams bye ba stong yong skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te//lag tu khyer to zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus
22b6(phal chen): la'ang ngal dub gang yang med//mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnasu bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med//'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam
22b7(phal chen): pa tha dad bstan pa dag/kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston//mkhas pa ba spu'i bu ga ro rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab
23a1(phal chen): d+har+m+marten du d+ma/ma nang 'grub mod 'gro bya dgu la gnod par 'gyur mod byubad+ma yang ston//khor yug khrag khrog shin du zla ba'i rdul rgyas
23a2(phal chen): lag gis bsdus khyer zhing //zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhug mi byed//zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhon
23a3(phal chen): yang rnam par 'jog byed de//de 'dra'i rjesu dang ba zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad//'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dge stong rnams ji snyed dang /
23a4(phal chen): gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me'i 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od//mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyid//'jig rten kun
23a5(phal chen): gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston//'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa//khyu mchog de dag tshig
23a6(phal chen): gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshangs par brjod//srog chags bya ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur//rgyal bas bstan
23a7(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur//gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs skal par ston//gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang
23b1(phal chen): dpar byung ba ji stod do dag 'das par ston//khyu mtsham dag ni zhing rnams 'chog dang gnas pa rnams pa tha dad ston pa byed//'gro ba dz+ra skrod thams cad mkhas pa ngo
23b2(phal chen): dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god//'das dang mi byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa//de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur
23b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa ston//sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems//de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la ga nas
23b4(phal chen): pa gang yang med//lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing //brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi'i
23b5(phal chen): rnams//gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la//sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa
23b6(phal chen): ston//'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams//thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston//'du
23b7(phal chen): shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang sgyur ba//bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston//de dag de dang rnam
24a1(phal chen): par 'phrul pa shin tu rgyu tshon dam pa gzhan yang ston//de dag gung la 'jig rten sa mon pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston//ston kyang bya ba
24a2(phal chen): lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed//de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/lus ni na mkha' lta
24a3(phal chen): bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso//tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs brgyan//chos kyi go 'phang skyon med
24a4(phal chen): thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste//bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas//pha rol phyin pa
24a5(phal chen): rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ye shes rdzu 'phrul rje ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin//spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo
24a6(phal chen): bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o//thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur//stong pa khyi mo ste ting 'dzin grong khyer
24a7(phal chen): mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o//shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin//'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni
24b1(phal chen): gdugs te yo shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng //de dang de dag bzod pa'i skabs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms//gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung
24b2(phal chen): ye shes lu ma shes rab shing //me tog byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan//stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yon te rnam par dpyod pa
24b3(phal chen): bzang po btsun mo yin//thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba thag pa gsum gyi rtse//de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang //
24b4(phal chen): gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongasu mi skye bas//ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro bu ye shes mchog la 'god//kha na ma tho kun med
24b5(phal chen): ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen po nyid rgyas byed//zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la//bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang
24b6(phal chen): skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de//skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi//sangs rgyas sras rnams smod pa dag ni bskal
24b7(phal chen): pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nuso//gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang //gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas
25a1(phal chen): /bad la dgod par 'dod pa dang //gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/dus ni rdo rje lta bu brtan
25a2(phal chen): pa'i sems gyis te yon tan bslab par byos//shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las//'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste///
25a3(phal chen): bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o////bam po brgyad cu drug pa//bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal//skyabs med pa la zas sbyin
25a4(phal chen): pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang //pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na//byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang //'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/
25a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang //brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang //chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang //me tog
25a6(phal chen): dom pa'i ye shes dang //nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang //zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang //dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang //rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang //rdul med dam
25a7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang //byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang //byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang //ri rab rgyal mtshan
25b1(phal chen): dang /rin chen rgyal mtshan dang /chags med rgyal mtshan dang /me tog rgyal mtshan dang //dri medang rgyal mtshan dang /nyi ma'i rgyul rngu tshan dang /mdzes pa'i rgyal
25b2(phal chen): mtshan dang /rdul med rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen grwazi brjid dang /blo
25b3(phal chen): gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang /ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang /dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang /chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang //bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang /
25b4(phal chen): ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang /kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas
25b5(phal chen): par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /pad+mo'i snying po dang /rin po che'i snying po dang /nyi ma'i snying
25b6(phal chen): po dang /yon tan rnam dge snying po dang /chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang /rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang /gtsug gi snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i
25b7(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang /rnam par dag pa'i mig dang /dri ma med pa'i mig dang /chags pa med pa'i mig dang /kun
26a1(phal chen): nas blta ba'i mig dang /shin tu rnam par blta ba'i mgo dang /ud pa la'i mig dang /rdo rje'i mig dang /rin pa che'i mika dang /byang chub sems
26a2(phal chen): dpa' na mkha'i mig dang /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang /chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang /
26a3(phal chen): phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /sangs rgyas thams cad yang drag par byung po'i snying po'i cod pan dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
26a4(phal chen): pa'i cod pan dang /kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i
26a5(phal chen): cod pan dang /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings na mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug bud dang /
26a6(phal chen): klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug pud dang /byang chub dam pa'i gtsug pud dang /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad
26a7(phal chen): rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug pud
26b1(phal chen): /nA mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dang par rnam par dmigs pa'i ran chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang /ngo bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'bral
26b2(phal chen): bsnang ba'i rgyal mtshon rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug pud dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug pur
26b3(phal chen): dang /byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug pud dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang /gzi brjid dri ma med
26b4(phal chen): pa'i 'od dang /rin po'i tshe'i 'od dang /rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang /skar ma'i 'od dang /chos kyi 'od dang /zhi ba'i 'od dang /nyi ma'i 'od dang /rnam par
26b5(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang /ye shes dpal dang /chos kyi dpal dang /mngon par shes
26b6(phal chen): pa'i dpal dang /'od kyi dpal dang /me tog dpal dang /rin po che'i dpal dang /byang chub kyi dpal dang /tshangs pa'i dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas
26b7(phal chen): snang ba'i dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang /sasgra'i dbyangs dang /'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang /ri dbang
27a1(phal chen): rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang /chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyus pa'i dpyangs dang /chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang /
27a2(phal chen): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang /snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrogs po'i dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'gra
27a3(phal chen): ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbug so 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa'o chos kyi 'phags pa dang /khyod par gyis 'phags pa dang /
27a4(phal chen): ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang /bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang /yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang /grags pas 'phags pa dang /kun du
27a5(phal chen): snang bas 'phags pa dang /byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang /ye shes pa rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
27a6(phal chen): birgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpral dang /mchog gi dpal dang /kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang /rnam par snang
27a7(phal chen): pa'i dpal dang /chos kyi dpal dang /zla ba'i dpal dang /na mkha'i dpal dang /rin po che'i dpal dang /dpal gyi dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa'
27b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' ro'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /tshangs pa'i dbang po'i/
27b2(phal chen): rgyal po dang /tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /khyu mchog
27b3(phal chen): dbang po'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /chags pa med pa'i sgra dang /sa'i dbyangs
27b4(phal chen): kyi sgra dang /rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang /sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang /chos snang ba'i sgra dang /na mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang /sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
27b5(phal chen): rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang /sngon gyi smon lam yongasasu skul ba'i sgra dang /byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang /byang chub
27b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang /ye shes ri bo'i blo dang /na mkha'i blo dang /dri ma med pa'i blo dang /chags pa med pa'i blo dang /rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang //
27b7(phal chen): dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang /yangs pa'i blo dang /kun du snang ba'i blo dang /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyingasu snang ba'i blo dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub
28a1(phal chen): sems dpa' lnga stod tsam ste/kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam gyi byung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams/
28a2(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'greng pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'a dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/sangs
28a3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yongasu bstan pa/rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa//de bzhin gshegs
28a4(phal chen): pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/nye bar 'dong pa rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob
28a5(phal chen): pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/'gro ba'i
28a6(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongasu ston pas/na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par drag cing mi gnas pa/sems
28a7(phal chen): can gyi khams sems can med pa dang /srog med pa yongasu shes pas rab ri bo med pa/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas
28b1(phal chen): namakha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mngon//
28b2(phal chen): bar khong du chud pa//yang dag dag pa'i mngon sum du gyur pachos kyi rang bzhini la zhugs pa/srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs
28b3(phal chen): su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang /bag la nyal ba dang /bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa na mkha' ltar zhi ba la
28b4(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa/sangs rgyas la the tsam dang /nem nur dang yid gnyis yongasu chad pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang /
28b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i dron du zhugs pa//gsol pa ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen
28b6(phal chen): du gyur pa/sems can gzhon bsrung ba la zhugs pa/'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/sems can
28b7(phal chen): thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongasu bsrung ba la
29a1(phal chen): zhugs pa/sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du
29a2(phal chen): 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas po de dge
29a3(phal chen): dang /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang /'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
29a4(phal chen): yul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /de
29a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
29a6(phal chen): pa'i mnga' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'khrul pa dang /
29a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /dge ba'i ga shes gnyen
29b1(phal chen): kyi skyabs dang /dang ba'i mig yongasu drug pa dang /rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'o bskum pa rnam par dag pa
29b2(phal chen): dang /bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing //yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/khong
29b3(phal chen): du chud pa 'am/yid ches pa 'am/yongasu shes pa'im/rnam par rtogs pa 'am/gzung ba 'am/rnam par dpyad pa 'am/rnam par bsgom pa 'am/rnam par
29b4(phal chen): dbye ba 'am/rnam par grol ba 'am/rab tu brjod pa 'am/sems can pha rol gyi rgyud bu byin par bya bar ni mi nus nA/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub
29b5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang /sems can bsam pa chas pa tha dad pa dang /mos pa sna tshogs dang /shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda'
29b6(phal chen): sna tshogs su gyur pa/dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan pa gnas pa/dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan//
29b7(phal chen): ce na/sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa chos bston pa gzhan dang gzhan pa ma/
30a1(phal chen): pa dag la/sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs//
30a2(phal chen): pa lta'ang yang dag par bstun grang /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu drag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /sngon
30a3(phal chen): gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongasu mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang //sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
30a4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang yang dag par bstan grangs/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon por bsgrubs pa rnam
30a5(phal chen): par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkang ba yongs dag par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /
30a6(phal chen): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dbyung ba'i rgyul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang sngun gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par
30a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par spyan grang /byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta yang yang
30b1(phal chen): dag par bstan grang /mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab
30b2(phal chen): tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /khyu mchog gi mthu lha yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang /rnam
30b3(phal chen): par 'phrul ba lce yang yang dag par bstan grwang/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lha yang yang dag par bstan grangs/de
30b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
30b5(phal chen): cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnasu gshegs shing /rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad
30b6(phal chen): pa lta yang yang dag par bstan gling /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhi ni gshegs
30b7(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa sems cad thams cad
31a1(phal chen): sems kyi tshul la/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can tham//
31a2(phal chen): cad la rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongasu bstan pa dang /rjes su/
31a3(phal chen): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi tingange 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis
31a4(phal chen): mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu
31a5(phal chen): rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin na mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang
31a6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin tsan/thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/thugs rje chen po'i chos
31a7(phal chen): can la mnyam par bzhag/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/pho 'brang brtsegs pa/rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med
31b1(phal chen): y-i s+yA d+ha/rdothub pa med pa'onan mtshan gyis sa gno rab tu brtan pa dang /nor buran durgya'i rgyal po thams cad rtsod bkun du b+ha/mA dra/rlon pan
31b2(phal chen): ma'i me tog sil mas chel bar gang ba/nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang /bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam
31b3(phal chen): par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /rin po che bzad pa mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che/'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu rgyun pa dang /rin
31b4(phal chen): po che thams cad lo//gang dang /rta babs dang /pu shu dang /skur khung byas shing /khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang /'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad
31b5(phal chen): dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang /nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i
31b6(phal chen): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang /sgo dang /rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes
31b7(phal chen): par byas pa dang /phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang /phyogs kun nas them skas kyi 'phreng ba nor bu rin po ches
32a1(phal chen): brtsegs shing /shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/'dza ta'i tshul thams cad kyang /rgyu zheng gab par
32a2(phal chen): shin tu yangs shing rgya chu bar kun nas gnas par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi mthus/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi
32a3(phal chen): zhing rnams kyang /chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs po dang /rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med
32a4(phal chen): pas kun nas grub pa dang /nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rta lnga'i phreng byas mdzes pas brgyan par
32a5(phal chen): kun nas gnas par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa glen mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongasu gang ba/rin po che sna
32a6(phal chen): tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dras par gyur la g.yas phyogs 'khyil zhing 'bi ba pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dpyangs sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun
32a7(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur te/rin po che'i me tog pu N+Da ri ka'i phreng ba dang /rin po che'i shing gam yo//rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shingashin
32b1(phal chen): du 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog
32b2(phal chen): bris/nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan zhing mdzes pa dang /nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs
32b3(phal chen): med pa/spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba/bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to//rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med
32b4(phal chen): pa dang /gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang /rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan
32b5(phal chen): dang /phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu rin po che snang
32b6(phal chen): bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu smrig
32b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
33a1(phal chen): /snron b+h+yo bar bcu skrag pa'i rgyul mAn+dan+da dang /nAr rlon pa na rgyul ba d+hA sar+b+ba ts+tshad smra thams cad t+ta ba d+d+hal na rgyud dang
33a2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi rgyunA rnam par byA baM thams cad phyogs kun nus brgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur te//'ju te'i tshul gyi na mkha'i dbyings thams
33a3(phal chen): cad kyangalha'i gzhal mod khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pos brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/'dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang /spos sna tshogs kyi
33a4(phal chen): shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /brjod du med pa'i rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang
33a5(phal chen): rol mo brdung ba dang /dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sbyin las de bzhin ga shegros pa thams cad le bstod pa'i dbyangs dang /nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas
33a6(phal chen): kun nas brgyan pa dang /rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nus yog cing brgyan pa dang /rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng
33a7(phal chen): lho rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing /de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sman gyis kun dang
33b1(phal chen): brgyan pa dang /g+ha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang /mu tig dkar ba'i dra ba'i
33b2(phal chen): sbyin brjod du med pas kun nas brkyen pa dang /mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nAs yog cing brgyan pa dang /rdo rje lta bur slu ba'i mu
33b3(phal chen): tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i
33b4(phal chen): rtsu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang //
33b5(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyiraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam
33b6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyiraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas//sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i
33b7(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs yongasu ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyiraro//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan
34a1(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par yongs smyon pa mdzad pa ba sam+b+ha gyis mi khyab pa'i phyiro//de bzhin gla shegs pa rnams pa sU bu ga gcig tu
34a2(phal chen): mtha de bzhin gshegs pa gar+b+he ga nas gcig tu brgyud pa/yongasu ston pa mdzod pa bas mo skyes myi khyab pa'i b+h+yo /de bzhin gshegs pa ru s+yA
34a3(phal chen): zer gcig gI sbyi nus 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas po smang par 'gyur ba bsam gyis m+b+hi khyab pa'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa swAng+gI d+he ma gcig
34a4(phal chen): las sprul pa'i spyi ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyi khyab pa'i phyiraro//
34a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa rnams bya sgra'i sgro gaN+DIg nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri ba dang /'jig pa'i bsgral pa yongasu ston pa bsam gyis ma~M khyab pa'i phyir/dz+dza
34a6(phal chen): ltar 'adz+re ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dgra pas/yongasu dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
34a7(phal chen): khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang /yongasu dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang /shin du
34b1(phal chen): spya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras yongs rgyas pa dang /'dud tshul du sa dashA pAr blun pa da /byang chub sems dbus yongs rgyas pa dang //de ldanan ga
34b2(phal chen): bo'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam ra klanas pa dang /brgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par ba pa dang /rin po tshe thams cad kyi da kyis rab tu
34b3(phal chen): snang ba dang /rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sbyin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa
