34b4(phal chen): dedang /lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad k+Sh+mI sbyin gyi chur rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing
34b5(phal chen): brnyan pa dang /gis tham+b+ha sA kyi shing gi sbyin gyi mdzad nas gas 'a dog ste nag su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bra pas brgyan pa dang /rnyeng ba dedam+b+hi dang /
34b6(phal chen): sdom de'i rgyun thams cad kyi sbyin gyi char rgyun mo 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brtun pa dang /spos sna tshogs kyi bdug smos phyugs kun nas 'thule de
34b7(phal chen): sprin dang /nu bun gyi tshar thams cad kyi rus kyi dbyengs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dri ba'i sprin las rin
35a1(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mI 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang /rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu la mtshan dang /ba dan rgya
35a2(phal chen): sbyin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/na mkha'i dbyings sngun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang /rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo ro ni po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab
35a3(phal chen): mima'i dkyil 'khor can/chu ba 'thon po dang ldan pa'i zi ba la rol mo bkod pa/kun+da nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang /rin
35a4(phal chen): po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /rin po chu seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad po'i phreng ba dang /so mo ngos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang
35a5(phal chen): bar gyur to//de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bskyungs pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/de'i tshe shir
35a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i
35a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang
35b1(phal chen): ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang bya zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan
35b2(phal chen): 'angs ngas gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/na mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi charare
35b3(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang /lho rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang /lha rjes kyi phreng ba'i
35b4(phal chen): sbyin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /lha rdzis kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang /lha rdzas
35b5(phal chen): kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang /kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang
35b6(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyul mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin na mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rkyen yid du 'ongs pas na mkha'i dbyings
35b7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'dis gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/bcom
36a1(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/shar phyog sru brtan to khyad pa brtsegs pa dang /rgyun kun dang ldan zhing /nor bA rlon pa che'i drabs kun
36a2(phal chen): mi byur ba dang /seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che byi gas rab tu sdud pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dri ba'i
36a3(phal chen): rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
36a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
36a5(phal chen): gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thug par dka' ba'i rgyal po
36a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/'khor gyi
36a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha thams cad spos kyi lnga ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /sangs
36b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha ldi dang /drwa ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams tsud /
36b2(phal chen): tog thams cad kyi lde ldi dang /phreng ba'i dra bis kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang /ldi ldi dang se mo do'i
36b3(phal chen): dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og go gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'breng bu yongasu gzung bar byin gyis
36b4(phal chen): brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
36b5(phal chen): gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongasu blangs shing bzung bar byin gyi brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang /lnga ldi
36b6(phal chen): mang po'i dra ba kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang /zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi
36b7(phal chen): brlab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
37a1(phal chen): gzho nur bu rin po che seng ga yin du 'ong ba'i 'brung pa dang lnga ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /mi mdzod kyi 'jig
37a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dir dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/
37a3(phal chen): phyogasu bstan te/nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snad pa'i pad+mo'i snying po
37a4(phal chen): can dag mngon par sprul te/rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nis/skyil
37a5(phal chen): mo krung bcas te 'kho da do//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin
37a6(phal chen): po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems
37a7(phal chen): dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha brjid du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu//
37b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das dus gnang nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khar rgya mchod nas 'phags te/chos kyi dbyings rnams nad bdag spros kha dag sna tshogs dang/dzAn chags/
37b2(phal chen): ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang po dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang
37b3(phal chen): ldan pa'i ri rab kyi skyon/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgung ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri
37b4(phal chen): du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos khe
37b5(phal chen): dag sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams
37b6(phal chen): cad ni ra bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba/sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med po'i rdul shin
37b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang lnga na pa
38a1(phal chen): ri rab tu sbyin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi rgyus pArarA dgang ba dang /tshasta k+Shi dpyongs thams cad rlon rngan+da
38a2(phal chen): rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprinasangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
38a3(phal chen): tu phra ba skyed kyis rgyus par dgeng ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang
38a4(phal chen): ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin
38a5(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin
38a6(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang /sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi
38a7(phal chen): sprin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi na mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po/de
38b1(phal chen): bAbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongasu ston cing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgyas
38b2(phal chen): k+Shi nang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phrab snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /phyogaso bcu thams nang rin po che'i rgyal po/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
38b3(phal chen): skyed po byung r+g+ha b+hU rab tu sna ba'i 'di dang ldan pa'i de rab kyi sbyin/sangs rgya sa b+he keng brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing
38b4(phal chen): mo mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na be der lcags nasabacom ldan 'das glang na be de re dong ste/'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyog 'tshal
38b5(phal chen): nas nub phyogs brtan te/khang pa brtsegs pa/spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa/mu tig dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang /seng ge'i khri nor
38b6(phal chen): bu rin pa che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i skyong po can dag mngon par sprul nas/rin po che gser gyi dru bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /yid
38b7(phal chen): bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas/skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'am/
39a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyod kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/rin po che'i gos yongasu snang ba zhes
39a2(phal chen): bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi
39a3(phal chen): rgyal po zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba snod dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang
39a4(phal chen): nonas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa
39a5(phal chen): dang //na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang /mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyi brlab pa dang /na mkha'i dbyings rin
39a6(phal chen): po che'i gos/spros sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /na mkho'i dbyings
39a7(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang //na mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu
39b1(phal chen): 'bur ba'i skyon gyis rgyan gyis brgyan bAr b+hin phyis brlab pa dang /na mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'byur b+ha'i gros kyis sbyin gyi rgyun gyis brgyan par byung
39b2(phal chen): gyis brlab pa dang /nam mkha' dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugaso brnyan gyis sna tshogs gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlob
39b3(phal chen): pa dang /na mkha'i dbyings phyogs bocu kun nas/nor bu rin po che snam bu khyu bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongasu rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /na mkha'i dbyings
39b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'byir ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongasu rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /na mkha'i
39b5(phal chen): dbyings phyogs bcu kun nus nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongasu rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /nam
39b6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyun gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der
39b7(phal chen): lhags nos/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/'khor dang bcas pa/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/byang phyogasu brtan te/rin po che'i rgyal po
40a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongasu 'byung ba'i khang pa brno gas pa dang /seng ge'i khri bo DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/nor bu rin po che'o//
40a2(phal chen): rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra byas yongasu brgyan pa dang /rin po che skar ma'i rgyul mtshan ma gau la thigs pa'i byang chub sems dpe'ilus su byin gyis brlabs
40a3(phal chen): nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu bya
40a4(phal chen): bskyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyod pa zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
40a5(phal chen): pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
40a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags
40a7(phal chen): te 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab
40b1(phal chen): 'byam thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sbyin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad bdug spyos kyi khang
40b2(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khabs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad tsan dan+da gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis
40b3(phal chen): kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab
40b4(phal chen): ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi
40b5(phal chen): khams rab 'byam thams cad rdo rje'i khang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad
40b6(phal chen): gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams rang gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i
40b7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas khebs par bya ni gyis brlabs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad pad+mo'i khang po brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par
41a1(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bA dUrar+ya dang ste/'khor
41a2(phal chen): dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/byed dang shar gyi phyogs mtsham su brtan to/nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams
41a3(phal chen): cad la mngon par lta ba dang /seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/rin po che'i rgyal po'i me
41a4(phal chen): tog gi dra bas yongasu brgyan pa dang /rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i spyod pa na bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas
41a5(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcus te 'khod do//shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol
41a6(phal chen): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs po klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa'
41a7(phal chen): chos kyi 'ang 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/
41b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/na mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyi
41b2(phal chen): kha drog kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /na mkha'i
41b3(phal chen): dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna
41b4(phal chen): tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis
41b5(phal chen): kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /nu mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po/rin po che'i shing gi yol ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'acwokyispri kyi kun tu khyab
41b6(phal chen): par bya ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs po'i gtsug tro//bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings
41b7(phal chen): thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khar gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog
42a1(phal chen): /wA bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin gyis kun tu khya par bya ba dang /nAmakha' dbyings thams cad zla ba dang /skyur ma'i tshogs kyi
42a2(phal chen): dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gong na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na
42a3(phal chen): ba der dang ste/'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'ongs la phyag 'tshal nas/shar dang lho'i phyogs mtsham su brtan te/rin po che rdul dang bral zhing
42a4(phal chen): rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/nor bu'i
42a5(phal chen): rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongasu brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod//lho dang
42a6(phal chen): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pho rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i
42a7(phal chen): nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub
42b1(phal chen): snyoms dpa' bdud kyi 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya bA/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul
42b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das des gnang nus/'khor gyi dkyiphra 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me
42b3(phal chen): tog 'ong 'phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ster yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha' sbyar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba
42b4(phal chen): dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye pa dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin
42b5(phal chen): po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba/spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sgron/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu de gye ba dang /ba spu'i
42b6(phal chen): bu gra thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor
42b7(phal chen): bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'a phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs po rab tu dgye ba dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab
43a1(phal chen): tu 'byur bu 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye pa dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpam
43a2(phal chen): da po 'bar ba 'od 'bri ba'i/nam kha'i dbyings sbyar yongs pa rIb tu n+d+he b+hU dang /ba 'i bu grwa thams cad nas nang bu rin gyi che de bzhin go shegs pa
43a3(phal chen): dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing /mi mdzad
43a4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dor dong ste/'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
43a5(phal chen): nas/lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshamasu brtan te/nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer myi dra ba phyogs kun du mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les tshe skyi dbyings thams
43a6(phal chen): cad du rab tu spang ba'i khong bu brtsegs pa dang /seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po rgyu smos kyi sprin mA'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dgu mngon par sgrol nas/rin
43a7(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongasu brgyan pa dang /rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'jud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod
43b1(phal chen): bcu bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas s+thi mo krung bcus te 'khod do//nub dang byang gri phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
43b2(phal chen): mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
43b3(phal chen): gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang gA'i rgyal tso po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lamo ye shes dpal zhes bya ba/byang
43b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phro ba snyid dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das sdes gnang nas 'khor gyi
43b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang //lus thams cad nas dus
43b6(phal chen): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang /mtshan drung dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba
43b7(phal chen): spu'i sgo thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas/dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang
44a1(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang //lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin
44a2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang
44a3(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang //lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyis gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun
44a4(phal chen): tu dgye ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin
44a5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sbyin kun tu dgye ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo
44a6(phal chen): thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byed pa'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang
44a7(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /bo spu'i sgo thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
44b1(phal chen): cad kyi snying po byang chub dang /byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba m+bu'i sku
44b2(phal chen): thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang //mtshan
44b3(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs
44b4(phal chen): brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgra thams cad dang /lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs
44b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig tu na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /mi mjed
44b6(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'angs gad na ba der dong ste/'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas//
44b7(phal chen): nub dang byang gi phyogs mtsham su brtan te/rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang po'i pad+mo'i snying
45a1(phal chen): po can drag mngon par sprul nas/mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs brgyan pa dang /rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan+ya
45a2(phal chen): bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
45a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
45a4(phal chen): snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes na mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa'
45a5(phal chen): bibasgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i
45a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ba spu'i bu ga thams
45a7(phal chen): cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang /sgra dang /dbyings dang /nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang /dus gsum gyi byang chub
45b1(phal chen): soms dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul
45b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin
45b3(phal chen): gyis sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag
45b4(phal chen): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
45b5(phal chen): ba thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang /bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang /byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /rnam par
45b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /mdo sde'i tshul dang /ming rgya mtsho'i
45b7(phal chen): dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra skrag pa dang /'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra reng tu bsgrag pa dang /ye
46a1(phal chen): shes thams na khyod du rlud par byA ba kyid+ha/skyon ma m+b+ha rA shA dang / ba 'o/khyad par da/s+yA /sa
46a2(phal chen): dang /chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyungs rab tu bzlog pa byed ci /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten mas ga na ba dUr ljags nAs/bcom 'dis gan bar
46a3(phal chen): dudan+tu/'khor dang bcas paso//bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nus/'og gi phyogasu brtan te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams rnyed kyi gan
46a4(phal chen): med khang gzugs brnyan du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams nAd kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi
46a5(phal chen): pad+ma'i skyed bri yangasu gzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/rin po che'i spring ba byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba'i rgyu la mtshan gyi cid pan
46a6(phal chen): mgyel bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i wa~M su byin gyis brlabasten / la m+bu krung bcas te 'drud //skyeng gi b+h+yos kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
46a7(phal chen): mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/de bzhin
46b1(phal chen): gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes
46b2(phal chen): bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/'khor gyi
46b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /lus thams cad dang /yan lag dang nying
46b4(phal chen): lag thams cad dang /tshig gi lam thams cad dang /gos dang //smad g.yogs thams cad nas/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang /bcom
46b5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs
46b6(phal chen): pa lung bstan pa dang /lung ma bstan pa dang /ma byin pa thams cad dang /de ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad na bzhugs pa
46b7(phal chen): rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsha dang /len pa dang /sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan
47a1(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po dang /ba spu'i sgo dang /lus thams cad dang /yan lag dang /nying lag dang /tshig gi lam dang /gos dang
47a2(phal chen): smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur bar rnam par bstan pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho
47a3(phal chen): dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongasu bstan pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bston pa dang
47a4(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan po dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang /drag shul dang /
47a5(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya
47a6(phal chen): mtsho yongasu tshul zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya ma tshe rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
47a7(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub ce de chos yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing /shin tu
47b1(phal chen): zhe non pa'i lus dang /de'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang byar gyur bya yongs su bstan pa dang //de bzhin gshags
47b2(phal chen): pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi la mo la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya
47b3(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang /rnam par menan po dang /
47b4(phal chen): rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang /chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi
47b5(phal chen): sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/byang chub se mos dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur ba yongasu bstan
47b6(phal chen): pi byed cing /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na be der dong ste/'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan
47b7(phal chen): 'das la phyag 'tshal nas//steng gi phyogasu brtan te/rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi
48a1(phal chen): rgyun gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /seng ge khri rdo rje dang /in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor
48a2(phal chen): ba'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyu ng+yas sgrog
48a3(phal chen): po'i phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba dang /mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lusu byin gyis brlabs nas/skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
48a4(phal chen): brgya pi brgyad nu bdun pa/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcos byar/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang
48a5(phal chen): smon lam gyis byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas nal du lta ba ye shes yongasu dag po'i mig dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa
48a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang mad m+bu'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtshol rnaMb yongasu gnal ba/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya
48a7(phal chen): bal/pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog khri /de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi chung ngung dang pa/rmad cig skad cig tu yongasu basbyin par rnam par 'phrul
48b1(phal chen): bas byung ba/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgrang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
48b2(phal chen): du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongasu chud par yang dag par ston
48b3(phal chen): po'i yul dang ldan pa/'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
48b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongasu shes pa rab
48b5(phal chen): tu thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes pas byung ba/las dang rnam pa
48b6(phal chen): smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ye shes mngon pa grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/'jig rten
48b7(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/mi
49a1(phal chen): pa'i khyu mchog dang /seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/
49a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi
49a3(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa/tshes thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/byang chubo sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye
49a4(phal chen): shos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/dus gsum thams cad shes
49a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa/gnas med pas na mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/thams
49a6(phal chen): cung mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/na mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/chos
49a7(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/'jig rten
49b1(phal chen): rnams thams cad gcig nas klu ga tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongasu ston pa
49b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang /rgya che ba dang /yangs pa dang /dag pa sna tshog sa rab tu rtogs pa/shin tu phra bar rgya chen po
49b3(phal chen): yang dag par gzung ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa/dmigs po rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig
49b4(phal chen): la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo
49b5(phal chen): rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas por 'gongs pa sha stag ste/de bzhin
49b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyisgra de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpe'i sha stag gis/'adz+re ta'i tshal thams cad yongasu rgyas par
49b7(phal chen): sbyar kyang /nyon thos chen po shA ri'i buM /ma'u dgal kyi zung /nga sbrang can po dang /nam gru dang /rab 'byor dang /'gag med dang /chol pa dang
50a1(phal chen): ka t+yA'i bu dang /byams gang gi bu la sogs pas 'dze tra'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag
50a2(phal chen): ma mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang //
50a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /sangs rgyas
50a4(phal chen): k+Shi zhing yongasu dag pa yang ma mthong //byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang /byang chub
50a5(phal chen): sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam
50a6(phal chen): par 'phrul dang /byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /byang chub sems dpo'i phyog su 'khod pa dang /
50a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
50b1(phal chen): ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /byang chub snyoms dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
50b2(phal chen): gnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpo'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' yongasasu smin par
50b3(phal chen): gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang /byang chubo sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus
50b4(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa dang /byang chub sem
50b5(phal chen): dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongasu dag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
50b6(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /
50b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa la nga ma mthong //de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/de dag gis ni sngon
51a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtswa bya ma bsagaso//de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
51a2(phal chen): kyis/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang /rgyun yongasu dag pa yang dag par bstan pa me mdzad//
51a3(phal chen): de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do//de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor
51a4(phal chen): ba'i tshe/sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas//de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub
51a5(phal chen): tu bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byaso//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin//de dag ni sems can thams cod
51a6(phal chen): yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa mi yin//de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas//de dag gis ni sngon
51a7(phal chen): 'khor ba ni 'khor ba'i tshe/'phro ba thams cad las khyod par du la brnam pa'i ye shes kyi sa lo dmigs pa ma byas//de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
51b1(phal chen): du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byaso//de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu mu bsgrub so//de dag
51b2(phal chen): gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud//de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis
51b3(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba
51b4(phal chen): khong du ma chud//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma
51b5(phal chen): yin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su
51b6(phal chen): 'dzin pa byin gyis rlobs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar phyed po khong du ma chung ngo //de bsu ni nyan thos chen po
51b7(phal chen): mchog go zung dang /bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de ma mthong ngo //mi zas/mi nas//nga du ma chung//
52a1(phal chen): /mi rtags//mau rikr-I/yid mdzes//mi snyoms//rnam par m+b+ha bAn//rtogs par mi ban+d+ha//ngos par mi bAn+d+ha'o//nyo b.ran
52a2(phal chen): sem so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/nyan thos kyi spyod yul mA yin//de bas ni nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang
52a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mo mthong ste/de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do//de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong
52a4(phal chen): du/de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag go/dmigs pa chu dul rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting 'dzin de lta bu med//de dag shes pa dang lha
52a5(phal chen): ba'am/khong du chud par bya ba 'am/rtogs par bya ba'am/rgyas par dgang bar bya ba 'am/'jug par bya ba 'am/rnam par blta ba'am/nyam su myong
52a6(phal chen): bar bya ba 'am/gnan pa 'am/rnam par gnon pa 'am/gzhan gyis thos por bya bu 'amabastan par bya ba 'am/zlos par bya ba 'am/yang
52a7(phal chen): dag por bstan par bya ba'am/bstabs par bya ba'am/sbyin par bya ba 'am/de lo sems can rnams yongasu bskul bar bya ba 'am/sbyor bar bya ba 'am/
52b1(phal chen): rab tu dgod par bya ba 'am/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa medo//de lta bu'i rdzu
52b2(phal chen): 'phrul med do//dro lta bu khyu mchog gi mthu mdo//de lta bu'i stobs med do//de lta bu'i dbang mdo//de lta bu'i gnas medo//de lta bu'i 'du shes medo//de lta bu'i mig
52b3(phal chen): gi mtha med do//de lta bu'i ye shes medo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba/nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongasu grub pa/nyan thos kyi
52b4(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yong su rdzogs pa/nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/
52b5(phal chen): shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thugs pa snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi spyod pa/rang gi don grub pa dag ste/de dag ni 'dze ta'i tshal de
52b6(phal chen): nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang /g.yas g.yon dang snam logs ni/bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lte bar gnas kyang
52b7(phal chen): 'dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe ni/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang /
53a1(phal chen): //thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang /thams cad
53a2(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag ma btab pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu
53a3(phal chen): ma bsgoms pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs
53a4(phal chen): par bya ba'am/blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta
53a5(phal chen): yin gyi/nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin na//de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
53a6(phal chen): ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to//da'ang
53a7(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/gang ga'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dgas bkres pa dang /skom pas rab tu mnar baM/gcer ba/gos med pa/lus
53b1(phal chen): kyi mdog dang /kha dag smrig cing 'chums pa dang /rlung dang nyims bAskamaswA pa/byA rog mang pos gats+tsha bA/spyang khyi dang /lhas thob tsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas/
53b2(phal chen): 'dus kyang /gang gA'i chu klung chen po mi mthong ste/sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribos pa'i phyir/la lus ni snyoms te chu med par mthong ngo //la las ni thul bas
53b3(phal chen): yongs su grang bar mtho /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag 'dzi ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs
53b4(phal chen): ma rig pa'i ling tog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongasu ma bzung ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs
53b5(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de dag ma mthong ma sheso//'di lta ste dper na/'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po dbus su/mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log
53b6(phal chen): bar gyur nas/de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na/lce'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas brag+h+nA ni mdzes pa dang /ri rab kyi skyed shing dang bcus
53b7(phal chen): pa/bzang shing ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang pa/sna'i buM khrag khrig brgya phrag stong sted gnas pa/lha'i ma
54a1(phal chen): tog sna tshogs kyis yongasu grang ba dang /yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang /mu tig gi phreng bu dang /rin po che'i rgyun dang /som
54a2(phal chen): do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongasu bskyod cing /sgra dbyangs yid du 'ongs la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan
54a3(phal chen): gyi shing mang po dang /dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa/rnam pa sna tshogs ma thong bar gyur la/lha'i bu mo meng pos glu blangs pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas
54a4(phal chen): pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong
54a5(phal chen): bar gyur kyang //skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du chu chud//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni skyes bu gnyid
54a6(phal chen): kyi log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
54a7(phal chen): de dag dang /'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs rgya chen po dang /rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma
54b1(phal chen): nor bar shin tu bsags pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skan lam shin tu 'angon par bsgrubs pa dang /de bzhin ka shegs pa'i yon+da tan thams cad la shin tu
54b2(phal chen): zhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas rje ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang /yan lag
54b3(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa
54b4(phal chen): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rngam por skyed pa thams cad
54b5(phal chen): la rnam par rtsa ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas/bsam gyis mi khyab po'i sangs rgyas kyi
54b6(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la/nyam su myong bar gyur kyang /nyan thos chen po mchog gi
54b7(phal chen): zung dang /bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mgo med pas mthong bai re me g+hu srabs kyu gau ste ste dper na/ri'i rgyal ba kha ba can/sman
55a1(phal chen): 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la/sngags dang /rig sngags dang /spyan gyi tshul dang /blang ba'i rgyas shes shing /reg sngags grub pa
55a2(phal chen): skyes bu gnas pa/sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa/slan blang ba'i las byed kyang //ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang /ba lang dang /ra
55a3(phal chen): lug 'tshe ba dang /sngon pa dang /de ma yin pa'i me smin gyi tshul mi sh+los pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang /sman gyi ro dang /mthu dang
55a4(phal chen): yon tan dang /byin dang /thabs dang /'phrod pa mi sheso//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' du bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa
55a5(phal chen): byang chub sems do pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul du dag mthong yang /
55a6(phal chen): nyon thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /bzang po'i zung la sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/gzhan gyi dgos po yal bar grazhog pa/btang
55a7(phal chen): snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshe la de nyid na gnas kyang tshe 'di la bde bar spyad pas/bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
55b1(phal chen): tang 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul bu'o yul du dag khong du mo chud par/'ad lta ste dbarA na/sna tshon ba rlon po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/tAr
55b2(phal chen): brgya stong du mas gang ba/rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongasu gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byung ba'i
55b3(phal chen): mi/rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lig gi blo shin tu byung ba/gter gyi gtsug lag dang /rgyas dang /ngan rtags gya nom par ldobs pa/bsod nams
55b4(phal chen): rgya chen po'i stobs kyis bstan pa dag/de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongasu tshim par byed/paM dang ma la yang legs par rim gro byad/
55b5(phal chen): bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing /de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang /na ba dang /dbul po dang /nyam nyes pa dang /kha zas dang /gos
55b6(phal chen): kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyad par bgo bsha' byed pa/nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyam su myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /
55b7(phal chen): gter gyi rgyus mo shes pa/bsod nams ma byas pa/rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs ma dag po/de dog de nyid na 'khod kyang /rin po che'i 'byung
56a1(phal chen): /gnas de dag dang /rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi rgyud mi shes pas/rin po che yang blung du med//rin po che'i don kyang byar med//da
56a2(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam b+his mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shing tu rnam par dag pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
56a3(phal chen): kyi yul bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag 'dza ta'i tshul na 'khod cing ngo /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la
56a4(phal chen): 'jug cing ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongasu sgrub ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang /rim gro la brtson zhing /dam pa'i chos yang su gzung ba la
56a5(phal chen): mngon par brtson te/bsdu ba'i dngos pa bzhis sems can de dag yongasu sdud kyang /nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
56a6(phal chen): ba de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta ba ying ma mthong ma shes//'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis
56a7(phal chen): gos kyis bkab ste/rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang /'brang ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba byas
56b1(phal chen): kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mi mthong //rin po che'i shing dang /gos kyi rin po che dang /spos kyi rin po che dang /rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/rin po che de
56b2(phal chen): drug gi spyod yul ldam+ba/rin thung ngam/yongasu spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/de ni rin po ched dag len kyang mi len la/rin po che'i don kyang nyamasu myong bar
56b3(phal chen): mi byed//gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing sheso//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen
56b4(phal chen): bair phyin pa de dag gis/bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che/'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyun du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/'dze ta'i tshal ni bzhugs
56b5(phal chen): shing ngo /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu ston pa mthong yang /nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de
56b6(phal chen): nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul de drug ma mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
56b7(phal chen): mang po de lta bu'i ron po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur te/phyir ne na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi khyu mchog ga mthu phyung
57a1(phal chen): ba dang /chu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang me mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rigs pa gos kyi tshe ye shes
57a2(phal chen): kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongasu dag pa de lta bu mod//de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la
57a3(phal chen): 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do//'di lta ste dper nu/mig yong su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang gya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/rab rib dang /mun pa
57a4(phal chen): thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/da mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/de rdul dang bral bas rib tu snang ba dang /ldan pa'i mig yong su dag pa dang
57a5(phal chen): ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun gA shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang /tshig dang /spyod lam rnam pa sna
57a6(phal chen): tshigs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yosasu 'khregs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang
57a7(phal chen): spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang /mau de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod par mi mthang ma shes//skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen/
57b1(phal chen): po/spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/phyogs tha dad du mngon par brnyas pa/dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad /kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/dmigs pa'i
57b2(phal chen): tshul tho dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med//de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/rnam par dag cing chags pa mi
57b3(phal chen): mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'brul ba dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang //
57b4(phal chen): nyan thos chen po de dge gris de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ting 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong byar ma gyur te/byang chub
57b5(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to//'di lta ste dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab
57b6(phal chen): pa'i tings dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/chus khyab pa 'am/mes khyab pa 'am/rlung gis khyab pa'am/sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ser po khyab pa 'am
57b7(phal chen): ngamar pos khyab pa 'am/dkar pos khyab pa 'am/lhas khyab pa 'ang/sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa'am/sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa 'am/
58a1(phal chen): dmyigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo //
58a2(phal chen): me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo //sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang /dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ting 'dzin
58a3(phal chen): la snyoms par zhugs shing /rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs//de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyis yul gyi rnam par
58a4(phal chen): sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongasu bstan pa mdzad na/nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' de
58a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong //khong du chud//'di lta ste dper na/slu ba grub
58a6(phal chen): pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu/skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo //des ni 'gro 'am/'dug gam/'greng yang rung ste/skye bo mang
58a7(phal chen): popa thams cad mthong ngo //de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongasu 'das pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i
58b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gas shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang //nyan thos chen po de dag gis de
58b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo //'di lta ste dper na/mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba ni dris mi de mthong yang /mis
58b3(phal chen): lha de mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa
58b4(phal chen): chen po'i dbus su/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yong su bstan pa mdzad kyang /nyan thos chen po de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
58b5(phal chen): 'phral ba dang /cho 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul ba de dag kyang ma mthong ma sheso//'di lta ste dper na/
58b6(phal chen): dge slong sems thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/shes pa med la
58b7(phal chen): tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang /bya ba gang yang nyan/su mi myong ste/mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la/'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad
59a1(phal chen): gunas de na yang kyang /snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang mthus des mi shes ma mthong ngo //de bzhin du//nyan
59a2(phal chen): thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de na yang rnam par spyong la/de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rnam par 'phrul
59a3(phal chen): ba dang /khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/khong du chud par ma gyur/shes par ma gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i tshe
59a4(phal chen): 'phrul chen pa de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de dag kyang khong du mi chud/ma mthong ma sheso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi
59a5(phal chen): yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'o//
59a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis me 'dus pa'o//de bas na/nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshul
59a7(phal chen): de nyid na 'khod cing /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen
59b1(phal chen): po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo //'dzo ta'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan gyur/bkod pa yongs su 'dus
59b2(phal chen): ba de yang ma mthong ma shes te/de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas
59b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag slaso//ltos shig sems can dam pa yi//sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab//rgyal bas sangs
59b4(phal chen): rgyas rnam 'phrul po//'dze ta'i rgyul mtshan 'di bstan to//rang byung rnams kyi byin gyis rlabasra//bgrang du med par 'byung ba la//sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i//
59b5(phal chen): 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongaso//chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing //shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni//de la 'jig rten 'babs mi nus
59b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dogs mdog/mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs//yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi//chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med/rnam 'phrul
59b7(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med pa//tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'o//rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag/rgyal bas 'dze ta'i tshal du bstan//rgyal sras bdag nyid tsha ba'i
60a1(phal chen): rnams//zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas//rgyal ba'i zhalnga ltar mas dga' ste//kun+da nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos//smon lam yongasu
60a2(phal chen): phun sum tshogs//spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa//de dog bsam pa shes par ni//'jig rten kun gyis ma nus//de dag sems dang spyod yul dang //spyod pa
60a3(phal chen): dag kyang nyan thos dang //rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang //rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus//rgyal klas shes rab chen po'i rnams//gzhan gyis thub dka'
60a4(phal chen): pham med la//dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing //ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa//ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la//brags chen mnyam par bzhag pa/
60a5(phal chen): rnams//chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing //rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs
60a6(phal chen): kye rgyal pos//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis//phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas//de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras//bsod nams snying po shes
60a7(phal chen): rab che//byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing //'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'o//bde gshegs sgyu las skyes pa ltos//yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing /
60b1(phal chen): shin tu mnyam gzhagasams ldan pa//mthu' dang dpung med zab pa yi//ye shes chu tshon spyod yul can//rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'o//'dze ta'o nags tshal rgya che
60b2(phal chen): ba//byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shig/bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur bar//gnas med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams//phyogs rnams bcu na kun
60b3(phal chen): 'dus te//pad+mo'i sbyin la 'khod pa dag/rgya mtsho mang la lta ba gyis//gnas meng len pa med pa'i rnams//spros pa med cing mi rten la/rdul bral chags pa'i
60b4(phal chen): sems med pa//chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang //ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba//rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing //grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la//mya
60b5(phal chen): ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa//phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba'i rnams//grangs kyis mi chos kun nas 'dus//yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags//gnyis kyi 'do
60b6(phal chen): shes rnam par spangs//rang byung shAkya seng gre yi//rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong //de yi byin rlabs drum pa yis//byang chub semasaM dpa' 'di dgra lcags/
60b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med//chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te//spyod pa tsam du yong so 'byed pa'i//pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras gya/chos kyi dbyings la
61a1(phal chen): dbyer med pa'i//mtha' la thugs pa de dag gnas//tshig rnams yongasu zad med pas//chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byeng //de nas byang chub
61a2(phal chen): sems dpa' dpal kun nus 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te//de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
61a3(phal chen): 'di dag smraso//ltos shig sems can dam pa yi//ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs//dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing //sems can rnams la chos
61a4(phal chen): kyang ston//mu stegs ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i//rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms//sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du//rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su
61a5(phal chen): ston//phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams//sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud//tshad med pa dang tshad yod las//thub pa chen po 'das pa
61a6(phal chen): mini//nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni//nyin par 'grangs pa smos pa byed//dri bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa//dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod//
61a7(phal chen): zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang //de bzhin chos dkor yongs rdzogs pa'i//dgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin//bar snang
61b1(phal chen): rnam pa'odastos 'dzin//nyama'o dkyil 'kho r+thA d+ha na//gdu yang thogs pa med par 'gyu//skangs rgyu smra rnam phrul du dranan//dza ska na ma khar phyog sa rnams ca/
61b2(phal chen): zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa//de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi//sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul shes par bya//ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten ni//lus can kun gyi gnas
61b3(phal chen): yin pas//'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten no//chos kyi 'khor la de ltar gnas//ji ltar rlung ni chags med par//mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ga/de bzhin sangs
61b4(phal chen): rgyas chos nyid kyang //'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu//ji ltar chu'i phung blo la//zhing rnams 'grang sA pa kun gnas pa//de bzhin du sa gsum sangs rgyas kyang //
61b5(phal chen): shes tshogs la rab tu kun sa//de nas byeng chub sems dbu' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sbyangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
61b6(phal chen): par bltas te/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad po 'di dag smraso//ji ltar rdo rje ri rUb brag/zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa//de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i//sangs rgyas
61b7(phal chen): mngon par 'phags pas maH//ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/chang mid rtog pa med pa ltar//sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin to//'jog rten kun gyi sgom tho
62a1(phal chen): gcod//rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi//ri bro ri rab ci 'dra bar//de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang //chos kyi mtsho las mngon par
62a2(phal chen): 'phags//rin chen kun gyi 'byung granas kyis//rgya mtsho rgyas pa ci bzhin du//rang byung ye shes de bzhin te//mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen//mgon po'i ye
62a3(phal chen): shes shin tu zab//tshod med de bzhin bgrang du medo//de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa//bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston//sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa
62a4(phal chen): yi//sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba//de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang //rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston//yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa//bsam don
62a5(phal chen): rdzogs byed ji lta ba//de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la//rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad//'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi//rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba//
62a6(phal chen): de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag/'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad//ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i//rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa//de
62a7(phal chen): bzhin chags med sgron ma yang //chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad//chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba//ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byeng //de bzhin sangs
62b1(phal chen): rgyas mthong bas kyang //'gro bya'i dbang po dag par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos//spangs
62b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlang bas kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te//de 'chi tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smroso//phyogs 'di in dra nI la yis//kha dog mdogacig
62b3(phal chen): byas pa lhor//sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams//de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur//sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la//rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs rnams//
62b4(phal chen): tshod kyis gzhal du med pa sten//byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad//de ni rmad byung shin tu zab//mtha' yas bslab pa dka' ba ste//blo ldan ye shes yul de la//'jig
62b5(phal chen): rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus//byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du//bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang //sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i//chos kyi dbyings la
62b6(phal chen): 'jug pa ston//sangs rgyas bzhid rnams bsam yas pa//blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis//kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang //rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzod//chos
62b7(phal chen): kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste//shAkya'i khyu mchog snum par gyur//de'i tshe 'phrul tshad med pa//'di dag rab tu byung ba yin//brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams//
63a1(phal chen): tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas//rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa//tshad mod gzonan ston po mdzad//'jig rten mgon blo rgyal
63a2(phal chen): sras rnams//chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad//chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang //chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur//skyes bu'i dbang po'i byin rlab
63a3(phal chen): kyis//cho 'phral brgya dang rob ldan zhing //'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang //ye shes
63a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs shing //shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnamaso//'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don gyi
63a5(phal chen): blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos//bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag smras//drang srong ngam
63a6(phal chen): pa'i mchog rnams kyi//dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba//de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi//gshegs thabs 'jogs 'dogs mi shes//dus gsum ma
63a7(phal chen): lus thams cad kyi//ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba//de dag gis kyang mgon po yi//gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi rig/ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams///
63b1(phal chen): khyiltar ljong la brgyus pra yo//sems can du 'dra kun gyi sgra ni//mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos//rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba min//de ni shes par mi nus te//sangs
63b2(phal chen): rgyas chags med ye shes can//tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das//zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba//brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris//de ni bskal pa dpag yas par
63b3(phal chen): rnarlom 'phrul thog med spyod pa mdzad//tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la//shin tu mnyam bzhag bsams byas kyang //bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa//brjod du med pa
63b4(phal chen): zed 'gyur gyi//rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las//phyogs gcig cha'i mthar mi phyin//sangs rgyas de'i zhal bltas kyang //sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab
63b5(phal chen): gang zhig de la smon byed cing //gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa//de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i//spyod yul blta dka' 'thob mi 'gyur//bsod nams ye shes mdza'
63b6(phal chen): yas shing //tshi gos chen yangs pas rnam gnon la//dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa//de dag 'di'i tshul la 'jug/de dag smon lam rgya che bas//sems dang sdom
63b7(phal chen): brgya che ste//rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing //byang chub brgya chen gnon par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par mtho ba'i
64a1(phal chen): ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcung rnam par bltas te/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa
64a2(phal chen): 'di dag smraso//chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas//rang byung rnams ni sku mod de//bsam yas ye shos yul mnga' bas//de dag bsam par mi nuso//phrini las dkar
64a3(phal chen): bo bsam yas pas//sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir//de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'gro/mtshan dang dpe brang bzang pos mdzes//chos kyi dbyings kyis
64a4(phal chen): rnam sbyangs pas//'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad//sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te//ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no//chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas///
64a5(phal chen): rdul mod spros pa mi mnga'o//ye shes 'dadi zer rab 'gyed pas//'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra//khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong pas//srid pa'i 'jigs pa
64a6(phal chen): rnam par gcod//byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad//byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no//kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzod kyang //kha dog kun la gnas pa
64a7(phal chen): med//sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i//kha dog tshad med yongasu ston//skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyis//byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/
64b1(phal chen): de'i ye shes mthur phyin par//brtag par sus kyang mi nuso//ye shes brtan pa zad mi shes//rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med//de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun//skad
64b2(phal chen): cig gcig gis rab tu brjod//rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste//shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas//sems la sems shes bya bar yang //de la sems
64b3(phal chen): skye med par bsam//gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi//sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam ma khyab//de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin//shin tu thob pas tshig lam spangs//
64b4(phal chen): dri nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/de'i tshe
64b5(phal chen): che gsuM bcad pa 'di dag smras//dran pa rmongs med dag pa'i rnams//chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing //blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la//byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad
64b6(phal chen): pa//dri dag yid ni 'di la ngas//de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin//de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo//de dag 'di la the tsam 'chad//de dag skyo bar mi 'gyur te//de dag yid kyang
64b7(phal chen): zhum mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos la rob gzhol bar//de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung //de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing //yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye//dmigs med
65a1(phal chen): gnas pa med pa yi//ye shes 'di la de dag dga'//bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi//bong du rdzogs pa dbye ba'i chos//ye shes 'di 'dod
65a2(phal chen): mtshungs med pa//de dag thams cad yongasu bsngo//'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang //'khor ba dag la gnas pa min//sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas//
65a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse//sems can khams na ji skad du//'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba//de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs//sangs rgyas phun
65a4(phal chen): sum tshogs la gnas//sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang //'jig rten don med rab tu gnas//chags mang spyod pa de dag ni//rtag tu sems can don la
65a5(phal chen): gnas//de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de//lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab//'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas//de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/'jig
65a6(phal chen): rten kun la snying ba rtse zhing //byang chub ye shes rnams dag pas//de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur//'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/de nas byang chub sems
65a7(phal chen): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
65b1(phal chen): dag smras//bskul pa bye ba phyag brgyar yang //sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkan na//blo tsam thams cad gtsud pa yi//dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos//chos kun thag su chud rtag
65b2(phal chen): pa/'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs//sems cad thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i//'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'//sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i//gzugs
65b3(phal chen): kyi sku ni mthong gyur na//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu//ngoms shing tshim ba skyer romi btub/pi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la//rgyal ba'i sras rnams blta blta zhing //rang
65b4(phal chen): dag ba chags med pa//gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo//thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku//glai yAs tha dad yang dag shes//chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas//de
65b5(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo//sems can bsam yas tshad med pa//snang bas mdzad de theg chen le//btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog/byang chub dam par lung yang ston//
65b6(phal chen): bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing //ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing byung //'jig rngan tshad med kun tu snang //bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad//sdug bsngal dra
65b7(phal chen): ba rab tu gcod//ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong //gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba//de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med//rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na//shin tu yadra//
66a1(phal chen): ba'i sems skye ste//'od snang gsal po'i shrIs rab mthu//grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing //byang
66a2(phal chen): chub dam par nges par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes//de dag kun kyang nges par sams//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi spyan
66a3(phal chen): lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso//yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa//shAk+ti'i khyu mchig
66a4(phal chen): thub mthong nas//yongasu bsngo ba byed pa'i sem so//theg pa che la rnam par 'dag/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//thugs rje che mnga' brtan po'i rnams/
66a5(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa//de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur//bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang //sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i//
66a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams//kun gyis ldan glan cis kyang nus//dran song gsum po mi bzad par//bskul ba bye bar bcos bla yi//chags
66a7(phal chen): pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i//ston pa mi mthong ma yin no//sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na//sdug bsngal phung po ci yod po//ma lus nyam su bzod nus
66b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no//'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na//tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa//de dag yun ring gnas bla yi//sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no//sems
66b2(phal chen): can dmyal ba re rer yang //bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi//mtha' yas rgyal ba bskyes pa yi//byang chub mchog las ring gnas min//ci zhig phyir ni ngan song
66b3(phal chen): du//yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na//rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni//ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyi //rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na//sdug bsngal
66b4(phal chen): thams cad 'chad par 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi//ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung //sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing //sgrib pa thams cad
66b5(phal chen): zad par 'gyur//byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi//bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams//the tsam yid gnyis
66b6(phal chen): chad par 'gyur//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi//bsam pa'ang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//dri nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
66b7(phal chen): pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng gi rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba
67a1(phal chen): dang /rgya tshor brjod pa dang /gsol bur bya ba dang /rab tu brjod pa dang //yang dag par bsnun pa dang /shin+da tu snang bar b+ha b+da dang /rang /
67a2(phal chen): tu gsal bar bya ba dang /man ngag bsten pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings
67a3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang /sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang /'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /sems
67a4(phal chen): can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang /sems can gyi myos pa mnyam pa nyid dang /chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i
67a5(phal chen): dus mnyam pa nyid dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid/byang chub
