67a6(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag lnga bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs
67a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi shing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/sangs rgyas gcig nis gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs
67b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi na'i mtha' mur thug pa'i bskal par/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjesu brjod pa bstan pa dang /'dri lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
67b2(phal chen): cod du de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu skye ba dang /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongasu brjod cing bstan pa dang //'di lta ste/
67b3(phal chen): na mkha'i dbyangs kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur
67b4(phal chen): pa'i gnas bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos
67b5(phal chen): kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/phyogs rgya mtshe thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing /lus
67b6(phal chen): gcig gis rgyas par dgrang ba bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la/sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par
67b7(phal chen): gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas
68a1(phal chen): /gcig tu brgud par sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang /bskul ba rgya mtsho yongasu bshud cing bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/dus gsum
68a2(phal chen): gyi sangs rgyas kyi skyon lam rgya min/rnamasna ca ba~M ste'i sgra thams cad nas rahA tu brjod pa phyi mo'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas/byang chub sems dpa'
68a3(phal chen): dang par 'byung ba bstan pa dang /'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khrod de/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /byung
68a4(phal chen): chub sems pa'i snying po'i rkyen tha mi dad pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba/phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o//kye rgya la
68a5(phal chen): ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
68a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba skyed de/rgyal ba'i sras dag/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yulo//dri nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung pos/
68a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs brten pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis//de sbyin/
68b1(phal chen): shegs pad+mo la du bam+b+ha nga/'khar kyil 'khor na mtshe thams cad la rnam par galtas nas/snangs rgyas stsa bsam sa mo byung ba dang /dro nan
68b2(phal chen): shegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bsdus te/'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yong dag par gan
68b3(phal chen): pa rnam par bltas nas/ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid lnga rnam par bltaswA te/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsnam gyis mi khyab pa la
68b4(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dku gi lam dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di
68b5(phal chen): dag smras//ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing //zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam//de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor//kun gyis yongs
68b6(phal chen): bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs//spu gcig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams//snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas//chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas
68b7(phal chen): bkang zhing //shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang //zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mdo snyed//rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa//byang chub sems dpa
69a1(phal chen): 'khor gyis yongasu bskor//kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad//zhing mchog gcig nA rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang //byang chub sems/
69a2(phal chen): dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa//de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas//rab 'byam zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong //zhing rnams bya ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi//
69a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'ong //phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun pAd+ma re zhing //ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang //zhing rnams kun tu
69a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rab tu ston//chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho//de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong //
69a5(phal chen): rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing //byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te//chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni//zhing bu'i ga tu'ang bskal
69a6(phal chen): pab bye bor spyod//byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa spyod pa byed/chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang //smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug/de dag sangs
69a7(phal chen): rgyaso sa'i spyod yul gnas//rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i//de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes//sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho
69b1(phal chen): dang //rnam par 'phrul ba rgyu tshun yangs la 'jug/ba gshegs chos dbyings bun tu rgyus bkang zhing //zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i//sku'i sprin rnams rtag
69b2(phal chen): tu 'gyed mdzad cing //chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la god////bam po brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
69b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin drung ga rnams par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la//de bos kyang brten te/dgod par mdzad pa'i don du//sgri mtshams
69b4(phal chen): mdzad spu'i nang nas/chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pos/dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po/'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing
69b5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jam klas pa thams cad
69b6(phal chen): snang bar mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gris/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /nam
69b7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud ba'i/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul
70a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba dag la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam pa dag pa dang /gzhi sna tshogs dang /
70a2(phal chen): dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa/'jig rten gyi dbang po
70a3(phal chen): thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/bla na myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgyu ba
70a4(phal chen): mthong ste/la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil
70a5(phal chen): 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong //la la na nI lha'i gnas na 'dug/la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/la lan ni gnod sbyin gyis gnas na 'dug/
70a6(phal chen): la lan ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/lal na ni na mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug/la la na ni me 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas
70a7(phal chen): na 'dug/la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /
70b1(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs dang /spyod lam sna tshogs dang /lus sna tshogs dang /ting 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang //
70b2(phal chen): ting 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang /rigs dang rgyud sno tshogs su byung ba dang /kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang /'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
70b3(phal chen): dang /'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang /dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang /gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /
70b4(phal chen): tshig dang /nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis/'jig rten gyi khams
70b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa/phyogs rgya mtsho thams
70b6(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa/chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogasu gtogs pa/phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad bar
70b7(phal chen): gtogs pa/phyogs sna tshogs kyi rje su song ba//phyogs sna mtsho sna tshogs su btogs pa/'di lta ste/sha ri phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs
71a1(phal chen): dang /byad dang shur gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar dang m+b+hi'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub dang byang
71a2(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing lhun gyi phyogs dang /sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang /sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs/sngon gyi
71a3(phal chen): mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang /phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang /na mkha'i khong thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dngon pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang //zhing
71a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang /las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongasu grub pa'i
71a5(phal chen): phyogs dang /skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i na mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings minyam pa
71a6(phal chen): nyid du gzhol bas/kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dang pos sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba
71a7(phal chen): thams cad tha mi dad pas/sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangasu gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang
71b1(phal chen): dar gyur bya'i de bzhin gshebs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par bsdu ba dmigs par bya bas/'khor gyi
71b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ljon pa/bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa/zhing thams cad la shin tu snyoms pas/sems can gyi bsam parje
71b3(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa/rnam par dmigs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan
71b4(phal chen): bas/sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa/de dag thams cad ni/sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/dge ba'i spyod pa
71b5(phal chen): bskal ba mnyam pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang /mnyam pa dang /rjesu dran pa dang /bsnyen bkur bas yongasu smin par byas
71b6(phal chen): pa dag go//sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go//de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i
71b7(phal chen): dag pa'i rtsa bas yongasu bsdus pa dag ste/de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal ba mnyam pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i rlabs
72a1(phal chen): kyis yongs su shin tu bzung ba'i b+hirar+ya/ban+d+ham+b+ha ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad k+Shi tI 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa tshos d+d+hi dbyings ltar yangs
72a2(phal chen): shing /na mkha'i dbyings kyi maHsa gtugs par gyur po dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/lA lce ni chos kyi sku la 'jug/la l-i ni gzugs
72a3(phal chen): kyekyi sku la 'jug go/la la ni ston gyi byang chub sems dang Sh+Ti yongasu bsgrub pa 'jug go/pAl lo ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa la 'jug go/la la ni spyad
72a4(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa'i rgyun la 'jug/la la ni byang chub sems denga'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul po la 'jug/la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i
72a5(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa la 'jug/la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i tingange 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/la la ni de bzhin gaushegs pa'i stobs
72a6(phal chen): dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go/la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
72a7(phal chen): brgya mtsho/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa brag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jog ste/mos pa sna tshogs dang /lam sna tshogs dang /sgra
72b1(phal chen): tshogs dang /'jug pa sna tshogs dang /'bab pa sna tshogs dang /tshul sna tshogs dang /rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang /phyogs sna tshogs dang /snod
72b2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang /yul sna tshogs dang /'jig rten sna tshigs dang /khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang /tshogs sna tshigs dang /rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs dang
72b3(phal chen): thibs sna tshogs dang /ti 'dzin sna tshogs dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de drag la 'jug/ting 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/
72b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang
72b5(phal chen): bor byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin de bzhin gshegs
72b6(phal chen): pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin nu mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang /byang chub sems drapa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs
72b7(phal chen): pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyi
73a1(phal chen): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tinge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi chu lnga thams cad kyi glong gi snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nga
73a2(phal chen): 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par skye sgrogs pas rgyas par 'ogangs pa'i zla ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
73a3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pa'i 'od kyis/byang chub sems dpa' de dgra bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsha de dag la rab
73a4(phal chen): tu 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa
73a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
73a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud byis
73a7(phal chen): rjesu 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting
73b1(phal chen): 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tinge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas/kun tu 'phrul ba'i gzugs brnyan
73b2(phal chen): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya
73b3(phal chen): ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par sod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
73b4(phal chen): 'dzin 'gro ba thams cadad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chagag pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa
73b5(phal chen): thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yin te na rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems
73b6(phal chen): dbu'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/phyi ma'i mthur byin gyi rlob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
73b7(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyar ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin phye ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
74a1(phal chen): kI rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho ltar byung ba thams
74a2(phal chen): cad yangasu dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la/sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing
74a3(phal chen): 'grogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'jig
74a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon
74a5(phal chen): bar bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
74a6(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la/
74a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas/khom par gnas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad ngu zhing 'byam pa
74b1(phal chen): bar+sabA bu yongs su ston pa'i sbyin b+h+yo rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tid 'dzin sgro rmugs gzhol rnam par spyod pa'i byin rlabs drung /byung chub sems
74b2(phal chen): dpa'i dzin sa rgyas nga rnams kyi mos ldan nasasapa ma dang bur byed sa pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la shes kyi kyad rnam
74b3(phal chen): la nga sus ga sa nga/ /khyimapa 'i ngas pa /shes pa byed padang /
74b4(phal chen): nub ma snyed pa'i ting 'dzin dus gsum sems ny-id hU~M sh+'ul tsa mi dang bu'i 'aM Sh+T+r-i /byang chubasems dru ni du 'dzin samam+b+ha s+t+rai dA ni gcoms cing
74b5(phal chen): dbyis kyi rgyal gyi rang bzhini dem pa da /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gyi gas po rnams cung kyi rigs kyi rjesu 'bring ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par
74b6(phal chen): gnan pa'i snying gi dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa rnams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mag gi dkyis kyi khor dang /byang chub sems
74b7(phal chen): 'i ting 'dzin dupas su tshu la sa rnam par gnani pas me da bya ma sa 'dzin da gas pa mas cad sngon nas
75a1(phal chen): mag ga dkyil 'khor dang /byang chub snyoms dpa'i ting 'dzin kha dog thams cad dkyil 'a 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon pa
75a2(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang //byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin gleng mo g.yo bya'i snying pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin tshes cig la chos thams cad yongasu 'dra bar
75a3(phal chen): ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos gcig gi che gi lam la nges pa'i dag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag/bcom
75a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnam por snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas
75a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la khyod mthar thug pa med pa dang /
75a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas/tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin tshul shin tu phra
75a7(phal chen): bos stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang byang chub sems dpe'i ting 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub
75b1(phal chen): bdang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang /byang chub sems dbu'i ting 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya
75b2(phal chen): ba'i rnam por 'phrul ba rnam par bsgrubs po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin tsher ba thams cad kyis reg bro med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub
75b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rgyan thams cad du na mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin skad cig skad cig la 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul
75b4(phal chen): pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi spyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od na mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang /byang
75b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkhar byin gyis rlob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan
75b6(phal chen): rab tu snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil
75b7(phal chen): 'khor snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas dzad gcig
76a1(phal chen): tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin skad TIg skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad man+tar phyin par byed pa dang /byang chu//
76a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bstod nams mi zad pa'i snying pi dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dong
76a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin dra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
76a4(phal chen): sgrol pa yongs su bstan pas/kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
76a5(phal chen): min+dan pA'i nyi ma gnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu sbyong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin chos thams cad rang
76a6(phal chen): bzhin gyi ba rab tu nye bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang /byang
76a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi/pad+ma'i tshel rab tu rgyas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas med pa'i
76b1(phal chen): sa na ma da' la rnam par smra bya dang /byang chub snyom sa pa'i ting 'dzin phyogs klu ts+tshag+sad+ha/phyogs blan rgyu margya 'ongs su spyad pa'i klung dang /byang chub sems
76b2(phal chen): dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings gzhi thams cad kyi sbyor 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpor ting 'dzin chos rgya mchi thams cad dang ldan pa dang /byang chub sems
76b3(phal chen): dpa'i ting 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon
76b4(phal chen): pAr shes pa dang /smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
76b5(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin tshe spyi dbyings tha mas cad rgyun cig tu 'ongadu chung bar 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams
76b6(phal chen): dran pa'i rang bsnyen rab tu snang ba dang /byang chub rnams dpa'i ting 'dzin 'gri ba tham pa rjid du byung par chen pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa da/byung
76b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin sems kyi snyid cag gis kyis kyi dbyangs kyi tshul mthar yas pa rang gi kyimi rgyam par 'ashe sa pa dang /byang chub thams dpa'ing 'dzin
77a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings chul gcig pas/chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par 'grod pa'i 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs//
77a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor la gzi brjid byin gyis rlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems can gyi khamos mig 'phrul lta bu yongasu bsdu ba'i
77a3(phal chen): smon lamu dang /spyod pa byin gyis rlobs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang /byang chub sems
77a4(phal chen): dpe'i tingange 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du
77a5(phal chen): chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis slobs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tinge
77a6(phal chen): 'dzin sems can thaMd kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongasu 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
77a7(phal chen): 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pa la mngon par shes pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang /
77b1(phal chen): /byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
77b2(phal chen): cotsod kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par blta bas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /de dgra la sogs po byang chub sems dpa'i tIng 'dzin gyi lAm la 'jug pa sangs
77b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul brgya
77b4(phal chen): motsho de dag la rab tu 'jug/sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skul pa mnyam par spyad pa yang
77b5(phal chen): rje su dAn na//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshul du phyin cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi sman snga na 'khod pa/seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi
77b6(phal chen): pad+mo'i snying po can/'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed drang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ye shes dang mngon par shes
77b7(phal chen): pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rje su thob pa/ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa/shes rab
78a1(phal chen): /kyai 'byung gnas rigasu byung pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i so sh+los la mngon du gyur pa/ye shes kyi myig rab rab med pa dang ljon pa
78a2(phal chen): sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/sangs rgyas thams cad dong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu sing po/rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod de//chos
78a3(phal chen): kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa/'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med par
78a4(phal chen): la rab tu gzhol ba/'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dod pa/chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa
78a5(phal chen): yod par chos thams cad blangs du med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/sems can thams cad
78a6(phal chen): lngal bde ba'i lam ston paye shes dang rnam par thar po shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye
78a7(phal chen): kyi lus dang ldan pa/srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/chos rgya mtsho
78b1(phal chen): rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/tong 'dzin gangs tshon mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing stong rje chen po rab tu sems pa/chos kyi tshul sgyu
78b2(phal chen): rnam pi lta bu rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bror zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khang du chud
78b3(phal chen): stesgra skad dang /dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/chos thams cad mngon par skabs pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/khyad par du
78b4(phal chen): phigs pa'i smon lam shin tu bas gas pA/ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nus rnam par dragapa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi pa dang /
78b5(phal chen): ldan pa/gzigs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa//ting 'dzin gyi stongs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi
78b6(phal chen): geganas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la dmyigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyad
78b7(phal chen): pa/ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad
79a1(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa/tIng 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci ldog
79a2(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/spobs pa'i stobs dang chos kyi sprin
79a3(phal chen): zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba nga dga' bas mos pa/chos thams cad la
79a4(phal chen): rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba/'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thang
79a5(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/chos thams cad
79a6(phal chen): la dbang po dang //ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sgrol ba la dpa' ba/ye shes
79a7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjod can/'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la shes rab
79b1(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa/zad pa med pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shos kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' kun+da gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/mtshan ma med
79b2(phal chen): po la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi
79b3(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa/'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gi nas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/
79b4(phal chen): chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/phyogs kun tung kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/'gro ba
79b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/thos pa dang /mthong ba dang /smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
79b6(phal chen): 'gegs pa/phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang d+hA/dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/sangs rgyas
79b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs po rnyan gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/'gro ba gdul ba dang 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/
80a1(phal chen): zhang 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gongs pa/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag
80a2(phal chen): pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba/ye shes
80a3(phal chen): kyi nyam 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/'ag ba thams cad bas me pA ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan po/'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab
80a4(phal chen): tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/phra ba dang
80a5(phal chen): yangs pa phan tshun du yongasu bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/tshig
80a6(phal chen): dang yi ge dang don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis/
80a7(phal chen): rlob pa/bskal pa mtha' yas par yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par
80b1(phal chen): gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/sems kyi skad cig gcig gos dus gsum shes pas/'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs
80b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa/'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/sangs rgyas
80b3(phal chen): kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/gya nom par snang ba'i tinge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes
80b4(phal chen): lnga mngon par mkhas pa chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang bar byin
80b5(phal chen): gyis rlob pa/chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjesu 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba
80b6(phal chen): shin tu bya ba ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongasu ston pa/phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de
80b7(phal chen): lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bsgyud/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dastod pa
81a1(phal chen): bsngags pa/bkur pa/tshig dang //yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang lags pa brjod du yod pad byang chub sems dpa' 'adz+re ta'i tshal du
81a2(phal chen): 'dug ste 'khod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams
81a3(phal chen): cad dang /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang /byang chub sems nga ba'i stan de dag dang /'dze ta'i tshal thams cad
81a4(phal chen): nas bya ba/dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/dga' ba'i
81a5(phal chen): shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/chas kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to//'di lta ste sems kyi
81a6(phal chen): skad cag re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/'gro ba thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/phyugs bcu rgyas par khyab
81a7(phal chen): par gyur to//rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs po rab
81b1(phal chen): tu brjod pa'i skyon gyi ro rje su bsgrags pas phyugs ban+d+ha rgyas par khyab par gyur to//dmigs pa thams cad ltas 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol ma'i sbyin mngon par 'dun
81b2(phal chen): te/sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin po/rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes sgrog cing /phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to//byang chub sems
81b3(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston po'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thog nas/byang chub sems dpa'
81b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pas phyogs ba cu rgyas par khyab par gyur te//de dgan gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang /rnam par 'phrul
81b5(phal chen): pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjesu brjod cing /phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to//byang chub sems
81b6(phal chen): dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skyo ba gcig tu brgyud
81b7(phal chen): ba rab tu brjod cing /phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to//dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par
82a1(phal chen): /'dzin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyun byung ba yongs skyon rnying /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas par
82a2(phal chen): khyab par gyur to//dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon por 'dzin nas/spyos sna tshogs kyi cher rab tu 'bebs shing phyogs
82a3(phal chen): bon+d+ha rgyas par khyab par gyur to//'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nis/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzong po'i
82a4(phal chen): spyod po yongs brjod pa byed cing/phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to//zhing pa yodus dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang byizhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sbyin
82a5(phal chen): ming yo mdun par 'thon nas/de bzhin gu shegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par skyon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur
82a6(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang /chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thong pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyun chen po
82a7(phal chen): par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs
82b1(phal chen): rgyus kyi byin gyis rlabasaHsa/rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs ston pa byung ts+tshad+ma//phyogs bAn+d+harar+ya rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs gtsud pa 'di ga smras//'dze tan
82b2(phal chen): tshol du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs//mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung lo bltos//dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams//mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams
82b3(phal chen): kun tu khyab//bdo gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan//kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa//stan dang dmigs pa yongasu bcas pa la//de dag thams cad
82b4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan byung ba snang //rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin tshon 'od 'phro'i sprin//bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las//sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog
82b5(phal chen): byed cing //zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro//tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang //spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dgro pa'i gzungas+ya//zhing gi me tog
82b6(phal chen): kun las mngon 'thon te//bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun cu 'dong //kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras//mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus
82b7(phal chen): gdas med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las//sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med par 'byung //bde gshogs sras pho dus gsum byung ba'i rnams//yon tan rgya mtsho'i
83a1(phal chen): legs pa brjod pa dag/brgya mtsho che mnyam rgyu na sbyin de dag kun//'adz+re ta'i cha la na gnas shing rab tu brjod//phyogs rnams kun gyi sen
83a2(phal chen): yongs kyi las//rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par//'dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi//gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grogs//dus gsum
83a3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi//zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnams 'phrul pa//zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyeng de dag kyang //seMs dgi khyod migs par gyur pa snang /
83a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin//spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnams phye ba'i//sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig ra rer snang //de dgra la yang sangs rgyas
83a5(phal chen): sprin med bzhugs//'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing //sems can thabs kyis yongasu smin par byed//de dag 'di las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang //
83a6(phal chen): me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sbyin kyang 'byung //mkha' ltar chud med rin chen gzhal med khang //ma lus rgyan rib kun gyis rnam mdzes pa//de dag thams cad phyogs
83a7(phal chen): rnams kun khyab byed//zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhino//dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis//kun tu bzla po spyod pa'i rnams tshul du//zhing rnadra/
83b1(phal chen): rgyu mtshornam par dag byas pa'o//rgyun rab sna tshog ste 'gro ltar chad med pa//phyugs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams//bskul pa rgyu mtsha chen bur nAn+da
83b2(phal chen): sbyangs pa//de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags tshal gyi//bair snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du stong //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin
83b3(phal chen): gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang //snying rje chen po'i sgra sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad
83b4(phal chen): du zhugs par gyu ra nas/de dag da bas kyang 'gro po thams cad la phun pa dang /yongasu bsdu ba'i don du zhugs por gyur te/de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag
83b5(phal chen): gi/ba spu'i sgo re ren kyang 'dra zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu zla ba skad mngani bar 'thon por gyur te/'od zer dgra gi sko re re nas kyang //byed
83b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sbyin//'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang //'gro ba thams cad la mngon par blta ba'i gas dang //sems can thaMng
83b7(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang /'phrad pa'i las dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te//mngon par 'then nas kyang //phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang
84a1(phal chen): /nas//sems can thams cad yang dag par bskal zhing yongs su smon par bya ba dang /gdul ba byed//lha'i gnos nas shi 'phros bya yangs/
84a2(phal chen): bsnun pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du se ba yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /
84a3(phal chen): rmi lam yongasu bstan pa'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yong spyi bskul ba byed//byang chub sems dpa' tha~Mng
84a4(phal chen): kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang /'jog rten gyi khams yang su bskyed pa'i sgra dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa'i sgro dang /da
84a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /yan lag dang nying lag ga cod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
84a6(phal chen): yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /byang chubo sems
84a7(phal chen): dpa' bsam gtan dang /rnam por thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyis shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang
84b1(phal chen): ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu btsal pa' phyir/chos kyi tshig dang /yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongasu gtong ba yongs su
84b2(phal chen): bstan pa'i sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongasu dri ba'i sgo dang /dus lo ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa dzi lta ba bzhin
84b3(phal chen): du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang byang chub
84b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol pos mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongasu bston pa'i sgo dang /bzo thams
84b5(phal chen): cad shes shing /mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing //mkhas pa dang //
84b6(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang sems cad thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing /mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bstan
84b7(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing /mkhas pa
85a1(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang /de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs sbyin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i thabs dang //
85a2(phal chen): bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phye ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/la la ni lha'i
85a3(phal chen): gnasu phyin par snang ngo //la la ni klu'i gan su phyin par snang //la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang //la la ni dri za'i gnas phyin par smad do//la pa ni
85a4(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi gni su phyin par snang //la lA nI na mkha' lding gi gnasu phyin par gan //lA la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas phyin par snang//la lA ni lto phye chen po'i gan su
85a5(phal chen): phyin par snang //la lo ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnasu phyin par snang //la la nI mi'i gan su phyin par snang //la la ni gshen rje'i gan su phyin par snang //la la ni
85a6(phal chen): yidwags kyi gnasu thams cad du phyin par snang //la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang //la le ni yi dgos kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thos
85a7(phal chen): du phyin par snang ste/mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang /thos pas 'dul ba dang /rje su dran pas 'dul ba dang /dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o dul
85b1(phal chen): pa dang /ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang /'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang /sems can rnams kyi bsam
85b2(phal chen): pa'i tshul ji lta ba bshan du yongasasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang /smon lam tha mi dad pa dang /ye shes tha mi dad pa dang /sems
85b3(phal chen): can yongasu bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
85b4(phal chen): pa thams cad dang /sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/lha
85b5(phal chen): la ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang /stan dang 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi
85b6(phal chen): g.yo'o//la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang /la la ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i don tu gcig pu gnyi su med par 'gro bar snang yang /de bzhin
85b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o//la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang /la la ni sems can yongasu smin par byi ba'i don du gcig pu
86a1(phal chen): gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mi g.yo'o//la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/la la ni
86a2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i gzugs/la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang /cho ga dang /chu zheng gi gzugs/lA la ni sman pa'i gzugs/la la ni tshong pa'i
86a3(phal chen): gzugs/la la ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/la la ni gaur mkhan gyi gzugs/la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan
86a4(phal chen): ba'i gzugs su grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/dus kyi dbang gis
86a5(phal chen): dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing //ming dang /gzugs dang /lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang /lus kyi kha dog dang /dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang //dbyangs
86a6(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dang /skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /gnas rnam pa tha dad pas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams
86a7(phal chen): cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang /bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron mo dang /bde ba
86b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang /las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang /phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang
86b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing /sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i don du grong dang /grong khyer
86b3(phal chen): dod/grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang //de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs
86b4(phal chen): ba ni 'dug 'dug pa las/bskal pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi
86b5(phal chen): nyam palta ba la brtson zhing /sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rig su gtogs pa'i lce dag dang /sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjesu
86b6(phal chen): 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i rigasu gtogs pa'i lha dang /chos mnyen pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang /snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang /ma
86b7(phal chen): dang /mtshe'u dang /rdzing bu dang /khron pa dang /chu klung gi lha dag dang /shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lce dag dang /rin po che'i cod pan thogs
87a1(phal chen): ba'i rang gi lha dag dang /chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang /ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan
87a2(phal chen): mo'i lha dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lho dag dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi na mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i
87a3(phal chen): na mkha'i lha dang /'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par
87a4(phal chen): ma sogs pa la brtson zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i rig lha dag dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs
87a5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang /byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha ngag dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongasu bskyang bar brtson pa'i
87a6(phal chen): grong gi lha dag dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du sman cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dang /sems can thams cad yongasu bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod
87a7(phal chen): sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang /sems can thams cad kyi dag sngo ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang /yi dgas kyi rgyud thams
87b1(phal chen): sno rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bram gyi dbang po dag dang /sems can thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu maN+Da nas gdon pa'i spyan lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam ge lA
87b2(phal chen): lding gi dbang po dag dang /'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dang /stobs yongasu bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i l+la
87b3(phal chen): me yin+d+ra b+h+rUM dbang po dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bsdu dga' bar gyur cing //lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /'khor ba'i
87b4(phal chen): skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbyung ba dag dang /rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gos
87b5(phal chen): rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing //de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpo'i rnam par rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste
87b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/mchod pa rnams pa du mas mchod/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung
87b7(phal chen): nas/lho phyogs log su yul rgyu zhing song ngo ////bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi/tshe dang ldan
88a1(phal chen): bA shwa radwa ti'i bus/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyun phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'ju
88a2(phal chen): ta'i tshul nas byung ste/lho phyogs log su 'gro ba mthong nas daM 'di snyam du gyur te/bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing
88a3(phal chen): 'gro'o snyam nas/de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/bcom
88a4(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang /bcom ldan 'das lnga lan
88a5(phal chen): gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab
88a6(phal chen): tu byung nas ring po mo lon pa gasngar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang /legs par byin pa chen po dang /bsod nams kyi 'od dang /
88a7(phal chen): bu chen po dang /kun tu khyab sbyin pa dang /rnam dge sbyod pa dang /lha'i dpal dang /dbang po'i blo gros dang /tshongs pa'i dam pa dang /dge slong zhi ba'i blo
88b1(phal chen): gros dang /de dag la sogs dog sbyong drubu nu tsam kun kyang /sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/dag bzhi rtsa ba skyong pa/myos pa zab mor gyur pa/dad pa'i mag
88b2(phal chen): yongasu dag pa/sems rgya chen pos yongasu spyod pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i
88b3(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas
88b4(phal chen): 'dul ba sha steg dang /'grogs shing mdun du byas te/sngon du bdar nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dongo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
88b5(phal chen): re'i bus/de ltar lam du zhugs te/'dong ba'i tshe/dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems
88b6(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe skyed bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing yongasu dag pa/lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /bod kyi dkyil
88b7(phal chen): 'khor yongasu dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongasu spyod pa dang /'od zer gyi dra ba'i rkyen sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
89a1(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bzung ba dang /lam gyi rgyan 'gron lam mig mangs risu gnas pa dang /lam rnam
89a2(phal chen): par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang /bsod namos phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen
89a3(phal chen): po mngon par 'thon po dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas lnga rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /rgyu 'thun pas shing gi bseb thams cad nas rgyun mang po 'byung ba dang /
89a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon mchod pa'i sprin gyi tshor mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang /phyogs bcu nos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
89a5(phal chen): cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/de dag la sogs pa che
89a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad medo pA dag dge slong de dag la yongasu bstan to//brjod do//bshad//
89a7(phal chen): smos so//bkrol//rab tu brjod//rnam par phyi'o//bstsal bar byaso//de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam du
89b1(phal chen): brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to//rab tu dang bar gyur to//dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to//mos pa skyes par
89b2(phal chen): gyur to//de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to//dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to//yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to//yid mi bde ba rab tu byu ngo par
89b3(phal chen): gyur to//sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to//sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to//sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos la
89b4(phal chen): sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yong su dag por gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to//snying rje chen po
89b5(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur to//pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to//snying rje chen po yongasu skyes par gyur to//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongasu slang
89b6(phal chen): bar gyur to//de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzor te/mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin
89b7(phal chen): par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/de nas tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces
90a1(phal chen): smraso//'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang
90a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ba'i dregs de tsam dang bcas par/glang po'i lta stangs kyis gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang /de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis
90a3(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas//thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ce smraso//skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang /khyod la phyag
90a4(phal chen): 'tshal ba'i dge pa'i rtsa ba 'di dang /bdag ca gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang /mkhyen pos thugasu chud pa dang /glang yang bcom ldan 'dra
90a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dro bar te/rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig/rnam pa 'di 'dri
90a6(phal chen): ba'i dbyang ba dang /rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang /'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin thob par shog shig ces/dge slong de dag gis de
90a7(phal chen): skad du smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//dge slong dag yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan
90b1(phal chen): ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo//theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par
90b2(phal chen): 'gyuraro//bo cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur blo dang /mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba la sogs yongasu mi
90b3(phal chen): skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing /yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /chos thams cad btsal ba la
90b4(phal chen): yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yong su mi skyo ba'i se mos bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems
90b5(phal chen): dpa'i ting 'dzin thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa lo yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyod pa dang /dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i
90b6(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dang /phyogs bcu 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgya sa ba ra dragang zhing yongasu dag par bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /sems con gyi
90b7(phal chen): khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
91a1(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91a2(phal chen): sbyar bas/sems can gtsug yo ngas su smin par bya ba'i tshul du/sems ca nu thams cad yongasu smin par bya bas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig
91a3(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o//dge slong dag yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu
91a4(phal chen): mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongasu 'grub par 'gyuraro//'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad
91a5(phal chen): las gyen du 'phags par 'gyuraro//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongasu 'da' bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du
91a6(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la
91a7(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongasu dag par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung
91b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro//bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongasu gnon par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin
91b2(phal chen): tu nye bar 'gyuraro//de nas dge slong dag gis/chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la tshogs pa med pa'i mig gis yul zhes bya ba'i
91b3(phal chen): ting 'dzin thob par gyur to//de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar
91b4(phal chen): gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag go 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems
91b5(phal chen): can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
91b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba dzI skad yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to//sems cad de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong
91b7(phal chen): bar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to//chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshigs dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang /
92a1(phal chen): /sgyud dang ming dang brdas yi su shes par gyur to//sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bas mu pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to/
92a2(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rje su dran par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon lnga bsgrub pa la yang
92a3(phal chen): rab tu zhugs par gyur to//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu
92a4(phal chen): la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad po yang dag
92a5(phal chen): par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//ti nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs
92a6(phal chen): rdzogs par gyur to//ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongasu non par gyur to//pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang dag par gyur te/snang ba chen po rab
92a7(phal chen): tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur te//de ltar
92b1(phal chen): mngon par shes pa'i myi gru gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/byang chub tu sems bskyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/byang chub sems
92b2(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas de dag smon lam chen po
92b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la zhugs shing ma ngon par bsgrub par gyur to//de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongasu dag pa rab tu thob par
92b4(phal chen): gyur to//lus rnam par dag pas lus yang rab tu thob par gyur to//de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang /lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed
92b5(phal chen): pas/mi nyams shing rje su 'byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to//mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas
92b6(phal chen): kyang myi g.yol/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi hU~M ni mngon par sgrub phyir
92b7(phal chen): gyur to//de nas 'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pas/dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas/mthar gyis yul rgyu ni lho phyogs
93a1(phal chen): logs skyed pa'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der log sa song ste phyin nas/grong rdul chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas
93a2(phal chen): kyi shar phyogs lcogs na nags tshul chen po stsol sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyun ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas pa rtogs bzhugs pa'i tshad rten/sems can sngon
93a3(phal chen): par mdzod pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/zhing mtha' yas par myong gi sgra rjesu grags pa/sngon chad bcom ldan 'das byang chub se
93a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de'i/rangs pa ba dga' ba dus ya rgyu pa d+ma ste/'i phyogs den nga kyu dang / sbyi nga / skye bu yi dang /
93a5(phal chen): namakha'i lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'tshod par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der
93a6(phal chen): 'khor dang btsas+thi te b+hin+da nas/der 'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pas med sa kyi dbyings kyi la rab tu snang ba zhes b+ha ba smang m+b+ha b+he bu zhwag khrig brgya stong drug pa
93a7(phal chen): 'byung ba bstan to//de bstan pa 'tsho/rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgyad du mnye bar lhags te/de dag gis chos kyi tshus de kris nas/klu'i
93b1(phal chen): larnam par smod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan lu myos par gyur nas/klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/lha dang mir skye ba yongasu 'dzin par gyur nas/dor klu stong /
93b2(phal chen): phrag bcu bla ni med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//chos de bstan pa'i rje/sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis
93b3(phal chen): dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to//de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ma rnams kyis/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyed pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal
93b4(phal chen): du phyin te/sbal sna tshogs kyi rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod zhes thos nas/dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes chen po las sogs pa/dge bsnyen pa dang dge
93b5(phal chen): bstan ma dang /khye'u dang bu mo mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
93b6(phal chen): gang na ba der dong //de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni/dge bsnyen bzang po so byin/lhas byin dang /bsod nams 'od dang /grags pa'i lha dang
93b7(phal chen): grags pas byin dang /zla ba'i dpal dang /zla ba dga' bo dang /blo gros bzang po dang /blo gros chen po dang /sgra gcan bzang po dang /dge bsnyen bzang po'i
94a1(phal chen): dpal dang /de drug la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na bder dong nus/'jam
94a2(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/'jam dpal gi ni no nur gyur pa la lan gsum du piskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig du 'khod/
94a3(phal chen): de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/dge bsnyen mo 'od bzung mo dang /lus bzang mo dang /dge ba yod pa dang /dge ba'i dpal dang /zla ba'i 'di dang
94a4(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od dang /dpal bzang mo dang /dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang /de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/'jam dpal
94a5(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum
94a6(phal chen): du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de la tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ni tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang /tshul khrims bzang po dang /dang
94a7(phal chen): tshul bzang po dang /rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang /bsam pa bzang po dang /blo gros bzang po dang /blo bzang po dang /mig bzang po dang /lags bzang po
94b1(phal chen): dang /tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang /de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun du byas te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong
94b2(phal chen): nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu/
94b3(phal chen): 'khod do//de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni/bu mo bzang mo dang /yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang /brtan pa'i blo gros dang /dpal bzang mo dang //
94b4(phal chen): tshangs pas byin pa dang /dpal gyi 'od dang /bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun du byas te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der
94b5(phal chen): dong nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
94b6(phal chen): tu 'khod do//de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod
94b7(phal chen): par shes nas/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis gnan te/byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas/snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos
95a1(phal chen): bstan pa mngon par sgrub te/ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nus tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos
95a2(phal chen): bstan par dga' te/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la blta so//tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang shes bya ba/ci'i phyir nor bzang shes bya zhe na/tshong dpon gyi bu nor
95a3(phal chen): bzang shes bya ba/thog mA ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu/khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur to//rin po che'i sdong
95a4(phal chen): po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/gsar dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shol dang /mu tig dmar po dang /a sma gar ba dang /mu sa ra gal pa
95a5(phal chen): dang /rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang /gter de dag nas skyes te so'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to//de yan lag dang nying lag gnyis
95a6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang /de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang /rngamasu khru bdun tsam du sa'i skyengs nas
95a7(phal chen): mngon par 'phags te/snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to//khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/'di ltar mar
95b1(phal chen): r+m+ma dang /na / dang /rlung rngu klud dang /sU ba d+hA dang //nA da/ngas sanas 'a byud sna rdzogs thams ca ts+tsha sa kAng byudagaN+Da/nga/
95b2(phal chen): lha'i rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang spros kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /man+ta shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs mchog tu
95b3(phal chen): nem pas yongasu gang bi dang /nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yingasu gang ba dang /dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs
95b4(phal chen): gang ba dang /phra men gyi snod nor bu rin pa che bai DUr+yas ying su gang ba dang /shel gyi skud mus dgal bas mingasu gang ba dang /mu sar gal ba'i snod rin pa che shol gyis
95b5(phal chen): yongs su gang ba dang /e s+tha gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongasu gang ba dang /mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar bas yongs gang ba dang /nor bu rin po che skar
95b6(phal chen): ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi slong/nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongasu gang ba dang /nor bu rin po che chu 'angang gi snod/nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongasu gang
95b7(phal chen): ba dang /de dag li sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'thon par gyur to//tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de bcas ma thag tu khyim dang /bang ba dang /mdzod thams cad du/
96a1(phal chen): nor dang 'bru dang /dbyigs dang /gser dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to//de la bram ze'i bltas pa dang /
96a2(phal chen): pa dang ma dang /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur pas na/nor bzangs nor bzangs shes de ltar ming du btags
96a3(phal chen): tate/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs de ni/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o//dge ba'i bshes
96a4(phal chen): gnyen gyi rje su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no//lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o//
96a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o//bsam pa'i na mkha' yong su dag pa'o//byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa
96a6(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas te/dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/de la 'di lta ste/
96a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing 'thob par bya ba las kyang brtsoms/sangs rgyas thad gcig
96b1(phal chen): nasu gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
96b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs
96b3(phal chen): kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongasu grub pa las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams
96b4(phal chen): cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
96b5(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/chos kyang bstan par gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po///
96b6(phal chen): de dag chos dang 'thun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/yang dag par skul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu sems
96b7(phal chen): bskyed du btsud de/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu dran par byas nas/skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan
97a1(phal chen): bas byin gyis brlabs te/bde par byas nas de nas song //de na tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/
97a2(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas/phyi bzhin du 'bring b+hi/'jam
97a3(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshig su bcad de mngon par bstod to//blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul can//khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du//bdag kyang byang chub
97a4(phal chen): mchog tu zhugs par gyur//de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson//dga' ba'i chus bkang 'bras kyis kun nas bskor//nga rgyal dreg pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs//sems
97a5(phal chen): can lam brgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs//de 'dra'i khyim ni sred gsum meng ldan che//de ni gti mug ma rigs gzings pas khebs//'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu
97a6(phal chen): gdungs//rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur//de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'//sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pas shin tu glags//ga dang skye yi sbyin gyis thab
97a7(phal chen): shing //the tsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa//log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs//pra dog ser sna'i theg pas btags shing bcings//yi dgas byol
97b1(phal chen): spyong sems dmyal me khom rgyu//rgya shi nang dang skye bas rab tu mnar//mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor//de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i//dkyil 'khor po shes
97b2(phal chen): 'od zer snang ba mdzad//nyon mongs rgya mtsho skom par shar te 'phags//nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzad//byams po bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya//bsod
97b3(phal chen): nams zla 'od bde ba'i gzer 'gyed pa//sems can kun gyi gan su shar gyur gyis//zla ba nya bi lta bus bdag sdong mdzod//dkar mthu thams cad yongs pa phags bskor mnga'
97b4(phal chen): shing //chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba//chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas//rgyal por gyur pas bdag la bstan d+ha sol//byang chub theg pa'i smyon
97b5(phal chen): lam mthu mnga' ste//bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bsags shing //sems can kun lo phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i//ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol//
97b6(phal chen): bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnubs te//ye shes la shAn mAnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bAs//bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar//dpa' bo chen pos bdag
97b7(phal chen): ge sel yang mdzad//chos kyi ri rab spol brtan bzhugs shing //ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor//nyon mongs sgyu gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa//brgya byin
98a1(phal chen): gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol//byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khung pa na//nyon mongs lus rnams rnam par bsngal ba mkhyen//rgyu
98a2(phal chen): mr-iso+o la lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par//me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol//ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing //bde ltar 'gro ba'i lAm
98a3(phal chen): rnams rnam sbyong ba//'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das//bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol//rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan//log 'dzin
98a4(phal chen): s+pho re'i skyebs kyis bcad gyur gyis//bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' ba//thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol//yang dag log pa'i lem la mkhas gyur
98a5(phal chen): cing //lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'//lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa//bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan tu gsol//yang dag lta ba'i sa'i thang
98a6(phal chen): la bzhugs//sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun//sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa//byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan tu gsol//rgyal ba gang
98a7(phal chen): 'das ma byon gang rnams dang //da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa//sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs//de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/
98b1(phal chen): las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul lA mi bsgrengs pa//chos thag shong rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing //ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa//byang chub zag pa bdag la bshad du
98b2(phal chen): gsol//mas shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can//bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing rten//dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'o//byang chub theg la bdag kyang brgya
98b3(phal chen): du gsol//gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can//byams pa brtsegs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa//tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dral 'phreng can//theg mchog/
98b4(phal chen): bzang pos bdag la bskyed du gsol//tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par rgyan//tingange 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu//chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa//
98b5(phal chen): theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bstabasu gsol//bsdu ba bzhi'i mi zad mdzod ldan pa//ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan//khrel yong dul ba'i 'breng bas mchog bsdams pa'i
98b6(phal chen): thag pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol//sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can//tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing //bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams dam
98b7(phal chen): sbyar ba'i//theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag bzhag gsol//sems can thams cad 'dul las me log pa//bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthong sgron cing //shes rab thabs gnyis
99a1(phal chen): 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'o//chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag bzhag gsol//smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong bya//chos kyi gzugs dam mthu byargyan
99a2(phal chen): tshe ldan zhing //ye shes 'khrul 'khor logs sbyangs legs byas pa'i//chos kyi theg pa de la bdagi bskyon gsol//kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing //sen
99a3(phal chen): lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa//kun tu bzang po'i spyod paso gnon 'gyur ba'i//ye shes theg pas bdog la bstud du gsal//de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa//ye shes
99a4(phal chen): sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing //sgribs dong chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi//bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyon par gsol//'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs
99a5(phal chen): gyur pa//sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing //chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i//byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol//sdug bsngal phung po rab
99a6(phal chen): 'gyur gcod byed pa//nyon mongs las kyi rdul meng skyong sel cing //bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'o//chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol//phyogs rnams
99a7(phal chen): kun tu ye shes rab snang ba/chos dbyings ni mkha' rnam par grub byed cing //sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing //chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol//
