99b1(phal chen): /ma dag ma'a' ltar tshang rjod mdzad pa//snod dang ma rig lta brda rgyun spyad cing //sems ldan kun sa phan par rab gnas pa'o//chos theg la bdug kyang bston du gso//rlung //
99b2(phal chen): chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas//smon lam mthu yi sa 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing //zhi ba'i gnas rab ldan par skyel byed pa'i//chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon
99b3(phal chen): gsol//sa tshan gzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa//snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khAr khyer shing //ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyir 'tsho ba'i//theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang
99b4(phal chen): bskyon du gsol//nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing //bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can//gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzangs pa'i//ye shes nyi
99b5(phal chen): mamo bdag la bstan tu gsol//bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pa//rgyu'i tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa//gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i//shes
99b6(phal chen): brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol//sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis//ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig lnga//tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs
99b7(phal chen): bslabs gyur pa//de legs ci 'dri 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol//gang ni yang dag sbyin mngar khyod bzhugs shing //ye shes rgyal po'i cod pani legs brgyan te//chos
100a1(phal chen): kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i//chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas//glang po'i lta
100a2(phal chen): stangs kyis bltas te//tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smoso//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
100a3(phal chen): bskyed de//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'brang zhing //byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu rdzogs par 'dod de//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod su dri bar
100a4(phal chen): bsam pa leg so legs//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang /rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
100a5(phal chen): yongasu grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongasu ma skyo bar
100a6(phal chen): byas shig/nor bzangs kyis smras pa/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dang sA/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi//ji ltar nan du brgya
100a7(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams par bgyi/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi//ji
100b1(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi//ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub snyoms dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bgyi//ji ltar byang //
100b2(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lo 'jug par bgyi//ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub por bgyi//ji ltar byang chub
100b3(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjesu 'brang bar bgyi//ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod po la lhag par dmigs par bgyi//ji ltar byang
100b4(phal chen): chub sems dpes byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi//ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher
100b5(phal chen): bstan tu gsol//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshig su bcad de smras po//dge ba'i bsod nams gangs chen 'tshe//de ltar
100b6(phal chen): khyod ni dra'i drung du nyer phyin te//snying rje'i snying rtse rgya chen gyi//yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol bar legs//'gro ba thams cad dgrol mngon du//spyod pa mtshungs med don du
100b7(phal chen): smin lam rab 'debs shing //'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin//byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i rnams//'khor ba
101a1(phal chen): /nu na d+ha mad yo / pyod gdo dag kun tu bzang po yi/spyod pa thub med chags mod 'thob par 'gyur//bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal//dany+dza byud ni kun tu
101a2(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa la//'gro la phan phyir smon byung ba//bsod nams rgya mtsho dge gzhi drag pa'i mtshan//mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs
101a3(phal chen): rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur//dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis byung //de dag chos kyi sbyin kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur//de ltar khyod kyis phyog suM bcu yi//sangs rgyas dang
101a4(phal chen): rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang //byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir//de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur//'jig rten gtsol slob byed cing //gang rnams
101a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bca' byas shing //'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa//de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur//khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu/
101a6(phal chen): bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi//spyod pa'i dam pa spyang byas shing //byang chub dam pa zhi pa 'thob par 'gyur//zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa//ma lus kun
101a7(phal chen): tu bskal pa rgya mtshor sgying por gyis//kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir//smon lam rgya chen yong su rdzogs par byas//khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur nas//son khrag khrig
101b1(phal chen): dga' ba yongasu spyos gyur c-ing //kun tu bzung ba ye shes kyus//byang chub mjug tu smon pa byed pa sa//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas//tshogs su bcad pa de dag
101b2(phal chen): smras nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu zang po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /byang chub sam
101b3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongasu btsal bar sems dpa' legs legaso//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang
101b4(phal chen): rab tu dkon te/de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni
101b5(phal chen): ches dkon//rigs kyi bu de bas na/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob por bya ba'i phyir//yang dag pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar
101b6(phal chen): rtogs pa thob par gyis shig/dgra bo'i bshes gnyen yongasu brtsal ba lo yongasu skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig/dge ba'i gshes gnyen blta ba la dmas pa med par gyis
101b7(phal chen): shig/dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin par gyis shig/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro che med par gyis shig
102a1(phal chen): rigs kyi nu ma phyogs kyi da 'di nyid na/yul ma po kyi nam mchog ces bye med de/don mgul legs pa nas bya ba'ir zhog yod pa/dol
102a2(phal chen): spyod sbyin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du sod la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang /
102a3(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams par bya ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod par bya ba dang /ji ltar byed chub
102a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /ji ltar yongasu dag par bya ba dang /ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang /ji ltar mngon nga ro bsgrub par bya ba dang /ji ltar
102a5(phal chen): rjes 'brang bar bya ba dang /ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang /ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil
102a6(phal chen): 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang /dge pa'i bshes gnyen de khyed la kun tu bzang po'i spyong pa'i dkyil 'khod ston te//de nas tshong dpon gyi thun bzang
102a7(phal chen): dga' rangs te/mgu zhing nyams 'de la/tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la skyibs phyag 'tshal te/l-i ma
102b1(phal chen): /gzhon nur gyur pa la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/lan bcu stong du mar phyir bltab to//dge ba'i bA shes gtan yid du 'ong ba'i sems du
102b2(phal chen): ldan pas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de gdong mchims gang bar du Sh+Ta/'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dben gyi
102b3(phal chen): nA bzungs mthar gyis yul mi mo g+ha no ma mchog ces bya ba der song ste/phyin nas yul mi mau gya nom mnog nas rnam par rgyas te/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen
102b4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa'i ljongs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongasu spyod cing /ri mgul legs pa gang na ba dang phyin nas/mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/dge slong
102b5(phal chen): sbyin gyi dpal tshel tshol zhing shor phyogs log su byung //de bzhin du lho dang nub dang /byang dang /byang shAr gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
102b6(phal chen): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtsham su 'ang 'byung ste/bla 'og tu 'ang lta zhing /dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las/des zhag bdun lon pa
102b7(phal chen): da /dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse gtsog cig sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/dge slong sprin gyi dang sa bye
103a1(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/dge slong sbyin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogasu bskor po byas te/mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar/
103a2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pas thug suM chud par mdzad du gsol/bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang
103a3(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod po brtsams pa dang /
103a4(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu spyod rdzog par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar yong su dag par bgyi ba
103a5(phal chen): dang /ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar rje su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi
103a6(phal chen): ba dang /ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/'phags
103a7(phal chen): pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /rjesu ston pa mdzad ces thos na/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag
103b1(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/do// ces smras pa dang /dge slong sbyin gyi dpal nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'ja
103b2(phal chen): s+yAd ci swA smraso//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyus bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dI ba legs legs
103b3(phal chen): rigs kyi ni 'ang lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu brtul ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongasu bcol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnams
103b4(phal chen): par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongasu
103b5(phal chen): btsal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu bstan pa dang /
103b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpo'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongasu bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su 'brang bu dang /byang chub sems dpas
103b7(phal chen): 'khor ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yong su bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang /'jigs pas mi gos
104a1(phal chen): pa'i rgyud yongasu btsal ba 'di ni dka'o//shin tu dka'o//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis/mig gis blo gros dang /dad pa'i mig/
104a2(phal chen): rnam par dag pas/kun tu mngon par blta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyin phyogs med pa dang /yul kun la thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag
104a3(phal chen): mthong la mkhas pa dang /mig gi yul kun nas yong su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang /phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis
104a4(phal chen): 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yong su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis/phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad kun nas mngon du gzigs pa'i
104a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas gnyis dang /bcu dang /sangs rgyas brgya
104a6(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas stong dang /sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang /sangs rgyas bye ba dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang /sangs rgyas bye stong dang /sangs
104a7(phal chen): rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab
104b1(phal chen): pa/mtshungs pa med pa/kun tu mtha' yas pa/sa mtshams med pa/gzhal du med pa/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong //de bzhin gsheg//
104b2(phal chen): pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /stong dang /stong gnyis
104b3(phal chen): pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
104b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
104b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra
104b6(phal chen): ba snyed dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba stod dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye
104b7(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/shar phyogs
105a1(phal chen): logs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dpa NAM byung phyogs dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
105a2(phal chen): dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang zla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsog kyang mthong ba nas/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
105a3(phal chen): rgyurgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna
105a4(phal chen): tshogs mnga' ba dang /dbyibs sna tshogs mda' ba dang /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /khyu mchog gi mthu dang /rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /'khor
105a5(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can+da dang /kha dog mtha' yas rab tu 'gyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par
105a6(phal chen): dag pa dang /pho brang dang rgyani sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /sku tshe'i tshod rnam par dag pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs
105a7(phal chen): par mdzad pa dang /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang /seng ge'i nga ro rnam par
105b1(phal chen): zlog pa mang po mthong ngo //de ltar rigs kyi bu khu bas ni skr-i kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'di thob par zad na/
105b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /pho brang rnam par
105b3(phal chen): dog pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo nas kun nus snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par/
105b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas//sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
105b5(phal chen): bcu tshad med pa'i rje su 'brang bas/sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/de bzhin gshegs pa bang
105b6(phal chen): kyi sku'i sprin la blta bas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la
105b7(phal chen): 'jug pas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /khu mchog gi mthu
106a1(phal chen): byung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang /bskal pa thang
106a2(phal chen): du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang ma 'bral bas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo bsgral par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis dum thams
106a3(phal chen): cid du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang /mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo dusu sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
106a4(phal chen): thams cad nas/mngon par 'phags shing /zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu mthong zhing rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab
106a5(phal chen): tu thob pa dang /gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo ngas
106a6(phal chen): gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing
106a7(phal chen): dmigs pas/sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro gtags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis skad cig gcig la/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de
106b1(phal chen): don ga shegs pa thams cad yongs myu na las 'dur brnam par du sogs pas pangs rgyas su pan+d+ham smosas bdags pa ba tubab pa dang /gang gis spyon cog gan nga
106b2(phal chen): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgra btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs
106b3(phal chen): re re rnyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i rgyu shin tu yangs pas
106b4(phal chen): btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /glang gis skra'i tso mo gcig lnga sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i na shin tu phra ba
106b5(phal chen): sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/gang gis
106b6(phal chen): sang+yas rgyas rjes dran pa'i sgo rgyun tu sgra btags pa rab tu rdzo pa dang /sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la dang /rnam par 'phrul ba dang /ye shes snang ba rab
106b7(phal chen): tu thob pas/gang gis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo dgos par btags pa rab tu zab pa dang /rang gi sems dang bsam pa la bltas na/de bzhin gshegs pa zang rab tu/
107a1(phal chen): snang ba thob pas stangs rgyas rnaM su dran pa'i sgra sam+b+has sa s+m+R+YuM chags pa rab tu rgyu pa dang /'gro b+hU thams cad kyi las rnam pa/bung ba
107a2(phal chen): pa'i gzugs brnyan yangasu ston pas grang pos sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo las kyi sgra btabs pa rab tu thob pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+ma'i tshul
107a3(phal chen): rgyas par/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgo btags
107a4(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrog byas chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' kun tu snang bas/gang gis sangs rgyas rje su dAn
107a5(phal chen): ba'i sgro na mkhas sgra btags pa rab tu zab pa dadag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus smyan/sod rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/phyogs
107a6(phal chen): ljongs rgya mtsha'i sgra zhes bya ba yod pa de na/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sbyin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du seng la/ji ltar byang chub sems dupas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
107a7(phal chen): pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i gshos gnyen de khyod la/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /rgyu yongasu ston pa
107b1(phal chen): 'gyur//tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed//dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /shugs rgya chen po yang yongs spyod par byed//byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen//
107b2(phal chen): po yang yongasasu rjod par 'gyuraro//theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang /snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skyed par byed de//pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po
107b3(phal chen): yang rab tu rtog par byed//spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu rjod par 'gyur ro//smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro//sgo
107b4(phal chen): kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyang bar 'gyur ro//snying rje'i chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongasu 'phel bar byed//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
107b5(phal chen): dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshal nas/dge slong sprin gyi dpal la len brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/lan brgya stong du
107b6(phal chen): mar phyir bltas nas/dge slong sprin gyi dpol gyi drung nas song ngo ///bam po dgu bcu tham pa/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
107b7(phal chen): dge bo'i bshes gnyen gyi gdan sa ngag de rje su bsam pa dang /ye shes snang ba rje su dran par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa
108a1(phal chen): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin gyi tshul de rjesu sbyang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor
108a2(phal chen): de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rje suM bsam pa dang /sangs rgyas gcig na/
108a3(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa de rje su dran par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi na mkha' de la rdzasu blta bar bya ba byed ci
108a4(phal chen): mthar gyis phyogs kyis ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang /dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
108a5(phal chen): te/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras/
108a6(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag ni bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal no//ji ltar byang chub sem
108a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing /thad mkhyen pa'i rgya mche
108b1(phal chen): 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /'khor ba'i rgyud las
108b2(phal chen): ldog par 'gyur zhing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
108b3(phal chen): dang /smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jam zhing /sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa
108b4(phal chen): dang /srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /mi khom pa dang /ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log par ltung ba thams
108b5(phal chen): cad kyi sgo gcod cing mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang /khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi
108b6(phal chen): sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang /yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yong su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to//de skad ces smras pa
108b7(phal chen): dang dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
109a1(phal chen): bskyod pa logs legaso//rigs kyi bu dge bu'i rtsub mA bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni/byang chub tu sems kyang mi skye'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba sku
109a2(phal chen): kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa /thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar gyur pa dang /bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen
109a3(phal chen): po bstsags pa dang /dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang //dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongasu skyo ba med pa dang /lus dang
109a4(phal chen): sgrog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang /dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /mthon dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang /rang bzhin gyis snying rje
109a5(phal chen): zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang /srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i
109a6(phal chen): sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye ste/'di ltar sems can thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang /'gro ba thams cad la snyoms
109a7(phal chen): par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir/byamos pa chen po'i sems dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/bde ba'i sems dang /med ga
109b1(phal chen): chos thams cad lapa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyur phan pa'i sems dang /'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang /sgrub pa thams cad rnam/
109b2(phal chen): pa 'azlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang /namakha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun
109b3(phal chen): tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/dri ma med pa'i sems dang /dus
109b4(phal chen): gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgrang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
109b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyu ro//rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyi su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/mngon du byas nas 'od
109b6(phal chen): lhur rna mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rje su bsam pa dang /dri ma mang byed dang ba dang /zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang /brags kyis gzhal zhing legs par gnas pa dang
109b7(phal chen): rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang /chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang /kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'byung po mtha' yas pa'i
110a1(phal chen): glanas su gyur pa dang /srog chags mang po/tshogs rten du gyur pa dang /sprin chen+d+ra po char yong su 'dzin pa dang /gang nying 'bri bar 'gyur ba mang
110a2(phal chen): bA la rje su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te/rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsam so//'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyu margya chen po 'de bas kyang 'phags par rgya chel
110a3(phal chen): 'di bas kyang yangs shing /'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/de de ltar kho ros tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa
110a4(phal chen): la brtson par gnas pa'itshe/rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad+ma chen po nor bu rin po che in dra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba n+dan nor bu rin po che bri
110a5(phal chen): dUr+ya dam pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa/'dzam bu chu klung gI gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi rnying po'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/rin po
110a6(phal chen): skr-i sma gar ba'i ze ba ni/rgyamatshatsam du yings shing rgya che ba/sgyu ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rdzing bu'i lhan nas b.rung ba rin po che sna tshogs bcu phrag kyang
110a7(phal chen): bi dra bas kun nas lags pa/klu'i de ring po brgya snang phrag bcus spris chu'i char mngon por rib pa/nam kha'i lding gi dbang po brgya brag bdus/rin ba che'i wa lding
110b1(phal chen): sen mo dro mang po na rgyas gzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa/mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/skyo 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag
110b2(phal chen): bcu 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa/dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang blo sna tshogs
110b3(phal chen): snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa/lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /'dug spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos
110b4(phal chen): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i bden gyi sprin gyi cher mngon par phab pa/tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btud de/phyag 'tshal zhing
110b5(phal chen): mchod pa/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba mi'i dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba brgya phrag bcus ro na po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon
110b6(phal chen): par mchod pa/brgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba/nor bu rin po che skar ma'i da dang rgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas
110b7(phal chen): pa/nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus 'kho su khebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba stong phrag bcus snying po
111a1(phal chen): rab tu gsal bar byas pa/nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa/nor bu rin po che mdzod
111a2(phal chen): sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas por snang bar byas pa/nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongasu ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/nor
111a3(phal chen): bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa/nong bu rin po che
111a4(phal chen): 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogasu brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang /'di 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/
111a5(phal chen): pad+mo chen po de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o//byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongasu brtan pa'o//phyogs thang du
111a6(phal chen): mngon par dmig su yod pa'o//sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o//rngan pa'i dri med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o//nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o//rmi lam
111a7(phal chen): lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongasu byung ba'o//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o//chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o//phyogs kyi khams kun tu
111b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gongs pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang 'thun pa ste/de'i rnam pa dang yon tan dang dbyibs dang /kha dog dang /rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni/
111b2(phal chen): bskal po brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te/pad+mo chen pode yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing /yongasu rgyas par mthong //
111b3(phal chen): ded bzhin gshegs pa spya yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong //de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong //
111b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /dang
111b5(phal chen): byed bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
111b6(phal chen): sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /lcags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong //sangs
111b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos//stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /mi bsnyengs pa'i rgyan
112a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mo khyab pa yang rngosu shes//sngon//
112a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rje su dran//mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang
112a3(phal chen): mthong ngo //chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /yongasu bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang /rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang
112a4(phal chen): thos//g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sems can gyi don dang /dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu grub par gyur pa yang mthong/
112a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang /phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing /kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas/chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
112a6(phal chen): yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang /rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
112a7(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa/zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang /rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongasu snang ba/phas kyi zhol de'i dkyil 'khor thams
112b1(phal chen): cad rnam par 'thor ba/bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms phu/sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/sems can+da thams
112b2(phal chen): cad kyi sems kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor
112b3(phal chen): lo'i rgyud dang mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te/kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blang so//bzung ngo //spel to//bsams so//de ltar bzung ba
112b4(phal chen): de la yang bran ni sdig cha rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang /smyu gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u ra re dang /sgo
112b5(phal chen): re re dang /chos kyi tshul re re dang /chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba ra ra kau las kyang zad pa 'am/'grib pa 'am/'byung ba 'am/mthar thug pa 'am/mtha' zad par 'gyur
112b6(phal chen): bdamigs par mi rung //rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis chang par chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs bya
112b7(phal chen): 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chudado//zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugaso//glong mtha' yas pa'i gzugs kyi 'od snang bas le'u
113a1(phal chen): grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/sa la rnam par dpyod cing rjesu rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par
113a2(phal chen): bsgom te rnam par dbye ba byaso//gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grongs med pa zhig yongasu blangaso//pad+ma'i rgyun gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pazhig
113a3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub so//dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad//na mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig
113a4(phal chen): rab tu bya'o//skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byaso//rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig ya
113a5(phal chen): su bkad//kho bo'i drung du shwar phyogs nas/lha dang lha'i dbang po 'am/klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/dri za dang dri za'i dbang po'am/
113a6(phal chen): ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/mamakha' ltung dang namakha' snying gi dbang po 'am/mi 'amachi dang mo'imaci'i dbang po 'am/lto 'phye chen po da m+b+hi phye chen po'angs
113a7(phal chen): pa'am/mdang ma'i dbang ba 'am/tshangs pa mtshangs pa'i dbang po ma/sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs po dang /
113b1(phal chen): chub snyoms dpa'i spyod pa snang ba chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing bcudado//de dag kun kyang kun nas migo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la grag/
113b2(phal chen): par byaso//rtog tu btsud//yongasu bstan to//yang dag par brjod//yongasu gsal bar bya'o//rnam par phye'o//rgyas par byaso//mngon par bstan to//rnam par bkro'o//
113b3(phal chen): rab tu phye'o//shin tu snang bar byas//de m+b+hir shar phyogs la ci lta ba de bzhin du/lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dong /byung phyogs dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar
113b4(phal chen): lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang bla'i phyogs nas/sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/kun la
113b5(phal chen): yang sdom bzhin no//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na/byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phyongasu dag pa dang ldan pas/byang chub
113b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mau gcad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /bsam
113b7(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongasu bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro
114a1(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /yongasu sbyin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus lngas mi 'dra' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad
114a2(phal chen): kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /de bzhin
114a3(phal chen): gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs
114a4(phal chen): pa dang /nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i
114a5(phal chen): skad rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lho
114a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod/de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la ji ltar/
114a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang
114b1(phal chen): pa gnyis la bos phyag 'tshal te/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sbyin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yung dang yang bltas te/dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas
114b2(phal chen): song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzengs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag do dang /kun nas mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjesu dran par byed cing //de bzhin
114b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rje su bsam pa dang /chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongasu bzungs pa dang /chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug
114b4(phal chen): par bya ba dang /chos kyi tshul de la'ang rjesu rnam par blta ba dang /chos kyi le'u dang /gleng gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang /chos kyi na mkha' de la yang dag par gan
114b5(phal chen): bar bya ba dang /chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjesu sbyang bar bya ba dang /chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjesu sems shing mthar gyis/lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba
114b6(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin nas/dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogasu bltaso//de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /rub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shAr
114b7(phal chen): gyi phyogs mtshoms dang /shir lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mchi maso dang /bla dang 'og tu yang dge slong zhin
115a1(phal chen): tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun tu bltas pa dang /des dge slong shin tu brtan pa na mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongasu bskor
115a2(phal chen): ts+tshisnying phan tshun 'chags pa mthong //na mkha'i dbyings de yung lha'i dbang po rnams kyis/dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/wA rdzas kyi me tog
115a3(phal chen): sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang /dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/brgyan par mthong //klu'i dbang po rnams kyis
115a4(phal chen): na mkha' de la/a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong //mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams
115a5(phal chen): kyis na mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyis stong pa'i rol mo brdung pa dang dkrol ba dang /gler blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs pa thos par gyur to//
115a6(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi skye na mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog shin tu phra zhing mdog bzung ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ste/
115a7(phal chen): dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dang cing mos pa'i gzugasu phyung ba mthong //lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang na mkha' de la/nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi
115b1(phal chen): skyon sa napas tu/kun na bsam smras sa ba pas sbyin spang ba dang rdzun par byas pa mdzud//na skyed so dbang nga sa hA gtsug du 'do rdzu/
115b2(phal chen): hUM ba la khong cing //namagyu'i lding gi dbang ba'i blams klan nas bskor te gsang pa mido la dga' bring bral sti sbyar tI/gnas pa byas ma gyis ma khya pa mi che//kun rje
115b3(phal chen): nyon gyi dbang po brgya stod 'khor dang bzlas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang rnamakha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su/dge rlung shin tu btsun pa la byams pa'i
115b4(phal chen): /dang ldan par 'khar ba myubyung //srin pa'i dbang ba brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byung /namakha' de la dge slong shir du brlud po yongs su
115b5(phal chen): byed cing kun tu d+hU ba mthong //tshangs pa'i dbang ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang namakha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i chog rgyud kyis pa snying pa
115b6(phal chen): rab tu brjod po po thang //gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i lasu bya ba'i phyir/zil mo skye
115b7(phal chen): cing gnal med khang nas gnas pa mthong //de nas tshang dpon gyi bunar bzangs kyis dge slong shin tu brten pa sbyar rnam pa'i dbyings la 'chog cing 'dug pa mdzang ni/
116a1(phal chen): dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces/
116a2(phal chen): smraso//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar
116a3(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsdu
116a4(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsten par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par
116a5(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu
116a6(phal chen): brtul bar bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgom par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas
116a7(phal chen): kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sbyangs par bgyi ba dang //ji ltar byang chub sems dpas//sangs
116b1(phal chen): rgyas kyu chos khong du chud par bgyi ba la 'tshal to/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag drung rjes b+hAstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gos zos na/'phags
116b2(phal chen): po ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du brgya/ji ltar nan tan du bgyis nu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang bskul bur mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/sa
116b3(phal chen): rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral
116b4(phal chen): ba dang /ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yang su thob par bgyi ba'i skad du/byed
116b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'brel ba dang /bskal pa thams cad du gnas pos yongasu mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
116b6(phal chen): mi 'bral ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang //de bzhin
116b7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi de'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /byang chub
117a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus/srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skyo mchod rang gi lus kyis nyam su myang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/
117a2(phal chen): 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu gzung po'i slad du/chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dus gsum
117a3(phal chen): gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rje su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/de skad ces smras pa dang /dge slong
117a4(phal chen): shin tu brtan pas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso//de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/sangs rgyas kyi chos dang
117a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legaso leg so//rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thathor pa thogs pa med po'i sgo thob pa med ste/rigs
117a6(phal chen): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/yongasu bzung nas rje bu 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /rnam par dpyad pa dang /
117a7(phal chen): rnam par brtag pa dang /snang bar bya ba dang /rab tu snang bar byas pas/thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob bo//de thob pas kho bos ni sen
117b1(phal chen): mas cad kyi sems dang /spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thugs pa med//sems can thams cad kyi smra ba dang /shrI'aphro yongs shes par bya ba la zhugs pa med//smyar//
117b2(phal chen): gyi gnas rje su dran par bya ba'o sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med//phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang /'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med//da ltar byung ba'i
117b3(phal chen): dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa medo//sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang kun rdzob yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med//sems can dzang
117b4(phal chen): kyi the tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs medo//sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khang du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med//sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba
117b5(phal chen): dang /gdul ba'i dusu 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa medo//nyin mtshan dang /skad cig dang /yud tsam dang /thang cig dang /dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la
117b6(phal chen): thogs pa med//dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa medado//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang bar bya ba la thogs pa medo/
117b7(phal chen): de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob par phyin te/rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing /mngon par 'du bya ba med
118a1(phal chen): pa smar dang r+d+han/b+ha ba nam tha'o yongs 'du las thun tshun du ga nong 'dug pa dang /bsgos pa dang /spyod lam sna rgyags smra/
118a2(phal chen): mi ba byed //nga bar byud //du ba gyul bar byed //ma skye 'ab bar byed// gang rang ra //mang bar bya shing ga N+Di
118a3(phal chen): dang mi d+hAng po 'du nyan su m+bo bIr+yA byung //cig pa la 'ong thags thigs med pa dang /rab la thugs thags med par 'gro ste/dpe 'ad/rnamakha' la b+h+re ba~M bAzhi na//nam
118a4(phal chen): ma di 'ang skyil ma kaisadaper na/mad+ma ba chags bya bzhin//sa su yang phyi rdul dung steng du 'byung ba skyed de/dbye na/rgyus bya ba bzhin/
118a5(phal chen): yang 'bring ba myod par 'gro ste/dra Tar na sa la bya ba bzhin//du ba 'thul ba dang //me lce 'bar ba byed/dper ni/me'i phung po chen po bzhin//sa yang yong su gas
118a6(phal chen): par byed// dang zla ba 'dig nyis de lta 'dul hU~M de ltar mthu chel/de ltar N+DI baN+Di tshe yang zhugs pas kun nas pa shA hA// u ba'i 'jig
118a7(phal chen): kyi bor dag tu rang lus kyis dbang sgyur//'jig rten na thos kyi drid ba na thun du chags pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khabs par byas tshang rab tu ri bar byed//rin patsha
118b1(phal chen): zur gyi sbyin b+h+r-i drA bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas shing /'gru ba thams cad dang 'dra bya'i sprul pa'i sbyin rab tu 'gyod//kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od
118b2(phal chen): ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing /phyogs kun tu'ang 'gro ste/'di ltar shar phyog su'ang 'gro'o//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byung shar gyi phyogs
118b3(phal chen): mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dong /'og dang bla'i phyag su'ang 'gro'o//sems kyi
118b4(phal chen): skad cig re re yangashar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o//'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o//'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang
118b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams skyong dang /'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /'jig rten gyi khams
118b6(phal chen): bye ba phrag stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams bye bo khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang /'jig
118b7(phal chen): na gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang
119a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang /'jog rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang /'jog rten rgyu
119a2(phal chen): khams sa mtshams med pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/'jog rten gyi khams de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom
119a3(phal chen): ldan 'das ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho gnyis la/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dgu dang /'jig rten
119a4(phal chen): gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams yong su 'du ba de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams
119a5(phal chen): 'byung ba de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgra de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par
119a6(phal chen): byA bde dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang /'jig rte/
119a7(phal chen): kyikhams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos snyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las/de bzhin gshegs
119b1(phal chen): par ro shing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang /lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyeng
119b2(phal chen): kye mchod pa'i sprin gyi tshor 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o//de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang /spos thams cad dang /phreng ba thams cad dang /phye ma thams cad
119b3(phal chen): dang /byug pa thams cad dang /na bzhi' thams cad dang /rgyu la mtshan thams cad dang /lha'i bden rnams cad dang /thA raM thams cad dang /dra ba thams cad dang //gzugs
119b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang /bstan pa dang /brjod pa dang /yang dag par bshad
119b5(phal chen): pa dang /yang dag par smos pa dang /yongasu brjod pa dang /men ngag tu gsungs pa dang /shin tu bstan pa dang /rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing
119b6(phal chen): 'dzin to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ji srid pa de dag thams cad kyang rje su dran//shaR+Sha b+hog gu ji lta ba de bzhin du sgo phyog sna dang
119b7(phal chen): dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang sher lce'i phyogs mtshams dang /lha nuba'i phyogs mtshams dang /nu byangan
120a1(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang stong glo phyogs yang 'jig rten gyi khams gtsug kyang 'da'o//'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o//'jo/
120a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'da'o//'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/sangs rgyas bcom
120a3(phal chen): 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/'jig rten gyi khams mtsho de dang de dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/'jig rten gyi khams
120a4(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag ni chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong //de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas/gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyis
120a5(phal chen): mchod pa byeda'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis nga ji snyed du gsung pa nas/rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongasu shes shing 'dzin to//sangs
120a6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rje su dran//sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /
120a7(phal chen): gong dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur//sems can phra mo 'am/rags pa 'am/ngan pa'am
120b1(phal chen): bzang ba 'am/bde ba'am/mi bde ba gang ji skad cig khro bos mthong bar gyur pa de drug kun+da la yang yongasu smin par bya ba dang /'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i
120b2(phal chen): phyir/khong te de dag gi lus kyi tshang dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlog//sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'das pa de dag thams cad kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
120b3(phal chen): par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par gnanI pa dan yad pa phyi rab tu gzhag/rigs kyi bu khe bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
120b4(phal chen): za pa thags pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang /rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /'thun pa
120b5(phal chen): de shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/theg pa chen po'i ngangango tshul can/byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can
120b6(phal chen): thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i skyid pa chung mi son pa'i ngang tshul can/byang chub kyi sems yang su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/sangs
120b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/thams cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'dral pa'i ngang tshul can/namatha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can
121a1(phal chen): 'jobargyun rnams cad la mi gnas pa'o dang tshul can/chung mi gson pad+ma dang tshul can/mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/mgang pa'i ngang tshul can Ak+Sha/
121a2(phal chen): mod pa'i ngang tshul can/ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/byang chub
121a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi skyed pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re s+thAnA/gang rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/dru bye la'i grong rdal
121a4(phal chen): grong khyer rjes bya ba yod/de na du byi lo sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dpos byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya
121a5(phal chen): ba dang /ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/lan
121a6(phal chen): brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/yang dang yang du bltas nas/dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
121a7(phal chen): chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa la rab tu brtson pa/dus gsu
121b1(phal chen): snang bas soms sbyang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byud pa dang ldan pa/sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/'dus byas kyi dga'
121b2(phal chen): ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu sbyang
121b3(phal chen): pa'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/chos kyi snang ba rje su dran par bya ba dang /dge ba'i
121b4(phal chen): gshes gnyen rje su dran par bya ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yong su rjod pa byed cing /mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyor du phyin nas/dra byi
121b5(phal chen): la sprin yongasu tshol la ba las/grong khyer gyi khams shig na/chos bsten pa'i don du/seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing /srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la/chos
121b6(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rkyen ces bya ba yongasu ston cing 'dug pa mthong //de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la skye
121b7(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa
122a1(phal chen): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
122a2(phal chen): byar bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba dang /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lom rgyud thams cad du tsho ba mi 'tshal ba dang /ji ltar yongasu
122a3(phal chen): skyo ba ma mchis shing /bsam pa brtun par 'gyur ba dang //ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag par 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar yongasu skyo
122a4(phal chen): ba ma mchis shing /snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang /ji
122a5(phal chen): ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing /shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar don dang
122a6(phal chen): chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang skyob pa la mkhas pa dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs shing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar
122a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing sran pa'i stobs yongasu gnan par 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i sna
122b1(phal chen): gsu rtogs shing rig pa'i sbubs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /dzI skar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi sbubs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab
122b2(phal chen): tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshul te//de nas dra byi la sbyin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri de las langs te/babs nas/
122b3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to//nor bu rin po che rin
122b4(phal chen): thang meng ba mang po dang /tsan dan gyi phye mdas pas kyang mngon par gtor to//gos chen sna tshogs rnam pa thams cad pas kha dog bsgyur ba/brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon
122b5(phal chen): par bkab bo//spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la dalta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas/mchod po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang
122b6(phal chen): mchod pa dang /rim gro dang /bkur bsti dang /s+t+rI stang cher byas te/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smra so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
122b7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa leg so//leg so//rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/sangs rgyas thams
123a1(phal chen): cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rigs par bya ba la brtson pa/
123a2(phal chen): yin/zhing gi rgyud thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba lo zhugs pa yin/sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin
123a3(phal chen): chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa la brtson pa yin/las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'grol bar gnas pa yin/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
123a4(phal chen): ba'i rigs thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin/smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/yang dag par zhugs pa yin/dus gsum
123a5(phal chen): gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/mos pa'i rigs shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thaMd
123a6(phal chen): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/
123a7(phal chen): 'phags pa thams cad kyis rje su dgyes par bya ba yin/tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon por dga' bar bya ba yin/lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod
123b1(phal chen): bya yin/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongasu bsrung ba yin/srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsdu ba yin/
123b2(phal chen): mi'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad
123b3(phal chen): kyang /dran song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongasu bcad pa dang /mi khom pa dang /ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
123b4(phal chen): lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
123b5(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongasu dag par bya ba byang chub kyi sems kyi 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang /byang chub
123b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yin/rigs kyi bu de la bdog 'di snyam du sems te/
123b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dga' ba byed pa ste/'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas
124a1(phal chen): pha dang many+dzu bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyun tu gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis
124a2(phal chen): mAnar pa rnams la skyabs gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir gan su gyur ba'o//byang chub sems dpa ni 'jigs pasmra
124a3(phal chen): tshigs kyis gtses po rnams le dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las/yongasu ston pa'i phyir rlung gi
124a4(phal chen): 'khor lo lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod
124a5(phal chen): nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed po'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o//byang chub sems
124a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas re rab lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o//byang
124a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas
124b1(phal chen): rdul bod pa lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongasu snyoms pas mo lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos
124b2(phal chen): sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char
124b3(phal chen): ba lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i 'gro ma yongasu ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
124b4(phal chen): las yang dag por sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir/mu stegs lta bu'o//de ltar dra byi
124b5(phal chen): la sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongasu bsngags pa byas nas/tshong dpon gyi bu ni ro
124b6(phal chen): bzangs la leg so//zhes bsngagaso//de ltar nges byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/tshig brjod pa'i tshe/kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam
124b7(phal chen): pa 'di lta bu byung ste/'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas por gang bar gyur nas/lha dang /lha rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/klu
125a1(phal chen): dang /klu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/dri za dang dri za'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/lha ma yin
125a2(phal chen): dang /lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/na mkha' lding dang /na mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/mi 'am ci dang /mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/lto 'phye
125a3(phal chen): chen po dang /lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phruphral chen po 'am/mi dang /mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/mi ma yin pa dang /mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/tshangs pa dang tshangs
125a4(phal chen): pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/snang ba des yongasu snang bar byas pa de dag/dra byi la sgron gyi drung du 'ong so//de nas de ltar dra byil
125a5(phal chen): sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa/lus dang sems sim par gyur pa dga' ba rgya chen po smyos pa/sr-i zhu chen po la gnas pa/nga
125a6(phal chen): rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa g.yo sgyu dang 'bral ba/dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyun
125a7(phal chen): ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag por bstan te/khong du chud pa dang /rtogs pa dang /shes pa dang /reg par byas//de nas kyang de dag thams cad blan med pa
125b1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mo ldog par gyur to//de nas de'i phyir chos kyi spyan la 'dug nas tshong dpon b+h+yo bu nor bzungs lnga 'di skad nas smra so//rigs kyi/
125b2(phal chen): bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes//de bzhin du klu
125b3(phal chen): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /tshangs pa rnams kyi
125b4(phal chen): tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes//lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes//de bzhin du klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nu mkha' lding dang /mi
125b5(phal chen): tsaM dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa dang /tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes//lha rnams kyi lha'i skang gcig pa yangs shes//de
125b6(phal chen): bzhin du k+Sha dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am N+Di dang /k+to 'bye chen pa dang /mI dang mi ma yin pa dang /tshangs pa
125b7(phal chen): rnams kyi chings pa'i skad gcog pa yang shes//lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa yang shes//de bzhin du klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
126a1(phal chen): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /tshangs pa rnams kyi tshungs pa'i skad tha dad pa yang sheso//
126a2(phal chen): byol song gi skye gan su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi brda' dang /skad dang /ming tha dad pa yang shes//sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnam
126a3(phal chen): kyang sheso//gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sen rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang shes//'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang sheso//'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang
126a4(phal chen): ming rnams kyang sheso//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang brda' dang nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang sheso//sems kyi skad cig rar
126a5(phal chen): la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang
126a6(phal chen): tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do//ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda' dang nges pa'i tshig dang /skad
126a7(phal chen): dang ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
126b1(phal chen): /mAtshungs pa nod pa/kun tu mtha' yas pa/mu med pa/pha mtshams med pa/gzhal med pa/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nug/
126b2(phal chen): phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
126b3(phal chen): 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda' dang /nges
126b4(phal chen): ba'i tshig dang /skad dang ming rgya mtsha thams cad la yong 'jug cing shes te/'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang sheso//tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du 'ang sheso//rigs
126b5(phal chen): kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes pas zad na/kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya
126b6(phal chen): mtsho la zhugs po de dag dang /'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /
126b7(phal chen): 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang /rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /tshogs thams cad kyi mtshams sgyur ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /
127a1(phal chen): rnyog gyur blangs te b+hasman gyi rgyu mtshol zhugs pa de dag dang /dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dam gos pa gcig tu rnam par spyod pa rgyu
127a2(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /tshig gis brtsegs te brtan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te brtan pa rgya mtshol zhugs pa
127a3(phal chen): de dag dang /tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang
127a4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi slad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyun thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang /yi ge'i 'khor lo'i
127a5(phal chen): mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba la byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nur ra spyan/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul nag
127a6(phal chen): tshul no gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na tshong dpon bting brjod ces bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dang
127a7(phal chen): spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang /ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang /ji ltar sems nges par gzhag par bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dra r+ya
127b1(phal chen): lha sbyin gyi rgung pa gnyis la skyo bas phyag 'tshal te/chos d+d+hi mgro byas nas/dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba chags pa la rab tu brtag pa dang /dge ba'i ga shos gnyen la//
127b2(phal chen): 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par blta zhing gdong mchims gang bar dus te/dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/
127b3(phal chen): yung dang yang du bltas phyag 'tshal zhing dra byil sbyin gyi drung nas song ngo ///bam po dgu bcu rtsa gi cig pa/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
127b4(phal chen): bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjesu bsam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang /
127b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjesu dran par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas/rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rje su 'brang bar
127b6(phal chen): bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chagaso bsdu zhing bslob pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid
127b7(phal chen): rnam par sbyang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam
128a1(phal chen): par dag par bya bye de nyid brtan par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i blasam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang
128a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de yang yongasu sbyang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang /byang chub sems da
128a3(phal chen): yong ma chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs snying dam la brtan zhing spyan lam gyi sems kyis yongasu skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun dang ldan pa
128a4(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/yid kyis rtul ba las mi zlog pa dang pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/rdo rje'i mthu bo ches mi byed pa'i
128a5(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag 'thun par len pa/shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/sgo kun nas rnam par
128a6(phal chen): dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/sa'i gzungs kun nas
128a7(phal chen): snang ba rab tu thob pa/chos kyi dbyings kyis gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/gzhi kun li rten pa'i rkyen rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin
128b1(phal chen): rnam par dmigs bya gnas myed pa dang /bdag gi myed pa dang /gnyi sa med pa'i spyod yul lha rab tu brtson pa/'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed ba'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam
128b2(phal chen): par dag pachos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa/'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog po/chos kyi gzhi dang phyog
128b3(phal chen): kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang /rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du
128b4(phal chen): chud pa'i ye shes can/chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ye shes kun nas snang ba'i tingange 'dzin gyi rnam pa snang bas sems
128b5(phal chen): gsal bar byas pa/yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa thams cad mkhyen pa
128b6(phal chen): nyid du dang po'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba med pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa/
128b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i
129a1(phal chen): smon lam dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus yang dag par bsdu ba dang mngon par bsgrubs pa la brtson pa do/mthar gyis song song ste//
129a2(phal chen): lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/des tshong dpon btang rjod de btsal btsal de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyi phab ste/phyag
129a3(phal chen): 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal par gyur pa ni/bdag gis
129a4(phal chen): 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob po/de ci'i slad du zhe na/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o//'byung bar dka' ba'o//mjal bar dka'
129a5(phal chen): ba'o//bgrod par dka' ba'o//bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o//mnyes par bgyi ba dka' ba'o//'grogs par dka' ba'o//rim gror bgyi ba dka' ba'o//dge
129a6(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjesu 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de raring bdag gis thob par gyur to//'phags
129a7(phal chen): pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta
129b1(phal chen): ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud
129b2(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang /sangs
129b3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi spyod par ma ngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas
129b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongasu dag par ba gyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams
129b5(phal chen): cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan cing blangs par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan
129b6(phal chen): pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa yongasasu gzungs pa dang /
129b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'
