130a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi spyod pa yongasu dag par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems
130a2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngogo la sgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par
130a3(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'o thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
130a4(phal chen): ting 'dzin gyi gtor dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
130a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gter dang
130a6(phal chen): mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gtar dang mdzod nang gi sems kyi dbang du bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'
130a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas
130b1(phal chen): 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dor mchis//bsam pa de lta bu dang yid la smon pa de lta bu dang /mngon par dga' ba dro lta bu dang /sems dpa' de lta bu dang /
130b2(phal chen): gdan mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang /spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang /tshul khong du chud par bgyi bra lams pa de lta bu dang /rnam par dag
130b3(phal chen): pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang /rnam par dpyad pa'i bas pa de lta bu dang /rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang /dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang /mngon du gyur pa'i
130b4(phal chen): dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/'phags pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga gdams ngag dang /rjes ston pa mdzad cing /tshul ni nye bar ston pa
130b5(phal chen): mdzad/rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad/lam ni bstan par mdzad/mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzad/chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/the tsam ni
130b6(phal chen): yongasu gcod par mdzad/nA mi nur ni sel bar mdzad/yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/sems kyi thibs po ni
130b7(phal chen): snang bar mdzad/sems kyi dri ma ni yongasu sel bar mdzad/sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang por mdzad/sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongasu sel bar mdzad/sems kyi gdang ba
131a1(phal chen): yongasu som par mdzad/'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/mau dge ba las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/sems can dmyal ba
131a2(phal chen): las ni ldog par mdzad/gnas dang ni dpral bar mdzad/mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/chags pa thams cad las ni yongasu 'grel ba mdzad/thams
131a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur pa mdzad/snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/byams
131a4(phal chen): pa chen po la rab tu gzho ga pa mdzad/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ting 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la 'dzud pa mdzad/rtogs par 'gyur ba'i
131a5(phal chen): sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gozhog pa mdzad/stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems
131a6(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba mdzad zhes thos na/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ji ltar brtson par
131a7(phal chen): bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/de nas chang dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems
131b1(phal chen): dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo gling mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dag bya'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang /de bzhin/
131b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsam shing /ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrungs pas snyoms par zhugs//chang dpan btang
131b3(phal chen): brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongasu dag pa rna di lta bur gnas par gyur te/lus yongasu dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
131b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang bcas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/sngon skyong
131b5(phal chen): pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcaste/mngon
131b6(phal chen): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongasu ston pa dang bcas/chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas//sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/chos kyi mu'i
131b7(phal chen): mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongasu chud cing 'dus par snang ste nga dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /phan tshun mchod pa dang /phan tshun shin tu rnam par
132a1(phal chen): phye ba dang /phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang /tshul sna tshogasu bzhugs pa dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs
132a2(phal chen): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam
132a3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa sna tshogasu yongasu ston par snangango //theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang /smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongasu brjod pa dang /'jig rten
132a4(phal chen): gyi khams la li nA ni dga' ldani gyi pho brang du skyes shing /sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang //la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang //
132a5(phal chen): la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam poraro 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston pa dang /la la na ni skye ba dang /la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang /
132a6(phal chen): la la na ni tsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang /la la ni ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul pa rkyen
132a7(phal chen): chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang /la la na ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri zas yongasu bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar//
132b1(phal chen): gangal ba gang ba pa dang /lasanan nas kyilakhor la bsgyur ba sma dA pa dang /la lan ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang /la la na ni yongasu mya ngan la du/
132b2(phal chen): 'da' bar snang //'jig rten gyi khams la lan ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsgral rnams par 'god par smra //sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lanan
132b3(phal chen): sku dang mi rnams du bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis sgrub pa byed par snang ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ros rnam pa thu dad par
132b4(phal chen): sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi mye gnas rnams pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi tshogs rnam
132b5(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi dge pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam
132b6(phal chen): patha dad pa dang /sems can gyims pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi dbang ba'i chung nam pa pa dang byud /dus kyi rgyud rnam pa dad pa dang /ma
132b7(phal chen): na gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /sems can gyi 'jig tan rnam par dbye ba rnam pathi dad pa dang
133a1(phal chen): sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang /sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang /sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa
133a2(phal chen): dang /dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bag tshogs sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams
133a3(phal chen): la/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu bstan pa dang /yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /gsung rnam pa
133a4(phal chen): sna tshog su bsgrub pa dang /mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i
133a5(phal chen): tshul gyi gzhu nga sna tshogs dang /'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang /seng ge'i ngo ro rab tu
133a6(phal chen): bsgrags pa dang /sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongasu bstan pa dang /dran pa sgro sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par
133a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga re sna tshogs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna
133b1(phal chen): tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbyung med pa/mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa/phan tshun mchod pa dang /rnam par dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna
133b2(phal chen): tshogs yangs pa dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang /dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang /dpag tshad brgya'i chang
133b3(phal chen): tsam nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom
133b4(phal chen): ldan 'das de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /sgra skad thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro bas/chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad
133b5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis thoso//blang so//yang dag par bzung //bsamaso//sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong //byang chub sems dpa'i ting
133b6(phal chen): 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong //de nas tshong dpon btang rjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting 'dzin de las langs nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di 'di skad
133b7(phal chen): ces smraso//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa/thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yong su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs/
134a1(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan
134a2(phal chen): pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar mo'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po las
134a3(phal chen): sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lamA du sdo //lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
134a4(phal chen): stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba/byang
134a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal por sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang /
134a6(phal chen): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i
134a7(phal chen): rgyal po zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /thabs
134b1(phal chen): gtsug tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang //byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
134b2(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/byang chub sems dga' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
134b3(phal chen): thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yong mig lam du snang //byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/de
134b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par
134b5(phal chen): shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dong thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang //shar lho'i phyogs
134b6(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/bya
134b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
135a1(phal chen): pa yang mig lam du snang //nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jijog rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'ad zer sbyar snad dra na/de bzhon gshegs pa dgra brtsam/
135a2(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug
135a3(phal chen): phud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang //thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du sna ngo //nub byang gi
135a4(phal chen): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyun yid du 'ongs pa dge ba'i snying po na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
135a5(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa/byang chub sems
135a6(phal chen): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snangango //'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i snang
135a7(phal chen): zhing 'bar ba na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyingasu snang ba zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa'
135b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyangs 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa
135b2(phal chen): yang mig lom du snang //steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs
135b3(phal chen): rgyas yon tan grogs pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs
135b4(phal chen): pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang //rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag
135b5(phal chen): la sogs pa/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed mthong yang de bzhin
135b6(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byan/kho bo yang der 'gro ba med/nas 'dod pa de na/bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha'
135b7(phal chen): yas bzhugs pa yang mthong //tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa yang mthong //spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi
136a1(phal chen): /khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra snad rin tshun b+ha zhugs pa yang mthad//pad+ma yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs
136a2(phal chen): pa'od snang rin chen pad+mo bzhugs pa yang mthong //gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang mthong //mngon par
136a3(phal chen): dga' bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa mi skul ba bzhugs pa yang mthong //shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs
136a4(phal chen): paseng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong //me 'ong gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong //rin chen
136a5(phal chen): dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong //rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang
136a6(phal chen): gang dang /'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi/de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong //dus
136a7(phal chen): gsum gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi
136b1(phal chen): don dang /sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa glang dang grang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/de bzhin//
136b2(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par
136b3(phal chen): la/gang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang /rmi lam lta bur shes la/rang gi sems rnam par
136b4(phal chen): dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/rang gi sems rnam par
136b5(phal chen): dmigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang /sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/rang gi sems
136b6(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa yid/sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag cu lta bur brjod par shes pa/rang gi sems rnam par dmis/
136b7(phal chen): pa yang /sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi cha skye thams cad ni/rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung zhes bya bar
137a1(phal chen): rjesu rtogs shing khong du chud//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad kyang /rang gi sems kyi byin gyis byu rlab so//byang chub
137a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs//sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis rlobs//byang
137a3(phal chen): chub sems dpe'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so//thams cing mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi
137a4(phal chen): rlab so//rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so//sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
137a5(phal chen): yang /rang gi sems kyi byin gyis rlab so//chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung zhing /rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs//
137a6(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad shin tu bla bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so//zhes bya bar khong du rgyud cing rjesu rtog so//rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di
137a7(phal chen): snyam du sems te/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o//chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu brtan par bya'o//sgrib
137b1(phal chen): rnams la spyan rang gi sems nyid yongasu spyad bur byA'o//btsun 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtun par bya'o//bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par
137b2(phal chen): bya'o//ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni ra gi semos nyid gzhol bar bya'o//shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu sbyang bar bya'o//rnam par dbang rnams la
137b3(phal chen): no rang gi sems nyid mngon par bslab par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi
137b4(phal chen): sems nyid snang bar bya'o//snyam mo//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/blangs shing yongasu 'dzin
137b5(phal chen): par zad na/kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/chag pa med pa rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/daltar byung ba'i
137b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting 'dzin rab tu thob pa/mya dran lngas 'brel ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting 'dzin
137b7(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam
138a1(phal chen): par bkram pa/sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyong yul dang ldan pa/rgyan
138a2(phal chen): phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs cing 'dre bar snang yong/de dag la bdag dang 'dzag rten gyi
138a3(phal chen): khomasu gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/yon tan brjod par nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi
138a4(phal chen): mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod/de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gis/nga'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas//
138a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis
138a6(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/tshong dpon bting rjod la lan brgya stong du g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas te/tshong dpon btang rjod kyi yon tan grang
138a7(phal chen): med pa la ston par brjod de brtag pa dang /mos par bya ba dang /mi gtang bar bya ba sems shing ngu ste/smre sngags bton nas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par
138b1(phal chen): sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'bring ba dang /dge ba'i bshos gnyen bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi
138b2(phal chen): 'ga' bar byed pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i gshes gnyen la rag lus par rje su lta ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjesu bsam pa dang /dge
138b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen g.yo sgyu med pa re spyod pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa zang
138b4(phal chen): yongasu spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu skyed pas phra tsam du sems shing /chod dpon btang rjod kyi drung nas song //de nas
138b5(phal chen): tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjesu sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams dag la nan tan bya ba dang /byang chub
138b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa rdosu dran par bya ba dang /
138b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya bA dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu 'dra bar bya ba'i tshul posam bya
139a1(phal chen): mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rje su blta bar bya ba dang /spangs
139a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyun rje su sbyang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
139a3(phal chen): 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang /khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsamau gyis mi khyab pa la yongasu brtag pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa
139a4(phal chen): la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang /byang chub sems
139a5(phal chen): dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rje su spyod cing //mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba//
139a6(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol pos las 'chags pa'i gnas shig gi/'chag sa'i mthar 'dug ste/ting+ge 'dzin la snyoms
139a7(phal chen): par bzhag naso/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yo la/byed pa med cing lus drang por bsring ste/dran pa mngon du byas nas/ting 'dzin gyi rnam par
139b1(phal chen): phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing /g.yas gson dang snang logs lus mtha' yas la/tshad mod cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/sgro gtsug bAm+WA
139b2(phal chen): mo mthong ba/kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig re re la khwa dog rnams pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongasu ston pa/de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhig ste/
139b3(phal chen): g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la/dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam
139b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong //rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongasu
139b5(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba dang /sems can thad kyi
139b6(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang /dran song gi lam thams cad yongasu bcad pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi bde po'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang /sems
139b7(phal chen): tsin thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang /sems can thams cad
140a1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir/rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas
140a2(phal chen): par 'gengs shing /de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang r-i mi gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong
140a3(phal chen): dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rini po che dang /cod
140a4(phal chen): pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/byis pa bye ba 'byes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong //bram ze dang
140a5(phal chen): khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang /ro'i yan lag sna tshogasu sbyar ba thams cad dang /rgyun thams cad dang /gos thams cad dang /me tog thams
140a6(phal chen): cod dang /phreng ba thams cad dang /spos thams cad dang /byug pa thams cad dang /'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang /rin po che thams cad dang /gnas zad
140a7(phal chen): dang /snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang /yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yong su sdud cing /'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams
140b1(phal chen): dbugs dbyung ba dang /sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang /sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /sems can rnams byang chub tu yongasu smin par
140b2(phal chen): byed cing /phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong //pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dong /bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /'jig rten na
140b3(phal chen): mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /mo'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa ri gzugs dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das
140b4(phal chen): ba'i las kyi tshul dang /rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa//dbyibs
140b5(phal chen): dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yi mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing /chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can
140b6(phal chen): rnams la phan gdags pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang /logs par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang /theg pa'i gru la
140b7(phal chen): nyal nye su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyungs pa dang /'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang /
141a1(phal chen): sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongasu bsgrags pa dang /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la sems can+da gzud pa dang /don spyad pa la sems
141a2(phal chen): can dgod pa dang /dga' ba'i shugs yongasu bskyed pa dang /snyan par smra ba'i bslu ba'i dngos po yongasu brjod pa dang /'jig rten la don 'thun par bsgrub pa ston
141a3(phal chen): par byed cing /phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dod pa mthong ngo //lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbying su 'khod pa/lpags pa dang /
141a4(phal chen): shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/gzugs dang cha byang drang dbyibs sna tshogs can/spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon
141a5(phal chen): tan brjod cing /chos kyi sku yong su bsgrag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongasu bstan pa dang /tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs
141a6(phal chen): brjod pa dang /dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang /rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang /ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang /'jig rten
141a7(phal chen): gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongasu brjod pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang /mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can
141b1(phal chen): rab tu dgong pa pyod cing /phyogs 'as bkang ste 'dong ba mthong //rdzob lcogs gnyis nas klu' bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa lus kyi dbyibs bsam tu//
141b2(phal chen): mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bsten pa dang /spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsnam gyis mi khyab pa na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyi
141b3(phal chen): brlab pa dang /me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang /'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zad rnam
141b4(phal chen): par grub pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs kyi sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongasu khebs par bya ba dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin
141b5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun dang /rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang rin po che'i phyang phul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
141b6(phal chen): rgyun dang /nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan da /rin cha si mi de sa tshigs dang me tog gi sbyin rgyu bsam gyis mo lta paSh+Ti
141b7(phal chen): rgyan dang /rin po che'i khri la skyil mo dkrung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan/lha rdzas kyi rin po che
142a1(phal chen): rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /rin po che'i
142a2(phal chen): pad+mo ze ba mtho ba/mu tig gi dri bas brgyan pa/rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i spri ni gyo char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /rin po
142a3(phal chen): tshe'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/'od zer gyi sgra ni mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /lha'i
142a4(phal chen): lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang phreng ba dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal
142a5(phal chen): mo sbyar te/gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs
142a6(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan/na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing /spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa dang /bdug spos kyi
142a7(phal chen): na bun dang /sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la 'khar mngon par khebs par bya ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
142b1(phal chen): klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas/skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas
142b2(phal chen): par 'gongs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/
142b3(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi sgras rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing /chu 'dzin chen po yongasu bskyab pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyed pa dang
142b4(phal chen): ro'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang /lha'i gnas thams cad yongasu bskyob pa dang /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang bdud kyi sde thad
142b5(phal chen): rab tu gdul ba dang /nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang /dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /gnod par sems dpa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang /tho mtshams
142b6(phal chen): pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang /sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i
142b7(phal chen): thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang /lha ma yin gyi sgras rnam par 'phrul pa dang /rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dong /sdig pa las gyen du
143a1(phal chen): bskyod pa dang /'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang /srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba//
143a2(phal chen): dang /byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /byang chub
143a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos
143a4(phal chen): kyi tshul snang ba yongasu bskyed pa dang /chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis/sems kyi skad cig re ro zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/tshong dpon
143a5(phal chen): gyi bu no ri bzangs kyis mthong ngo //rgyab kyi gzhung nas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byung nas/nyan thos
143a6(phal chen): dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams/bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa yongasu rjod pa byed cing /rtag par mngon
143a7(phal chen): par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongasu bstan pa dang /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la/byams
143b1(phal chen): ba dang /gti mug gi spyod pa rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung brjod pa dang /cha mnyam pa'i spyad pa can rnams la/ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i
143b2(phal chen): chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang /yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang /zhi ba la gnas sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis
143b3(phal chen): spro ba bskyed pa dang /phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
143b4(phal chen): 'gengs pa/tshong dben gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //phrag pa'i rgyun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang /srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /lus mi sdug
143b5(phal chen): pa dang /kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/'khor sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba sems can gyi
143b6(phal chen): khams yongasu bskyang ba la rtson pa/'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung
143b7(phal chen): nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi na mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing /dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yang su bslu
144a1(phal chen): rmAb dang /'phags par dkyil 'khor thams cad phongs bsrung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongasu bzung ba dang /lag na du
144a2(phal chen): las kyis yang dag par song ba dang /yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongasu bsrung ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba dang sems
144a3(phal chen): can ldog par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang /gnod pa dang /'jigs pa thams
144a4(phal chen): cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongasu bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongasu rdzogs
144a5(phal chen): par bya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang /phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod pa byed cing /chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gongs pa
144a6(phal chen): byed pa/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //mdun gyi lho nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/mi 'am
144a7(phal chen): ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stang grangs med pa tsan+d+ra dang /dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo 'khor
144b1(phal chen): ba stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas g+ha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang /dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa
144b2(phal chen): byed cing /byang chub kyi sems yongasu bsngags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu brjod pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon
144b3(phal chen): por bstod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
144b4(phal chen): sgro thams cad yongasu brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang /sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas
144b5(phal chen): kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba dang /chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang /sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang /dge ba'i
144b6(phal chen): rtsa bar sgro thams cad yongasu bskyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //kha'i sgo nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/
144b7(phal chen): rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing /stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing ron po che'i 'byung gan
145a1(phal chen): thams cad yongasu gtang ba dung /nor bu rin pa tshwa'i chags thams cad sbyin pa dang /dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang /srog gcod pa sa
145a2(phal chen): 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgodu pa dang /mi byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang /rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i
145a3(phal chen): bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongasu gtang ba dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang brdzun du
145a4(phal chen): smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang /slu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang /phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang /gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig
145a5(phal chen): rab tu brjed pa dang /zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /gnod pa'i chos dang ldan
145a6(phal chen): pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las/sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang /de ni zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang /ngag gi nyes pa zad
145a7(phal chen): las 'jog rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig tu brjod par bya ba dang /'jig rten gyi snying gi dri za yongasu sel cing /'dod pa chung ba dang /tshogs
145b1(phal chen): shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang /
145b2(phal chen): lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang /yid gnyis kyi rab thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang /the tshoms kyi sgo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /nem nur
145b3(phal chen): dang som nya'i rab rib yongasu bstsal ba dang /chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang /rkyen las byung ba rab tu rjod pa dang /rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems
145b4(phal chen): can rab tu dgod pa dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing //phyogs
145b5(phal chen): bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshad dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo //mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong /sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul
145b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongasu snang bar byed cing /'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang /sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rab
145b7(phal chen): sel ba dang /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grangs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ong kha dog dkar
146a1(phal chen): po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /gsor gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 'ong ba dUn+ya kha dog can rab tu 'gyod pa dang /bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams
146a2(phal chen): 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyod pa dang /dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyod pa dang /gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'o
146a3(phal chen): shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 'di mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /a s+sa g+har pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing
146a4(phal chen): rnan su 'od gser gyi kha dag can rab tu 'gyed ba dang /gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od ya skye gar ba'i kha dag can rab du 'byed pa'o//in d+ha nI lA'i rang bzhin gyi
146a5(phal chen): zhing rnamasu 'di rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed//rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi ning rnams 'od rin po che'i in dra nI la'i kha
146a6(phal chen): dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab
146a7(phal chen): tu 'byed pa dang /rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od mu tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa
146b1(phal chen): dang /rlan po cho gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'ong rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyod pa dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhong rnams 'o rin po che
146b2(phal chen): gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi
146b3(phal chen): dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo //smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
146b4(phal chen): byung nas/lho'i dbang po thams cad zol gyis gnon cing /'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjesu
146b5(phal chen): bsngags par byed cing /sems can tshad med pa gdul ba las brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong //'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam
146b6(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangasu brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsal ba gdab pa dang /byang chub
146b7(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang //
147a1(phal chen): kyis mthong //mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/kha dag dang dbyings pa cha
147a2(phal chen): kyis/brgyan pa'i lus yongasu ston cing /dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dpung med pa rab
147a3(phal chen): tu dgye ba dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/gtong ba dang len pa dang /dngos po yongasu
147a4(phal chen): gtang ba'i rnam pa'i sprini mang po rab tu dgye ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon/gyi sbyor ba brgya mtsho yongasu bstan pa dang /sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig
147a5(phal chen): rten du yongasasu brjod pa dang /ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang /chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs
147a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag pa brjod
147a7(phal chen): pa dang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo //yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas
147b1(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing /bA spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya ma
147b2(phal chen): yongasu bstan pa dang /sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang /'jig rten
147b3(phal chen): gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang /'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bskul ba dang /log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas/byang chub sems
147b4(phal chen): dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang /snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu brjod cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/sangs
147b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing /rmi lam gyi tshul dang
147b6(phal chen): nyam par yongasu gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir/yul yongasu 'dzin pa dang /nyon mongs pa la dbang sgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong //yang byang chub sems
147b7(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/'jig rten rnams la mo dog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par ston cing /khro ba med pa dang /khrug
148a1(phal chen): ba med pa dang /shar gnyer ba med pa dang /zhe sdang ba med pa dang /chud ston pa med pa dang /khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa/
148a2(phal chen): dang /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongasu bcad pa'i phyir/be spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
148a3(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing /bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo //
148a4(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing
148a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongasu btsal bas mi skyo bar bya bar yongasu brjod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
148a6(phal chen): pa thams cad mched ning rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa/sdug bsngal gyi phung pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can+da rab tu
148a7(phal chen): dgod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba med po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
148b1(phal chen): nadu na sman du dang /ldan nga ldan nam pa du/na rgyu rdzu dru rdzun pa sasu
148b2(phal chen): dashing ba dang /ma la dang skyer ba 'i 'jig sbyin dab rgya gzung pa dang /rgyun mi chad pa 'atsun par byed pa mchod //snang byung chub sems dpa'i sangs rgya zhing rje
148b3(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed byu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dge ci sgrib pa dang /bar du gcod pa dang
148b4(phal chen): mas cad das par bsgral 'darnam pa dang bag med pa sems cad las sem m+b+ha nan nus par bzlog pa dang /bag spyod pa'i chos la ra te dag pa rjes pa
148b5(phal chen): da du rgya la sbyirna la man /nas pa da/ seM sa kyi m-i h+ma T+Ta hU~M sa 'ig rgyas pa dang /ga sbyin nams la bams tan gyi tu blun pa
148b6(phal chen): shes pa dang /ts+tsha bu ga rnams pa rnaMs pasam na gyipa na pa dang ldan pa sbyin pa tshul ming ba na ba dang na yang
148b7(phal chen): sems can rab tu dgod po byed cing /dacigare ma chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gongs pa mthang //yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rjem shin tu
149a1(phal chen): phra ba skyed byung ste/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos yong du tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang /
149a2(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /yang dag par lto ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang /chos kyi
149a3(phal chen): rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang /sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang /lta ba thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang /the tsom
149a4(phal chen): dang yid gnyis dang nam nur gyi rab rib rnam par bstsal pa dang /ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig ri ra la chos kyi dbyings rgyas
149a5(phal chen): par 'gengs pa mthong //yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul
149a6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing /kha spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /'jig rten rnams la thabs
149a7(phal chen): mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang /theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang //
149b1(phal chen): byung /myu da gas sa bas dad pa'i byung chub sonas dpa'i spyod 'dus brdzun pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ba tu ston pal can/
149b2(phal chen): can rab tu dgod pa dang /'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing /sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gas
149b3(phal chen): pa mthong ngo //yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byung ste/baspu'i bu ga thams cad nus/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
149b4(phal chen): kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sdug cing /bya spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon ldum gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon
149b5(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba rang sbyi d+h+ya dbye ba dang smon lam ste pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams ca la sem rab tu dgod pa dang
149b6(phal chen): smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba/chos thams cad kyi rje su 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa/mi shes bya'i ri rnam par
149b7(phal chen): 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong //yang byang chub
150a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang ba bya ba dang /byung
150a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i stobs yongasu bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu byung ba dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i
150a3(phal chen): sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongasu bstan pa dang /khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdibs
150a4(phal chen): kyang mi nyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang /bskal pas 'tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongasu bstan pa dang /'jig
150a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis na mkha'i dbyingasu ston pa'i stobs yongasu ston pa byed cing /sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs
150a6(phal chen): pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong //yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
150a7(phal chen): ston cing /bre spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'byed pa dang /'jig rten rnams la
150b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye
150b2(phal chen): shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang /smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu brjod pa dang /sems can thaMd
150b3(phal chen): yongasu bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang
150b4(phal chen): bzhin la gzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye
150b5(phal chen): shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /sems can zad
150b6(phal chen): kyi bsam pa dang /mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang dag par brjod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho
150b7(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon
151a1(phal chen): par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bstan pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig ro ro la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'grengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu
151a2(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis mthong //spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang /
151a3(phal chen): dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sba zhing tshad med par
151a4(phal chen): 'bar ba dang /chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yongasu ston pa dang /'gro ba
151a5(phal chen): thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/chos kyi dbyings
151a6(phal chen): kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la/gzhi kun tu
151a7(phal chen): rten pa'i sgroni ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshar mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab du dbang bskur nga rnams la/sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes
151b1(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi ston gyi chur mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gnon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dab pa dang /byang
151b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' phyir me ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shun tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bas
151b3(phal chen): pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa
151b4(phal chen): rnams la/'gro ba yongasu sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams le dus gsum gyi de bzhin
151b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thad
151b6(phal chen): gi rang bzhin dang /gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying
151b7(phal chen): po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la/dga' bar bya ba'i mdzad shin tu
152a1(phal chen): bsags pa'i snying po zhes rgyu ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi rgyur mngon par dbab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la
152a2(phal chen): rnam par thur pa mi zad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /gzugs la
152a3(phal chen): spyod pa'i sems can rnams la ga ni kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par dbab pa dang /tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgyud cha tshad med
152a4(phal chen): 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzad ces bya ba'i chos
152a5(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi cha mngon par dbab pa dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs tshul mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyings shes
152a6(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang
152a7(phal chen): pa dang /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon 'am rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /mtshe ma'i
152b1(phal chen): rlu sa la bzhin gshegs pa rnams nA \u0f7fu d+hun du y-imadzod ces bya bya'i chos kyi skyon rgyar mngon par dbab pa dang /d+h+rU'i dbang po byAHb+h+yon gyi gnas de bzhin ga she
152b2(phal chen): nga pas dga' ba'i thags 'byung zhes sa sbyin gyi rje ngon par dang po ba dang / n+d+ha dung de'i kunas chos kya byung ston pa 'i 'de nan ga
152b3(phal chen): bya'i rnam pad+ma m+b+hal pas r+b+bA s+yai p+na p+na g+h+ri s+m+R+YuM pa zhes bya ba'i chos sbyin gyi cher mngon par dbyu ba dang /hrIrje'i dbang du'i gar+b+ha sI de bzhin gsasu pa rnams
152b4(phal chen): dgu par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /lha ma yin gyi gan su ye shes kyi nul rgyu'i dA la 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyim mngon du
152b5(phal chen): dbyib pa dang /nam 'u rdzing gi dbang de'i gan su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sbyin ces bye ba'i tshad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /mi'am
152b6(phal chen): 'i na sa kyi sbyi yang bar ng+ge g+sa sa na ra dang nga byesas rlung ma
152b7(phal chen): da'i rnas par bru ci rmed pa'i ma kyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed zhes rgya napa sprin cin mengon par dbang ba 'i gyi chen pa'i de po'i gnas dag
153a1(phal chen): brgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /mi'i gnasu 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par
153a2(phal chen): du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams
153a3(phal chen): cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /byol song gi skye gnasu las kyi lam
153a4(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshor mngon par dbab pa
153a5(phal chen): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhino gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya
153a6(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi pa rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi
153a7(phal chen): nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing /chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //ba spu'i bu gathad
153b1(phal chen): laka/ba spu'i sgo rA rA nas kyang /'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khar kha dog dang gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa lnga sta gon du gan+d+ha//
153b2(phal chen): pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dri ba dang /dkyil
153b3(phal chen): 'khor la la las ni/sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo //ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/dus
153b4(phal chen): gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yid dam dang tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba
153b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag gi dam ya gcad
153b6(phal chen): kyang /nyam su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang /nyam su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
153b7(phal chen): lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig byung yang nyam su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong //byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba/rnam par brtags
154a1(phal chen): pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongasu btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang /yan
154a2(phal chen): lag dang nying lag gcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyam su bzod par byas pa dang /bag la zhu bar byas pa dang /gtang snyoms bzhag
154a3(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong //baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil 'khor
154a4(phal chen): la la las ni/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/rnam par bye ba'i gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /ma 'das
154a5(phal chen): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongasu bskyod pa dang /rgya mtsho yongasu bsgrim pa dang /sems can yongasu skyo bar bya ba dang /
154a6(phal chen): mu stegs can thams cad yongasu tshur+ya gcud pa dang /bdud thams cad spa dkang ba dang /chos kyi phyogs snang b.ri bya ba'i byang chub sems raba'i mthu chen po rnam par
154a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa mthong ngo //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed padang
154b1(phal chen): lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang /rigasu skye ba yongs gzung ba ji skyed pa dang /gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa ji snyed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su
154b2(phal chen): bstan pa yongasu gzung ba ji skyed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag
154b3(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i gtsug lag dang gnas dang /gzhal med khang dang /yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang /bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongasu bsgrub
154b4(phal chen): pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang /rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang /brtul zhugs dang /yi dam dang /tshul dang /spyod
154b5(phal chen): lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dben gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil 'khor la la las ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
154b6(phal chen): spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing /chos thams cad yong su tshal ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongasu bzung ba mthong ste/lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad
154b7(phal chen): yongasu btang ste/sems can thams cad las yongasu btsal ba dang /rim gro dang /bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongasu btsal ba dang /
155a1(phal chen): dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongasu btsal ba dang /chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes
155a2(phal chen): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongasu btsal ba de de dag
155a3(phal chen): thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil 'khor las mthong //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /dkyil
155a4(phal chen): 'khor la la las ni/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pas sems can thams cad
155a5(phal chen): ljongasu brngu ba'i sbyor ba mthong //sems canA re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/sems can ning
155a6(phal chen): kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongasu sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/sngon
155a7(phal chen): gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du/smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang /sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i smon lam/mngon
155b1(phal chen): par bstazlas pa'o spyod pa dang 'od thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzod pa ji stod pa dang /snron lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil
155b2(phal chen): 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabos kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor po'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de
155b3(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ba spre'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dri ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig los mthong //ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra bo'i dkyil 'khor la la
155b4(phal chen): las ni/stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod bzed dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong //baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer m+b+hi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam
155b5(phal chen): par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes bya'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to//de nas tshong
155b6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal ma chen de myur mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shing rtog pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rje su dran par
155b7(phal chen): bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjesu rnam par bsam pa dang /sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
156a1(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rmyad kun la mngon du glanas pa'i rgyun de'i rngos 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyun rnam par/
156a2(phal chen): dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba da /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs yang dag par mnad pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
156a3(phal chen): dbang gi stobs de yongs bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs shin tu rgyas par bya
156a4(phal chen): ba byed cing /dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang len no//nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang la no//zla ba byed dang zla ba gcig dang /zla ba gnyis
156a5(phal chen): dang /zla ba drug gi ba rAru dang /nyin zhag kyang drug tu/dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du ljon te/de ltar zla ba drug dang /nyin zhag drug 'das nas/dge slong
156a6(phal chen): rgya mtsha'i rgyal mtshan ting 'dzin las lang so//de nas nor bzangs kyis smras pa/'phags pa ting 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul
156a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /de ltar
156b1(phal chen): ma 'brog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang /de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang /ting 'dzin 'di ltar sems can gyi don chud ma
156b2(phal chen): mchis pa rab tu sgrub pa ni ngo mtshar te/de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnams par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/'di ltar
156b3(phal chen): dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnaso//sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyis rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su
156b4(phal chen): bskyab pa dang /mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang /mtho ris kyi lam g+ha si rgyud tu byin par bgyi ba dang /lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar
156b5(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyam su myong bar bgyi ba dang /'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo
156b6(phal chen): yongasu bstan pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o//byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongasasu brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o//bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par
156b7(phal chen): skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'jal bar bgyi ba dang /smon lam chen po'i stobs yongasu bskyed par brtse ba dang /d+yang
157a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang /theg pa chen po'i khyad
157a2(phal chen): par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /
157a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /spyod pa dang /'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongasu bsgrub pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs
157a4(phal chen): pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o//'phags pa ting 'dzin de d+hI ming ci zhes bgyi/smras pa rigs kyi bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i
157a5(phal chen): btang snyoms yong su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ting 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o//rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157a6(phal chen): pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag
157a7(phal chen): pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro//smras pa/'phags pa'i ting 'dzin 'di'i yul der bsams pas/
157b1(phal chen): smos pa/rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmyigs pa la thogs pa medo//'jig rten gyi khams 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa
157b2(phal chen): med do//'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnan pa la thobs pa medado//'jig rten gyi khams yongasu brgyan pa la thogs pa medo//'jig rten gyi khams yongasu spang ba la thogs
157b3(phal chen): pa med//'jig rten gyi khamasu dag par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la
157b4(phal chen): thogs pa med//sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sangs rgyas
157b5(phal chen): kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongasu gzung ba la thogs pa med//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ma 'dres pa shes
157b6(phal chen): shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chung bar bya bya 'dzegs pa med//phyogs bcur 'jug cing
157b7(phal chen): rjesu bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa mido//sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjesu brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med//sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rje su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa medo//snying
158a1(phal chen): rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med//byams pas phyogs myos par dgang ba la thogs pa med//sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs la
158a2(phal chen): 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa mdo//sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa medado//sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams
158a3(phal chen): cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa medo//sems can gyi dbang po thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa medo//rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
158a4(phal chen): byin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la zla

159b3(phal chen): gnyis pa//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu no ri bzangs dag pa'i bshos gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang

159b6(phal chen): pa'i bu shes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rje su lta/dge ba'i bo shes gnyen ni sangs rgyas na mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas

165a3(phal chen): ba mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o//chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o//rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal pa
