165a5(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag/rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165a6(phal chen): byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/kho mo dang spyod pa'i skul ba mang yang dag go/smras pa/'phags ma khyod kyis/bla na
165a7(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/sngon gyi gnas rje su dran te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
165b1(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mo mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de d+hang nA/khoms tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad//de bzhin gshogs pa de
165b2(phal chen): mos mchod//de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongasu bzung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/de'i bstan pa la'ang
165b3(phal chen): mo rab tu byung ngo //chos kyi 'khor lo kha mos bzung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/de yang kho mos bskon bkur to//de'i snga rol du de bzhin
165b4(phal chen): gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa padad+ma mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya ba
165b5(phal chen): byung ngo //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo //de'i snga rol du de bzhin
165b6(phal chen): gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung //de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgud pa dang /
165b7(phal chen): bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams medab chagasu bsams te dran par byas na/gang kho mos
166a1(phal chen): rim gror byas te bstan bkur ba dang /mchod pa dang /bsti stang du byas pa dang /gang gi spyan sngar khams ches thos par gyur pa dang /gang gi
166a2(phal chen): bstan pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'ga' 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rje su dran te/rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin
166a3(phal chen): gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to//rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu/chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'grengs pas//
166a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongasu 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/byang chub sems dpa'i ni tshod med pa'o//rigs kyi bu
166a5(phal chen): smon 'am chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thad
166a6(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas/zhing thams cad du/bskal pa thams cad
166a7(phal chen): yongasu sdud pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/byang
166b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad mdu /rigs kyi bu gzungs m+b+ha stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khang du chud bar byung bas/byang chub sems
166b2(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa'
166b3(phal chen): rnams ni tshed med pa'o//rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams bsgom pa dang /myos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dri ba'i 'khor lo mngon
166b4(phal chen): par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu tha dad po yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis/tshig gcig brjod kyang /'gro ba thams cad shin
166b5(phal chen): tu tshim par byed pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad/rang gi lus kyis rgyas par
166b6(phal chen): 'gengs pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//nor bzangs kyis smras pa/'phags ma khyod ci sprid cig na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du
166b7(phal chen): mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/sems can gcig la dmigs shing gdul bar byed dang smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
167a1(phal chen): /rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyob ma yin te/snyoms can brgya'i phyir ma yin/sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir/
167a2(phal chen): ma yin/sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/sems can bya ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phy-ir ma yin
167a3(phal chen): te/sems can bye ba khrig khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/sems can thams cad kyi phyir mi yin
167a4(phal chen): sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/sems can gang yi'i phyir ma yin/sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/sems can
167a5(phal chen): byang bying gi phyir ma yin/sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can ldad
167a6(phal chen): snod kyi phyir mo yin/sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/sems can phyed byed kyi phyir mi yin/sems can lham ldem gyi phyir ma yin/sems can ya gangs
167a7(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/sems can chos mo'i phyir ma yin/sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/sems can nang nub kyi phyir ma yin/sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma
167b1(phal chen): yon/sems can btang yus kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bkra yAr gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bsdu yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can guzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/
167b2(phal chen): sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir mi yin/sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/sems can rab rib kyi phyir mo yin/sems can thab thob kyi phyir ma yin/sems can
167b3(phal chen): 'grib stsol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can them 'byo'i phyir ma yin/sems can bsam khyod kyi phyir ma yin/sems can 'du mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/sems can brang breng gi
167b4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir mo yin/sems can rgyal 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/
167b5(phal chen): sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/semasA nAn rtse 'phro'i phyir ma yin/sems can yod than gyi phyir ma yin/sems can drug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/sems can srang
167b6(phal chen): zhal gyi phyir ma yin/snyoms nan thing yul gyi phyir mA yon/sems can+d+ra snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can+da nan pa'i phyir mi yin/sems nan yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/
167b7(phal chen): sems can na na kyi phyir ma yin/sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yini/sems can yal yal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can
168a1(phal chen): drug pa yA b+hI b+hai mud+hAn+ta/sten+tas nan yang mung+ga n+de b+h+yo ma sbyin/snrum+b+hasar+b+ban+na N+yaNAg tu b+h+yor ma smin/snyoms can brna las hU~M myur ma yin/sems
168a2(phal chen): dz+nyAnA d+hU ba 'i phyir ma yin/skyems n+dan nAg zug gi b+hair ma ldan/sems maSh+kaMkyA ka'i phy-i /l+r-in+d+he/sems n+da ri sus kyi ra ma yin/sems can s+yAd ma
168a3(phal chen): phyir mo yin/sems can mchog 'breng gi phyir ma yin/sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yinasems can spu 'phyis kyi phyir mA yin/sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir
168a4(phal chen): ma yin/sems can brjod bos kyi phyir ma yin/sems can lhong pas kyi phyir mo yin/sems can badz+rod tshul gyi phyir ma yin/sems can ni skad kyi phyir ma yin/
168a5(phal chen): sems can+d+ra dag zim gyi phyir ma yin/sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/sen
168a6(phal chen): zal zul gyi b+hai ma ya nA~M/sems can sA la stsal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can gso ldeg gi phyir ma yi dz+dza/sems can gan phun gyi phyir ma yin/sems can
168a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can rim 'drol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can rdzi dad kyi phyir me yin/sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/
168b1(phal chen): sems can 'ol rol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can dud dad kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/sems can dga'
168b2(phal chen): rlung gi phyir ma yin/sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/sems can pyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can 'ol pyod kyi phyir ma yin/sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin//
168b3(phal chen): sems can gcul yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bgrangs yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can khyim 'phye'i phyir ma yin/sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/sems can skam
168b4(phal chen): yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can lngab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin
168b5(phal chen): sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yini/sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bun lob kyi phyir maM yin/sems can lam
168b6(phal chen): lom gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can lang lding gi phyir ma yin/sems can ldab ljib kyi phyir ma yin/sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma
168b7(phal chen): yin/sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/sems can smos yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bkra tshal gyi phyir ma yin/sems
169a1(phal chen): snyun lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can 'dun rdob na b+h+yo ma yan/sems can la Sh+To b+h+yo ma yina?/sems can rgyam d+h+yarma k+Sha b+hU ma ston/
169a2(phal chen): bgrang 'byos kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bgrang 'byos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/sems can dpa go yas los bsgres pa'i phyir
169a3(phal chen): ma yin/sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/sems can yal 'phyong las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/sems can mu yal las
169a4(phal chen): bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/sems can bgrang yol las bsgres pa'i yin ma yin/sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin//sems
169a5(phal chen): tsun mi 'jal lus bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can bsam pyod kyi phyir ma yin/sems can bsam pyod las bsres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can mtha' 'byub
169a6(phal chen): g+hi phyir ma yin//sems can mtha' 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/sems can dpag thag las bslus pa'i phyir ma yin//
169a7(phal chen): sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/
169b1(phal chen): sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/snyems can 'jig rten gyi kham sa gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/brjod du
169b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
169b3(phal chen): khams gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma
169b4(phal chen): yin/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
169b5(phal chen): rten gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
169b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i
169b7(phal chen): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i
170a1(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi don du yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o//'di lta ste/
170a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang /mnyes par bya ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems/byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang /
170a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin po nas/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
170a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
170a5(phal chen): yin/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/sangs
170a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya
170a7(phal chen): ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir//
170b1(phal chen): b+hu rgyub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byung chub tu skye ba ma yin papA nas/'jig rten gyi//khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170b2(phal chen): yong sde dag par bya ba'i phy-ir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yangasu gzungs pa'i phyir/byang chub
170b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byong chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sod+has kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba skyed /de bzhin gshegs pa
170b4(phal chen): bstan pa yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/sang+ges gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug
170b5(phal chen): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
170b6(phal chen): sangaso rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin//de bzhin gshegs pa
170b7(phal chen): gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rkyen la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yon be nas/sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i
171a1(phal chen): yang brjod du mod pa'o rdul shin tu phra bskyed /de btsun klu gas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rgyun la 'jug par bya ba 'byor/byang chub sems//
171a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byu rgyub tu skye ba ma yin//sangs rgya sku gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye pA la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dbang rnams
171a3(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin po nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye
171a4(phal chen): ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/de bzhin ga/shegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lnga yong su gzung
171a5(phal chen): d+hi/byang chub sems dong 'a rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin po nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu bri brnyed rjid
171a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu gzungs pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye bam ldan sems can gyi bam
171a7(phal chen): gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjed du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
171b1(phal chen): dzAlA shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sboms rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/sems can gcig gi dab //
171b2(phal chen): de'i 'khor lo yod/shes par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi nod brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa'i rtsub
171b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongasu shes par bye ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba mi yin/sems rten gtsug gi
171b4(phal chen): dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nus/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med bI rang brjod du med pa'i rdul
171b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/'jig rten gyi khams gcig
171b6(phal chen): gi bskal pa nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
171b7(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
172a1(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/'jig rten gyi khams gtsug tu gtugs pa'i sems can thams rgyud kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams skye bang lu/
172a2(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba mA yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing badz+rad du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
172a3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thos smai cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems
172a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu rgyu ba ma yin/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs po rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
172a5(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
172a6(phal chen): tu phra ba skad kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
172a7(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang
172b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye bya ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod da pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
172b2(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad ky-i lus rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/'jig
172b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thoms cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
172b4(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod
172b5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa/lhag ma med pa
172b6(phal chen): mtha' drag thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms byang chub tu skye'o//sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen
172b7(phal chen): bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o//'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thar du
173a1(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/mchod ts+tshi rim gror bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
173a2(phal chen): rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa ljin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpo' rnams kyi bsam pa
173a3(phal chen): brtan pa 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongasasu gzung ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/de bzhin
173a4(phal chen): gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/sems kyi shugs
173a5(phal chen): drag po skye ba yin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gri yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
173a6(phal chen): kye yi dmau brtun pa skye ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpal
173a7(phal chen): rnams kyi mngon pa ro mos pa 'byung ba yin/'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon la/
173b1(phal chen): yongasu skyo ba yin//sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yor//
173b2(phal chen): sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
173b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsgral pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos po skye ba yin/sems can ma lus pa thams cad
173b4(phal chen): kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongasu gcad pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus yongasu skyo ba yin/sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi
173b5(phal chen): lus dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyi re/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs
173b6(phal chen): shes par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya
173b7(phal chen): ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nis 'du ba yin/rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i lam
174a1(phal chen): dang /sgo grang sa myod pa blurgyu stong phrag bcu dag/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu bslab par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di la
174a2(phal chen): ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o//byang chub sems dpa'
174a3(phal chen): rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongasu drag par bya ba'i phyir/zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam na mkha'i
174a4(phal chen): dbyings rna me par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thog pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig/bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thethug pa
174a5(phal chen): de'i mthas klas par shog shig/bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /brag la nyal ba'i
174a6(phal chen): mtha' glang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig ces/de ltar smon lam btab bo//smras pa/'phags mya rnam par thar pa 'odi'i ming ci zhes bgyi/smras pa/
174a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa/bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
174b1(phal chen): buM pa? sho par 'dra na/byang chub sems dpa' sangs/sa chas rnams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/snyoms rgya mar+g+ha dang ldan pa/thug pa'i bsam pa brgyan
174b2(phal chen): 'i b+h+yo /ri rab dang 'dra hA/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu ses par byed pa'i phyir/sman gyi rgyal ba mthong na legs pa lta bu sems can tha~Md kyi
174b3(phal chen): rige pa'i mun pa sel ba'i b+hir/nyi mar gyur ba/sems can thams cad k+Sh+mI bskum pa'i kun su gyur pasas lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/'gru ba thams cad kyi dun
174b4(phal chen): byed pa phyir/rlung du b+h+yo du/snams can thams cad la ba shes kyi 'i 'byin pa'i tingasang+ga s+t+re T+TA pa/zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas rgyas kyi char yang dag pa
174b5(phal chen): lbu ba bzhin du/'babs pa'i phyir sbyin du gyur pa/bstod nams kyi 'di zer gyi dri ba rab tu 'byed pa'i b+hir+ya b+h+rUM blta bu'agri ba thams cad yongasu bsrung ba la khrugs pa'i
174b6(phal chen): phyir/brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyad pe shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod pa 'am/byang chub sems dpo'i bslab pA pa samA gyis mI khyab bya smos pa 'am/byang chub sems
174b7(phal chen): dpa'i smon las kyi rnam pa mtha da /dbu med pa sangs btsun pa zhes pan/sang gas kyi buM byags spri di nyid kyi khyim rnam par drub pa'adzin/
175a1(phal chen): /ba g+ha cung mags bya ba 'ad de/do na drang skyong 'jigs mchog dbyuHsa zhes bya ba 'dug gAp+ta/de'i glan du pang la U shIg/de rigs ts+tsho Ta
175a2(phal chen): khyod la byang chub sems dbu'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzings kyis/dge bsnyed sa yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
175a3(phal chen): to/dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya skyong du mar/g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas te/phyag 'tshal nas/ngo mchi mas gang bar
175a4(phal chen): dus te/byang chub mchog tu dkon pa/rjesu sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rje su bsam pa dang /skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa
175a5(phal chen): rjesu bsam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba rjesu bsam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa dkon par rjesu bsam
175a6(phal chen): ba dang /skal ba mnyam pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'bad pa dkon par rje su bsam pa dang /byang chub du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par
175a7(phal chen): gzhog pa dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang /mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rje su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i
175b1(phal chen): sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pu dka' bar rje su bsam pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyes pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjesu bsam pa byed cing /
175b2(phal chen): dge bsnyen mu yid bzhin gyi drung nas song //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/byang chub sems dpa'i gdams drug gi rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/byang chub
175b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag par bya ba'i rje su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
175b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/smon lam
175b5(phal chen): chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/chos kyi rang bzhin gyi
175b6(phal chen): 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
175b7(phal chen): rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi tshogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing /thub par 'aka' ba'i sems dang
176a1(phal chen): ldan pan+d+ha/mthar gyisu yul dru ba gaHdam ga pa ba der phyin nas/drung srong 'jigs mcho pa dbyungs tshol rdal pA lAs/de'i rje
176a2(phal chen): srong 'jigs mchog dbyu sa//dge basbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phran sna tshogs grangs med+ma ba'i nags tshul mdangs dga' bo loms rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas
176a3(phal chen): 'grigs pa/rtag tu mai tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs
176a4(phal chen): kyi shing drung /nor bu rin po che'i spang le be kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/tsan dun dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing
176a5(phal chen): las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bsna rab tu brtan pa/phyogs bzhi nas shing pe ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongasu brgyan pa/n+ya gro da'i shing dbyangs yid du 'ong ba
176a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/'dzum blo'i shing las dz+nyAgA tu shing thog sbyin pa 'brul bya/me tog gi tshal ban+to dang /yud pAl gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan ba zhig na 'dug
176a7(phal chen): 'dug ste/tshang dpon gyi bu nor bza kyisadrang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/drang srong stong breg bcus par tshon dan gyi lal gshin tu grol
176b1(phal chen): byaskyobs shog na/thor tshugs kyi rjod pan nAn/lpags pa dang /rtswa'i gos gyon pa shing shun gyi skad g.yogs can/D+ha'i spyan la 'dug pa mthong //mthang nas kyang drang
176b2(phal chen): srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste/byin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bring ba'i bsam pas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam
176b3(phal chen): sbyin pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/thams cad mkhyen pa nyis la gzhog pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/dge ba'i gze
176b4(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/stobs bcu'i ye shes/rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/dge ba'i bshes
176b5(phal chen): gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dgra bAr skyed pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
176b6(phal chen): sbyin mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/nyamanyes med par thams cid mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba
176b7(phal chen): baM shes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/mnyam pa dang /mi mnyam nga yongasu ston pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa
177a1(phal chen): /yang dag par lta/g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
177a2(phal chen): smin par yang dag par lta/byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis/sim pa yongasu skyed pa'i phyir/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
177a3(phal chen): yin par yang dag par lta/snying rje chen po yongasu skyed pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing
177a4(phal chen): chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/dge ba'i bshes gcan la rag las par mthong nas/lus thaMd
177a5(phal chen): kyis pa bya ste/phyag byas nas langs ste/drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la/lan brgya stong du mar sbyor ba byas nas/mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas/
177a6(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis/yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
177a7(phal chen): bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'chal te/'bogs pa ni byang chub
177b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /rje su bstan pa mdzado zhes thos na/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba
177b2(phal chen): dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/
177b3(phal chen): 'di skad ces smraso//byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed/sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgran du
177b4(phal chen): gnyer to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
177b5(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char btud bar 'dod pa'o//chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o//ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o//snying rje chen po'i sprin pa sde
177b6(phal chen): par 'dod pa'o//chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o//ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil
177b7(phal chen): bar 'dod pa'o//sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o//de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/me tog dri zhim la yid du
178a1(phal chen): 'ang zhing /kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos/tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//rab tu gtor to//mngon par//
178a2(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/rab tu btud phyag 'tshal nas/g.yas phyogasu bskyor ba byas te/tshig 'di skad du brjod//'di ni sems can thams cad yongasu sgrub par 'gyur//sem
178a3(phal chen): tsucan dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro//byol seng gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur//gshin rje'i
178a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyuraro//mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro//sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems par 'gyuraro//sreng
178a5(phal chen): pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyuraro//sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro//ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyuraro//bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs
178a6(phal chen): bskor bar 'gyuraro//ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongasu ston par 'gyur//ye shes kyi nyi mu 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro//chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyuraro//
178a7(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang /mi mnyam pa yang dag ston par 'gyur//de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//
178b1(phal chen): byos pa dag gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems can thams cad kyi bad
178b2(phal chen): bo rab tu skyed de/rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyuraro//byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
178b3(phal chen): bskyed pa ste/de bas na 'di ni/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongasu sbyong bar 'gyuraro//de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
178b4(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam por thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o//nor bzangs kyis smras pa/byang chub
178b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/tshong
178b6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mgo la phyugs nas/lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo //chang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas
178b7(phal chen): bzung ma thag tu/de'i mod la/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong
179a1(phal chen): par gyur te/de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na/bdag nyid
179a2(phal chen): 'dug pa shes par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang /rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong //de dag na 'bade bzhin gshegs pa'i
179a3(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can/rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong //'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshes
179a4(phal chen): pa'i sgra'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang ba 'bar bas brgyan pa dge bzhugs pa mthong //de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang /phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan
179a5(phal chen): banyan to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor la de dge kyang phan tshun ma 'dus par yang dag par 'dzin to//chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab
179a6(phal chen): pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam/mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mchu li yang zhug so//
179a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dge ba rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugaso//sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba
179b1(phal chen): bkon du rtsom par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer mo dra ba 'dod rgyags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor dag
179b2(phal chen): kyang ma thong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhug so//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi
179b3(phal chen): thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ting 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/tingange 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par
179b4(phal chen): zer ba dang ldan pa/gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/phyogs kun gyi dru ba/rab tu thob pa gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ting 'dzin gyi ye shes
179b5(phal chen): brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul
179b6(phal chen): du gyur pa/ting 'dzin gyi sdang ba sangs rgyas na mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sem
179b7(phal chen): rab tu snang bar byas pa/ting 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/de bzhin gshegs pa le la'i zhabs
180a1(phal chen): b+h+rUM drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes//lal ni nyin zhag bdun lon bsgyus/la lar ni zla ba phyed lon bu snum/l-i ltar ni zla ba gcig
180a2(phal chen): lon b+hUm+bu/la ltar na lo gcig len pa snum/la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snum+ba/la lar ni laM stong lon pa snyam/l+ya lar ni l-i ban+d+ha phyug stong lan pasnyam
180a3(phal chen): laltar rnol bye ba lon pa snyam+b+ha/la lar ni la bye ba bam+b+ha lon bskrun/la lang ni lo b+h+yo ba skyong lon pa snyam/la lar ni lo bye ba brgya thag sbyong len pa sgyum+b+ha/
180a4(phal chen): lar ni la b+ha ba zhwag khrig yon bad+hAs/gakhor ni bad+ga lnga ba pyid 'on pa snyam/yul ni bsam pa gtsu ga yon pasnum/la lar ni bskal pa brgya yin
180a5(phal chen): ma/lo ltar ni bskal pa steng ldanu pa snyam/la lar ni brgol pa brgya phrag snang lon brgyanal lar ni bskul ba bye ba lon pa snyam/la lar ni bskal pa
180a6(phal chen): phrag brgya lon pa s+thAn+te/la la ni bsku la pa bye ba skrag sted len pa snyam/l-i lAr+ya nI bsgyel pa bye ba brgya phrag sbyong lon pa smraH//la lang ni bskal pa bya ba byug
180a7(phal chen): zug brgya theg stong len pa rnyam byed pa nas/de bzhin ni shegs pa la la'i nas kyi dzu dzin/bsgrul pa brjid du me pa'i yang brjod du myed pa skyed lon par
180b1(phal chen): pa snyam byed pa nas/de bzhin gshegs bra la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu bri ba snyed lon pa sbrum byed pa nas/bskal pa sangs rgyud rgya
180b2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to//de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
180b3(phal chen): btang ba dang /des yang bdage drang srong 'jigs mtsho dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur te//de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu dran
180b4(phal chen): mod smras pa/'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran//smras pa rigs kyi bu kho zos ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyu'i ma
180b5(phal chen): 'di shes par zad na/byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las/khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin thob pa/dus thams cad du

181b6(phal chen): sa pa/byang chub sems dpa' ti 'dzin pasam gyis mi khyab par mi shes kyi sa sems bye bar b+ha pa/dus thams cad du yang dge par 'jug pa'i ting 'dzinam shes
181b7(phal chen): snang ba rab rgyan pa pa/'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug de'i ting 'dzid kyi rdum gyis snang byer gyur po chu ba thams kyi 'is rkyod bar byung
182a1(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/gnyis rnam par rtog pa med pas
182a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'angal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/mnyan pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i

182b1(phal chen): dang dpung med pa mngon du gyur pa'i snyoms dang ldan pa/sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smon par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa/med pa'i sems dang ldan
182b2(phal chen): pa des/byang chub sems dpa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /

183b1(phal chen): 'dir mchongs shig dang /des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dag par 'gyur zhes na/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/mi khom

185a1(phal chen): skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lnga sa yong su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung

186a3(phal chen): rnam par dag par bya ba dang /chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med po mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag/

186a5(phal chen): rnam por dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshigs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa drug kyang /
186a6(phal chen): steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/spros sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzir to//rigs kyi
186a7(phal chen): bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas nas dga' ba medade/de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dod
186b1(phal chen): ste/bdag cag phyin pa rnams la/'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//chog shes pa'i semasasu bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
186b2(phal chen): dag par brjod po dang /byang chub du sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyo'i chos ston to//rab mtshe ma'i
186b3(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dog gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phab te/'di skad ces 'dzer
186b4(phal chen): to//rags kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngaste yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi gla snyan pa la dga' ba med de/de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags
