186b6(phal chen): rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag ban+du/so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /lha'i bu dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshogs
186b7(phal chen): kye 'khor dang bcas pas/lha rdzas kyi gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang /me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste 'di skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa
187a1(phal chen): 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'in+do/bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang /bza' shing gi rab dang /rtse ba'i nags tshul dang //
187a2(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang /gam yo ni glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba mad/de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo //bdag
187a3(phal chen): tsug der phyin nas kyang /'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag lnga 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongasu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to//'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/
187a4(phal chen): mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do//dreg pa dang /bag med pa thams cad yongasu gcad pa dang /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu smra
187a5(phal chen): ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to//rigs kyi bu gzhon yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/des bdag cag go shigs pas
187a6(phal chen): sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu smon lam mngon par sgrub bo//klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang /dga'
187a7(phal chen): po dang /bsnyen dga' bo las sogs pa/klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing /dus dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang /klu'i/
187b1(phal chen): bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro rgan pa'i dbyangs dang /lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/'di skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di
187b2(phal chen): dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ma'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/phye ma'i char dang /
187b3(phal chen): na mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongasu sel to//khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/lus sam par byas shing /yid shin tu mos par byed//de sems shin tu mos par
187b4(phal chen): gyur nas/'phags pa 'di ni/bdag cag la chos ston to//'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang /sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir
187b5(phal chen): nyes pa 'chag su btsud cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god//gnod sbyin gyi dbang
187b6(phal chen): po stong phrag bcu yang na mkha'i dbyings pa 'kho/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lo mchod pa
187b7(phal chen): byas nas/'di skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdungs mdzad pa'i tshekho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang /mi rnams la byams pa'i
188a1(phal chen): snyoms skyo bar 'gyur to/gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum thams cad kyang /byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur//de dag byam
188a2(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du'ongo //kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas/rang rang gi gnas de dang
188a3(phal chen): de dgra na dga' ba med/de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye ba'i 'khor dang bcas te/'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong //bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la//'phags
188a4(phal chen): pA rI'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis/lus thams cad snang bar byas shing /de bas khyab par mdzad/de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/'phags pa
188a5(phal chen): 'di ni ci nas kyang /bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum dang /lus srul po mang po byang chub du sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to//dri za'i
188a6(phal chen): dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang /steng gi bar snang la 'khyod nas/'di skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang /rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/'phags
188a7(phal chen): pa 'di dka' thub lngas yang su gdung ba mdzad pa'i mi'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/bdag cag gi gnas snang bar 'gyur//de ltar bdag cag 'ad des phog te/bde
188b1(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang /'phags pa 'di ni bdug cug ce nas kyang /bla na med
188b2(phal chen): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos sbyin to//lA ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu drug kyang /rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thun te/
188b3(phal chen): rnamakha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang gtsug to/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzir to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe
188b4(phal chen): kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho drung rIr bcas pa'i so chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/bdag cag kun gyi rgyal dang /rlom sems dang /dregs
188b5(phal chen): pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo //der phyin nas kyang /'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu
188b6(phal chen): spang ba dang chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang /mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang /stobs bcu'i ye shes yongasu grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//namakha' snying
188b7(phal chen): dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang /bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugasu mngon par sprul te/'di skad ces 'dzer to//
189a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'phags pa/dka/'o zub rdzas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/bdag cag gyis
189a2(phal chen): gnas snang bar byas nas/yongasu g.yo bar byed//des bdag cig kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'dra'i drung du 'dong ngo //
189a3(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing /byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad//snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad//'khor ba'i rgya
189a4(phal chen): mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad//'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la yang yongasu spyod par mdzad//lhag
189a5(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad//shes rab dang thabs shin tu bskul ba la yang /yang dag par sbyor ba mdzadado//rnam pa ji lta
189a6(phal chen): ngur yongasu sbyin pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la yang /rab tu sbyor ba mdzad//mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang stong gi bar snang la 'khyod//'di
189a7(phal chen): skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dri ba rir
189b1(phal chen): po che'i srad bus lnga ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang /rol mo'i yo byad dang /rin po che'i rgyan dang /khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung //chos kyi sku
189b2(phal chen): dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgo dang /byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung //'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che
189b3(phal chen): ge mo zhig na ni/byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debaso//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/byang chub sems
189b4(phal chen): dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig/dka' ba yongasu gtong ba byed//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig/
189b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyong ba byed//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba
189b6(phal chen): zhig snying po byang chub du 'gro'o//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grongasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i
189b7(phal chen): bdud rab tu pham par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'ching rgya'o//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/de
190a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'dri zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mdzar//'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs bya ba cho ga ma zhig na na/de bzhin
190a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan ni che mo zhig/sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/phung po ma lus pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin
190a3(phal chen): te/rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang /shing dang yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blugs pa'i mur thug par ni rung yong
190a4(phal chen): srid kyi/de bzhin gshegs//de dag gi mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang
190a5(phal chen): kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing tA la'i 'phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang /rin po che'i sman dang /khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing /nga ro//
190a6(phal chen): 'byin pa dang /rna lam du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung //de ltar bdag cag kyang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa'
190a7(phal chen): rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang /spyod pa dang /mtshan gyi chu klung gi smras/dka' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos/nyams bde ba skyes te/'phags pa 'di'i drung
190b1(phal chen): du 'dod do//de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang /'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang /khro bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du mi zhig/bla na med pa yang dag
190b2(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad//'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa/kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag
190b3(phal chen): kyang na mkha' la 'khod cing /yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa byas nas/'di skad ces 'dzer to//'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/me'i phung
190b4(phal chen): po 'di dag las//rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste/'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du/sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/sems can dmyal ba bI sems
190b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas/de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems
190b6(phal chen): mosra par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyan su bde bar skyeso//de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du bzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas/
190b7(phal chen): pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongasu spangs te/'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong //der bdag cag phyin nas kyang /'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang /sems can tshad med pa'i rnams
191a1(phal chen): byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta
191a2(phal chen): bu zos nas/dga' rangs te/mgu zhing nyams yid bde ba skyes te/bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed/bram ze
191a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen g+ho bka' dang
191a4(phal chen): 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshagaso//de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//
191a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rje su bstan dang 'thun byed cing /dran pa nye bar bzhag ste/bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/de'i phyir de'i don rnams thams cad 'thun
191a6(phal chen): papor 'grub par 'gyur/'thun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'chang yang rgya/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ri ga yang sa'i lam spu bri'i sa gshe
191a7(phal chen): pa la 'dzegs te/me'i phung po chen po der mchong so//de de ltar ma tshangs pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu brtan gnas bya ba thob par gyur to//mo nges
191b1(phal chen): rog nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/des 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa'i me'i phung po lnga de ltar
191b2(phal chen): reg na bde ba dang /ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang /de ltar reg na bde ba da ni ngo mtshar tshwa'o//nges smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa
191b3(phal chen): thar pa/dkyil 'khor mi zad pa thob pa ste/rigs kyi bu des kho bas ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/dkyil 'khor yongasu mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na//
191b4(phal chen): kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu/'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad du yongasu zad par bya ba'i smon lam can/ru mtshon phyir mi
191b5(phal chen): ldog pa dang ldan pa/sems la thub pa med cing /sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i skrong pa dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/brtsams po chen
191b6(phal chen): pi mthar phyin par bya ba brgyad lug pa med pa/sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu/'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa
191b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa/yon tan brjod par nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer
192a1(phal chen): /snod ga rnam par bsgyings paHsa bya ba meng/do na rgyal po snong ka'i dpal b+h+yo blam/byams mnos bya ba/bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug
192a2(phal chen): gis/de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dro pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgrub par bya ba dang /ji wAR+Sha nAn tAn du b+hA ba dris shig/de nas
192a3(phal chen): tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/bram ze rgyal po'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyug 'tshal to/bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la/lan brgya stong du
192a4(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltos te/bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/dge ba
192a5(phal chen): ba shes gnyen la rim go bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs paM mos bla rgyu chen pos rnam par dag pa/theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon
192a6(phal chen): pApar mos pa sangs rgyas ches la yang dag par zhugs pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'brang bar skye ba/chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/chags pa med pa'i ye
192a7(phal chen): shes la mngon du gyur pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ye shes kyi mtha' la rmi gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du
192b1(phal chen): chud par byed pa/namakha'i mtha' gnyis su mngon du gyur pa/mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gnod mi za ba thob pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/
192b2(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med
192b3(phal chen): ba khong du chud pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtogs par gnas pa/sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes lnga gzhol ba
192b4(phal chen): zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
192b5(phal chen): yongasu dag par bya ba gnas pa med par spyod pa/sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/sgra thams cad chog gi lam lta bur
192b6(phal chen): khong du chud pa/gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la/gzhol ba de mthar gyis steng ge rnam par bgyings pa'i grong khyer
192b7(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin te/bu mo byams mchil zhing yongasu rmed med pa las/rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma/'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par
193a1(phal chen): snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na/khro con dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/gsar gyi lcags bod kyi dra bas legs par bla sa pra/lha rdzas kyi stan
193a2(phal chen): bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/rgyal
193a3(phal chen): po'i byi sgo'i sgo gang na/bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir/stod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang /des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /srog tshogs stong phrag du ma
193a4(phal chen): dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag du 'dong ba mthong nas/khyed gang nas 'od de gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang /de dag na re nged ni/bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir
193a5(phal chen): 'dong ngo zhes nas des bsam pa/'dir ni su 'gro yang drug pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/de yang nang du phyin to//da ltar phyin te bltas na/khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can
193a6(phal chen): de yang /gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/bai DUr+ya'i ka bu bkye ba rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun dang ldan pa ba gam brgya phrag rnying gis brgyan pa/
193a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu sba bar byas pa/nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas/
193b1(phal chen): byung brtun pa/na shod tu grangs med pas rnyings bskor bya/gsor mi dril bu brgyan shin tu 'khyi ba'i sgra snyan pa bsnam kyis mi khyub du rgyan dang ldan pa dug pa/
193b2(phal chen): nga //bu ma byams ma des yang mig de//ra nag 'byin pa/sku mthun tid du 'dug pa/mdag gsar gyi kha dog sbyar 'dug pa mthong nas/dos de'i / pa gnyis la spyi bo ste tshal
193b3(phal chen): /lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyagasu bskor ba byos nas/thal ma sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras//'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
193b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags ma ni
193b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams dag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis thos na/'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
193b6(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/smras pa/rigs kyi bu/kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas/des kun tu byung te bltas pa dang
193b7(phal chen): rtsig pa re re dang /kaM ba re re dang /me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang /rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang /dbyibs re re dang /nor bu rin po che re re dang /gser gyi dril bu re re dang
194a1(phal chen): /na gad ra dang /bskye brag ra dang /napana'i surnam ra dag las dang /rdza myos thams cadan/btsud nga
194a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa/thig ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcus pa/spyad pa dang /sman lham gyi yul dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i rgyun dang bcas pa/mngon par 'chang rgya
194a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas /chos 'khor lo bskor ba da bcas pa/yongasu ma ngon sa 'das pa stan pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi nus du mabyung bar
194a4(phal chen): gyur to//dmigs pa de dag re re las/ji lta ba de bzhin du/dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur te//'di lta ste dper na/chus yangasu gang ba rje mtsho dang ni
194a5(phal chen): rnyog+sa du mad pa la rnam par bskul pa yi na/nam hrI th+liM dang/ma'i tshigs kyis brnyand/gzugs brnyan ma tshul du sangs skyeng//de bzhin du 'dupa rnam pa
194a6(phal chen): dasde 'di dmigs par ra ltas /chos kyi dbyings kun na bzugs pa'i/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ca dru gzugs brnyan mo tshul du snang ba t+tA te//de
194a7(phal chen): byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ngo so ltar rnam par bsdus nas/sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mchin ma da yongasu bzung ste/tham mo sbyar nas bu
194b1(phal chen): mo byams mA'i gdung du bltas pa dang /des smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/shes rab kyi
194b2(phal chen): papha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/lo mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'grang 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug gi bye mo snyed las yongasu brtsal ba ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gri
194b3(phal chen): kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par btsun pa 'di/sgo sna tsho gros kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad/gcig gis gang du gsungs
194b4(phal chen): pa de yang gnyis kyis mA gsungs//smras pa 'phags ma/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par rgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis smras pa/rigs kyi bu
194b5(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la/kho mo mngon du byed cing /sems dpa' dang /rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang /rnam par dpyod pa dang /
194b6(phal chen): rjesu sems pa dang /dran par bya ba dang /yongasu gzung ba dang /rnam par brtags pa dang /mngon par bsgrub pa dang /yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang /rab tu rnam
194b7(phal chen): par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongasu skye ste/gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongasu 'du'o//khong su chud//
195a1(phal chen): mngon du 'gyuraro//mngon par 'du'o//khongs na 'khod//'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgro dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang /chos kyi sgo dang /
195a2(phal chen): sems can gyi sgo dang /'das pa'i sgo dang /ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang /da ltar byung ba'i sgra dang /gnas pa'i mtha'i sgo dang /bsod nams kyi sgo dang /bsod nams
195a3(phal chen): kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang /ye shes kyi sgo dang /ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang /smon lam gyi sgo dang /smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /spyod pa'i sgo dang /spyod pa rnam par dag
195a4(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang /spyod pa yongasu 'byung ba'i sgo dang /spyod pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang /las kyi sgo dang /las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang /los kyi rkyen gyi sgo dang /
195a5(phal chen): lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang /mi mnyam pa'i los yongasu spang ba'i sgo dang /yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang /las la dbang sgyur ba'i sgo dang
195a6(phal chen): legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang /legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang /ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /ting 'dzin gyi khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo da/ting 'dzin
195a7(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang /tinge 'dzin spyod yul gyi sgo dang /ting 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang /mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang /sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang /sems
195b1(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang /sems kyi rgyud yongasasu dag par bya ba'i sgo dang /sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang /sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang /sems 'byung ba'i sgo
195b2(phal chen): dang /sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang /sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs rgyu ba'i sgo dang /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang /nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang /mos
195b3(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang /sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang /sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang /sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang /sems
195b4(phal chen): can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /phyogs kyi sgo dang /chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang /snying rje chen po'i sgo dang /byams pa chen po'i sgo dang /zhi ba'i sgo dang /ngag gi lam
195b5(phal chen): gyi sgo dang /tshul gyi sgo dang /khong du chud par bya ba'i sgro dang /rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang /yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang /chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang /kun gyi sgo dang /
195b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang /nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi tshod kyi sgo dang /
195b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang /'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang /'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi kham
196a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa'i
196a2(phal chen): sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra dang /'jig rten gyi khams
196a3(phal chen): gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang /'jig rten
196a4(phal chen): gyi khams kyi spyi'u tshugasu rgyu ba'i sgo dang /mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i so dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang /gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo
196a5(phal chen): dang /phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku
196a6(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgro dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgro dang /sangs rgyas
196a7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang /
196b1(phal chen): songs rgyas sa/'khor ba ngas pa'i tshig go sgo dang /sangasar+b+bas chos 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i ska dang/sangs rgyas kyu 'dzin las r+b+ba~M smr-i nga /sarba/
196b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshar 'jug pa'i sgra dang
196b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par skyed pa'i
196b4(phal chen): dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin rje rlabs ma dang /sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas kyi sems can par ma gyi sems drugs chung pa'i spyi dang /sangs rgyas kyi
196b5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra dang /dga' ldan ma pa blang na ba zhugs pa'i sgo nas/yang sna m+b+ha ngan las 'da' ba bstan bya bar gyi sgo /sems can ma don cang rang ba mdzu byi sa
196b6(phal chen): deng /chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang /chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sku dang byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi b+h+yo
196b7(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /'byung ba'i rnam par
197a1(phal chen): sgo dang /gzungs rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /shes rab yongasu dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang
197a2(phal chen): byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas
197a3(phal chen): kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/kho mos byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/blo gres chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/rgyud bsod
197a4(phal chen): nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/'jig rten gyi chos yongasu mi rgyu ba/ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/
197a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/blo na mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang ldan pa/dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i mig can/chags pa med/
197a6(phal chen): pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa/'jig rten gyi
197a7(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshul rnam par spyod pa/'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa/'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi
197b1(phal chen): tshul dang rnam pa la ma sa pa/'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan bya/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa sbyin pa/dus kyi 'khor la thams cad/
197b2(phal chen): dbang sbyar ba de drug gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re sman/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyu de 'di nyid na/yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba dang /de na dge slong
197b3(phal chen): bstun sdug pa zhes bya ba'i 'dug gis de'i gan du mang la/ji ltar byang chub sems dbus byang chub sems dpa'i pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba rnaMs
197b4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/bu mo byams ma la lan bzla steng du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas
197b5(phal chen): nas/yang dang yang bltas te/bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rje su bsam
197b6(phal chen): ba dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes bsam pA dang /sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjesu bsam pa dang /'jig rten gyi 'du shes
197b7(phal chen): rnam par zab mo rjes bsam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rje su bsam pa dang /sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rje su bsam pa dang /rten cing
198a1(phal chen): 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyibs zab mo rje su bsam pa dang //rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes bsam pa dang /'gro ba thams
198a2(phal chen): cad kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjesu bsam pa dang /chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyun gyi dbyings zab mo rje su bsam pa dang /lus kyi 'khrul
198a3(phal chen): 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes bskum pa dang /las kyis sna tshogs kyi dbyings zab mo rje su bsam pa byed cing /mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa
198a4(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin te/yul gyi 'khor dang grong khyer gyi 'khor dang /tshong 'dus kyi 'khor dang /grong rdal gyi 'khor dang /yul gru'i 'khor dang /lhas kyi 'khor dang /
198a5(phal chen): drang srong dge ba spyod pa'i gnas kyi 'khor dang /yul dang rkyen kyi 'khor dang /chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang /ri'i sil sul gyi 'khor dang /nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu/dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs
198a6(phal chen): su tshol tshol ba las/des dge slong blta na sdug pa/nags tsha la stug po zhig na gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/
198a7(phal chen): sgra mthon ting g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can 'phral ba yangs pa/mig dkar nag 'phyis shing ril la
198b1(phal chen): rnam pa'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ra bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa/mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/so mnyam
198b2(phal chen): zhing thugs bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/mkhur bshas gang zhing rgyas pa/smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug
198b3(phal chen): cing ring la/shin tu mdzes pa mdzod spu'i zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang
198b4(phal chen): pa/mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ro stod seng ge'i stong ltar 'dug pa/thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing
198b5(phal chen): zlum pa/log pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/rkang lag 'khor los ngargyan pa/rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon lA shwas rgyas pa/bdun shin tu mtho ba/rkang pa rdo rje ltar
198b6(phal chen): 'dug pa/lus che zhing drang pa/brlar zlum pa/po mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin ltar 'dug pa/sor mo ring ba rkang pa'i rting pa
198b7(phal chen): yangs pa/'od 'dom gang ba dang /mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ba s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogasu gyen du 'khyil ba/shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zhed ga ba pa/
199a1(phal chen): lus mtshan dang /dpe byad bzad pas shin tu brgyan pA/mig mi 'gebs shrIng mI rgyud pa/dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ri'i rgyal po khro bo can t+ta
199a2(phal chen): dang /nags tshal dang /sman dang shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/b+h+rUM shin tu yangs pa/ye shes kyi spyad yul dang /yul lathub pa med pa/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'kho
199a3(phal chen): rgyun gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/g.yo ba dang rlo mi sems dang g.yong ba dang spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/sangs rgyas
199a4(phal chen): kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i bsam pa'i rkyen mi 'chad pa/snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu
199a5(phal chen): yangs pa skyes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongasu gzung ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/de
199a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs bya'i tshul rjesu dran zhing /'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'jug pa la zhugs te/drag dal med cing pang ral med lnga/shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/gnas
199a7(phal chen): gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/sgra dang klu dang /gnad sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang
199b1(phal chen): brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //dge slong blta nA mdzes pa de 'chug pa'i tshe/phyogs mngon
199b2(phal chen): du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu sgrubs par byed//rkang gis 'gro'i rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe/yongasu blangs pa byed//
199b3(phal chen): mi'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zod mi shes pa rnams kyang /mun pa dang /rab rib rnam par sel to//'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang /me tog
199b4(phal chen): mang po'i char mngon par 'beb so//sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang /rin po che'i 'byung gnas mar po ston to//nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan
199b5(phal chen): pa rnams kyang /na mkha'i dbyings yongasu brgyan pa byed//rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang /rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor ro//ri rab
199b6(phal chen): gyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo//rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang /'dug spros dang /me
199b7(phal chen): tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do//mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang /lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo//nyin ma'i
200a1(phal chen): lga rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang /nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing /
200a2(phal chen): snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa gdo na ba der phyin nas/dge slong blta
200a3(phal chen): ni sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/legs
200a4(phal chen): par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
200a5(phal chen): par zhugs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
200a6(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do//zhes bdag gis thos na/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang
200a7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/ches btab na dar la bab po/rab tu byung bas btab na
200b1(phal chen): sar du thugs bAn+d+ha rigs kyi bu kho bos na//rgyud 'dra ba gtsug gas/da btsun gshegs pargya klung gang gA sum+b+ha rba rtsa brgyad ts+tsham+bu spyod
200b2(phal chen): gyi rlung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i sham ring du ni nyin gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa srid do//l-i lho ron nyin zhig
200b3(phal chen): bdun du/la la ni zla bo byeng du/la lpA nI zla ba gcig tul lar ni la gcig/lA l+yar nI lo brgyad/le lar ni lo stong du
200b4(phal chen): na mo ban+d+ha thag mau yul ni la ra/ma na mo bye gakhrag khrig sa/ ltar na bad du med pa'i yang brjod du meng pa /5nga
200b5(phal chen): nI bskal pa po ma/la lar ni bskal pa pyod du/la lar ni bskal bad+mo/bdag gis de bzhin ga shegs pi la la'i ma ring du ban
200b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs par sbed pa spyad de/bskal pa bgrang ba'i rgyul 'di nyid kyis du bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
200b7(phal chen): basbyin pa zas te/gdams dag da/rjes su brtan pa yang dag par blangs so//smon lam gyi can yongs su sbyas so//yang dag pa
201a1(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so//skyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so//pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yong su rdzogs par byas
201a2(phal chen): so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so//de dag goso chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs
201a3(phal chen): su gzung ngo //de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so//de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs su
201a4(phal chen): bzung ngo //kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi/sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin
201a5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyisarang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/mngon par bsgrubs so//kho bos de
201a6(phal chen): bzhin gshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang /spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang
201a7(phal chen): gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/mngon par bsgrubs so//kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
201b1(phal chen): par dag pa'ang /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs s+ho//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/kho bo'i tshogs 'din 'chags
201b2(phal chen): pa'i tshe/phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams chud kyangashin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams kyi
201b3(phal chen): rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la'ajig rten gyi khams brjod
201b4(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod med pa 'da' zhing /yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro//sems kyi skad cig
201b5(phal chen): gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
201b6(phal chen): po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyi //stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
201b7(phal chen): mngon sum du 'gyur ro//sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba/rnam par dag pa dag
202a1(phal chen): na na ga rnam mad pa ldan pa mngon par /da ban ga ga sa
202a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za bskyed mchod ba da /basbyin 'bur dudu/gro bya ba'i phyir
202a3(phal chen): myongon du 'gyur ro//sems brjid pa gcig lade bzhin ga shegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa'i chos kyi sbyin gyi rgyur rnams rtsong /
202a4(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin po'i gzungs dang /smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul byings med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya
202a5(phal chen): ba'i phyir bsam bu la mngon par 'bab po/sems bskyod pa gcig la/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang/
202a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yongasu rdzogs por bya ba'i rgyun lam myangon par bsgrubs pa'i rnams kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs drug 'a byu 'i

202b1(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang drug par 'du gyuba'i skyon lam mngon par bsgrubs bya'o stobs kyis/ting 'dzin gyi kyil 'a khor thams cad yongasu dag par d+ha rdza
202b2(phal chen): sems bsgyud ba gcig lnga dbang po rgya mchi brjod du med pa'i ya d+ya brjod du med pa dag dran pa'i mthur sbyin pa'i dpung po thob byer byA ba'i rlon

202b5(phal chen): smon lam mngon bar bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur//sems bskyed po gcig la
202b6(phal chen): dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyangadus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i ye shes smyung ba'i smon
202b7(phal chen): lam mngon par bsgribs pa'i stobs kyis//'jig rten gyi khams thams cadus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur te/rigs kyi
203a1(phal chen): bu kho bos ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/kho bos
203a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bsdam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/srog gi dbang po la rgyun
203a3(phal chen): 'ochad pa med pa ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa rgyu 'i

203a6(phal chen): dang /dug dang /mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus tsa na/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba

203b6(phal chen): sems dpa so//byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/byang chub sems

209b2(phal chen): no'ang yod do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nAs gA cig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing

209b4(phal chen): pa bstan tu yod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa dang /chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa//sems
209b5(phal chen): can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa bstan du yod pa de/las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/byang chub sems
209b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/phyogs bcu na ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu ba'i rgyud pa bstan tu rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/
209b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu na ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji skad yod pa thams cad kyang /bgrang zhing brtsing

210a7(phal chen): su dag pa yang dag por bstan pa'am/ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/so rigs kyi bu lho phyogs
210b1(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer rgyu mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod do//don dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gyis/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub
210b2(phal chen): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab por bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bashr-is gnyen
210b3(phal chen): gyi tshig thos nas/spu g.yos te/dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa/ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rin po che

210b5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo glos la rten pa/thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs pa rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstad pA l-i brtson pa/dus gsum gyi

211a7(phal chen): gyi gdams ngag gis/sems kyi me tog pun ri ka kha bye ba/rin po che sna tshigs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling lhar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
211b1(phal chen): gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bsdu sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes

211b4(phal chen): spro ltar dge ba'i bri shes gnyen gyi gdams dgu las byung ba'i chos/dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis

215b7(phal chen): spyi'i phyogs mtshams dang / rlu kyi phyogs mtshams dang / ris phyog mtshams dang 'a nad cig phyogs ni/ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin na/
216a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bro shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu chogacig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems da'i ji skad cig bzhugs 'ang

216a3(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams

216b1(phal chen): snod nas//shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdulnga shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe
216b2(phal chen): gcig gis thogaso pa/ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang /kho mi 'i kha zas gsol cing snying po byang chub la bzhugasau nas/bdud sde dang bcas
216b3(phal chen): pa pham par mdzad de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shar phyogs na ba zhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/lho phyogs dang //

216b7(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams
217a1(phal chen): /birgyu dang /'jig rten gyi khams stong dang rtsa'ajig rten gyi khams brgyu lkug stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /'jig rten

217a3(phal chen): stong dang /'jig rten gyi khams dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /stong gi 'jig rten
217a4(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin+da tu prA ba snyid dang /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten+da gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
217a5(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khang mas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdulA shin tu phra ba
217a6(phal chen): smad na/byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji srid cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang /kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing /snying po byang chub
217a7(phal chen): tu bzhugs nas/bdud sde dang bcas par pham par mdzad de//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o///rigs kyi bu khyod
217b1(phal chen): b+h+yama' 'khor maud smra blag bcu po 'di dag d+hAngs//smras pa/laphags ma bdag gis mtho //smras pa/rigs kyi bu rgyud med 'di dag la sogs pa
217b2(phal chen): stong grangs med pa drag btsu kho mo dang skal ba mnyam re spyod pa/skyon lam gcig padage ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/myos pa'i lam rnam
217b3(phal chen): bapar dag pa gcig pa kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/skal pa mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/skal ba mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa/skal ba
217b4(phal chen): mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/skal ba mnyam par
217b5(phal chen): chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston po/skal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par
217b6(phal chen): dag pa/skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/skal ba mnyam par
217b7(phal chen): dbyangs rnam par dag pa/tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa/thams cad la skal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/las kyi rnam par
218a1(phal chen): sbyin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing /rnam par dag pas bskal ba mnyam par lus kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/'gro ba thams cad yongs su

218a3(phal chen): pos rgyas par 'grengs pa/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas/skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam
218a4(phal chen): par dag pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skul ba

218a6(phal chen): chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thub par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par spyad pa rnam par
218a7(phal chen): dag pa sha drug gcig kyang yod de//rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis
218b1(phal chen): thogs pa rnams la/zhal zas yongs su/dbul ba'i phyir//phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dabang //phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing sring po'i tham pa dang /nyan thos
218b2(phal chen): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms 'dzul ba'izla bAn rgyas par 'ad // sa klas shing phyogs pa nu rgyas par bkang
218b3(phal chen): steyi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed rismos kyi bu de skye ba rmA ni/phung 'di nyid nas/ske rnams na lha'i kha zas kyiso slongs su

219b6(phal chen): smras so//rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/
219b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas/

220b1(phal chen): phyogs su bsgyur ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas te/dge bsngon ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas byulta bas ngoms byozhin du srung ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bun du bzangs
220b2(phal chen): thos rnams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyud gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rang tu thob pa de/bsod nams rgya mtsho de la rdo rjes su sems/bsod nams kyi na mkha'
220b3(phal chen): de la ni kun tu lci/bsod nams kyi phung po de na yongs su 'dzin/bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzod//bsod rnam sa kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par spyang /

220b7(phal chen): rgyung dong /dge ba'i bshes gonyen gyi sa byin spyi rlabs pa'i bsamo pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim

224a2(phal chen): pa rnams la btung ba dang /ro dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang /bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang /bca' ba 'dod pa

224b5(phal chen): gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la gzhon nu dang /cod pan dang /gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la/bcod pa nA dang /gtsug gi rin po che dang /thor pag dang bcas

224b7(phal chen): mthon ting dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang /yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed

225a2(phal chen): nga du la / dang dang /da kyi gle /khyom tha dadu ba dang /sems
225a3(phal chen): hU~Md+hU \u0f7fdad pa dang /sems rten gyi rigs pa dad pa dang /sem smi can rnam pa mi mthun pa zla ba dang /lum gyi rgyung thedad pa dang /gAn+d+ham+b+ha m+b+hi rnam pa dang /
225a4(phal chen): dzI Sh+T+rI'i tha panas/sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs de ldan pa kha zhis sna tshogs don drug rnye ba/kha bas m+b+ha rdzogs 'did pa/
225a5(phal chen): zad po bo ra ba rje btu pa gtsang ba 'dod 'a dang /'ju ba /kha bas rnam pa zangang po sna tshogs de ni du gnyer g+hu/lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
225a6(phal chen): khya ba du smras pa'i rgyamached la gnas pa'idi sti ste/mi'i nang nas 'bras can dang /sran chen dang /khri mi dang /sbo ma dang /nyidang /shal sogs pa/
225b1(phal chen): khams kyis bzla' bam kha nas sna chags don t+ta gzhor b+hU dang /mi nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du dag+h+ra d+hA'i rgyud/mAs nA danA/ byar nga du shA kyang /kha zas
225b2(phal chen): tung ba ste tshogs don du gnyer bi dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byung rgyu ba sems da pa'i sbyin ba zlogs pa med par gtong kyi ba'i rdo sbra dang /byang chub sems
225b3(phal chen): dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/'ongs nas kyang /khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so//pa dang du lto'o//rjod
225b4(phal chen): do//gsol ba 'debs so//de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas/skyong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams ste/nam mkha' la bltas pa dang /
225b5(phal chen): na ma mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang /btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs/re sna tshogs dang ldan pa/kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon
225b6(phal chen): lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to//de de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo pa/mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang /
225b7(phal chen): btung ba'i rnam pa dang /yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so//ci 'dod pa yongs su zin no//rab tu dga' bar byas so//shin tu tshim
226a1(phal chen): par byas so//dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so nyams shin tu bde bar byas so//yod rab tu dga' bar byas so//de ltar de dag shin tu
226a2(phal chen): tshim par byas nas/des kyang mchog ste/de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyud yongs su brjod de chos bstan
226a3(phal chen): to//phongs pa thams cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /sgyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /chos kyi ye shes kyi
226a4(phal chen): tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /dga' ba bza' ba'i zas
226a5(phal chen): rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang //
226a6(phal chen): thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /bla na med pa'i kha zas yongs su shis pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su
226a7(phal chen): brjod pa dang /bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i bsod nas kyi stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa bya ste cho sa bstan to//
226b1(phal chen): des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la na mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/de dag la tsha dang /mdog dang /stobs dang ///
226b2(phal chen): bde ba dang /spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to//des btung ba don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la/btung ba mang po zhi me
226b3(phal chen): pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/yid shin tu dga' ba byed pa/de dag gis tshim par byas nas/de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par
226b4(phal chen): bzlog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to//des ro'i mchog don tu gnyer/
226b5(phal chen): zhing 'ongs pa rnams la/ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang /sbyar ba dang /lan che dang /tsha bo dang /kha ba dang /bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su
226b6(phal chen): tshim par byas te/de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to//des bzhon gdon du gnyer zhing /phyogs
226b7(phal chen): kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdud do//de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to//des
227a1(phal chen): gos don t+ta gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun+da nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams twA/n+yam mkhyen dbyangs la ban+d+has//
227a2(phal chen): pa dang /nA mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgun dang /shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug
227a3(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs cano//kha dog du myir rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing /lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/des de dag gi slongs mo pa de dag la yongs su bsung
227a4(phal chen): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /khril yod pa bla na med pa dang /mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag po
227a5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to//de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo pa rnams la bsnyad byas nas/ci rigs su ches
227a6(phal chen): bstan to//de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sem+b+has dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/tshong dpon gyi bu no
227a7(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khri bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/kho bos byang chub
227b1(phal chen): sems dpa'o yo byad la dbang thob pa/rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams mA lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khobs par byas shing /sangs
227b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu
227b3(phal chen): 'bebs pa/de bzhin du rgyun kha dog sna tshogs kyi sbyin dang /cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
227b4(phal chen): na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /dkrol ba dang /glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /me togs
227b5(phal chen): dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /spros kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /
227b6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod de'i sprin gyi char dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
227b7(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs

228a2(phal chen): na/rnam pa ba smin du na/ dgasu s+m+R+YuM gas kyi rlung di na ni/zis khye mang ga

228a4(phal chen): ba pa bye ba dang de sar nanA tan du byung rjes shog/nas tshang dun gyi bla ni rib bdus dga' mthu nor nyams bdil tshim
228a5(phal chen): nga yid bde bsgos nas/khyim bdag mkhas pa mchos kyi migs rlob ma'i tshul bstan te/de'i byin gyi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
228a6(phal chen): thob pa gyur bar yongs su blta zhing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang /de la rag lus par ba ba dang /dge 'a'i bshes gnyin dben par
228a7(phal chen): sems rgyun mi 'tshong bar bstan pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bsnyen pa dang /dge ba'i bshes
228b1(phal chen): gzhon rjedang du rgyu rgyu rdzas sa nga byu du/dag pa ba gas gtsun kyi gdu pa d+ma tshig mnyan pa byu nga/dz+nyAn nan na gas gtsun las zlang da

228b3(phal chen): dag ma khas pa'i stong pa gnyis ma spobs byagalahU~M/m+b+ha pa ma sa pam la rlub rgya da dum gsus thugs su bad+ma byas nas/nga dang yang mAn te/ma
228b4(phal chen): bdag ma khas de'i chunas sa dang /nganas rgyang rgyu na s+ya/sa sa na dzo sa ni yad rgyas par snyoms/bsod rnams kyi zhing de la ni yong
228b5(phal chen): drug par bya//bsud nam kyi bang ni ya~M s+t+wa~M smr-i hU~M /sa nas kyi mas sa dal ni yang dag pa g+sa/ba bad rnams kyi mdzad de ni rnam par 'byed/ dum
228b6(phal chen): gter ngom ni shin tu bay-i/bos rnams kyi dkyi l-i 'kha du ni mas so spyod/bsud rnams kyi drung ba de ni yang dag pa la na/brisang rnams kyi mas ni
228b7(phal chen): /sa kyi zugs den rnam pa ngas da pyad / kyis bya sa ni ga gas ga ni 'du phyin te/kyi can rkye
229a1(phal chen): yongs su tshol tshol ba las/tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi 'os phyag 'tshal te/gas phyogs
229a2(phal chen): su bsko ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//'phang sna pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
229a3(phal chen): bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba mi 'tshal na/'phags pa lam
229a4(phal chen): ba gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bro'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man drug legs par mi stsal tam+ba/de nas chos kyi tshong
229a5(phal chen): dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag nas bzung ste/rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de/khyim de bstan nas 'di skad
229a6(phal chen): ces smras so///rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/des bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/'dzam bu chu klung gi gAseng las
229a7(phal chen): byas pa ste/yangs shing mtho la dngul gyis rabs bskor ba/shel gyi rtsigs pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te/mdzes par byas pa/bai dUr+ya'i phung po brgya
229b1(phal chen): drug snod gos rab tu brgyan pa/mu sa rag la ba ka ba 'gyo mu ta dmar po las byas de'i sdong gA'i khyi shin tu byA shams pa/nor bu rin po che rang bzhin spang
229b2(phal chen): seng ge'i rgyul mtshan bsgred ba/nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres po/gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus bArgyunA pas kun nas yog+sa pA/nor bu rin
229b3(phal chen): bo che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa a sma gaR+Sha ba las brtsegs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/
229b4(phal chen): rgya che zhing yangs pa/rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/shin tu mtho ba/sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/des khyim de'i nang du byin te/kun tu bltas
229b5(phal chen): ni/rim khang tha ma'i nang na/bza' ba dang /btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //ri ma khang gnyis pa'i nang na/gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su
229b6(phal chen): gtong ba mthong ngo //rim khang gsum pa'i nad na/rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na/btsun
229b7(phal chen): mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba/bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //rim khang lnga pa'i nang na/sa lnga pa la gnas
230a1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par bgro ba dgar ba la mos pa/'jig rten la phan pa dang /bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan
230a2(phal chen): gtsug lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/gzungs kyi tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang /ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang /ting nge 'dzin la
230a3(phal chen): rnam par spyad pa dang /ye shes kyi sna dra ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo //rim khang drug pa'i nang na/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
230a4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/shes rab shin tu zab pa rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pating nge 'dzin dang /
230a5(phal chen): gzungs kyi sgo dang /snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba/bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can/mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa chos yang dag par bgre ba
230a6(phal chen): la rnam par 'phrul pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjesu 'brang zhing rnam por dbye ba dang /rab tu gsal bar byed pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
230a7(phal chen): rdo ring po yang dag par dgro ba byed pa rnams su nas 'du shing 'khod pa mthong ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po na'abya ba dang /
230b1(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i rlung zhes b+ha bA dang /shus
230b2(phal chen): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin paM'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka r-i pra zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa'i/
230b3(phal chen): sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing /rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo byi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil
230b4(phal chen): 'khor zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya bo dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bA'i sgo kun tu blta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes
230b5(phal chen): bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho
230b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
230b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pos mi dmigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231a1(phal chen): pa'i sgo de drag las sogs pa//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgyad stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed cing
231a2(phal chen): rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to//rIm khang bdun pa'i nang na/byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lnga
231a3(phal chen): bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin
231a4(phal chen): pa shra stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo //rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na/byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa//
231a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu rnam par rgya ba/'khor kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/chos kyi dbyings thams
231a6(phal chen): cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/de bzhin gshigs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
231a7(phal chen): kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas
231b1(phal chen): 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo //rim khang dgu pa'i nang na/byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo //rim khang bcu
231b2(phal chen): pa'i nang na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang /spyod pa dang /'byung ba dang /smon lam rgya mtsho dang /sangs rgyas
231b3(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang
231b4(phal chen): bcas pa dang /sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug bud la 'di
231b5(phal chen): skad ces smras so//'phags pa khyod la 'di lto bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de/ji lta bu zhig du sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/
231b6(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/dris smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bos ngan te 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
231b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol ga cig na//'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs shes bya bar/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer
232a1(phal chen): mtha' yas bAs/yongs su brgyan po'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten
232a2(phal chen): mkhyen pa/bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur nga /lho dang mi rnams kyi ston pas saM swA rgyu sa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de
232a3(phal chen): ye shes rnam par snang ba las sogs pa/nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang /ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid las sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa' bya ba brgya phrag
232a4(phal chen): stong dang /thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/bza' shing re ba chen po rin chen rgyalo ma tshan gyis mdzes pa'i zhes bya bar
232a5(phal chen): gshegs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe/kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang chub
232a6(phal chen): sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/sil snyan dang /rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung spos kyi ril lu gcig gcig
232a7(phal chen): kyang bsregs te/bdug spos kyis bsrungs so//spos kyi ril lu gcig po de de ltar bsregs pas//zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi
232b1(phal chen): nAzlun g+hi sprin 'dog sadz+rog sna dang ldan pa/sems can+da thams nad kyi lus dang dA bas/yongs su khobs pa n+d+harAd+ha/zlos sbyin thun gyi sbyin de dag las kyang sla 'a
232b2(phal chen): skad du ba rjod de/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o//thams cad mkhyen
232b3(phal chen): pa ste/sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o//nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste//de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams
232b4(phal chen): cad kyang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro//thams cad mkhyod pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad du/
232b5(phal chen): kha ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par skye ba dang /sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/
232b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo //rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i
232b7(phal chen): rtsa ba de yang /kho bos gnas ga sum du yongs su bsngos te/gsum gang zhe na/'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcod pa dang dam pa'i chos
233a1(phal chen): mnyan pa dang mi 'brul ba dang /dge ba'i bshus glu nyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cung nA thong ba yongs su rdzogs
233a2(phal chen): par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so//rigs kyi bu khro bos mi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa myed pa'i
233a3(phal chen): rgyunA tses bya ba 'di shes par zad na/kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan+t+ra rin po che tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho dang
233a4(phal chen): tho mi dad pa la zhugs pa/tha mi dang bya'i chos kyi sbyin gyi cher yang dag par 'dzin pa/tha mi dang pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/kun tu bzang po'i sgra
233a5(phal chen): ba'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha ma dang pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu na gcig
233a6(phal chen): tu gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa/dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/bskal
233a7(phal chen): pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas pas/mi skyo ba/kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyad pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod
233b1(phal chen): bar nus re swAn+ta/sang rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sna'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/de'i grong khyer kun nas skyo zhes bya ba na/tshang pan sa 'a
233b2(phal chen): kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gos/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dang slo/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan
233b3(phal chen): tAn du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chos kyi tshang dpon rin chen gtsug pud kyi rkang po gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/chos
233b4(phal chen): kye tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/chos kyi tshang dpon rin chen gtsug
233b5(phal chen): gi drung nas song ngo ////bam po dgu bcu lnga pa////de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/
233b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/chos kyi
233b7(phal chen): tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas/shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi rnam par dag
234a1(phal chen): pa//byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stong
234a2(phal chen): la gnas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas
234a3(phal chen): pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyis thub pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan nano/byang chub sems dpa' ba'i ye shes
234a4(phal chen): snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/mthar gyis yul spa'i rtsa ba gang na ba
234a5(phal chen): deng phyin nas/grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tsho lta zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang /sgang dang gshod dang /
234a6(phal chen): mnya mo pa dang mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i bsam po dang /'jigs pa mang po'i sems dang /ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
234a7(phal chen): thub pa med pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag ma brjed pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos
234b1(phal chen): pa dang /smr-i kun+d+ha nas rnam par dmyigs pa'i dbang pyod du sbyin du/drug mod pa thams rgyung dang bral ba dang /mig dang rna ba ga stod pa mod par+ya gan+d+ha t+ta rgol rnam
234b2(phal chen): nas/yul sde'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/grong khyer klan nas sgo tshang 'dus kyi rdul stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur bye de/shin tu bzang po grub paM/bar+d+han
234b3(phal chen): sa shin tu mdzad/dz+nyAnI mang brjod kyis n+d+han pa 'dug ba'i nade na na zlos 'tshod kun tu yang /sa 'tshang
234b4(phal chen): khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/blosa'i tsho kun tu lta ba gang na da sbyi te/sgros 'tshong ban+de hUM blta ba'i ba gnyis la sgri bas phyug 'tshal na

234b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpasabyang chub sems dade'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nAn tan du brtsi ba pa 'tsho'o //smras pa rigs
234b7(phal chen): de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad
235a1(phal chen): shes te/rlung lhas gyur pa dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /bad kan las gyur pa dang //cha mAnyam par 'khrugs pa

235b1(phal chen): labyug pas byug byas nas d+hA tshul g+ha rgyun kyis yan lag shin tu byargyun te/ci rigs pa'i gaus+ya lus la bskyon nas/khyA zas bri ba'i mchog dang
235b2(phal chen): ldan pa/sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas ste/nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do//de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang
235b3(phal chen): be bstan cing 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir chos ston to//byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang po'i phyir chos ston to//chos rnam par dbye ba
235b4(phal chen): bye brag bstan cing gti mug sbyang ba'i phyir chos ston to//khyad par khang du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing che mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang

235b6(phal chen): ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med pa/yongs su bstan cing snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//
235b7(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing yon tan chad med pa 'thob pa dang /'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//
236a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang /gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan rnyed/thug pa chen pa'i sprin lam

236a3(phal chen): bshad cing byang chub sem dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang /'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

236b1(phal chen): tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gyis ma non+d+ra pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston te//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

236b3(phal chen): zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to//smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing /bskal pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi snrums deng 'gros
236b4(phal chen): pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to//stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par

237a1(phal chen): kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang /bdug spros dang /bsgo ba dang /bsku ba sbyor shes te/'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa las sogs pa dang /

237a3(phal chen): pa dang /spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa las sogs pa dang /spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa las sogs pa dang /spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan

237a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/de'i mthus
237b1(phal chen): kho bo snyoms can thams cad yongs su skyo ba pa'i rgyun gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa byed do/'di ltar spos kyi khyad pa brtsegs pa'i s+phon g+hA rgyu n+da na sngo/rnam pa thams

237b3(phal chen): mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang /sgro thams cad nas/sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang

237b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dra byings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlobs pa byed do//

238a6(phal chen): pa/ming thos na drin yod pa/mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams ngan

238b5(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer ta la rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/na rgyal po ma zhes bya ba 'jug gis de'i gan du sargyal/ji ltar byang chub sems dngas

238b7(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas
239a1(phal chen): to/tshong dpon spros 'chang kun tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nasku gcig tu brgyud
