239b1(phal chen): bcu'i yid la bya ba dang /mo 'bral ba'ang thob nas de mthar gyis stong sa nas ljongs dang /grong nas grong dang /yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyor ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang
239b2(phal chen): na ba der byin te/rgyal po me gang na bzhugs shes dri san+na/de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/rigs kyi bu 'dri re/rgyal po mA ni/rgyal po'i don bsgrub
239b3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/seng ge'i bdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad//khams rab tu sbyong ngo //chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod//bya dgas bsdu bar 'os
239b4(phal chen): pas ni bya dgas sdud do//g.yon yod pa'i rnams la ni gyod rmed//rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal che ni yongasu gcod//dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to//dregs pa rnams
239b5(phal chen): ni 'dul ba mdzad//srogs gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog/ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad//gzhan gyis yongasu bzung po la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam
239b6(phal chen): par zhi bar mdzad//brdzun du smra ba las ni phyir zlog pa mdzad//phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par dbral bar mdzad//zhe gcod pa'i dag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad//tshig kyal
239b7(phal chen): pa las ni yongasu glo no//chags sems dang ni mi 'dre bar mdzad//gnod sems dang ni rgyang srid //log par lta ba ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
240a1(phal chen): nor bzangs rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na nges mthong ba/rgyal po me de rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis smras
240a2(phal chen): pa/rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/rin po che gcig ma yin pas/legs par smras shing brgyan pas yid du
240a3(phal chen): 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/gser gyi lcug bod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chu btags pa/nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/nor bu rin po
240a4(phal chen): che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spros sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu
240a5(phal chen): bdug pa/rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa/rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/rin po che'i me tog gi
240a6(phal chen): chun po sna tshogs kyi lda lde rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing /de ni gzhon zhing
240a7(phal chen): dar la bib pa gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/sgra mthon thing g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba dang ldan pa mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/gtsug gtor
240b1(phal chen): / spyi bo rgyad 'phral ba yangs pa chog dkar nag 'byes shing /rdzi ma bya'i rdzi masbyar 'dug pa/sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa
240b2(phal chen): ma chu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/'gram pa'i lte nga seng na
240b3(phal chen): 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/mkhur ba shes rgyas pa smon tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dig ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can
240b4(phal chen): rtswa shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang ba/mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/snying kha dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ro steng
240b5(phal chen): seng ge'i sted ltar 'dug pa/thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/lagi pa ring po/dra bar 'brel pa'i ser mo can/rkang lag 'khor mos brgyan
240b6(phal chen): ba/rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhan la shas rgyus pa/bdun shin tu mtho ng+ge/rked pa rdo rje myur 'dug pa/lus che zhing drang ba/brla' zlum pa/ngomatshan gsang ba'i sbubs na
240b7(phal chen): 'dug pa/byin pa ri dgas i na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/sor mo ring ba/rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa//'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa//mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug
241a1(phal chen): ba s+phu re re nus glayas phyogs gyen du 'khyil pa/shing n+ya glo da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gabA pa/lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan
241a2(phal chen): pa/mgo la nor bu rin po che yod bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/'dzam bu chu klung gi ser las byas pa'i 'phral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/rna ba las
241a3(phal chen): rin po che in dra nI la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/lha rdzas kyi
241a4(phal chen): nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang /gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa'i yu ba can rin po che shar bu
241a5(phal chen): brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can rin po che'i dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan
241a6(phal chen): cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba//nor bu rin po che'i 'ong phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/rgyal po'i gaN+DI dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/srid la gzhan
241a7(phal chen): gyi 'khor gyis gtso ba med pa/dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong //de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal ba'i
241b1(phal chen): /dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson pa mthong //de'i mdun na chad pas garjod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srungs malta bu/gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu/'jigs 'jigs lta gas//
241b2(phal chen): ljon pa gtum zhing mi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/mig dmar ba/so gtsigs pa gdong gi gnyer ma gsum gnyer du bsdus pa/ral gyi dang /sta re dang lcags//
241b3(phal chen): kyi tshangs mdung dang /mda' dang /ber ga dang /mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs pa/lus dang bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing /'jig su rung ba/sbyin nag
241b4(phal chen): po ltar 'dug pa/mi snyan cing brlang la/sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/gzi blta bar dka' ba 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gum
241b5(phal chen): bar byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chod pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong //de na srog chagos rku ba/gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/sems can
241b6(phal chen): byi longs spyod chud smon pa/lam skugs shing 'phrog pa/grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /lha sa la mes gtong ba/grong du tsham po byed pa/khyim phugs 'debs pa
241b7(phal chen): sdig sdig ltor byed pa/dug ldud pa/bkrugs ma byed pa/thong mi byed pa/byi ba byed pa/logs par zhugs pa/gnod par sems pa 'dod chen che ba/sdig pa sna
242a1(phal chen): tshogs kyi las ma bzad pa byed pa/brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing /rgyal po mo'i drung du khyad pa dag kyang mthong //de dag la'ang rgyal
242a2(phal chen): pa mes ci rigs par chad pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo //des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing /lA lA ni rkang lag bcad/la la ni rno ba dang sna bcad/lA la ni mig phyung //
242a3(phal chen): la la ni yan lag dang nying lag dang mgo bcad/la la ni lus thams cad mes btang /la la ni ba tsi'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing /lpags pa brnyil ba la sogs
242a4(phal chen): pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du mi ma bzad pa/drag pa brlab pa yid du mi 'ong ba/srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong //gsung ba'i sa de na yang /bsad pa'i rkang
242a5(phal chen): lag dang /rnamig dang /sna dang /mgo dang /yan lag dang /nyid lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo //khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du gzabs su
242a6(phal chen): zab la chu zhed du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong //de na shi ba'i keng rus yan lag dang /nying lag dang /mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/spyang khi dang /wA dang /
242a7(phal chen): khyi dang /bya rgod dang /khwa dang /bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/'drid cing 'theg pa mthong ngo //de la yang la la ni kha dog gyur te/sngon por gyur pa tsam/la la ni
242b1(phal chen): rmugs pa tsam/la la ni bam pa tsam/la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur to//shin tu skye g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong //gsad pa de dag bsod pa'i cha
242b2(phal chen): me sdug cho dgur byas pas na/'jigs 'jigs skad dang /snyed rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing /tshe des 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos na/skyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po skyed pa/
242b3(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu yang thos//des de ltar khe btogs ste btungs pa dang /shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to//
242b4(phal chen): bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol
242b5(phal chen): zhing 'bad de/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/mi dag pa ni gang zhig spong zhes 'dri 'dri na/rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med/kha na ma
242b6(phal chen): ba chen po'i las la spyod pa/yid kyi yongasu rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa/sems can pha rol shin tu man ba la
242b7(phal chen): brtson pa/tshe phyi mo la lta ba med pa/ngani song gi g.yang sa'i gang kha na 'dug pa zhig na/'di la ci byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur ram snyam ste/de de ltar
243a1(phal chen): sems shing yid la byed/sems can thams cad yongs bsgrub pa la mngon par brtson pa/snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la/stong gi
243a2(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos po/rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/des gyen tu na mkha'i dbyings
243a3(phal chen): la bltas nas drano zhes/brjod//lha rnams kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tsom ma skyed cig/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i
243a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams ni/yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi log pa ma yin//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas/spyod pa'i ye shes ni bsam
243a5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab bo//sems can yongasu sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyabo//sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyabo//sems can tshar
243a6(phal chen): gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyabo//sems can gzeng bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khya'o//sems can yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
243a7(phal chen): sems can yongasu skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyabo//sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam
243b1(phal chen): rdzos mo khyab bo//sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//song rigs kyi bu de yi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig ces nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
243b2(phal chen): kyis/lha'i ngag mnyan to//rgyal po me gang na ba der song ste/phyin nas/rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
243b3(phal chen): phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/
243b4(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
243b5(phal chen): la gdams ngag dang /rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis thos na/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji
243b6(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/seng ge'i khri las langs nas/tshong dpon gyis bu nor bzangs kyi lag pa
243b7(phal chen): g.yas pa nas bzung ste/rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khridro//de mthar gyis rong gi gnasu phyin nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khri
244a1(phal chen): khri la bzhugs nas 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang longs skyed la bltos shes nas/des bltas na/khyim de rgya che zhing yang/
244a2(phal chen): la/rin po che bdun gyi rabs yongasu bskor pa/nar bu rin po che sna chags kyi/babapas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas
244a3(phal chen): rab tu dargyan pa/nor bu rin po che bsam gyiste mi khyab pa'i 'odadra shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar byas pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad par rnam
244a4(phal chen): par phye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba/nang du seng go'i khri mu sa ra gA ba las byas pa/rin po che brgya stong du mas
244a5(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogasu brgyan pa shin tu bshams pa/nor bu rin po che sgo snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba/steng nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i
244a6(phal chen): bla re bris pa/yid bzhin gyi bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas/kun nas yog pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan bya'i ba gami gyi rgyun
244a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ya sma gar ba las byas pa'i rdzing chu bsel bas gang ba dang ldan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug par mthong ngo //de'i 'khor
244b1(phal chen): bud med bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/kha dog rgyas pa bzad pa'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa/sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa sngon du ldang ba/phyi nas nyal ba/
244b2(phal chen): byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/je bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing dag nyan pa bye bo phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo //de nas rgyal po mes/chang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
244b3(phal chen): 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la/las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/lus phun sum tshogs pa
244b4(phal chen): 'di lta bu yod dam/'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/dbang phyug dang dbang chen po phun sum tshogs
244b5(phal chen): pa 'di lta bu yod dam//smras pa/'phags pa de lta bu na ma mchis//des smras pa/rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thab pa ste//
244b6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang /phal cher srog gcad pa byed pa/ma byin pararo len pa/'dod pas log par g.yem pa/brdzun du smra ba//
244b7(phal chen): ma can/tshig brlang por smra ba/byung rgyal du brjob pa/chags sems dang ldan pa/gnod sems can log par lta ba/sdig pa'i las byed pa khre zhing gtum pa/
245a1(phal chen): bab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang /dgag pa
245a2(phal chen): dang bstan par mi nus te/de ltar rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang /yong su smin par bya ba dang /shin tu dul bar bya ba dang /phan pa la
245a3(phal chen): dgod par bya ba'i phyir/snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mi sprul pa rnams la gsod du gzud pa dang /chad pas
245a4(phal chen): gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams/mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par/sprul pa'i rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang /rkang lag dang /sna dang //
245a5(phal chen): rna ba dang /yan lag dang /nying lag dang /mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang yongasu ston pa byed/dri mthong
245a6(phal chen): nas nga'i khams na/gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtor zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur//'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur//de dag sdig pa'i
245a7(phal chen): las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des/nyos pa gtong zhing /'jigs pa'i sems dang
245b1(phal chen): ldan pa dang /skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan byas nas/dga' zhing bde
245b2(phal chen): ba'i mthar phyin pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/rigs kyi bu nga ni lus deng rnyog glama?/yid kyis kyang
245b3(phal chen): sems can su la'ang cho mi 'dri tho mi 'tsha mo//rigs kyi bu nga ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsrings shes pa ste/byol song gi skye gnas glen
245b4(phal chen): pa'i kham su gtogs pa las kyang /chung ngu na rtsi'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phre'u 'ga' la yang /sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang /sdug bsngal bar bya bur
245b5(phal chen): mi dga' na/zheng du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyod par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ji smos/rigs kyi bu da ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongasu rgyu ba mi skyed na/ched
245b6(phal chen): du bsams te lta smos re skan/rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/ngas byang chub sems dpo'i mi skye ba'i
245b7(phal chen): chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa/sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba'i gzugs pornyad lta
246a1(phal chen): bu'i 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rig pa/rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khyong du chud p+ta/thogs pa med pa'i nan chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul lA dz+nyAs+ya/
246a2(phal chen): zhugs pa mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par 'gyur ba/ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting
246a3(phal chen): 'dzin gyi lam gyis byung ba/glong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur ba/sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa 'am//
246a4(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu m+b+ha phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod/da na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba
246a5(phal chen): 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
246a6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar/g.yas phyogasu bskor
246a7(phal chen): ba byas te/yang dang yang bltas nas/rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ye shes sgyu ma de rje su dran par byed cing /byang
246b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang /chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang /las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya/
246b2(phal chen): ba dang /chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjesu bsam pa dang /chos kyis yongasu smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang /ye shes las byung ba'i
246b3(phal chen): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang /smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /spyod
246b4(phal chen): pi sprul pa'i chos nyid tshogs pa med pa de rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /du sa gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang /rnam par dbye ba byed cing /mthor
246b5(phal chen): gyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang /kun tu btsal ba dang /rjesu rnam par blta ba byed cing /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang /lam dang smon ldong dang /thang dang
246b6(phal chen): zag thug dang /khal ko la dang /r-i dang ri sul dang /grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongasu skyo
246b7(phal chen): ba med pa'i sems dang /lus la dub pa med par tshol tshal te/grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nyen 'khor cig tu phyin nas/rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes
247a1(phal chen): dris na/de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/rigs kyi bu 'dir 'di ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/'di na rgyal po 'od chen po
247a2(phal chen): bzhugaso zhes nas/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po grang na ba der byin nas/grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo //
247a3(phal chen): mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/'di snyam du bsams//'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs
247a4(phal chen): pa blta ste/de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i
247a5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang /byang chub
247a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting
247a7(phal chen): 'dzin la rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab po dang /byang chub sems
247b1(phal chen): ba rnams patsun pa ma drung ba rnam par dag pa dang su mas mo khya pa 'od masu nga du rgyags pa/dubasam pasod du gyu nga /rlung rgyu na pa 'ad
247b2(phal chen): gangan ba der song b+hin nas/gleng khyer chen po 'dra bzang pa de la bsgos nA/gser dang dngul dang /n+d+han+d+ha dang /shAlo dang /mu tig dmyur ba dang /
247b3(phal chen): dang /mu sa ga'o ba dang /rin pa tsho 'di mdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing bAg+h+nA na mdzes pa/rin pa che'i 'obs za su zab pa/chus gang ba gni gse kyi grabs pa
247b4(phal chen): gang gAskye rdzas kyi ud pa lnga dang /pad+ma dang /kA m+b+ha da dang /prAn da ri kas kun nas log pa dus dang 'thun pa'i nAn dAn gyi 'dam dang/lums 'khor ba 'dun gyi
247b5(phal chen): kun nas yongasu bskor ste/rin po che sna bdun gyi ta lo'i 'bring ba'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongasu bskor ba/rdo rje rI ni pan+de'i sa bdun gyis kun nas yongs bskor ba 'di
247b6(phal chen): /seng ge yid du 'ongs pa'i rdo rje'i bo dang /rdo rje gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i ra bdang /'dug pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang /thub pad+ma shA' ba'i dang

248a1(phal chen): bskor ba ste/rdo rje rin po che'i rA ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs myod bas yongasu spras pa/'dzam bu chu klung gi ser gyi lan

255a7(phal chen): dong /grong rdal dang /spongs dang /sems dang /rgyal po'i pho br-ing dag na/rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te/mo dag pa
255b1(phal chen): bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par 'dod par gyur na yang /de'i tsheng de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong zhes bya/
255b2(phal chen): ba/byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar da ting 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /de nyid kyi mad la/sems can de dag
255b3(phal chen): gi 'jigs pa de dag dang /mi bde ba de dag dang /shar gnyer ba de dag dang /thab mo dang /rtsod pa de dag dang sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang /'tshe ba'i sems de
255b4(phal chen): dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin/'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid thob pas/rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//nye rab zhi par
255b5(phal chen): 'gyuraro//rnam par ldog par 'gyur//'gag par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig stongad dang /de'u re mngon sum du 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po 'od chen pos de'i tshe/byang
255b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba/'jig rten gyi dbang po'i gling la mnyam par bzhag go//de ltar rgyal po 'dra chen pos/byang chub sems
255b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba/'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang
256a1(phal chen): phyogasu bcas pa/grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang khams dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yoso//de
256a2(phal chen): g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i ra ba de dag dang /rin po che'i khang pa dang /rin po che'i snying po dang /rin po che'i khyim dang /rin po che'i gnas dang /rin po che'i gzhal
256a3(phal chen): med khang dang /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /rin po che'i ba gam dang /rin po che'i pu shu dang /rin po che'i skur khung dang /rin po che'i stegs bu dang
256a4(phal chen): rin po che'i rta babs dang /rin po che'i zla gram dang /rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang /rin po che'i lan kan dang /rin po che'i 'bru dang rin po che'i bla rI dang /rin po
256a5(phal chen): che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu gasmer kha'i dra ba dang /rin po che'i dril bu dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /rin po che'i ba den dang /rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang
256a6(phal chen): rab tu g.yos te sgra 'byin to//rab tu 'khro'o//de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing /yid du 'ong la snun pa dang /mnyan na dga' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing /rgyal po 'od chen
256a7(phal chen): po gang na ba der 'dud do phyag 'tshalo//grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na/sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang /dga' ba dang /rangs pa'i
256b1(phal chen): sems kyis yongasu rgyas nas/rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de log su mngon du bltas te/lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshalo//de'i khams kyi grang khyer dang /ljongs/
256b2(phal chen): dang /yul dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang /lus dang sems bde bar gyur to/dga' zhing rlangs pa skyes nas/rgyal po 'ong chen//
256b3(phal chen): po gang na ba de log su phyag 'tshalo//byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang /gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems
256b4(phal chen): su ldan par gyur nas/rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logasu blta zhing mngon par 'dud do//ri dang sgang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang /rgyal po 'od chen po
256b5(phal chen): gang na ba der mngon par 'dud do//me tog gi shing dang /'bras bu'i shing dang /lo ma'i shing dang /sa bon gyi tshogs dang /'byung po'i tshogs dang /me tog dang /
256b6(phal chen): ldum bu dang /rtsa dang /grol ba dang /sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang /rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de log su mngon par 'dud par gyur to//de'i khams na mtsho
256b7(phal chen): dang mche'u dang lu ma dang /lteng ka dang /'bab chu dang /chu klung dngardzing dang /khron pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang /rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su
257a1(phal chen): mngon byar gzhol zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to//klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang a gA ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'gru
257a2(phal chen): pa'i spos kyi sprin las klog sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing /'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur
257a3(phal chen): to//brgya byin dang /reb mtshe ma dang /rab dga' ldan dang /rab 'phrul dga' dang /dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang stong
257a4(phal chen): gi bar snang la 'khod do//na mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sprin bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra byung bas/dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher
257a5(phal chen): bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /lha'i bu mo grangs med pa/lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyings snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis
257a6(phal chen): brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi spyan grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog
257a7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa
257b1(phal chen): na gyis brgyan pa dang /sgyu rdzas kyi phyi ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sbyin grangs med pa rgyur rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang /s+yA rdzas kyi rin pan+d+ha l+h+wa sgrub bya tshog/
257b2(phal chen): sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brtan pa dang /sgyu rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma mod cing 'jam pa/kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i
257b3(phal chen): char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
257b4(phal chen): dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ongs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin
257b5(phal chen): tu'aphye ba'i rin po che'i ba dran gyi sbyin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rgyal po 'od chen po la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/byin gyis brlab so//glang po'i
257b6(phal chen): rgyal po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang /glang po'i dbang po'i'o khyu mchog go mthu phyung ba dang /rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthus na mkha'i dbyings thams cad g+ha rdzas kyi rin po
257b7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi pad+ma'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas ye g.yog byin gyis brlab so//lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i seng mo do grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang /lha rdzas kyi rin tra
258a1(phal chen): tshwa'i snam bu'i wa l-I dang /rgyun po grangs myed pa rab tu 'byung ba dang /rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phrong ba'i rgyud grangs mod pa mngon par
258a2(phal chen): 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang /lha rjes kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi ltab lhub dang /phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi
258a3(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda lding grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan po dang /lha rdzas kyi spros kyi rgyal po kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad
258a4(phal chen): du dri zhim pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dag sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med
258a5(phal chen): pa 'ichar rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa drang /lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'khrigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
258a6(phal chen): pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sbyin grangs med pa'i chur phru mAM rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang /lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed
258a7(phal chen): pa dang /bru snyan pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ongs par len cing /bstod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par na mkha'i dbyings
258b1(phal chen): rkyen gyis brlab so//srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyi sa'i gzhal gnas pa/kha zasu sha dang khrag
258b2(phal chen): 'thung zhing za la/chu la spyod pa dang /ri dgas dang /byugs dang /bya dang ba lang dang /rta dang glang po dang /bong bu dang /skyes pa dang /bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs
258b3(phal chen): 'phrog pa zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa//rtag tu 'gro ba lnga 'tshe zhing /tho 'tshams pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang /byams pa dang phan pa'i sems dam pa dang
258b4(phal chen): ldan zhing /bzhin gyi mdog shin tu drang ba dang /'gro ba thams cad la mi 'chi zhing /tho 'tshams pa med pa la zhugs te/'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/thal
258b5(phal chen): mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de log su btud nas/phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med
258b6(phal chen): pa yong myong bar gyur te//gnod sbyin dang /grul bum dang /sha za dang /'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang /phan pa'i sems dam pa dang /ldan zhing
258b7(phal chen): bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang /'gro ba thams cad la mi 'cha zhing /tho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas//thal mo sbyar cing shin tu
259a1(phal chen): dga' ba'i soms kyis/rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud cing phyug 'tshal bar gyur te/lus dang soms kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med
259a2(phal chen): pa yang myong bar gyur te//de ltar gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang /gnod pa dang mi bde ba dang /shar gnyer
259a3(phal chen): pa dang /thab mo dang rtsod pa dang /sems kyi 'khrug pa dang /'che ba'i sems thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//rnam par zhi bar gyur to//rnam par log par gyur to//
259a4(phal chen): 'gags par gyur to//phyir log par gyur to//gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thad nas/
259a5(phal chen): phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang /gnod pa dang /mi bde ba dang /shar gnyer ba dang /
259a6(phal chen): thothab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /sems kyi 'khrug pa dang /'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten
259a7(phal chen): gyi dbang po'i glong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to//rnam par zhi bar gyur to//rnam par log par gyur to//'gags par gyur to//phyir log par gyur to//
259b1(phal chen): de nas rgyal po 'ang chen po ti 'dzin de mas langs te/chang dpon gyi bu nar bzangs pa 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams
259b2(phal chen): pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pa/byams pa chen po'i gdugs
259b3(phal chen): tshad med pa dang ldan pa/'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas/'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/dang po 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la zhugs pa/
259b4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongasu gzung ba la zhugs pas/byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung blo zlab nya zhing rgyus
259b5(phal chen): ba lta bur gyur pa/shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang byed pa'i phyir/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thabs pa
259b6(phal chen): rab tu sel bas sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/sems cani thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa dang bar byed pas/nor du rin po che chu 'dang dang 'dra ba/'dra/
259b7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/'gro ba thams cad ting 'dzin dang /snyoms
260a1(phal chen): par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas/rlung dmang chen po dang 'dra ba de dag ge spyod pa shes pa'am//
260a2(phal chen): yon tan brjod pa 'am/bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal ba 'am/yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i na mkha' la blta ba'am/smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil
260a3(phal chen): 'khor las mtshams gcad pa 'am/chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung ba'am/theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis bsngags pa yong su brjod pa 'am/kun tu bzang
260a4(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa'am/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chen po bsgom pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/snying rje chen po'i sprin yongasu smos par nus ra skan
260a5(phal chen): sed rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod/da nA dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la dza
260a6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis//
260a7(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog pu skor ba byas te/yang dang yang bltas nas/
260b1(phal chen): rgyal ba 'ong tshun pa'i drung nas song ngo ///bam po dag cu drug pa de nas tshong dpon rtswa na da bzangs/rgod gyung chen po 'di bzang po nas rgya
260b2(phal chen): drod tsam du lem gyi migo brtul nas/rgyal po 'dra chen po gdams ngag de la rjesu bsam pa byed rting /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan
260b3(phal chen): rjesu dran par bya ba dang /tingange 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi snang ba chen po de yongasu bsgom pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyis
260b4(phal chen): ni khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba/rnam pa sna tshogs dri dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dnga'i smon lam dang /bsod nams kyi dbang dang
260b5(phal chen): stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rjesu sbrel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu brtan
260b6(phal chen): par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpe'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mongs du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjesu bsam pa dang /byang chub sems dpal
260b7(phal chen): gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dog kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bas
261a1(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa de rjesu dran par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu dag pa de la brtag ba dang /byang
261a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed byung bas/sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang /sems
261a3(phal chen): kyi nyams bde ba dang //sems shin tu tshim pa dang /sems khod nas dga' ba dang /sems rnyog pa med pa dang /sems 'ad dang ba dang /sems brtan pa
261a4(phal chen): dang /sems rgya che ba dang /sems mi zad pa thob ste/de de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjesu dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su
261a5(phal chen): sems pa/kyi hud dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni/yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnasu gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
261a6(phal chen): yongasu dag pa dang /yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs
261a7(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongasu skyed pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba na
261b1(phal chen): dang bsgrub pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyis tshul thams cad brjod pa'o//shes rab dang /
261b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par skyed pa'o//byang chub sems depa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ran
261b3(phal chen): bod gis g.yongs thams cad nas skyob pa'o//dge ba'i bshos gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen durmi
261b4(phal chen): ni bdag la lam bde ba dang /mi bde ba ston pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongasu ston pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang
261b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams dag gis 'dems pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston par
261b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gran su phyin par skye la bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'dzag par byed
261b7(phal chen): //dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la ras gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi
262a1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o//
262a2(phal chen): zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/na mkhwa'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang /sangs rgyas
262a3(phal chen): kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bladam dgu la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni
262a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas/
262a5(phal chen): ni/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bskyed pa yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom gyi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge bo'i bshes gnyen
262a6(phal chen): rnams kyang nye bar snyen pa yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis rigs
262a7(phal chen): kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par/dge bsnyen ma me g.yo ba gang na ba der song shi tA ro/de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur//de nas tshed dpon
262b1(phal chen): rje bu nor bzangs ting 'dzin rtswa ye shes snang ba las lang s+ya nas/mthal gyis rgyal po'o phra brang brtan pa ra/dge bsteng+ga mA ma~M ga yo ba gang ra ba der so pa sa/dge bsnyen ma
262b2(phal chen): mi g.yo ba yongasu tshol ji rme de rmed dpa las/de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni/rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing kizhon nur
262b3(phal chen): gyur pa ste/rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nopa 'azangs/dga' ba chen po dang mos
262b4(phal chen): shing spro bas yongasu rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bo'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i cha/des
262b5(phal chen): khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/'od nges tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
262b6(phal chen): lol phog par gyur ma thag tu/tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /zhi ba'i gnas kyi tinge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting
262b7(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sngo mang po dang /kun tu lnga pa'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi tingange 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa cing nga
263a1(phal chen): 'dzin rgyas lnga brgyatsam la zhugs par gyur te yongasu stug//ngo dag kyang shin tu phywa rlung gzhon pa s+thA/'di ltar dper na/thag ma mngal du zhugs pa'i/
263a2(phal chen): rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ting 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to//des dri zhim po zhig tshar na yang /de ni lha la yang med/!nga mol
263a3(phal chen): yad med/klu la yang med/klu'i bu mo la yang med/gnod sbyin la yang mod/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/dri za la yang med/dri za'i bu mAM lnga yang med/
263a4(phal chen): ma yin la yang med/lha ma yin gyi bu mo lnga yang med/na mkha' lding la yang med/na mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang med/mi 'am cing lnga med/mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med
263a5(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po la yang mod/lto 'phye chen pi bu mo la yang med/mi la yang med/me'i bu mo la yang med cing mi sred pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tsher bar gyur to//bud med de'i
263a6(phal chen): gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten na med na lhag pa lha ga las 'od /kha dog dang mngag de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang /kha dog
263a7(phal chen): dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang /mdo/ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang /mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na
263b1(phal chen): las 'dra/lus kyi chu zhed dang dbyibs d+h+we l+yA brASh+Tha de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra'i lhun du zher dang /dbyibs dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang skye ba thob pang /
263b2(phal chen): lus kyi chu zhed dang /dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu deng dang /dbying bu mnyam pa phyog bcu'i 'jig rtenan med na/phyug pa lta ga las 'od 'od kyi rgyun de
263b3(phal chen): lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang sgyur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma glegs par de de 'ad kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i
263b4(phal chen): 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /de'i khwab dad kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/klu dang /gnod sbyin
263b5(phal chen): dang /dri za dang /lA ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na thad na/lhag pa g+ha gA las 'ong
263b6(phal chen): byin gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu lang de bzhin gshegs pa'i long spyod dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i yod spyod ma gtogs par/de'i khyim gyi khyam
263b7(phal chen): dang longs spyo dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na ldag pa lta ga las 'ongad /g.yogs 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun
264a1(phal chen): /snam tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum chags bam gtogs pang de'i kwa 'oka 'khor kun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa yang
264a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na mang na lhag pa lte ga las 'ong ste/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de la bu dang phyo
264a3(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na medo//dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu/nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yangs//phyogs bcu'i
264a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na me de/'di lta ste/dper na tshangs pa chen po stong brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni/'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi bya
264a5(phal chen): de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yang mthong ma thag tu/sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs pa ma rgyu'o//dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de lo blta bas rams par 'gyur ba'i
264a6(phal chen): sems can de lta bu yang /shes rab kyis ngoms paM/ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi se na mdo//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
264a7(phal chen): bzangs kyis/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzugs dang //kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /chu zheng bsam gyi mi khya
264b1(phal chen): bA dang /sa'i gzhi dang /grong khyer dang /rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sems can gyi don bsam gyis
264b2(phal chen): mi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste/bai spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas/'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/khyim dang gshul me
264b3(phal chen): khang gi rgya ni phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas//yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud//dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshig su bcad pa 'dis bstod//khyed kyis
264b4(phal chen): rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongasu bsrungs te//bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongasu bsgom mdzad cing /brtson 'grus brten pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na//ri bo'i rgyal
264b5(phal chen): po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar/de nas tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigasu gcad pa des mngon par bstod do//'di skad
264b6(phal chen): ces smras//'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems daskyed na/ji rtar+ya byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i smod pa la
264b7(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis
265a1(phal chen): thos nas/'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bsdu pa dang /ji ltar nanA tan du bgyi ba bdag
265a2(phal chen): la bsha du gsol/de nus dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing /yid du'ang la/nyam su bde bas/tshong dpon gyi bu nir brdangag la
265a3(phal chen): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas/'di skad ces smroso//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso
265a4(phal chen): legs//rigs kyi bu kho mo na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgro yi dam brtan
265a5(phal chen): ba la slob pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o//kho mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba/chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o//
265a6(phal chen): kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o//smras pa 'phags mi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par zer pa thub par dka' ba'i
265a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mtshos/yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs
265b1(phal chen): dang/ tsug rnams cad snang bar brjod pa'i grubs bsgrung ba'i sa dang /ma y-i sa btsal bas myi skye ba'i rgyan gyirgyud 'dzin ldan na rgyu rdot+ta gagags /
265b2(phal chen): ba/rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'//smras pa 'phags ma bstan du gsol/sangs rgyas kyi bye dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung na yid kyi
265b3(phal chen): ces par ya chi grang /rtags pa dang 'tshal ba dang /rnam par rtogs pa dang /rje su rtogs pa dang /rig pa dang dmig su babs pa dang /goms pa dang /mi 'gal ba dang
265b4(phal chen): rnam par mi rtogs pa dang sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang /mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis grangs/de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/tshong dngon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di
265b5(phal chen): skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskul ba lnga de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byang ste/kho mo yang
265b6(phal chen): de'i tshe rtul po glog gis byin pa'i bu cig ma zhig tu gyur nas/de'i tshenab ma mI nyil tsam zhig na/rgyal ba'i sgra phong bca /pha dang ma yang nyal/snul po dang phreng med dag
265b7(phal chen): gnyid kyis log/rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang de lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/kho na mal gyi steng na 'dug cing //na mkha'
266a1(phal chen): dbyings la rgyu ba'i skur ma'i tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la blta blta ba las/stong gi bar snang la/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
266a2(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba/ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang //dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
266a3(phal chen): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongasu bskor ba/phyogs thams cad du 'od
266a4(phal chen): gzer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas por khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong //de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu
266a5(phal chen): byung ste/des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te/mal gyi skyed nas langs nas//sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la
266a6(phal chen): babs nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag 'tshal to/de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na yang /mtha' thug par ma rung
266a7(phal chen): g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung /mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshagaso ba la bsam na yang ngo mos par ma rung ste/de'i tshe kho mos 'di snyam du bsam so///
266b1(phal chen): A Sh+Ta bA zhog byas na/lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/rgyan dang dab byud bzang pa dran sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshad/

267a5(phal chen): can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das
267a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phye ba rab tu brkyang ba las/chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnams pa de lta bu dag thos nas/thang
267a7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/stobs bcu'i ro 'o bzhin lo ni mngon par smon par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/sangs
267b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongasu sbyang bache dga'/sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tsho ba rtsa ba ni yongs bsgrub par dga'/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa no//
267b2(phal chen): mngon par mos par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyi ba'i khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni ma ngon par smin par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par zag pa la ni mngon par dang
267b3(phal chen): par gyur//sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/rdo rje ltar ri
267b4(phal chen): dang mtshan cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang de/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa skyed/rigs
267b5(phal chen): kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kying 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran
267b6(phal chen): na/gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshas la'ang khong kho ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/ngo ma yin pa'i seM
267b7(phal chen): ma nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smras/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/bdag tu lta ba dang /ldan pa'i sems bsod pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/de ma yin
268a1(phal chen): pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smras//shi pho dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang /sems rmongs pa 'am
268a2(phal chen): 'du shes sna tshogs sam/lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran naM/legs par bsams shring lta ci smos/bskal ba de skad cig tu sangs rgyas gcing/
268a3(phal chen): kyang chung ngu na/rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rje su mi dran na/byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos//dri nas nye bar
268a4(phal chen): bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang /yi ge gcig kyang
268a5(phal chen): brjed par mi dran na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta re smos/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/chos kyi rgya mtsho snyed cig 'thung 'thung

268a7(phal chen): las kyang chung ngu na/'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang /kho mos dngange 'dzin na dron par ma bsgrungs pa de lta bu med/
268b1(phal chen): de nas nyo bar bzung ba tshun chad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dro skad kyi 'khor lo bzung yang /ji ltar yongasu bzung ba las/sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtog/
268b2(phal chen): bar chung ngu na rjesu brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang /yi ge 'ga' yang dor bar mi dra no//de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de skad cig mthong yang//
268b3(phal chen): chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam mar dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma
268b4(phal chen): bsgrubs be medo//de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam
268b5(phal chen): yang /kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/mngon par mi bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dri no//de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/sems can gang kho mos bla na
268b6(phal chen): med pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul pa de la bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran//de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
268b7(phal chen): yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcog kyang mngon par sgrub su mi dran//rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung nga tshun chad du/bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra
269a1(phal chen): bsnyad cig lon pang /tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang tho rlom bskyed pa 'am/gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/rnam par rtogs pa'i 'du shes sam/
269a2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/rab kyi 'du shes sam/bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dra no//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas
269a3(phal chen): byung ba dang ma bral//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bla'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bra'o//yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bra'o//
269a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bra'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bra'o//byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bra'o//byang chub
269a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bra'o//byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bri'o//mtha'
269a6(phal chen): dang dbud med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing /khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bra'o//mtha' dang dbung med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung
269a7(phal chen): ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang maM dra 'o//'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral//sems can thaMd kyi ngag
269b1(phal chen): ba'o rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i yo shes thob pa dang ma bra'o//sems can rnams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs ston pa dang ma za'o//sems can thams cad shes par
269b2(phal chen): byed pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dad pa dang ma bral//rigs kyi bu khro mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgra thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang
269b3(phal chen): chos thams cad yongs btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyun gyi ting 'dzin sde sgra 'di la snyoms por zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa'i sgra yi dmal brtan pa 'di rnam par byA bA dang /
269b4(phal chen): gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang /spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'od rnam par phyeg dang /cha 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyad
269b5(phal chen): pa yod na/rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/smras pa 'phags ma 'tshalo//de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/byang chub sems ngo ba'i
269b6(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i smr-i thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi
269b7(phal chen): ngan yod pa 'di dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang /ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang ting 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs
270a1(phal chen): mi zad pa'i mdzod la stobs pa/ting 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang /rnam par spyad pa dang /rjesu 'jug pa dang ka nges par
270a2(phal chen): rtogs pa byaso//de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/tshong dpon gyi bu nir bzangs kyis/phyogs ban+d+har 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
270a3(phal chen): dri med pa brag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang /bai DUr+ya yongasu dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo //'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa
270a4(phal chen): ba brag brgya brgyan/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcwa brgya bzhugs por mthong ste/la l-i ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/la la ni yongs mya ngan las 'dul
270a5(phal chen): bamadzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong //de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongasu dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od
270a6(phal chen): gzer dang /'ad kyis dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par bye ma dang bya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dog so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba
270a7(phal chen): rgyam tshe yang mthong bar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa/sems can thams cad kyi ni lam du rnam par
270b1(phal chen): /grag pa'ang thos par gyur to//de nas dge bskon ma ma gso ba tong 'dzin da las langs nas/tshong dpon gyi du nor ba 'angs la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu khyud kyis mthong ngam thos sam/
270b2(phal chen): shes sam/smras pa 'phags ma mthong //thoso//rig/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing /chos thams cad yongasu bcal bas
270b3(phal chen): skyo ba'i rgyun gyi ti nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'o sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis
270b4(phal chen): dazungs khang du chung pa dang /sbubs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cang snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/sems can thams cad yang su chem bye byed
270b5(phal chen): par zad na//khri mos byang chub sems dpa'i sngon tin tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa na mkha'i dbyings la mdab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod do//
270b6(phal chen): namakha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongasu smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gdon pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/chung pa nyir skabs bcu'i ye shes
270b7(phal chen): ngan pa ma mngon par 'ad cing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du d+huho/mthu dang ldan pa na brgya'i ming ma 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang ldan
271a1(phal chen): lag pas rmed pa'i rdu lus byung ba'i sems can yongs sbyin par mngon par gadron pa'i phyir chos kyi rgyu mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba lha'i dbang lta tun
271a2(phal chen): mongs pa'i sgyu ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir/khams gsum gyi gnas yongasu bkang shing /rnam par rgya ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi srung
271a3(phal chen): chudang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bsnam pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings kyi na mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa/zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog
271a4(phal chen): ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon paro shar ba/sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir
271a5(phal chen): byams me byams dang /mthon dman med par/'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/rlung ngamar ltar sems can tha~Md kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta bo'i shig shing bran gyi nags tshol
271a6(phal chen): dong /kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam por rgyu ba/'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rten gyis 'gro
271a7(phal chen): pa thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir/'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re skan+ta/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
271b1(phal chen): kyi yul dga' 'dzin chad med pa na/grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod/do na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
271b2(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa
271b3(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshalo te/dge bsnyen mo mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas
271b4(phal chen): so //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rje su dran par byed cing /dge bsnyen ma mi
271b5(phal chen): g.yo bas bstan pa dang /yang dag par bstan pa dang /bsgrags pa dang /bshad pa dang /brjod pa dang /yang dag par brjod pa dang /bzhag pa dang /rnam par phye ba
271b6(phal chen): dang /smos pa dang rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdoni mi za bar yid ches shing /rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang /rje su bsam pa dang /khong du chud par bya ba dang /bsgom
271b7(phal chen): pa dang /yongasu bsgom pa dang /gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /rtogs par bya ba dang /snang bar bya ba dang /mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang /yul
272a1(phal chen): nas yul du bsgyur te rgyu zhing song song nas/yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol
272a2(phal chen): te/nyi ma nub du cha ba zhig na/grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas/
272a3(phal chen): srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo nas/l-i gyi bzhi mdo dang /grong phrag nas/grong phrag tu kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang /mtshan
272a4(phal chen): me mi nyal tsam zhig na/grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/de'i rtse mo rtsa dang grol ba dang /sman sna tshogs dag
272a5(phal chen): dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa/'od chen po dang ldan pa nyo ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong //des snang ba de mthong nas/dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/'di snyami
272a6(phal chen): du bsamaso//bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/grong khyer de nas byung ste/ri shin tu mod pa gang na
272a7(phal chen): ba der phyin pa dang /ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang /rgyang yang ring po zhig nas/kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro
272b1(phal chen): ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig/tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/'chag sen 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong //
272b2(phal chen): nas/de'i drung du phyin te/rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/mdun na 'dug nas/thal mo sbyar te 'di skad
272b3(phal chen): ces smraso//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i skyong po la bslab par
272b4(phal chen): bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngagra dang /rje su bstan pa mdzadado//zhes bdag gis thos na/'phags
272b5(phal chen): pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla
272b6(phal chen): na med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs po leg so//lag s+ho//rigs kyi bu kho bo na thams cad du 'gro ba te/thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
272b7(phal chen): pa la gnas pa'o//sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang /dngos po med pa la gnas pas/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang //chos
273a1(phal chen): kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir tugs par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o//rigs kyi bu de Shar kho zan son
273a2(phal chen): snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang /sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang /sems can shi 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang /sems can gyi skye nga'i sgo thams cad
273a3(phal chen): dang sred pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang /skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /chu zheng
273a4(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/skye ba kun tu 'brel po rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/lha'i lam gyi rgyud tu
273a5(phal chen): gtogs pa dang /klu'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /dri za'i lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang /lha ma yin gyi lam gyi
273a6(phal chen): rgyud tu gtogs pa dang /na mkhri'i lding gi lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs po dang /mi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang /lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang
273a7(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang /gshi ni rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
273b1(phal chen): gsug du sa rgyu ga klu h+ma/dU na rdzu nags la na m+b+ha sa Sh+Ta
273b2(phal chen): ba'i rgyu /dang thams cad dang sman pa gzug/nga jug gyi ba rgyasasu rnam pas gang ngan spyod//seMms sbyin la lal d-i nA~M/sa
273b3(phal chen): skyed pa'i stegs pa bas pa'i phyir/badz+ra bI dang sna pa bzhis rang su skye ba'i thabs na byudang //sems can lnga lnga la nI 'dis /rnams cad rgyunapa da du
273b4(phal chen): sa byung ba bangs paspyod bag+sa/ 'i sbyin pa byud dag par rjod cing da da//ngas rgyun la la lA nI hrI nga
273b5(phal chen): seM ts+li brgyang pas rnye chub sa 'i sems 'angs brjod cing drin byeng //sems can me lA~M ldan 'di/ngas kyis kyi da thas so dade 'dus dag nga b+ha ba dang /
273b6(phal chen): pa tshong ring sa smon par bya ba'i smon lam ming su bskyed por byung /byang chub sems dpa'i byung ba rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byeng//sems pa
274a1(phal chen): la ni 'di lta ste/ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang 'thun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar myong bar
274a2(phal chen): 'gyur ba yongasasu bstan pas/skyo ba yongasu bskyed cing don byed//sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga thaskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi
274a3(phal chen): za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed//sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
274a4(phal chen): kye yon tan dang /sku la mngon par mos pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags
274a5(phal chen): pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed//sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/mi zlog shing lhun gyis grub pa dang /rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du
274a6(phal chen): mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che brjod pas don byed//sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/chus
274a7(phal chen): zil gyis gnon la/phas zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongasasu brjod cing don
274b1(phal chen): /gas kyi bu gzhan yang Na ban glang ku dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bya'i mngo' pangs thams cad dang /srang thams cad dang /ldum gyi sum mad rnams cad dang /glang mtshams cad du/
274b2(phal chen): khyim thams cad dang /thum par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad dang /glod thams cad dang /grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar chags shide 'dus pa'i bud mi dang /sa
274b3(phal chen): nga /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /sbya ba ji lta ba dang / dzi ba dang /rnam par spyong pa rdo la ba bzhin du de dag dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyangs
274b4(phal chen): na ba bsgrubs shing tshes sbyin /sa mas na nI de dag gis dbus bstan pa dang /de g.yas 'das pa mi shes te/gzhan du ni thos nas man ba nan tan du byed ba ni
274b5(phal chen): da' bzhin//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'din nags pa 'thu pA m+b+ha b+ha rnam pa sna chags la mngon par kaR+sha pa dI hU~M dza~M nu druga' khang pa da dag thams cad kyi nang drung
274b6(phal chen): snangs can lta ba'i rnam pad+d+ha chags la chags pa rnams yongasu sbyin par bye bu'i phy-ir rnams cid dang 'thun par gnas te/rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyung dga' nga dzi
274b7(phal chen): na/sems can gyi na byung zing /'dug pa de bzhin du/'jam cu grong ga zang dang /zang kyor dang /ljongs dang du'odong khams dang /rgyal ba'i ba zang
275a1(phal chen): thams cad na yang sems can gyi don byed//'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /de bzhin
275a2(phal chen): du stong dang stong gnyis pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba tha~Md dang //
275a3(phal chen): sems can gyi gnasu bya ba thams cad dang /sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang /sems can gyi khams bya ba'i ming du
275a4(phal chen): gtogs pa thams cad dang /sems can yongasu rgyu ba thams cad dang /sems can yongasasu 'du ba thams cad dang /sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa thams cad dang /sems can
275a5(phal chen): gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang /sems can gyi phyogasu bya ba thams cad dang /sems can gyi phyogs mtsham su bya ba thams cad dang /sems can spyod pa'i gnas tha~Md du'ang
275a6(phal chen): thabs sna tshogs dang /tshul sna tshogs dang /sgo sna tshogs dang /rigs pa sna tshogs dang /phrad pa sna tshogs dang /thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang /bya ba sna tshogs kyi sems
275a7(phal chen): can rnams kyi don byed//gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongasu bstan cing mos par bya ba dang /tshig lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed//rigs kyi bu
275b1(phal chen): bos ni/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjesu song ba 'di shes par zad na/kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus
275b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/bdag dang sems can gyi lusu tha mi dang po'i ting 'dzin thob pa/'phrul ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos skyid pa'i lom gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/'jig rten gyi skye ba thams
275b3(phal chen): cad rang gi lus la rjesu spyod pa/'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang /chero skye ba rab tu
275b4(phal chen): ston pa bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pani mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/'gro ba tha~Md kyi don byed
275b5(phal chen): kyang gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje
275b6(phal chen): chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dog gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus ro snyed
275b7(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yo de/de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la
276a1(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
276a2(phal chen): bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/kun tu rgyu thams cad 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas//yang
276a3(phal chen): dang yang bltas te/kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas songo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la mi lta/srid pa'i long spyod dang /yongasu zin pa dang /nye bar
276a4(phal chen): blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rag bya thad
276a5(phal chen): la ni mi lta/g.yog 'khor dang /long spyod dang /nye bar spyad pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/rgyal srid dang /dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la/sangs
276a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongasu dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba dang yongasu dag par bya ba la blta ba/mchod
276a7(phal chen): pa dang /bsnyen bkur dang rim gror bya bas mi ngoms pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta ba dang /rang bzhin med pa yongasu shes pa'i ye shes khong du par bya
276b1(phal chen): ba'i phyir chos thams cad la bsdu ba yon tan rgya mtsha thams cad kyi don du ran tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang /
276b2(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/de bzhin gshegs/
276b3(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/tingange 'dzin gyi sgo re re ra/byang chub sems dpa'i tinge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzud pa la rnam
276b4(phal chen): par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung bas/mi
276b5(phal chen): ngoms par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la/lta ba de/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang /dge ba'i
276b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/dge ba'i bya shes gnyen ni/de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gan su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing /mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang
276b7(phal chen): na ba der phyir nas/spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la yongs rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/mthong nas spos 'tshong gi tshang dpon long spyod ud pa la gang na ba der
277a1(phal chen): phyin te/drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te/spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon/
277a2(phal chen): long spyod ud pA la la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud po la'i mdun du 'dug te thal mo sbyor nas/
277a3(phal chen): 'di skad ces smra so//'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal to//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs
277a4(phal chen): par bgyi bar yang dgal/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongasu grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sku yongasu 'tshal bar
277a5(phal chen): bgyi bar yang dga'/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khro
277a6(phal chen): thams cad snang bar bgyi bar yang dga'/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu brtan par yang dgal sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
277a7(phal chen): par gtor bar yang dga'/zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/
277b1(phal chen): rdo ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgrub par bgyi ba dang ji wAr nAn tan du bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/byang chub sems dpa'
277b2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal hUM/smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/lags
277b3(phal chen): leg so//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/spos sgyur ba thams cad dang /bdug spos thams cad dang /bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang /byug pa thams cad
277b4(phal chen): dang /byug bsgyur ba thams cad dang /bye ma thams nad dang /bye mi sbyar bu thamasna cad dang /sros dang byug pa dang /bye ma'i rnam pa rnams cad kyang shesate'i spros kyang
277b5(phal chen): so//klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /ni mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci da /s+ho 'phye chen po dang /me dang mi me yin pa'i spos kyang shes//nang giso pa'i
277b6(phal chen): sa dang /yid mi bde ba bskul ba'i spos dang /'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongasu skyed pa'i spros dang /nyon mongs pa 'bar byar bya ba'i sgo dang /nyon mongs pa lci bar bya
277b7(phal chen): spos dang /'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna chags yongasu bskyed pa'i spos dang /'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongasu bskyed pa'i skyes dang /bag bya ba'i gnas
278a1(phal chen): thams cad yongasu sol ba'i spos dang /sangs rgyas yod la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung bal spros dang /chos kyi tshul khong du chud par b+hU dASh+Ta
278a2(phal chen): smr-id du/'phags pas spyad pa'i sgras dang /b+h+ya rgyu sa nas dpa'i thos rnam pa pa da ba gi/byeng nabasams dpa'i sa sems cad rnam par dgod pa ni sa sa/
278a3(phal chen): kho bos thos de dag rnams cad rnam pa 'i lta bu'ang rab tu giso//'byung ba dang /skye bdud/TI grub pa dang /dngas rdzogs pa dang /song su dge padang /yongs su sa pa dang /
278a4(phal chen): tu sbyar ba dang /yongasu spyad pa dang /dz+wal dang mthu dang las dang /rgyu yang rab tu shes//rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/klu yong su 'khrug
278a5(phal chen): par byed pa yod/r-i lu ti la gyi 'bru nam gyis kyang /yul khams chen po thams cad spros kyi sprin bye ba shin tu skrag pas/klan nas khebs par gyur te/zhag bdun du
278a6(phal chen): spos rgyu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi
