278a7(phal chen): me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lusu 'gyur//khang pa dang gzhal med khang deng /khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag tha~Mng
278b1(phal chen): kyang /me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas//sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas par gang gis/spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur
278b2(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang /mos pa chen pos yongasu rgyas par 'gyur te/lus dang sems la bde ba dang /dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyuraro//de
278b3(phal chen): ngag gi lus la yang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med//sems kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba yang mi
278b4(phal chen): 'byung //'jigs pa 'am/sdang ba 'am/bag tsha ba 'am/yid 'khrug pa'am/gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gcig la
278b5(phal chen): gcig byams pa'i sem su 'gyur//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang /nyams bde ba skyes po rnams la/bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang
278b6(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ro ma lA ya las byung ba'i tsan dan sa sgyings dam pa zhes bya ba yod/de lus la bsdus
278b7(phal chen): nama'i 'o ba su mchongs kyang tshig pa med//rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod/des rnga'am dung la bskus na/de'i skyes
279a1(phal chen): gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dras pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i ya gA ru nag pa pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba sod //
279a2(phal chen): de'i ril lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gis dris kyang /'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas byar gang bar gyur te/sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshar ba de dag thams rnyed
279a3(phal chen): kyang /sdig pa la smod cing /sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po khu ba can las/'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod/
279a4(phal chen): de'i dri cher na/sems can+da de dge 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'gyur te/kho bA ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor sa b+ha ba'i ting 'dzin thob pa
279a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to//rigs kyi bu srin pa'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i sgras kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i stong pa zhes bya ba de/de ni 'khor los bsgyur bu'i long spyod kyi don du
279a6(phal chen): 'byung ste/des bdugasu ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs/yan lag bzhi pa yang /namakha'i dbyings la gnas//rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos
279a7(phal chen): bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa yod/des bdug ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab
279b1(phal chen): mtsho ma'i gnas na/spos kyi rnam pa drag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod/des bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad/lha'i rgyal po rab mtsho ma'i drung du 'dod//de dag der phyin nas
279b2(phal chen): kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems chos kyi gtam bya'o//rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas ni spos kyi rnam pa sa 'du bar zhes bya ba yod/de'i spros kyi dud pa/byang chub sems dpa'i tshe
279b3(phal chen): gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi ston pa 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
279b4(phal chen): thams cad rgyan rnams pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo//rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba
279b5(phal chen): yod/des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dge'i gnasu bdugs na/zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba dri shes
279b6(phal chen): su zad na/kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/srid pa'i la
279b7(phal chen): byi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang /gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul
280a1(phal chen): can/sgrub pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa/kun gzhi'i gnas
280a2(phal chen): thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/yon tan brjod po 'am/tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i
280a3(phal chen): sgo yongasu spyos pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa 'am/gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi rgyud bstan byar nus de snun/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs
280a4(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod/de na monyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i drung du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang
280a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/spros 'chang gi tshong dpon long spyod ud
280a6(phal chen): pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyug 'tshal nas/spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pal la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang da
280a7(phal chen): yang bltas te/spos 'a tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod yud pa la'i drung nas songango //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug
280b1(phal chen): pa'i tshe/lam gyi gyen thur dang /lam mnyam pa dang /lam gyi thag thug dang /lam rdul yod pa dang /lam rdul med pa dang /lam bde ba dang /lam mi bde ba dang /lam dog pa dang /
280b2(phal chen): lam gegs med pa dang /lam 'khyug pa dang /lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par spyad/bltas nas 'di snyam du bsam so//'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni//
280b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyuraro//pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro//sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur//sems
280b4(phal chen): can thams cad byams sdang dang /mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang /sems can thaMthad
280b5(phal chen): kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi mi dag pa'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang /tsher ma dang /gyo mo dang /gseg ma bsal ba dang /chos kyi dbyings
280b6(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa lnga gzhol bar bya ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos tha~Md kyi/
280b7(phal chen): 'byung gnas//dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag luso zhes/de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs
281a1(phal chen): bder phyin nas/mnyan pa dpa' bo nga rbad cang tsha la tshol ba las/grong khyer chen po nag chen pa'i ngogs na mnyan padapa' dri rgong ba
281a2(phal chen): phrag stong tsam dang /sreg chags brgya stong du sa gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dod pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing /rgya mtsho'i gtam yongasu brjod pas/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
281a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong //mthang nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' ba gang na ba dar song ste phyin nas/mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
281a4(phal chen): tote/mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste thul mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smra so//'phags pa 'dag
281a5(phal chen): gis bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa lo bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba
281a6(phal chen): ma 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa mdzad//zhes bdag gis thos ni/'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
281a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar blan med pa yang dag par
281b1(phal chen): /par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ye shes chen po 'thab par 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dri ba dang /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /thams cad mkhyen pa
281b2(phal chen): nyid kyi gling gi gnasu 'gro ba 'byung po'i rgyu dang /dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'dzegs pa dang bral bar 'gyur
281b3(phal chen): ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /zhi ba'i tingange 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thad du
281b4(phal chen): 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyod po'i gzi brjid
281b5(phal chen): kyi dba' rlabs kyis/rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang /rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /chos kyi phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyi
281b6(phal chen): mAma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang /rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legaso
281b7(phal chen): leg so//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsha'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongasu sbyong zhing gnas te/rigs
282a1(phal chen): /hU~M bu kho ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod/de dag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//
282a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongasu bsgre bar bya'o//chos kyi long spyod kyis de dag yongasu tshim par bya'o//de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya/
282a3(phal chen): shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'i//dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongasu spel bar bya'o//byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o//byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o//snying
282a4(phal chen): rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o//'khor ba'i spyod pas yongasu mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o//sems can gyi
282a5(phal chen): mcho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o//yan tan rgya mtsho sbyinan rten gyi sgo la dgod par gyur//'di dag lo chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o//sangs rgyas rgya
282a6(phal chen): mtsho thams cad kyang 'di drug gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang /yid la spyod pal
282a7(phal chen): brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnaso//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang /bde bar brtson pas rgya mtshachen pa'i chen po
282b1(phal chen): che'i gling thams cad kyang shes//rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang /rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu sheso//klu'i gnas thams cad
282b2(phal chen): dang /klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang /gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang /srin po'i gnas thams cad dang /srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad
282b3(phal chen): rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad dang /'byung ba'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/klong yod pa thams cad dang /klong thams cad bkol ba dang /dpa'
282b4(phal chen): rlubs chen po yongasu srungs pa dang /chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu she so//gnyi zla dang /gza' skur gyi tshogs yongasu 'khor ba dang /nyin zhag dang /skad cig dang /yud
282b5(phal chen): tsam dang /thang gcig kyang rab tu sheso//phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang /bde mi bde dang /gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang /gru bzung ba dang /gru phul ba dang /
282b6(phal chen): rlung brdo ba dang /rlung bskyed pa dang /gru bsgyur zhing /bzlog pa dang /gru nad pa dang /gru gtang ba'ang rab tu shrIso//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/rtag tu
282b7(phal chen): sems can gyi donadang dgos pa byed/tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nyi zhor mi 'gyur la/mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang /spro ba bskyed cing
283a1(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /phyur
283a2(phal chen): yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang /rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang thob pa 'am/nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /so ni gang
283a3(phal chen): gisna kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyu ro//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i
283a4(phal chen): ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro//sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo//sems can thad
283a5(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro//zhing
283a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyuraro//phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyu ro//'gro ba thams
283a7(phal chen): cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rje su'ang 'brang bar 'gyuraro//'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang
283b1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur//rigs kyi bu kha bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang /zlas pa dang /'grogs pa dang /rnaMs dran pa'i chu klung glo dbyu stan na/
283b2(phal chen): ba da na/ba rgyu chu bsams da' 'khor bya'i rlo ma rgya thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/rkyen mangs pa'i rgyas rna khrims kya gis pa med pa
283b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba 'gro brgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yong su spyod
283b4(phal chen): nga'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsha dang 'grogs pa/sems can gyi mngon byar chags pa'i rgya mtsho dri rab tu sgrub pa/dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad pa
283b5(phal chen): rnamabyar spyod pa/'gro ba rgya mdzo tham sna ts+tshed myong su sbyin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/'gro ba rgya mtsha thams cu kyi 'dul ba'i dbus las mi 'de' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'chi/
283b6(phal chen): brjod par drub ra skrun/song rigs kyi bu phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod/de ni tshong dpon rgyal ba dam bya zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du
283b7(phal chen): dzi ster byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/mnyan pa dpa'i ngo'i
284a1(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/mnyan pa dpa' bo la ldan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/yang dang yang bltas nas/gdong
284a2(phal chen): mchims bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyon blta bas ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ////bam po dgu bcu bdun pa//de nas
284a3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyud can
284a4(phal chen): bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bstsal pa/nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang /mun pa dang /dri ma dang /'dam thams cad dang bral ba/chos mnyam pa nyid khong
284a5(phal chen): du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/dge bu'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i
284a6(phal chen): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byung ba/rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa shes rab kyi nyi ma'i
284a7(phal chen): 'od gzer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus par bskul pa/thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blabs pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/smon lam chen po'i rgya
284b1(phal chen): mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang 'thun pa/chos kyi dbyings thams cad thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gongs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thog
284b2(phal chen): pamed par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/tshong dpon rgyal ba'i dam pa yongasu rmed
284b3(phal chen): cing tshol tshol ba la/grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab gcig na/shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/khyim
284b4(phal chen): bdag stong phrag du ma zhigis bskor te/grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongasu bgro zhing de las brten te/bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang /yongasu 'dzin pa thaMd yongs
284b5(phal chen): gtang ba dang /dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang /srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang /lta ba'i rnam
284b6(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang /the tsom dang /yid gnyis dang /nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang /brag
284b7(phal chen): dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongasu sbyangs pa dang /sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang /sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs
285a1(phal chen): bskyed/sangs rgyas blta ba myos pa bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /byang chub
285a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongasu bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing /byang chub sems
285a3(phal chen): dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
285a4(phal chen): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjes chad du bsdad nas/tshong dpon rgyal ba dam po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ring mo
285a5(phal chen): zhig tu btud nas/chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod//'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
285a6(phal chen): yongasu tshol nu/ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang /bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yong su smin par bgyi ba dang /gdul
285a7(phal chen): ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal bsti ba las mi 'phang pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas
285b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyas kyi sngon gyi char songasu gzung ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad rgya chos kyi rdul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dang
285b2(phal chen): spyod pa spyad pa dang /bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yong su mi skyo ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnams par 'phrul pa yongasu 'tshal
285b3(phal chen): bor 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags
285b4(phal chen): pas bdag la bshad du gsol/de nas tshong dpon rgyal bdam pas/tshong dpon kyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par
285b5(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/
285b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs sbyong ste/de ltar kha ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing nga
285b7(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang /dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig
286a1(phal chen): rten thams cad dang /'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /bdud kyi gnas tha~Md dang //
286a2(phal chen): 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i risu gtogs pa thams cad dang /lha'i gnas thams cad dang /klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /klu'i gnas thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi 'jig
286a3(phal chen): rten thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang /srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /srin po'i gnas thams cad dang /grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /grul
286a4(phal chen): bum gyi gnas thams cad dang /yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang /dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /dri za'i gnas thams cad dang /
286a5(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang /nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang /na mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang /mi 'am
286a6(phal chen): ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang /lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang /mi'i 'jig rten
286a7(phal chen): thams cad dang /mi'i gnas thams cad dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i pho brangs 'khor dang /'dod pa'i khams su
286b1(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du nas ni ston to//chos ma yin pa ni bzlog/cod pa ni zhi bar byed//'thub pa ni rnam par zlog/'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed//g.yul
286b2(phal chen): du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog go/shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byedado//mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to//bcing pa thams cad ni yongasu gcod //btson ra thams cad ni mngon
286b3(phal chen): par 'dra'o//'jigs pa rnam par bzlog/mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod//srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog/ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas
286b4(phal chen): logs par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /zhe gcod pa dang /tshig kyi la ba dang /chags sems dang /gnod sems dang /logs par lta ba las ni
286b5(phal chen): sems can rnam par zlog/mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'jug/dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug/sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob du 'dzud de/
286b6(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /sems can yongasu smon par bya ba dang /zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir
286b7(phal chen): rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i
287a1(phal chen): gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to//rnam par 'god//rab tu bskyal bar byed//rjod//de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams
287a2(phal chen): kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to//stang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
287a3(phal chen): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang stan to//byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan//
287a4(phal chen): thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to//sems can dmyal ba yang ston to//sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang /sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi
287a5(phal chen): bde ba'ang ston to//byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to//byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang /byol song gi
287a6(phal chen): skye gnasu skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to//gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to//gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang
287a7(phal chen): ston to//mtho ris kyis 'jig rten yang ston to//mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' bar spyod pa dang /long spyod kyang ston to//mi'i 'jig
287b1(phal chen): rten yang ston to//myi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang /mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyam su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten
287b2(phal chen): gyi chos kyang ston to//'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang /'jig rten du nub par 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi kha na mtho ba dang /'jig rten nas 'byung ba yang ston te/de yang 'di ltar byang
287b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang /'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang /srid pa'i lam gyi
287b4(phal chen): rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang /sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par bstod pa dang /sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang /'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongasu bstan pa dang /'jig
287b5(phal chen): rten 'byung ba dang /ldog pa'i bde ba dang /sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang /'gro ba thams cad gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
287b6(phal chen): chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang /las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba
287b7(phal chen): shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba/dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du
288a1(phal chen): //b+hu ba nod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'ang shes par zad na/kha bas byang chub snyo mas dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa/zhing gi dbyings thad
288a2(phal chen): du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob bya/tshigi lam dang /sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu
288a3(phal chen): go zhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/dus gsum rgyas par 'gengaso bo'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa/chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang
288a4(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsdam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
288a5(phal chen): lnga na pa'i lho yangs shing srab la yid du 'ongs pa dang ldan pa/bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ongs pa'i kha dog dang dbyib su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
288a6(phal chen): cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus lo gzhol ba/dus gsum tha~Md
288a7(phal chen): du rje su 'brangs pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/na mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod
288b1(phal chen): par nus re skanra/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i na grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod/de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhe
288b2(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
288b3(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor bya bas nas yang dang yang bltas
288b4(phal chen): te/tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas so //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul shu ma phyi mA'aM grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshol gang na ba dor song ste phyin nas/dge
288b5(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongasu tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/gang nas gang du song la di dring der/rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang /bu mo ngargya phrag du ma zhig srang dang
288b6(phal chen): lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /lom gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rje suM 'brang //skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang /bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang /rigs kyi bu 'dir/dge slong ma seng
288b7(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shong gi ra ba chen po//rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na/sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing /
289a1(phal chen): 'dug zhes bstan to//de nas tshong dpon+da gyi bu nor bzangs/bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na/bza' shing gi ra
289a2(phal chen): ba de na/shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba/khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can/'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi
289a3(phal chen): khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang /lo ma'i shing yongasu 'gebs pa zhes bya ba/gdugs kyi rnam pa dang /dbyibasu 'dug pa'i mdab mas kun nas khebs pa/baM
289a4(phal chen): DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang /me tog shing /me togi mdzod ces bya ba/rI'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna
289a5(phal chen): tshogs dang ldan pa/kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang /sus kyang mi shigs
289a6(phal chen): pa lta bu mang po dang /shing tig gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro//dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba/gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs
289a7(phal chen): par gnas pa mang po dang /rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbye bas lhar 'dug pa/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng
289b1(phal chen): ba dang /so mo do dang /rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas gyur pa mang po dang /gos
289b2(phal chen): kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang /rol mo'i shing dga' ba skyed pa zhes
289b3(phal chen): bya ba/lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang /spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par/
289b4(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ongs pa'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong /mtshe'u dang /lu ma dang /lteng ka dang /rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/phyog
289b5(phal chen): bzhi nas rin po che'i tham skas btsugs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba/gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya sAn
289b6(phal chen): po las legs par blangs pa/'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu/lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ongs pa can gyis yongasu gang ba/rin po che'i pad+mo dang
289b7(phal chen): ud pa la dang /ku mud dang /me tog pun daM ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas chu kun nas yog pa/bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs
290a1(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongasu bskor cing brgyan//
290a2(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang /rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yi du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab
290a3(phal chen): pa du mas brgyan pa/lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba/lha rdzas kyi spos dang /bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i
290a4(phal chen): dar rin po che mngon par sbyangs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/rin po che sna tshogs dang /'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/rin po che'i dril gyi dra
290a5(phal chen): ba yid du phongs zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong //rin po che'i shing drung la la ni seng
290a6(phal chen): ge'i khri/rin po che'i pad+mo snying po can bshams pa mthong //la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //la lar ni ser
290a7(phal chen): ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //la lar ni song ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bsham
290b1(phal chen): pa mthong //la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i
290b2(phal chen): pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //la lar nI seng ge'i khri rin po che'i
290b3(phal chen): rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ongs pa'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong //rin po che'i shing drung la la rA ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa
290b4(phal chen): bshams pa mthong //bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongasu gang ba mthong //bai DUr+ya
290b5(phal chen): sngon po'i dam pas spras te/rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ki tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang /gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe/mtho dman med pa rdo rje rin
290b6(phal chen): po che'i mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ngang dur dang /rma bya ba dang /khrung khrung dang /ku na la dang /ka la ping ka dang /ko ki li dang /
290b7(phal chen): 'ji ba na 'dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsen dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par
291a1(phal chen): brgyan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang /rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun tu 'bab pa/'bres pa'i nags tshal las
291a2(phal chen): kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu rtsegs ma rgyan par dkod pa'i nang nas/spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa/lha'i 'dun sa chos
291a3(phal chen): bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgyan pa/lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang /lnga ldi ku nas
291a4(phal chen): bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogasu rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas dkrigs pa/rol mo'i shing dang /rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba
291a5(phal chen): rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis/glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu
291a6(phal chen): yod du 'ong ba blang ba/lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gis kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi cher rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/rgya mtsho chen po lngar kha dog dang /mdog sna tshogasu ldan
291a7(phal chen): bas blta na gtang mi bra ba/khang pa brtsegs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa/brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/rin
291b1(phal chen): ba sna tshogs rnam par bya byas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas/kun nas bltan mdzes pa/dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten snang
291b2(phal chen): shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid
291b3(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang /byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsi
291b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pas/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gan su gyur pa'i nam kha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
291b5(phal chen): kyis/de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/tshogs pa'i bza' shing gau ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongasu grub pa/'jig rten las 'das
291b6(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/sangs rgyas la mchod cing /rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i
291b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub bo/dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/dge slong ma seng ge
292a1(phal chen): de rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs smrar byas pa dang /rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas tha/
292a2(phal chen): dang thun mongs ma yin pa/mu skyegs can dang /nges kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi'i phrogs pa/bdud kyi lam yongasu rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/byis pa so so'i skye ba thams
292a3(phal chen): cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste/shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang /dge slong ma seng ga rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa/sgyid lam
292a4(phal chen): kwi b+he/dbang bzhi pa/ping shi ba rab tu dben pa/dbang po rtul ba/klung bltar shin tu dul ba/mtsho ltar dngas zhings gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/rin po che'i rgyul
292a5(phal chen): pa ying bzhin gyi nar bu ltar 'dang po thams cad sgrub pa/pad+ma la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang /spyi g.yeng ba med pa/mi 'jan
292a6(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po ltar mi sprul pa/tshul khrims rnam par dag pas/yid du 'ong ba'i blos kyi rgyal ba ltar 'gru ba'i sems tshim pa da pa/kha ba tshan ngan sna
292a7(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/sman gyi rgyal po bltar na bzangs pa ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na yodas
292b1(phal chen): de bzhir gshegs pa'i 'od lhor las dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi kun nam ldang ba dang bral ba/rin po che'i
292b2(phal chen): rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dngas par byed pa/zhing gsha ni ba ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par
292b3(phal chen): mthong //'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po las sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ri su gtogs pa'i
292b4(phal chen): lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi ba pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la
292b5(phal chen): la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ri su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/
292b6(phal chen): gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa/gzhan 'phrul dbong byed kyi lha'i bu/lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang
292b7(phal chen): bcas pa dag 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
293a1(phal chen): bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu/lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
293a2(phal chen): 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bsnyen pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la ba nid+ha
293a3(phal chen): rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ri su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi
293a4(phal chen): sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzad kyi klong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa lha'i bu/lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa
293a5(phal chen): rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo rgyun mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dgu par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin
293a6(phal chen): la sogs pa/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ri su gtogs po'i lha'i bu/lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes
293a7(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs chen mtshol sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od nga rgyab dang /dga' bo dang /banyen dga' bo dang /yid du
293b1(phal chen): /'ong ba dang /shugs ldan dang /ma dros pa la sogs pa/klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma sang+ge rnam par bsgyings dus
293b2(phal chen): tshun gyi sgra sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /yul gyi 'od kyi rgyuni ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/rgyal po chen po ngal bas po la sogs pa/gnod sbyin gyi
293b3(phal chen): dbang po/gnod sbyin gyi bu ma dang /gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la spyod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
293b4(phal chen): skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa//dri za mang po dri za'i bu ma dang /dri za'i byis par 'khor dang
293b5(phal chen): bcos pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma sing+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la
293b6(phal chen): ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi
293b7(phal chen): sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa shes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la nin mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs
294a1(phal chen): pA/nA mkha' lding gi dbang po/na mkha' lding gi mu mo dang /na mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma saing+ge rnam
294a2(phal chen): par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgro srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la sogs pa mi
294a3(phal chen): 'am ci'i dbang po/mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang /mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi
294a4(phal chen): spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa/lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang /lto 'phye chen
294a5(phal chen): po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcag pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ///
294a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi bro khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya/
294a7(phal chen): ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i rgyal po la sogs pa/srin po'i dbang po/srin po'i bu mo dang /srin po'i//
294b1(phal chen): byis pa'i 'khor dang brkus pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma song ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la lan
294b2(phal chen): sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgra ye shes khyod par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan
294b3(phal chen): pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma sang+ge rnam par bti/nges pas/chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
294b4(phal chen): chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la l+ya ni/sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/
294b5(phal chen): tinge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgra zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing /dge
294b6(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi ston la la la ni/byang chub sems
294b7(phal chen): dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnos pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong mo seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bston pa mcho'o/
295a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ti 'dzin gyi sgo
295a2(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing //dge slong ma seng ge rnam
295a3(phal chen): par bsgyings pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpas lnga pa
295a4(phal chen): la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan lel
295a5(phal chen): la ni/byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings bas/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par
295a6(phal chen): bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun
295a7(phal chen): nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par byed
295b1(phal chen): pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyingasu lus shin tu rnam par phye ba phul zhes bya ba yang dgu par bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa/
295b2(phal chen): rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma song gi rnam par bsgyings pas//chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas kyis bstan pa zhes bya ba yang dag por bstan pa mthong //'khor gyi stan la la lani/
295b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
295b4(phal chen): mthong //'khor gyi stan la la la ni/lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing /dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyun ces bya ba yang dag pa
295b5(phal chen): bstan pa mthong //de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang /sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongasu smin pa rnam par
295b6(phal chen): 'dul ba/snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing /'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/bsam pa tha dad pa/mos pa mi mtshungs pa/bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar
295b7(phal chen): gyur pa/dang pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ci nas kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta
296a1(phal chen): de ltar chos bstan pa mthong //de ci'i phyir zhe na/da ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des/kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang /sangs
296a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang /sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang /'gro
296a3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang /khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang /chos kyi dbyings
296a4(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang /sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang /kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrubs pa'i snying po la sogs pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs myed
296a5(phal chen): pa non pa'i phyir te/bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang /chos
296a6(phal chen): mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang /sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la shin tu bkod pa nas//bla na med pa yang dag byar
296a7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha sta go/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs//
296b1(phal chen): pa dang /nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang /gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang /'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang /long skyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /mal cha phun sum tshogs pa
296b2(phal chen): dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa
296b3(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos/sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas//
296b4(phal chen): bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/da ni g.yas phyogasu bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig du bya'o snyam pa dang /de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/
296b5(phal chen): bzang shing gi ra ba dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par bya'o//de ltar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas/skor ba byed pa'i
296b6(phal chen): tshe/'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas/mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso//'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
296b7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags ma ni byang
297a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis zos na/'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i//
297a2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bsha du gsol/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar po/rlom sems thaMd
297a3(phal chen): yongasu bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o//smras pa/'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/rlom sems thams cad yongasu bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/smras pa/rig
297a4(phal chen): myi bu de na ye shes snang ba ste/dus gasbyim du byung ba'i rgyun sems skad cig cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhino//skyes pa/'phag su ma ni ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji ltan
297a5(phal chen): zhig mchis/smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang /yongasu sgrub pa'i tshe/chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin skyes te/ting 'dzin de thob mjug
297a6(phal chen): tu yid kyi de bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thaMng
297a7(phal chen): re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu bre ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i
297b1(phal chen): phyir 'gro ste/'dra ltar lha'i lus dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa'i dbang du
297b2(phal chen): lus me tog gi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /spos kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /bdug spos kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /'phreng ba'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /byug pa'i sprin yongasu 'dzin
297b3(phal chen): pa dang /phye ma'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /na bza'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /gdugs kyi sprin yongasasu 'dzin pa dang /rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /ba dan gyi sprin yong
297b4(phal chen): 'dzin pa dang /rin po che'i lhub sgrub kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyun gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /rin po che'i gnam phol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /rin po
297b5(phal chen): che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang /rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/
297b6(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang /bltam
297b7(phal chen): ba dang /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
298a1(phal chen): rgyus shing /snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sbyor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs
298a2(phal chen): ba dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa nas/'gro ba thaMd
298a3(phal chen): kyi sems dang /bsam po yongasu tshim par mdzad nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang /yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta
298a4(phal chen): bu'i mchod pa byed cing /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o//sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de
298a5(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyuraro//sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la yang kho mo ni/shes rab kyi pha
298a6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang /rje su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis//sems can thams cad la blta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed la
298a7(phal chen): rlom sems kyang mi byed//'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/tshig lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom semasu byed pa medo//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mthos
298b1(phal chen): ste/chos kyi lus yongasu shes pas rlom semasu byed pa'ang med//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yongasasu 'dzin kyang /chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems byed pa medo//sems
298b2(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'thongs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom semasu byed pa medado//rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
298b3(phal chen): par thar pa/rlom sems thams cad yongasasu bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa la zhugs pa/chos thams cad la rlom sems
298b4(phal chen): med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lusu 'dus par ston kyang /skad cig gcig gis de bzhin
298b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa spu'i nyag ma gcig gcig
298b6(phal chen): gis sbrams shing mngon par 'phen pa/rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal ba yongasu ston pa/skad cig gcig la bskal
298b7(phal chen): pa brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes
299a1(phal chen): pa ma/don tan brjod bdunas stan/da rigs kyi bu ni blugs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul babra du/'ab/grong rgya ngon po ci'i rgyun nus bya ba ba /don btsum na
299a2(phal chen): lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dngos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgrub par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
299a3(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/dge slong ma song ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du
299a4(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas te/dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po
299a5(phal chen): des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rje su lta/sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam
299a6(phal chen): par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed//
299a7(phal chen): snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar rton/chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de pa ni rab tu
299b1(phal chen): rtog/chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yong su dag pa de'i rdzasu ni 'drang /chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od da ni shin tu gsal
299b2(phal chen): bar byed/chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bya ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dran pa
299b3(phal chen): thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar byung ba'i smon lam de ni yongasu rdzogs par byed cing /mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyun gang na ba der phyin te/bcom
299b4(phal chen): ba ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongasu tshol tshol ba dang /de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag
299b5(phal chen): 'di snyam du sems te/mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la/de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/de ltar 'khrul pa med cing /de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la/de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam
299b6(phal chen): du lha ste/de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing /de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang /ldan de yid la brel ba med cing /bsam pa zab la mngon
299b7(phal chen): bar mdzes te/rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing /sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba medade/sems byin
300a1(phal chen): log dang ldan yang mi sridado//'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongasu rgyu ba med/'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khor kyang mi sridado//'di lta bu dag ni bud med
300a2(phal chen): kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med/'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid//'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med/'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying yang mi sridado//
300a3(phal chen): 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med/mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid snyamo//gang yong bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes
300a4(phal chen): shing /ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongasu dri bar sems pa ni/khyod kyang thob par bya ba
300a5(phal chen): legs par thob pa ste/legaso leg so//khyod ni nges par sangs rgyasu smon pa'o//khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnasu bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o//khyod ni nges par sems can thaMd
300a6(phal chen): kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod ba'o//khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'dir//bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni gro
300a7(phal chen): khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas/dga' rangs ste mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing /yid
300b1(phal chen): bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der byin nas/de'i khyim cha zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus
300b2(phal chen): kur nas bskor ba/'obs spos chus gang ba/lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo dang /ud pa la dang /ku mu da dang /me tog pun da ri kas chu yongasu khebs pa/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yong
300b3(phal chen): suM gang ba/gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba/spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim pos gang ba/rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/rin po che
300b4(phal chen): thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang /gzhal med khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkris shing /ba gam+b+ha dang /rta babs dang /skar khung gi shur bu dang /zla gam dang /seng ge'i
300b5(phal chen): shing thags dang /snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/rin po che'i dgar/
300b6(phal chen): bai DUr+yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/lha rdzas kyi spros zhim po thams cad kyis/'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/a ga ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs
300b7(phal chen): pa/spos kyi byug pas 'khor ku nas byugs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis/rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas
301a1(phal chen): kun nas bka' ba/gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma
301a2(phal chen): kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyun dang ldan pa/rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred pas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dri ba snang ba mu
301a3(phal chen): med par brjod du yod pa/rin po che bye ru'i sdong po dang rdo rje dang man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/bza' shing
301a4(phal chen): gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/de na bcom pa mA lha'i bshes gnyen ma/gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/
301a5(phal chen): gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/sgra mthon 'thing du 'dug pa/lus kyi yan lag dang /nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang /mi
301a6(phal chen): thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang /gzugs dang /dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad
301a7(phal chen): kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can/rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/bzo dang gtsug lag thaMd la
301b1(phal chen): mkhas par byung ba/chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam
301b2(phal chen): par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rkyen dang lhab lhub grangs
301b3(phal chen): med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba/nor bu rin po che dam po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang /
301b4(phal chen): nor bu rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa mthun pa dang /smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du
301b5(phal chen): 'ong ba dang ldan pa/bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzad dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/des khyim de dag thams cad dang /rin po che'i gnas dang /
301b6(phal chen): gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar
301b7(phal chen): byas pa mthong ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad
302a1(phal chen): ces smraso//'phags ma bdag gis blan mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
302a2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bsti ba ma 'tshal te/'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan po mdzad zhes bya
302a3(phal chen): gis thos na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'bogs mas bdag la bstan du gsol/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni
302a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba zab ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams lha mo'i gzugs dang /kha dog dang /dgye sa dang /
302a5(phal chen): chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang /rnam par dag pas ci las mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed//de bzhin du klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
302a6(phal chen): b+h+r-ing dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gi zugs dang /kha dog dang /dbyings dang /chu keng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas
302a7(phal chen): cil mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed//sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor long sems dang ldan pa dag la mo'i drung du 'ong sa na yang /de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags
302b1(phal chen): dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/chos ston te/de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'a
302b2(phal chen): baT la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dga' ba dang /ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo//la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis
302b3(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo//la la nI lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang
302b4(phal chen): bral ba/thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjesu 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thobo//la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod
302b5(phal chen): chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob//la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis/'dod chags dang bral ba thob par
302b6(phal chen): 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yang rib tu 'thob//la la ni glul pa tsam gyis/'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sem
302b7(phal chen): dpe'i ting 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob//la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
303a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thobo//la la nI pang du khyad pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting
303a2(phal chen): 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongasu sdud cing mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob//la lo ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting
303a3(phal chen): 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob//de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang /byang chub
303a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin po/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god//smras pa 'phags ma khyod
303a5(phal chen): de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de/khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/
303a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dung zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
303a7(phal chen): sgyur ba/lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mthob par gshegs pa zhes bya ba/'jig rten du byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de/seMn
303b1(phal chen): rnams lnga thugs brtse ba'i sku don du/rgyal po'i gnas rmi bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas/sgo'i thim pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu gsos nas/
303b2(phal chen): yangs shing rgya che la/rin po che du ma las byas par ming su grub par gyur to//steng gi bar snang yang /rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan po dang /rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis
303b3(phal chen): yongasu grang ba dang /lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang /lha'i lus kyi sprini tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to//rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/tshong dpon gyi
303b4(phal chen): chung mo zhig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o//de nas kho mocho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas/khyim thab dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du
303b5(phal chen): gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig gcig pu'o//de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu ma
303b6(phal chen): bar gshegs pa'i zham 'brim na 'dug ste/des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed//rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod
303b7(phal chen): chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na kho mos byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang /ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/
304a1(phal chen): ye shes kyi sbrul la thub pa med pa d+mo dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/yon tAn+da brjod par nusA rA k+ShAnA/sod rigs kyi b+hU k+ShiM phyogs kyi rgyud 'odi nyid na/klong
304a2(phal chen): khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod/de na khyim bdag non khugs shes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khro 'phong can la mchod pa byed pa zhig
304a3(phal chen): 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
304a4(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom bai ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor
304a5(phal chen): ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas ste/bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen pa'i drung nas songo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag
304a6(phal chen): nan khug kyi khyim ga na ba der phyin nas/khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa bdag
304a7(phal chen): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan
304b1(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /rjes bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis thos na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems da 'i
304b2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba/'phags pas bdag la bsha du gsol/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu mi
304b3(phal chen): zod pa thog pa ste/rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang /sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/'jig rten gyi khams thaMd
304b4(phal chen): nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yong su mya ngan las 'das pa med//yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba mdo//yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bu med//
304b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgro 'byed 'byed pa ste/kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin//
304b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyun ces bya ba thob bo//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni tingange 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam pa gzhog ste/sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad
304b7(phal chen): par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thobo//smras pa/'phags pa ting 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/'jig rten
305a1(phal chen): /khams rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gaN+DI cachud pa/bsad skyabs 'as rba/de bzhin ga/shegs pa tham cad dang /gsod dang /log pa dang /
305a2(phal chen): sel dang /thams cad mda' ba dang /gtsug tor dang /rnam par gzigs dang /rgyal dang /rdzogs mdzad dang /grags mchog dang /pad+mo'i bral legs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa zed
305a3(phal chen): kyang /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/sa sa rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/rgyun mi ched pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs
305a4(phal chen): rgyas brgya'ang mthong //de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong //de'i 'og mo'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong //de bzhin du sang+yas bye ba dang /sabya /bye ba phrag brgyad
305a5(phal chen): sa bye ba phrag stong dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang /sangs rgyas bye bdung phyur dang /sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad thaM dad pa dang /sangs rgyas ba
305a6(phal chen): khrakhrug khrigs dang /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyu pa/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong //de'i 'gro ma'i sems kyis de
305a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed kyang mthong //de'i rig ma'i sems kyis/de banini gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
305b1(phal chen): bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung mthong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa Tug/thugs dang po bskyod dra/
305b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug/smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa 'i'ang 'jug/spyod pa rnam par dag pa la 'ang 'jug/pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad
305b3(phal chen): pala'ang 'jug/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa la'ong 'jug//bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag bra la'ang 'jug/bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi
305b4(phal chen): mthu byung ba la'ang 'jug/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jog/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug/sems can
305b5(phal chen): ying su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug/'khor kun nas 'dus pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug/'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug//chos kyi 'khor lo ba/ ba'i khyu
305b6(phal chen): gis sa byung ba la'ang 'dra'o/sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa dang /cho 'phrul la'ang 'ju'o/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par gas la bang
305b7(phal chen): ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin to//dran pas yongasu bcang so//rigs pas rab tu shes par byed//blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed gros rtogs par byed//shes rab kyis snang
306a1(phal chen): bar byed//ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas
306a2(phal chen): rgya'ang mthong //de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/de'i 'og mo'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
306a3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
306a4(phal chen): chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang /ma 'dres pa rjesu dran te yang dag par 'dzin to//dran pas yongasu bcang so//rigs pas rab tu shes par bya//blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed//
306a5(phal chen): blos rtogs par byed//shes rab kyis snang bar byed//ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di/sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
306a6(phal chen): pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
306a7(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/thams cad kyang shes shing mthong //de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug/sangs
306b1(phal chen): rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /mi zad pa dang /dad pas shes par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang /zho non pas khong du chud par bya bad
306b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /'jig rten thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang
306b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes shing khong du chud par bye'o//rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
306b4(phal chen): na bzhugs pa/gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/sems kyi skad cig gcig lnga sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong zhing sheso//de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas
306b5(phal chen): stong yang mthong ba nas/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/nam de
