306b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang /bstan pa mdzad pa dang /bstan par 'gyur/
306b7(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad kyang thos//thos nas kyang 'dzin to//dran pas yongasu bcang so//rigs pas rab tu shes par byed//blo gros kyis rnam par byed//blos rtogs par byed//shes rab kyis
307a1(phal chen): snang bar byed//rigs kyi bra la sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha du yongasu mya ngan las ni 'da' bya'o mabar byed pa'ang shes par dran/ byang chu
307a2(phal chen): sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/skad cig gi cha shas la ting 'dzin rnam pa dbye ba lce spyod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/
307a3(phal chen): pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin rdzas rtogs pa/bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas mi gnyis par
307a4(phal chen): spyo pa/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gangs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thad
307a5(phal chen): drong mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/chos kyi dbying sa thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdul dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par
307a6(phal chen): rig par byed pa'i mi shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'im/yon tan brjod par nus re kAnra/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi churgyud 'di nyid na/ri gru 'dzin ces byi ba yod de/ngar
307a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
307b1(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig ces nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis smra so//song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dbang zhig na//mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa
307b2(phal chen): yod//rin chen rgyas byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang //bza' shing ra ba rdzi de dang chu bran 'bab par ldan//ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //'gro ba rnams la phan
307b3(phal chen): pa'i don tu rnam par spong //de dag na song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po yi//yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston pa byed//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/khyim bdag nan khug
307b4(phal chen): kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/yang dang yang bltas nas/khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas
307b5(phal chen): so ////bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rje su sems shing /byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i
307b6(phal chen): mdzod de ni shes par byed/byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu dran pa'i stobs de ni rje su dran par byed/sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/sangs rgyas
307b7(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/rnam thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi ni rje su 'brang /sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dag ni 'thun par byed
308a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyun de ni khong du chud par byed/sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gri mthu phyung ba de la ni
308a2(phal chen): yid ches par byed/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing /mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du
308a3(phal chen): phyin te/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongasu rmod cing tshol tshol po las/nub phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang /mtshe'u dang /'brub chus
308a4(phal chen): mdzes par gyur pa/bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na//rin po che rdo rje'i rdo rtags shig stsal
308a5(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcas te/'dug cing /rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo rjegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/chos kyi rnam
308a6(phal chen): grongs 'gro ba thams cad yongs sdud pa'i yul byims pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong //mthong nas kyang
308a7(phal chen): dga' rangs te/mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas shing mi 'dzums pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i
308b1(phal chen): shugs dang ldan pas/soms mi 'khrugs pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen lus byung ba'i chos kyi sbyin
308b2(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/yon tan dang /nAn tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can dge ba'i be shes gnyen dang //
308b3(phal chen): phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung ning 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
308b4(phal chen): las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bzla/
308b5(phal chen): gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa yongasu ston par 'du shes pa
308b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dres pa yongasu skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang
308b7(phal chen): nab der phyin to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/tshur shog/dpe med pa'i theg
309a1(phal chen): pa chen po yangs shing /bsam gyi sa ma khyab pa la zhugs pa skye ba las byung ba'i sgrag bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing bskyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro bathod/
309a2(phal chen): yongasu bskyabs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/'jig rten thams cad las 'das ste/dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa
309a3(phal chen): snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/'gro ba thams cad yongs bsgrubs pa'i blo gros can bltan kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon tu bsdus pa/smon lam chen po'i dkyil
309a4(phal chen): 'khor yongasu sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu gzung bar mos pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsogs pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/dge
309a5(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyon gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la
309a6(phal chen): mngon du bltas pa/ting 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par bzung ba la/mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa
309a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brten pa
309b1(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzad bdag la mngon du gyur pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam
309b2(phal chen): gyi shugs gzhan la yongasu bstan pa'i bsam pa can/snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i
309b3(phal chen): /blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa leg so//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/byang chub sems dpa'i spyan res gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
309b4(phal chen): gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/thal
309b5(phal chen): mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
309b6(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis thos na//
309b7(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
310a1(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/mdog 'jam du chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'gro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin
310a2(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed
310a3(phal chen): pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag ste 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
310a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu nga ni/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/rigs kyi bu
310a5(phal chen): nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo/snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs
310a6(phal chen): pa/sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/sems can yongasu bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bor gnas pa ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
310a7(phal chen): blo//snying rje chen po'i blo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/sems can thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'ongs
310b1(phal chen): du gnas te/sbyin pas kyang sems can yongasu sdudado//ngag snyan pa dang /don bya ba dang /don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongasasu sdu //gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang /seM ni/
310b2(phal chen): yongasu smin paro byed//kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang /'od gzer gyi dra ba dgyi bas kyang /sems can rab
310b3(phal chen): tu sim par byed cing yong su smin par byed//bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang /ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongasu bstan pa dang /mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos
310b4(phal chen): bstan pa dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongasu bskul ba dang /bsam pa dang 'thun
310b5(phal chen): par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongasasu bstan pa dang /rigs sna tshogasu skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal pa 'thun pa'i gzugs yongasu bstan pa dang /gnas gcig tu 'grogs
310b6(phal chen): pas kyang /sems can yongasu bsdus shing yongasasu smin par byed//rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo/snying rje chen po'i sgro thogs pa med pa 'di yongasu sbyangs
310b7(phal chen): pas/'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed/'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jig pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya bo dang
311a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sems can thams cad kyis bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongasu cad pa dang /seMn
311a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang /sems can thams cad
311a3(phal chen): kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa los yongasu badra ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs
311a4(phal chen): pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang /
311a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang /sems
311a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi skul ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shan+ti tu bsal ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang /sems
311a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /sems can tha~Md
311b1(phal chen): sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongasasu bzla ba'i phyir/'gro ba thams cad
311b2(phal chen): rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas//sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjesu dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlab so//sa
311b3(phal chen): thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang /'jig rten du rnam par dmigs pa ro byaso//dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par
311b4(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlab so//rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs
311b5(phal chen): po las yongasu bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byeda'o//rigs kyi bu//
311b6(phal chen): ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo/snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon
311b7(phal chen): lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyu dang ldan
312a1(phal chen): gabyang na seMnas dang nga dzin na na ga/ byas slad du nanan gang rgyun rgyam rnan nga /
312a2(phal chen): ldan pa/dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling yongasu 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad kyi
312a3(phal chen): dge ba'i sims rnam par ni ba byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pr-I/sems chen thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yong su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun la
312a4(phal chen): phyir rdzo bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ljon pa de dag gi sbyong pa shes pa 'am/tshon tan brjod par nus skrun/de la 'di skad ceste d+ha'o//g.yas kyog pu Sh+TAn ra ba byas te gus par
312a5(phal chen): g+hu g+ho n+ya/nod rjong sa shin tu dul bye phyogs rgyud tu song//spyan ngas gzigs dbang dring srong snyi rje ma spyad pa//rin chen+d+ra r-i'is ldan gnas par des kyang mthong //rin nas
312a6(phal chen): phyogs na stod nu/'i snying po'i ming la gan pa jug/s+yA dang nA min k+Sha dang srin pa ma ba'i rdzas kyi d+mo cing des chos kyang ston//
312a7(phal chen): ning ba mi dga' tsho mi byas par gyur//rkyen tu yon rgya 'i rnyeng ba'i rgyu la na sa/tsanas nga ba'i spyod pa dadag gis ba 'byung ba /
312b1(phal chen): rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol//bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brgyad ste//'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab rton pas//nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sen
312b2(phal chen): rnam dog pa//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras//sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gci ga sgo shes//ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes stug/'gro ba
312b3(phal chen): thams cad bskyob cing yongasu bsdu phyir byung //kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu//'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob//gang rnams dam du bcings shing
312b4(phal chen): dgra lag phyin pa dang //lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang //nga yi ming thos bcing shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur//rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsang spangs
312b5(phal chen): pa//de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na//mda' 'phangs de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur te//mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur//dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang
312b6(phal chen): gang rnams rtsod gyur pa//dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur//grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur//nga yi ming drin de dag thub pa med
312b7(phal chen): par 'gyur//gang gis nga yi ming ni rjesu dran byas pa//de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te//seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang
313a1(phal chen): dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur//grang rnams la las nga'i ming zhig dran byas na//sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ljongasu bor gyur/
313a2(phal chen): tama?//sol ma dag lci med rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang //me rnams pad+mos gang pa'i chu'i gter du 'gyur//nga yi ming ni skrod 'ga' yud tsam d+he su dran na//rgya mtsho'i chur bor
313a3(phal chen): de'i nang du 'chir mi 'gyur//chu bos mi khyer me'i dbusu 'tshig mi 'gyur//don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur//shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin
313a4(phal chen): ltung rnams dang //brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang //smyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang smra phab rnam pa las//nga'i ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob//gang
313a5(phal chen): rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang //gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan rjod pa'i rnams//nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par rjod par 'gyur//mthong ba tsam gyis
313a6(phal chen): mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye//nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dAn byas ni//gnod pa'i don du ro langs spags dang byad byed pa'i//dkra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par
313a7(phal chen): 'gyur//ma lus dug gis de'i lus la mi tshugaso//la las gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na//klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang //grul bum srul po
313b1(phal chen): 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang //mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur//nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang //pa dang ma dang gnyen gshes mdza' ba///
313b2(phal chen): kun dang yang //'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min//nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngosu mi 'gyuraro//nga ye ming gis rjesu la la dran byed na//'di nas shi 'phos
313b3(phal chen): mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste//byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnasu min//sems can dag pa lha dang mi'i gan su skye//nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na//dmus long
313b4(phal chen): zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te//thed pa long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta skyug 'gyur//bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por kun ldan 'gyur//la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na//
313b5(phal chen): sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu'i//'jig rten kham su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bor 'gyur//sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur//'di dang
313b6(phal chen): de bzhin gzhan drag thabs mang ji snyed kyis//'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nub//sangs rgyas sras phro ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom ste//yon tan can gyi yon tan
313b7(phal chen): thams cad ngas mi shes//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba/shar phyogs nos na mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs ste mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor
314a1(phal chen): yug gi rje mor 'dug/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas//mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag tu/
314a2(phal chen): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des/nyi ma dang zla
314a3(phal chen): ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /sgyu ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /
314a4(phal chen): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /me dang /rin po che dang /glog dang /skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus bkye ste/sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang
314a5(phal chen): snang bar byos//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin d+he'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas ste/dran song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o//
314a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyam su mi gnong par gyur to//mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang /sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi 'ongs thams cad
314a7(phal chen): du'ang /rin po che'i sprin gyi tsher bab ste/me tog dang /spros dang /bdug pa dang /'phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdan
314b1(phal chen): kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song //de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan no/sems can zad rgyu
314b2(phal chen): gnas snang ba ste/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang //
314b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba
314b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/smras pa/'phags pa mthong //smras pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems
314b5(phal chen): dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi
314b6(phal chen): dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' spyan res gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya snying du mar ga pas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/byang chub sems dpa
314b7(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nos song //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang ba'i ye shes kyi gtong ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/spyan
315a1(phal chen): rdzug/dmug gas kyi dbang blo sa kyang mngams bzhin du bsgo bo dang mo 'gal bar byang chub sa nga gzhan du 'grob gdun par nga nga /myu du
315a2(phal chen): snyoms dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste thul mo sbyar nas 'di skad rjes smra'o//'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dge bar
315a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byad chub ti sems de byud na/dziH/ byang chub sems dpas/byang chub ste mis ng+ge pa'i spyod ba liM bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du dgyi 'tshal te/'phags
315a4(phal chen): ba ni drung chub sem pa dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzod zhes bdag gis thas ni/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
315a5(phal chen): /dz+dza m+b+ha n+na tu du rtsi ba phags pas byung ga le 'i gdug /de sa pa/rigs kyi bung ni byung chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar po'i TIkun tu 'gro bshA 'o//rma /
315a6(phal chen): dri bzhin ga shig sa pa gang gigab kyi d+d+ha n+yAs/d+hI chub sems d+ma'i rna pa d+ha smin tu 'grozugs pakyi buM 'di nas/'dzu da kyi khams 'di ji da cig
315a7(phal chen): tshig 'a nyi ma mas ngan pa'i myod sa ni khyod cig log sa rgyas pa/gas kyi basbyin pa 'di /skye nga me nga shu ma yi du phyis pa'i mi gtan dang /de spyong nga
315b1(phal chen): pa'i skye dbus kyang shes par dga' ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/de ni rigs kyi
315b2(phal chen): bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu ma zin pa/sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/dge bo'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/shes rab kyi mig
315b3(phal chen): dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis thos pa 'am/yongasu gzung ba 'am/yid ches pa 'am/khong du chud par bya bar mi nus//smras pa/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dad pa dang /
315b4(phal chen): mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi sprul tam/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun
315b5(phal chen): nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas/ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu
315b6(phal chen): 'gro ba 'di thobo//rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas du song nas ni/bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig
315b7(phal chen): 'das te/sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang goms/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bo ro//gom pa re ris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
316a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ongs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan das
316a2(phal chen): dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs par mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/byang chub sems dpa'i
316a3(phal chen): dga' ba yongs bskyed pas mthong ba byaso//'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'ang
316a4(phal chen): khong du chud//de dog thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo dang yongasu shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji ltar zhin du gzugs kyi lus yongasu bstan to//chos kyi dbyings rab tu bsgrag so//
316a5(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu bkye'o//yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar bsdud//rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/de ni yong su smin par bya ba dang
316a6(phal chen): gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyan mi 'chad pa'i phyir/shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs
316a7(phal chen): mchims dang //lho nu kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhon te/rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun
316b1(phal chen): tudagro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na//ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kun tu mngon par gnol ba tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par go/
316b2(phal chen): po/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /mas pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thun par spyod pa/zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gangs pa/chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjesu song ba/dus gsum gyi
316b3(phal chen): rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/chos kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par
316b4(phal chen): rtog pa med pa/chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khang du chud pa/gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan/song
316b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid ni/grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod/de ni lha lha chen po zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub
316b6(phal chen): sems dba'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tetan du byA bo dris shig/de nas tsho de dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/byang chub sems dpa'o gnan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyi
316b7(phal chen): la spyi ngos phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stang du mar g.ya su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang blta ste/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro
317a1(phal chen): ba'i drung nas stong //de nas chung dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byung chub sems papa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i dzas song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/byang chub sems
317a2(phal chen): dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i mi shes kyi ltung yul 'dod pa'i dang tshul can mngon por shes pa chen po/mngon par bsgrubs pa'i tshul la yon tan gyi byed par du lta ba brtson 'grus
317a3(phal chen): rte pa'i gatsho rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thub pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes sang pa'i bsam pa dang /ldan pa de/byang chub sems
317a4(phal chen): dpa'i na tan gyis la ninan tan du byed/ting 'dzin gyis lani rnam par spyod/gzungs kyis la ni rab tu gnas par byed/sman lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/tho dad pa yang dag par
317a5(phal chen): shes pa'i sal rjesu slob/skyabs kyi sa ni longs sgrub cing mthur rjes glong khyer sgra dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/Am+b+ha chen po kun tu dris pa dang /de la 'gro ba mang pos brtan
317a6(phal chen): /rigs kyi bu 'di /lUg+ha rgan bgrang khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mngon/bdag nyi shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug/de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzang
317a7(phal chen): chen po gang na bdar thong //lhag+ha chen pa'i rkang pa gnyis la skye bas phyag 'tshal to//mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa bdag gis blan
317b1(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bstod na/ngostor byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par btso ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du 'asgribs
317b2(phal chen): 'tshal te/'phags pa ni byang chub sems da rnams la ga mas ngag dang /rngas brtan pas nas bdag gis a na/dza~M/ byang chub sams dpas/byang chub sems de pa'i rgyud dul
317b3(phal chen): bsgrub pad+ma bkri ba dang /dza~M ltar nan tan du bgyi ba phags pas bdag la ba shing dru gang la/de nas kyu//chen pos lag pa'i na phyogs bzhi brgyud b+h+yo/rnamatsha chen po bzhi 'os shin
317b4(phal chen): skye ba'i shugs kyis rgya blangs te/bdag gi gdang bkrus nas/chung dpon kyi bzangs la gas ky-i k+Sha ta~Mkra gis bta te 'od sa \u0f7fsa smras//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems da
317b5(phal chen): rna ni thong ba /( b+h+ya/thos pa mad+ma ny-i /9//skyes bum chog gis ga pa 'du ga ni la gtan gyi phul du bya bzhin pan+de/dum rgyar chung du drung ba yin tu 'jig
317b6(phal chen): nAm+b+hi gan sa m+b+ha r+yA ba'o//'gro ba'i rkyen du d+hA pa'o//sems can rnams la rtswang na du byon pa'o//lam rmongs pa rnams la lam ba brtson pa'o//chos kyi tshul du gzung ba
317b7(phal chen): mthun myur bag/thams cad sbyin po'i slong stsa du byin par bye sa da dan chen porgya 'i 'di rnam du zasas/khye sa thams dpa' sems de pa'i
318a1(phal chen): rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma myed pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing /lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang /ngag gi nyes
318a2(phal chen): pa spangs pa rnams dbyings kyi snang ba yongasu gnon par byed pa dang /bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa
318a3(phal chen): yin par bsamaso//rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o//smras pa/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/sprin
318a4(phal chen): gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang /dngul gyi phung po dang /bai DUr+ya'i phung
318a5(phal chen): po dang /shel gyi phung po dang /mu swa ra gal ba'i phung po dang /a sgra gar ba'i phung po dang /nor bu rin po che dang gi snang ba'i phung po dang /nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang /
318a6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang /nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang /gtsugi nor bu rin po che dang /cod pan gyi phung po dang /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi
318a7(phal chen): se mo de'i phung po dang /dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang /rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang /gdu bu'i phung po dang /ska rags kyi phung po dang /rkang gdub kyi phung po dang /mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i pud
318b1(phal chen): po dang /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang /nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang /me tog thaMd dang /
318b2(phal chen): spos thams cad dang /bdug pa thams cad dang /phreng ba thams cad dang /byug pa thams cad dang /phye ma thams cad dang /gas thams cad dang /gdugs thams cad dang /rgyal mtshan
318b3(phal chen): thams cad dang /lha'i bu dan thams cad dang /rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang /rol mo dkol ba thams cad dang /'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang /bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag
318b4(phal chen): kyang nye bar bstan nas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu nga de dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig/de bzhin
318b5(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams la ni mchod cig/sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongasu bsdus te//gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig/'jig rten na sbyin pa la slobs
318b6(phal chen): shig/gtang bar dka' ba yongasu gtong ba ni ston cig/rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bskud pa'i ngo bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang /mi bral ba'i sems
318b7(phal chen): can tshad med pa dag gis bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongasu bsgo ba byed//sangs rgyas dang //chos dang /dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /dge ba'i
319a1(phal chen): dA rgyutan rnams pa du dran pa bru~M bad+mo /smyan mod pa yang dam par rtogs pad+mo rgyu ga d+hA dU smra ban+d+ha//phyogs dru //
319a2(phal chen): kha ba ni/sem nan 'dod pa'i dga' bas byung gdul gyi longs spyad la yang du chags pan ma la sres ng+ge gan mi g+sa par hrI sa rbA // mnan pa d+ma ga
319a3(phal chen): can dang /rgyags shing dregs pa dang /rlom pa tshor gcad pas 'dul po rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la 'dzegs pa'i lus she za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang
319a4(phal chen): ldan byer bstan te/rnam pA dang skyem sbyangs 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed//la la ts+tshan brtson 'grus pa ba'i sems can rnams la ni medang /chu dang /rgyal po de
319a5(phal chen): sbyin po dang /gno pa'i 'jigs pa yong su bstan cing sgyu byer bya skye brtson grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed/de ltang thabs de dang de dag gis/pha li d+hu sbyin pa thams
319a6(phal chen): sbyin pa da / na po mas /rigs pa dang / sa seM u dag pa na da /
319a7(phal chen): ring ba'i chos la gzung ba'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/dag pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par dgod par byed//rigs kyi
319b1(phal chen): son//byang chub sems da 'i rnam par t+tA pA sbyin b+hiR+sha ba 'dri shes par zang+ga na/khyo bos byang chub rloms dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgyu ma yin rab tu 'dzom pa
319b2(phal chen): chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbring pa'i chu sgrims pa/rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags
319b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thur ba rdo rje ltar bdag gis 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba de dgi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re skan//song sngon
319b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma gA ta'i snying po byang chub na/sa'i lha mo brten ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/
319b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du khya bi dA shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/lha rgya chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la sbyi
319b6(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/g+ha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs so bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang du bltas te/lU chen po'i drung nas song ngo //
319b7(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nir bzangs/mthar gyis yul ma~M ga te'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo portan ma gang na ba der song ba dang de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong drag bcu gcig
320a1(phal chen): lha gaN+DIg 'di skad ces 'dzir to//sems cani thams cad kyirkyen du 'gyur bya zhig ni 'di nas rgu 'ong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pr-I tsan/snyoms n+dan/
320a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo ba'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'dong //chos kyi rgyal po'i rigasu byung ba/chags pa med ning dri ma med pa'i chos
320a3(phal chen): rgyal po'i go 'phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'du nas tshur 'ong ngo //ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu
320a4(phal chen): 'dul ba zhig 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo //zhes nas de'i mod la lha mo brtan mA la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyed de/'brug sgra zag
320a5(phal chen): mo lci bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bod chen pos snang bar byas te/lus rin po chu'i rgyuni dang lhab sbyi
320a6(phal chen): kyis shin tu brgyan nas/klog gi 'phreng ba'i tshogs na mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag tu byas te/shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/
320a7(phal chen): tog gi shing thams cad ni khe 'bu bar byed/chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed/mtsho dang /mtshe'u dang / thams cad ni rgyas par byed/spos chu'i char pa ni/
320b1(phal chen): rab tu 'bab par byed/me tog sprin rab tu 'byor ba 'i rgyu chen pa ni ltung bar byu/sol spyan b+h+yo ga khrag khrog borgya spyod na 'o sgra sgrog par byed/sgyu rdzas kyi gzhal mang
320b2(phal chen): khang dang /rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ba lang dang /khyu mchog dang /glang po dang /stag dang /ring gis kyang pa ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/lha dang /
320b3(phal chen): lha ma yin dang /klu dang /'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/ri'i dbying po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ tshogs bye ba ban+d+ha spyod ni
320b4(phal chen): mngon du 'byung bar byi rnying /sgo'i 'og nas 'thon to//de nus so'i lha mo brtun mas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs
320b5(phal chen): pa legaso//sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsu ba bskyed pa yin na/de'i rnam par sbyin pa'i phyogs 'gro' tsam lta ba
320b6(phal chen): 'dod dam/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis lha spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/sa'i lha mo bar+d+ha ni pa la lan+d+ra brgyu spyod du mar g.yas
320b7(phal chen): phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//'phags mi 'tshalo//de nas sa'i lha mo brten pas rkang
321a1(phal chen): pa'i mthil gyis/sa chen po la brdabs te/rin po che'i gAter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa brtan nas 'di skad ces smras so//
321a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang /khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o//khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o//khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o//khyod kyi bsod
321a3(phal chen): nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o//khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o//'di las long ste/khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig/rigs kyi bu
321a4(phal chen): gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang /
321a5(phal chen): ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing /rtag tu srung ba la zhugs pa ste/de tshun chad du rigs kyi bu kho mo ni/
321a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do//ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go/smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do//byang chub sems
321a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang
321b1(phal chen): sems rgya chen blos rgyas par 'geng so//byang chub sems dpa' thams nad kyi stobs kyis dbang sgyur ba dang /zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dga' ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
321b2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mngon pa dang /dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad
321b3(phal chen): dang /mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang /chos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /sems can thams cad yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i tshul dang /sangs
321b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do//yang dag par 'dzin to//yang dag par nod to//rigs kyi bu byang chub
321b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal ba ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol gcig tu/'jig rten gyi khams
321b6(phal chen): zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i
321b7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod/rnam par dpyod dpyod/shin tu dpyod dpyod/yang dag par 'phel bar byed de/
322a1(phal chen): shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas/bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bAr du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo//de srid kyi bar gyis
322a2(phal chen): kho mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig
322a3(phal chen): bsnyen bkur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
322a4(phal chen): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o//rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par
322a5(phal chen): zad na/kho mos byang chub sems dpa'//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhum ring du 'brang ba/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/de
322a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang
322a7(phal chen): ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/sangs rgyas
322b1(phal chen): byung ba thams cad du rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod par
322b2(phal chen): nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu bi gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga tA zhes bya ba na/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas shes bya bo yod de/de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings
322b3(phal chen): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya
322b4(phal chen): ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/sA'i lha mo brtan pa la la nAM brgya stong du maur
322b5(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/yang dang yang bltas te/sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i
322b6(phal chen): gdamus ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can de rjes su drad par bya ba dang /byang chub sems
322b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu gom par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rjes su bsam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par
323a1(phal chen): rtse ba da la rnam par dpyad pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa
323a2(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang /byang chub sems
323a3(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyangs pa de rje su rtogs par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'bab par bya ba byed cing //
323a4(phal chen): grong khyer chen po sar skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/
323a5(phal chen): nyi ma nub nas ring po mo lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/byang chub sems dpa'i gdams dag 'thun par len pa de/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid
323a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa ye shes kyi mig kun tu blta ba'i
323a7(phal chen): yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi brlabs dang ldan pa/phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang /ye shes chen
323b1(phal chen): po snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ya/
323b2(phal chen): shes rgya mtsho 'byam klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blto ba/ye shes rkun po'i mig
323b3(phal chen): 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhal zhing bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang /mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de/grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi
323b4(phal chen): steng gi na mkha'i dbyings la//nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cod kyi pad+mo'i snying
323b5(phal chen): po can zhig la/lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/skra 'jam zhing mngal mthon thing du 'dug pa/mig dkar nug 'byes pa/gzugs bzang pa shin tu mdzes pa/
323b6(phal chen): bAlta na sdug pa/lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos dgos pa/tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
323b7(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa thogs pa/lus la rgyu skar dang /gza' dang /skar chen dang /skar ma'i tshigs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang dar gyur 'dug par mthong ngo //des sems
324a1(phal chen): can gyi khams yangs par mi khoms pa dang /ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log par ltung ba nas/sems can ji snyed cig yongasu dkrol ba de dang /
324a2(phal chen): thams cad kyang /de'i ba spu'i sbubasu chud par mthong ngo //ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang /ji snyed cig nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang
324a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par bya ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubasu chud par mthong ngo //lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa
324a4(phal chen): dang /kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thibs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang /de'i ba spu'i sbubasu chud par mthong ngo //nga ro mngon par bsgred pa
324a5(phal chen): dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongasu sbar ba ji skad cig gis yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang /de'i ba swa'i sgo
324a6(phal chen): nas rje suM brjod pa thos so//dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /bsami pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'bring bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i///
324a7(phal chen): spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang /byang chub sems da pa'i khyu mchog gi
324b1(phal chen): mthu phyung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par blta ba dang /byang chub sems
324b2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba ji snyed
324b3(phal chen): cig gis/des sems can yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang /de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo //des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de
324b4(phal chen): dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te/mgu zhing nyams bde la/tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab
324b5(phal chen): nas phyag 'tshal te/langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa
324b6(phal chen): mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/da ltar bdag
324b7(phal chen): gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag du bdag
325a1(phal chen): nyid bor ba lags na/lha mo shul gang la brten na/byang chub sems dpa'i skyobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen
325a2(phal chen): pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/de skad ces smras pa dang /mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//
325a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyam par 'dod pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams
325a4(phal chen): ngag la nan tan du byed pa leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas/gdon mi za bar bla na med
325a5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i
325a6(phal chen): chos kyi snang bas/'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams lnga byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//mi dge ba'i
325a7(phal chen): las kyi laM ma la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o//dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o//sems mnyam pa dang mi
325b1(phal chen): mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o//nyam dbyur
325b2(phal chen): gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongasu bskyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//dbang po zhum
325b3(phal chen): pa rnams la/brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o//'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la/'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam
325b4(phal chen): par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam
325b5(phal chen): la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can
325b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas/sems can gang ji snyed cig/mun nag skrag tu gyur
325b7(phal chen): pa'i nam la/mi ni nyal bar gyur/'byung po'i tshogs ni rgya bar gyur/kun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/sems can mi srun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu bar gyur//
326a1(phal chen): sprin stug po nag pos kun nas khebs par 'gyur/dung ba dang /rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/rdzi char mi bzad pas ni rab tu gtags
326a2(phal chen): par gyur/zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la/sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod de ma/thang la spyod dam
326a3(phal chen): re la spyod dam/nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam/yul gzhan na spyod dam/grong gzhan na spyod dam/phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/phyogs mtshams gzhon na spyod dam/lam
326a4(phal chen): gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/rgya mtsho la sbyong spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa 'am/thang la spyod spyod po las nyam nyes pa'am/ri la spyod spyod pa las g.yangs chen por lhung bar gyur
326a5(phal chen): pa'am/'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa laso/kha zas kyis phongs par gyur pa 'am/nagos tshal thibs por spa'i zang zing la thogs pa'am/tshul ma yin pa'i nyim nyes
326a6(phal chen): shig tu gyur tam/yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am/grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las/mi srun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa 'am/phyogs gzhan
326a7(phal chen): na spyod spyod po las 'brog rmis pa 'am/phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs po 'am/lam gzhan na spyod spyad pa las nye dor gyur kyang rung ste/rigs/
326b1(phal chen): kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de ltar bu dag la/thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabasu gyur par byed pa ste/'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sbyin nag po gtor ba dang /
326b2(phal chen): chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang /rlung mi bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang /rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang /klong gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang /phyogs
326b3(phal chen): bstan pa dang /chu'i lamo legs par dmigs pa dang /'gram bstan pa dang /rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongasu ston te/yongasu sdud pa'i gzugs
326b4(phal chen): dang ded dpon gyi gzugs dang /rta'i rgyal po rdog chen gyi gzugs dang /glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /rus sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /lha ma yin gyi rgyal
326b5(phal chen): po'i gzugs dang /na mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang mI 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /rgya mtsha'i lha'i gzugs
326b6(phal chen): dang /mnyen pa'i gzugs kyis skyeb su gyur par byed do//dge ba'i rtsa ba de yong 'ji ltar /sems can thams cad smug posngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongasu bzlog
326b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir skyabasu gyur par shog shig ces yongasu bsngo'o//thang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnag pa'i nam la/sa gzhi 'od ma dang /tshor ma dang /
327a1(phal chen): gsog ma dang /gyo mos gang ba/sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba thag thug dang mi 'dre ba'i lam ts+tshan+da/rdul dang byag dar shin tu 'thul ba/
327a2(phal chen): ji chur drag pos gtags pa/tsha ba dang /grangs pa'i sdug bsngal yod pa/sbrul dang gcan zan gyis bag tshwa ba yod pa/thong mi dang tshem po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig la/
327a3(phal chen): mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la nyi ma'i gzugs dang /zla ba'i gzugs dang /skya ring 'char ba'i gzugs dang /skad mda' chen po'i gzugs dang /glog
327a4(phal chen): gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang /rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang /rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs
327a5(phal chen): dang /lha'i gzugs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabasu gyur par byed//sems dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bskul
327a6(phal chen): ba'i phyir/sems can thams cad kyi skyabasu shog shig par bskyod do//ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas//'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi sgrog dbyung ba dang /grags
327a7(phal chen): pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang /sten pa dang /sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang /longs spyod tshal ba dang /'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang /yo byad yongasu btsal ba la brtson pa//
327b1(phal chen): /rab po na sa chugs pa da ts+tsha brtson pa dang /d+ha dang rlung ma gtong ma yod pas thogs pa dgyur d+ma dang / ba'i yodas por 'khyams bdud /ga bcwas dang /
327b2(phal chen): 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses parnaMs ma la yang /thabs sna rdzogs kyi sgo nas skyab su gyur par byed/'di ltar ri'i phug dang /bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /shing rtog nga
327b3(phal chen): babazung rnying ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /rgyu lam+b+ha dang /chu migri mngon par bslob pa dang /tsha ba dang //grang bye'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /yang dge pa'i lam bstan pa dang /
327b4(phal chen): ka la bing ki'i sgra skad bsgrag pa dang /rmya bya'i rgyal po skyed 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang sman 'byur bsdu snang ba'i gzugs dang /ri'i lha'i khyod kyi gzugs dang /ri'i phug dang /sum
327b5(phal chen): dang /stong su dag ste/sreg bsngal sna tshogs rjes gcis pa'i sem sa can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i rab ri'i rnam par bsnyil bya dang /'i gzhi mnyam par mngon pa bsgrub pas sbyangs
327b6(phal chen): gyur par byed de/sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ril spyod pa 'di dag yongasu bsgrubs pa de bzhin du/'khor ba'i dri'i yan rgyud g.yangs la gnas shing
327b7(phal chen): gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyab su yang bdag gyur par shog shig par spyod//nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod/
328a1(phal chen): shring dang shing phran 'dzings pa'i gsapa shin tu nyam nga ba dang /chu dang /rdza dang /sdong po dang /'khri shing gis lam chod pa dang /shong dang /shong drud
328a2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs po'i nang du phyin te/stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i spyad can/dran ma grub pas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /'jigs pa dang /
328a3(phal chen): dang /mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba/nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongasu ston par byed do//
328a4(phal chen): sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/sems can lta ba thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/sred pa'i dru bas 'khris par gyur pa/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs
328a5(phal chen): kyis gtses pa rnams/sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu 'grel par shog shig par bskyed//'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang ni 'thom pa rnams kyang
328a6(phal chen): thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongasu bskyed cing lam bstan te/de dag 'jigs pa med po dang /bde ba la rab tu bkod nas sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/sum
328a7(phal chen): can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thom pa/ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams/sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu dkrol te/shin tu phun sum chog
328b1(phal chen): bas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed//rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu
328b2(phal chen): las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar gyur pa rnams la yang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul le mngon par chags pa de las gyen tu skyod pa byed/sems
328b3(phal chen): kyang 'di ltar drag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen tu bskyod/gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par
328b4(phal chen): bya bar shog+sa shig par bskyed//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyi bcing bris glags pa rnams/mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas tshong bri
328b5(phal chen): nung na/khyim gyi don sna tshogs nyam su gnod pas sdug basprul bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/tshugs pa med pa'i sems
328b6(phal chen): yongasu bskyod nas/chos kyi sbyin pas yongasu bzung ste/tshim par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/sems can
328b7(phal chen): skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor bo'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen tu bskyod/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog
329a1(phal chen): shig par bstod//rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang /phyogs mtshamasar
329a2(phal chen): rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang /sbrang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/phyogs kyi lam dang
329a3(phal chen): sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang /kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te/phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongasu ston to//rgal bar 'dod pa rnams
329a4(phal chen): la ni mu steg yongasu ston to//brgyal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongasu ston to//khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongasu ston to//rnam par blta bar 'dod pa
329a5(phal chen): rnams la ni phyogs yongasu ston to//sa'i gzhi mtho ba dang dma' bo yongasu ston to//sa'i ge ni phyogs mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
329a6(phal chen): yongasu ston to//lam gyis du bya ba rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang /ljongs dang /khams dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongasu ston to//tsha ba dang /sko mi pas munar ba
329a7(phal chen): rnams la yang mtsho dang /mtsha'u dang /lu ma dang /rdzing dang /rdzing bu dang /chu klung dang /nags tshal dang /bza' shing gi rab dang /kun dga' yid 'ongs pa yongasu ston
329b1(phal chen): /sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par 'dod pa rnams la/pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang /mdza' bo dang /blon po dang /gnyen pashes dang /yid tu 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshog/
329b2(phal chen): yongasu ston te/sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sman mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gis chod pa mig ba rib kyis nyams pa/phyogs bsrud pa/lam 'khor ba rnams la/gzugs kyi
329b3(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba skye //'od byas pa de bzhin du/bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid
329b4(phal chen): kyi phyogasi la bslad pa/ma rig pa'i mun par 'thom pa/yis kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/'du shes dang sems dang lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/mi rtag
329b5(phal chen): pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/sdug bsngal ba lnga bde bar 'du shes pa/bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/bdag dang sems can
329b6(phal chen): dang /srog dang gso ba dang /gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/phung po dang khams dang /skye mched la gnas pa/rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/mi dge nga'i
329b7(phal chen): las kyi lam gyi phyog su zhugs pa/srog gcod pa ma byin par len pa/'dod pas log par g.yem pa/brdzun du smra pa/phra ma zer ba/ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/tshig kyal 'a
330a1(phal chen): bad chags soms dang ldan pa/gnod sems kyi snyoms dang ldan pa/log par lta ba can/phar mi shes pa/mur mi shes pa/dge sbyong dang bram zer mi
330a2(phal chen): shes pa/dbang po mi shes pa/skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa/log pa'i chos kyis yongasu
330a3(phal chen): 'khris pa/de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa/chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/byang chub sems dpa' la gnod
330a4(phal chen): par byed pa/theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spong bar byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod pa/snod ma skams par snying ring ba/
330a5(phal chen): gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la
330a6(phal chen): 'khrukhu ba/pho mu la log par sems pa/mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/g.yang sa chen po pa mngon par bltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i munr-i pa/shes rab
330a7(phal chen): kyi snang ba chen pos bstsal te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sa'i
330b1(phal chen): ldum yongasu ston par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /sangs rgyas kyi yo
330b2(phal chen): kyi spyod yul dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /stobs bcu yongasu grub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongasu ston
330b3(phal chen): par shog shig/yongasu bstan nas kyang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi grwan sa la rab tu dgod par shog shig par bskyed//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun
330b4(phal chen): ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/lus nyam chung ba dang /rgas pa/rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang /mgon med pa dang /phongs shing dbul ba dang /log par ltung
330b5(phal chen): dang /yul gzhan du phyin pa dang /phyogs log par zhugs pa dang /btson ra nA 'dug pa dang /chad pas bcad pa dang /nyes byung ste rgyal pos gsad par sri ba rnams kyang
330b6(phal chen): srog dang bral gyis 'jigs pa las yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir gnaso//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sems can nad pa rnams kyi nud thams cad ni/thabs thams cad kyis gso
330b7(phal chen): bar nan tan du byed//rgas pa dang /rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni/bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro dang /yo byad kyis mi phongs par yongasu sdud par byed//mgon med pa'i
331a1(phal chen): sems can rnams la mgon byed//phyongs shing dbul ba rnams ni nor dang gser gyi phung pos yongasu spyod//log par ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongasu srud //
331a2(phal chen): yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed//phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzu do//btson rnyan 'dug pa rnams ni btson ra nas zar pa'i
331a3(phal chen): byed do//chad pas bcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed//nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsang par sgri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed/sems kyang
331a4(phal chen): bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang /gnod pa sna tshogs las yongasu skyob cing mgon byed pa de bzhin du/bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi songs su
331a5(phal chen): bsdu bas yongasu bsdus te nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu dgrol bar bya'o//skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug
331a6(phal chen): bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrugs pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o//ngan song dang /log par lhung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu dgrol bar bya'o//drang //
331a7(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgong par bya'o//chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yong su bsdu bas yongasu bsdu bar bya'o//kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o//de bzhin
331b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sgra rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskul byA byu //rga shrI yongasu med pa'i dbyungs shin tu rtogs pa las rab tu dgod par bya ba bstod//rigs kyibu kho mon sems/
331b2(phal chen): can lag pa'i la mo la zhugs pa lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/log par rtog pa'i spyod yul can lus dang ngag dong yid kyi las nyam nga bar 'gyur ba la
331b3(phal chen): yongasu spyod pa/brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su 'du shes
331b4(phal chen): pa/lus gdung ba dang /yongasu gdung ba la rab tu brtson pA/mtsho dang /'tshe'u dang /lu ma dang /rdzing bu dang /chu klung dang /ri'i gzeng dang /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams la
331b5(phal chen): 'dud cing phyag 'tshalwa ba la mos pa/sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang /thabs sde tshogs kyis ma gon du gyur par byed/de dag sdig po'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
331b6(phal chen): ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam lces rnam par bzlog gro/'jig rten pa'i yang dag par blta ba la rab tu bkod cing /lha dang mI'i phun sum tshogs pa la
331b7(phal chen): yang yongasu 'god//sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang sdug bsngal las yongasu bkrol ba de bzhin du/bdag gis son
332a1(phal chen): thams cad kyang /'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/kun tu bzang
332a2(phal chen): po'i smon lam chen pos/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du/byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo ba
332a3(phal chen): bya bar bskyed//de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpying dang ldan pas/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i
332a4(phal chen): chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di brnyan te/bstan par bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/tshong dpon
332a5(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs la/tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras//gti mug ma rig mun nag bsngal don du//sems can phan phyir kho mo chos ston te/dus la bsdang cing 'gro ba
332a6(phal chen): bde bar byas//'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin//khro mos byam su yangs shin tu skyed pa byas//bskal pa mtha' yas sngon chang shin tu bsgoms//des ni 'dzi
332a7(phal chen): rten rgyas bkang snang bar byed//nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis//kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshang med de/'di las dris gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung //
332b1(phal chen): de ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed//nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'dri shes par gyis//'jig rten bde mngon par bsgrub pa dang //ma byas 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon bsgrub cing /
332b2(phal chen): des ni kho mo dga' mgur rangs par byed//rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis//sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongasu sbyong byed cing //nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang //
332b3(phal chen): 'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis//rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis//kha mo'i mug ni rgya che yongasu dag/des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong //zhing //
332b4(phal chen): dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams//byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs par mthong //sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongasu brgyan cing //'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de//
332b5(phal chen): ba spu kun nas 'od gzer mong 'gyed pa'i//sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong //zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams//shrI 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong //
332b6(phal chen): byis pa de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtshon//'khor zhing ra rang las kyang myong bar byed//kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste//der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongasu 'du//'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad
332b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag/kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongasu 'dzin//dbyangs kyi yan log sgra skad thams cad kyis//dang zla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te//des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu
333a1(phal chen): skor//de dag khams thos shing dran pas 'dzin//kho mo'i sna'i mthu yongs su blangs rnam dag ste/chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med//rnam thar gnas
333a2(phal chen): rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i//tshul ni rgyu la sras khyod kyis shes par gyis//kho mo'i lce ni rgya tshe rab tu yangs//sgrub cing mdog do myur rin chen 'od du dag/sems can bsam
333a3(phal chen): pa ci bzhin des shes byed//rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis//kho mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste/dus gsuM kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas//gzugs lus seMn/
333a4(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin te//de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong //kho mo'i sems ni chags mang zag pa med//sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin tu//de'i longasu mi mchog
333a5(phal chen): kun chud kyang //de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med//zhing gri dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab//de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes//de dag dbang po bsam pa rab
333a6(phal chen): shes kyang //de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med//kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu gru'o//des ni bskaM yas ning yang rab tu spyod//lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de zhin te/
333a7(phal chen): des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul//kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongasu dag/kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mo dzod//des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed//
333b1(phal chen): /'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin//kho ma'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag/des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes//'gro ba kun gyi mtshom yongasu gcod//rgyal sras khyod kyis
333b2(phal chen): tshul 'di shes par gyis//dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas//sang+yas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes//de dag smon lam pha de dra rab tu zhugs//tshul 'dri dpog ya
333b3(phal chen): rab tu rdzogs pa yin//rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong //de dag dus gsum 'jug pa'ang de bzhin te//de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong //'di ni kun tu gnas
333b4(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis//rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te//phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing //rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na//zhi ba'i chos rnams
333b5(phal chen): gsung du ldog pa ltos//de nis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyed de dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smra so//lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
333b6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus/sems can gyi don bgyi ba la ste sngon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas
333b7(phal chen): ji srid cig lags de skad ces smras pa dang /mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu sngon 'ongs pa'i dus ri rab
334a1(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba/snyed kyi bskal ba'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/de'i 'jig rten gyi
334a2(phal chen): khams ni rin chen dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/rgyal po'i ga nas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba
334a3(phal chen): yod de/rgyal po'i gnas der/rgyal po chos rab mu stegs shes bya ba chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/nges
334a4(phal chen): sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyal bar byas nas/bde bar gnas par byaso//rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo//chos kyi tha
334a5(phal chen): gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/de srid la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rjes dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnasu phyin te nya lo//de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od
334a6(phal chen): da'i shwar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhan can/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas
334a7(phal chen): byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu me ngon par
334b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas nas/de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ched dpal 'byung ba thams cad ni 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to//rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od
334b2(phal chen): ces bya ba de na/mtshan mo'i lham zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/de rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sang
334b3(phal chen): par byas te/'di skad ces smra so//'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig/nags tshul chen po zhi bo'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa/chos thams cad rab tu sgrog/
334b4(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso//de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa
334b5(phal chen): dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam rgya cher bshad//rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de yang /de bzhin
334b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang
334b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dang /nyin thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro cher byeso//rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam dus pas de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun po skye 'i
335a1(phal chen): blo gros zla ba zhes b+ha ba /gzhan zhig yom sa nom du sems nA ni da ltar mi blta ste/kho ma ni nga'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyas rgya b+h+yo gros
335a2(phal chen): zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
335a3(phal chen): tshun chad du/num gang ngan 'go log par ltung bar ma skyes te/sems can dmyal bar ma yino//byol song gi skye gan su ma yino//yi dag su mA yi no//nem yang rigs
335a4(phal chen): dma' bar mi skyeso//nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to//nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/de ltar khams rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid theg/
335a5(phal chen): mi'i nang du mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral//du sa ngan par yang ma skyeso//rigs
335a6(phal chen): b+hi bu de ltar kho mas/sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/bskul pa rI rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sdig tu lam bang 'ong mnyam pa nas nye zho mang par
335a7(phal chen): byiphyin kyang /de tsam gyis khro mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongasu grub par ma gyur te/ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la nga de dag ni 'das/bskal pa bzang
335b1(phal chen): po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni/bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul phyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar/bsgral pa mya ngan med cing rdul da
335b2(phal chen): bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjing rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gyur te/de ro sangs rgyas lnga'i rgya /
335b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo//
335b4(phal chen): rgyud pa/lha dang mi'i ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyan pa
335b5(phal chen): ma par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzesra shing bzang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tu mdzes shong rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/mu tshan
335b6(phal chen): mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis/gling bzhi pa'i 'ji ga rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas/rgyal me tshan sna tshogs/
335b7(phal chen): su mtshan mo'i lha mo mgo rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang /khyim de'ang yongasu bskyed de/'od chen pos
336a1(phal chen): snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thog pa mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag
336a2(phal chen): bdun lon te/snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan to//de nas kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang /'grogs te/mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag
336a3(phal chen): pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin te//de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/de bzhin ga
336a4(phal chen): pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu/ting 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /ting 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil
336a5(phal chen): 'khor ces bya ba'ang thob par gyur to//de thob pas kyang kho mo bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snying po de dag kyang rje su dran par gyur to//kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de
336a6(phal chen): yang mngon du gyur te/de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/sems n+dan thams cad kyi mun pa
336a7(phal chen): rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to//de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
336b1(phal chen): ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing /bdag nyid kyang de dag thams
336b2(phal chen): cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par sheso//'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji skad cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang /kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/de dag gi sgra skrang rnam
336b3(phal chen): pa tha dad pa'i brda' yang rab tu sheso//sems dang bsam pa dang /dbang po dang mos pa yang rab tu sheso//sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongasu smin par
336b4(phal chen): gyur ga'ang rab tu sheso//de dag la bsom pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongasu ston to//kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig ra raM la rnam par
