336b5(phal chen): 'phel te/rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gangaso//de'i 'og ma'i
336b6(phal chen): sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengaso//de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya
336b7(phal chen): phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par dgangaso//de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med
337a1(phal chen): po'i rdul shin tu m+bu skrod kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'god so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dkun/de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag nga
337a2(phal chen): kyang kho mo'i mig la mA du snang ste/bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhadas kyi drung na 'dug par sheso//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to//
337a3(phal chen): 'dzin to//yongasu 'dzin to//nye bar 'dzin te//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /skyon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
337a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgru'o//sems can ji skad cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod
337a5(phal chen): ngag tu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/sems can de dag gri bsam pa dang /dbang po dang /mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bye brag
337a6(phal chen): tu/de dag yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste/de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig ra re la yod/chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas
337a7(phal chen): po rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'pho po//rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam pa ro selwa ba'i chos
337b1(phal chen): kyi snang bas/'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dpung med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam
337b2(phal chen): gyos byung ba/chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam klas pa 'dul ba la 'jug par dka/d+ma skur pa/byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis
337b3(phal chen): rnam par rtse ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs the mas cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
337b4(phal chen): pa thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis/yongasu dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongasu grub pa sems kyi skang cig re re la/sems can gyi khams thams cad
337b5(phal chen): yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i ye shes dbang sgyur ba/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i yis
337b6(phal chen): kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom dang /nem nung dang /
337b7(phal chen): yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyong pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
338a1(phal chen): dag pa/chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul ba yongasu ston pa la dbang bskur ba/dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la
338a2(phal chen): ye shes dbyar med pa de dag gi spyod pa shI s+t+ra pa'am/yon tan brjod pa'am/spyod yul la 'jug pa 'am/rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongasu bstan par nus re snya na
338a3(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu yul ma gra ta lo de nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bskyed pa/yang dang yang sku la stsal ba'i mtshan//
338a4(phal chen): mo'i lha mo//kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song ba ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
338a5(phal chen): dang /ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la/tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod ngo do//
338a6(phal chen): khyod su shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong //mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ci bzhin du//'jig rten kun las mngon phags 'jig rten du//phun sum tshogs sna 'jam dpal bzhin/
338a7(phal chen): du mdzes//khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste//dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog/dar ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'du ste//'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags mi
338b1(phal chen): mnga'o//lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun tu yang //khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye//skabs na zla skar rgyu skar tshogs bzhin du//sU rtswa kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong
338b2(phal chen): khyod kyi thugs yongs shin tu rnam dag ste//phyogs rnams kun kyi na mkha'i dbyingasu rgyas//der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongasu 'du//khyod lnga ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'//zhing gi
338b3(phal chen): rdul skad rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin//khyed kyi spu rtse kun nAs mya ngan 'thon pa//rgyal mang sna tshogs char pa mngon+da 'bebs shing //phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs//
338b4(phal chen): 'gro bi kun skad lus rnams mtha' yas pa//khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'o thon cing //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongasu bkang nas//sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can
338b5(phal chen): rnam par spyod//sgyu rtsa kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams//sna tshogs rgyun ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong //lham rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa//ji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun
338b6(phal chen): kyang byung //gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dgar 'gyur ba//de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho//sems can gang gi khyod kyi sku mthong ba//byang chub lamA la mngon du ltas par
338b7(phal chen): 'gyuraro//da ltar thos nas rab tu sems dga' la//mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas//bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung //khyod kyi zhal blta'i don tu chos
339a1(phal chen): par rtse//shi rnam stong gi rdul skyed dus s+ho//dI maung bskal pa brgyan tso du'o//zug tso/ yon tan logs stod cing //phyogs y-i sh+tsa d+hA/
339a2(phal chen): nam du'ang mi 'gyur//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mi dpyid dang ldan pa la tshig su bcad po de dag gis mngon par bstod nas//mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid do
339a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyi la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te//mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la//lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas na//yang dang yang bltas ste/dag pa'i
339a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya bas ma ngoms bzhin du/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i dung nas song ngo ///bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa//de nas tshing dpon gyi
339a5(phal chen): bu nor bzangs/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa/thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i/byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/byang chub sems
339a6(phal chen): dpa'i snying po yang dag par byung ba la ni rje su dbyung byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la nI yong su 'jug/byang chub sems de ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongasu sbyong /
339a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongasuM gnon/byang chub sems dpo'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rje suM 'brang
339b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par blta/'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la gzhol ba'i byang chub sems drapa'i snying rje chen pa'i sprin ni n+ya mor byed/mtshan ma
339b2(phal chen): lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod po dang /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni/zhing thams cad du bye ma'i mthar byin kyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrus
339b3(phal chen): cing /mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od grong na ba der song ste/mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'odra kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
339b4(phal chen): 'tshal te/mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri mu med pa'i 'od la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i ngo bral dri ma
339b5(phal chen): meng pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso//'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byang
339b6(phal chen): chub sems drapas/byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang /ji ltar 'byung ba dang /ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa ma 'tshal to//smras pa rigs kyi tshe ltar khyod blo na meng ba yang dag
339b7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad pa dang /'byung ba dang /yongasu 'grub pa 'dri ba leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
340a1(phal chen): ldan pa'i byang rgyub sems dper rnams/byang chu sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongasu grub pa yin te/stug na na/lats+tsha ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
340a2(phal chen): thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam pa'i blta ba'i mig rnam par dag
340a3(phal chen): pa dang /de bzhin ga shegs pa'i kha dog rgyu mtsho mthar dang dpung med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya
340a4(phal chen): tshad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis tshad kyi 'jug pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od gzur rgya mtsho/sems can thams cad dang
340a5(phal chen): mnyam pa dang /sems can sna tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang /ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi khyo dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang /
340a6(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing /sem sAn+dan la lta ba'i byin gyi brlabs la 'jug pa dang /
340a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungasams can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yon lag dang ldan pos dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi'iji lo'i sgro sgrogs pas/mang sde thams cad/
340b1(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor sa 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung mor pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsram kyis
340b2(phal chen): mi khyab pa yongasu bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jugs pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
340b3(phal chen): yongasu grub pa yin//rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/rigs kyi bu kho mos
340b4(phal chen): ni de'i mthus/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa la'ang
340b5(phal chen): 'jug/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang /ting 'dzin mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho dang sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug/
340b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa tha dad pa'ang 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tsho tshad sna tshogs dang /dbyangs kyi yon rnam
340b7(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sku la'ang 'jug ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par
341a1(phal chen): zhen pa yang med//ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bstud pa 'gags pa'i phyir/de bzhin klu shegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med
341a2(phal chen): rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na dri bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byin pa med pa'o//mi smra ba'i tshes nyid dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshibs pa de dran ni/
341a3(phal chen): mu skyes pa'o//mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mI 'gags pa'o//sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir/
341a4(phal chen): zhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o//'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyi drang bzhin gsheg pa de dag ni badz+ran pa ma yin pa'o//shing blo dang skye bo las
341a5(phal chen): rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o//chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa
341a6(phal chen): dri dag m+b+hi tig du ltung ba'o//ngag gi la ma thams cad las yongasu 'dres pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig paro//chos kyi ma
341a7(phal chen): nga bzhin gyi ma nga gas pa/de bzhi gshegs pa de dag na mam na nyid mi mngar bar//rigs kyi bri//mi ni ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ca
341b1(phal chen): chung bar byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byasam gtan zhi ba'i byede bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bAsam gtan gyi dkyil
341b2(phal chen): 'khor snang bas shin tu rgyu che dang byu //shin tu yangs par byed//khong du chud par byed//rtogs par byed//mnyam par byed//mngon par bslu'o//gzhi snyoms par byed//rab tu
341b3(phal chen): 'jug/rnam par 'phel bar bya po//nges par semaso//nye bar d+h+r-ig/dran par byed//s+yAd yul du zud //brtan par byed//snang bar byed de//rab tu brjod do//rnam par bya
341b4(phal chen): rnam par 'bying //tshogs byung //yid ches par byed//yongasu rtogs pa thams cadu rgyu ba med po'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te/sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la yang dag
341b5(phal chen): per spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/bsam gtan dang po sgom mo//yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /ye shes kyi stobs dang /mthus sems can ji ska
341b6(phal chen): yongasu bsdu pA la dga' ba'i bde bya la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgom mo//'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyom su byas//
341b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges prarwa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/bsam gtan gsum pa bsgom//sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bye ba
342a1(phal chen): byung /bsam gtan bzhi bskum//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil la bar shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /tI 'dzin rgya mtsha thams cad mngon par
342a2(phal chen): bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes
342a3(phal chen): thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/sgo kun nus chos kyi dbyings la 'jug
342a4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongasu sbyong zhing /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgo mo//rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo//
342a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa 'di skom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can yongasu sbyin par byed/'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshwa/dga' ba lnga mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi
342a6(phal chen): sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed//mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /yongasu skyo ba'i 'du shes dang /gogasu 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang /'ching ba'i 'du shes dang /srin mo'i 'du shes
342a7(phal chen): dang /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /rje med pa'i 'du shes dang /gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang /rga
342b1(phal chen): shi'i 'du shes dang /'dod pa'i yul dang /longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed/sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongasu sgrom pas/'dod pa'i dga' ba thams
342b2(phal chen): cad la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo //de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe'i chos dang 'thun pa'i dad pa yongs
342b3(phal chen): skyedado//sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed//mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang yang dag par ston to//spang ba dang 'thun pa'i
342b4(phal chen): rkyen kyang nye bar ston to//khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par 'byed //lam yang yongasu ston to//snang bas kyang mngon par byed//mun pas chod pa'ang rnam par sel to//'jigs pa'angadra med par
342b5(phal chen): byed do//rab tu byung ba la yang yang dag par bsngags par byed//sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjed do//chos kyi legs pa dang /dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang /dge ba'i bshes
342b6(phal chen): gnyen gyi legs pa rang brjod do//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed//rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing /sems can rnams kyi chos
342b7(phal chen): ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongasu rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed//tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang log par yengasu
343a1(phal chen): rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongasu rtog pa de dag dang /yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed//sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba
343a2(phal chen): dang /sdig to'i yong su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrubo//dge ba'i yongasu rtog pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /spyod pa dang
343a3(phal chen): ldan pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon pa bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang /byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos
343a4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang /lha dang me'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna chog sa yongasu skyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongasu rtogs pa skyed pa dang skyes nus kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen
343a5(phal chen): nye bar bsgrub pa byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar bsgrub pa byed/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam
343a6(phal chen): gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes par zad na/kho mos byang rgyu ba sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub
343a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs
343b1(phal chen): pathams cad ci ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang nga rab tu thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/gnas thams cadadu sgrib pa med pa'i sam
343b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/zhing rgya mtsho thams cad zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong
343b3(phal chen): bar bye ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad kyi ma rig
343b4(phal chen): pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang ba skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag gi
343b5(phal chen): spyod pa shes 'am/yon tan brjod par nus re skan/song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid nang dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol gcig na/mtshan
343b6(phal chen): mi'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/de'i gran du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/byang chub sems dpa'i lAm la brtson
343b7(phal chen): par bya ba dris shig/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri mi mang ba'i 'od kyis/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thor pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas/kun
344a1(phal chen): tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brtan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs la tshig su bcad de smras pa/dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs
344a2(phal chen): rnams//mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems ldan pa//de dag mig yongs rnam par dag par 'gyur//ngas ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong //rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med
344a3(phal chen): le bltos//mchin gyis yongasu brgyan pas shin tu mdzes//rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams//skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang bltas//byang chub
344a4(phal chen): shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rab la//bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas//chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing //'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin
344a5(phal chen): 'khor lo skor//rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi pa//gnyis meng rang bzhin med po thugs chung nos//gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis//'gro ba ma lus
344a6(phal chen): bkang zhing ston pa mdzad//sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam ma khyab//chos kyi dbyings kun yongasu rgyas bkang zhing //de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste//rgyal ba thams
344a7(phal chen): cad kun tu ston pa mdzad//zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba stod//'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku//kha dag bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas//chos//
344b1(phal chen): dbyings rgyas par skad cig re res 'gongs//rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od gzor sprin//rgya mtsho bas ma yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba//de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing /
344b2(phal chen): srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung bsel//sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad po//rgyal po'i spu'i 'khor nas yongs bton cing //chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste/
344b3(phal chen): srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel//sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa//dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho smra 'od cu na//chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad//
344b4(phal chen): srog chags byang chub bsam pa yongasu skyed//bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//'dis ni sngon chad yongasu gzung mdzad pa//de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad//zhing
344b5(phal chen): rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong //de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu byung //sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par bzhugs//mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod
344b6(phal chen): yul gzhan dang gzhan//de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus//rgyal sras dam pa thams ci de ma lus par//bde bar gshegs pa'i spu phye tsog rtse las 'byung //rnam thar ji la
344b7(phal chen): gang rnams bsam yas pa//de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus//kho mo'i mdab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di//'jig rten mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'//ming du snang ba
345a1(phal chen): /'od 'gro mr-ig+sa ces b+ha//de la byang chub spyod du rnaMs//de nas rkyong dpo gyi bu nor bAzla s+yAng+yas//mtshan mau'i lA ma kun tu zab pa'i dpal//dum med/
345a2(phal chen): pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to//mtshan mo'i lha na kun tu sgrub pa'i dpal dri ma myod pa'i 'dal//lan brgya stong du par g.yas phyog su bkor ba byas nas
345a3(phal chen): yang dang yang bltas te mtshan mo'i lha ma kun tu zab pa'i dngal dri m+b+ha mA po'i 'od kyi drung nas slong ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bo'i bshes gnyen gyi
345a4(phal chen): gdams ngag gi byin gyis brlabs pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyes pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mun pa la nang
345a5(phal chen): pa lte ba'i 'du shes kyis yongasu sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/dge ba'i bshes

345a7(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob po'i sems dang ldan pa/dge bal bshes gtan mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i yos
345b1(phal chen): ba dag tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan byung /mtshan po'i skye bo rab tu dga' du ga 'gro bar rnam par snang bya gdan dung so nga //donas mtshan ma'i sgyu mo rang tu dga' m-ismra'

345b3(phal chen): dag de'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gru ba/tshogs chen pa las byung bar pyid gyis brlang so//dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon po chen por byin zlos
345b4(phal chen): brlab so//dge ba'i bshes gi nyin gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlab so//dge bo'i ba shes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la stod cing shrIn/

352a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yo smra ston pa dang /
352a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongasu shes pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa
352b1(phal chen): dang /sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes
352b2(phal chen): yongasu ston pa dang /sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mchos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams rgya
352b3(phal chen): mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang /dbyibs dang /rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yong su ston pa dang /
352b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongasu
352b5(phal chen): ston pa byed cing de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa dang /sems dang bar byed pa dang /rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang /
352b6(phal chen): mis pa 'phel bar byed pa dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang /sems rnam par sbyong ba dang /sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang /dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang /
352b7(phal chen): mos pa'i stobs yongasu skyed pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo //pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar
353a1(phal chen): sems can yongasu smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
353a2(phal chen): mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba ni thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing
353a3(phal chen): mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang /dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongasu btadrwa ba dang /tshul
353a4(phal chen): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs pa'i thabs dang /rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang /'khor mang po dang longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongasu btang ste mngon par byung
353a5(phal chen): ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i thub pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji skad cig yod pa dang /byang
353a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji skad cig yod pa/byang chub sems dpa' yi dam brtun pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can+da
353a7(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas dang /ngan du smra ba dang /nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang /lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyam su bzod par byed pa
353b1(phal chen): sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzud pa dang /chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par
353b2(phal chen): rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu sgrub pa'i brtson
353b3(phal chen): 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod po ji snyed pa thams cad dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
353b4(phal chen): la bri rnon par bya ba dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub po rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pA dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul
353b5(phal chen): ngaji snyed cig yod pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug par ji skad cig yod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji skyed pa thams cad dang /shes rab kyi de
353b6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa nig yod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul d+hi snyed cig yod pa dang /shes rab chen
353b7(phal chen): po'i sprin yongasu 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang /shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang /shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /
354a1(phal chen): skyong ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /babs chen pa la mkhas 'tshul gyi sbyor ba skang cig yod pa dang /thubs chen po la mkhas pa yongasu dag par bya ba dang
354a2(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngan b+hi sbyor ba ji skyed pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi phu la tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang /smor lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa
354a3(phal chen): yong su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba
354a4(phal chen): ji snyed pa thams cad dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen tu gyur pa ji snyed cog yod pa
354a5(phal chen): dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji skad cig yod pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cog yod pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
354a6(phal chen): pA dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cog yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i
354a7(phal chen): ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyog pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /yis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjesu 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi
354b1(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa ji skad cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
354b2(phal chen): tshul rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rje su 'brang bar bya ba ji skad cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas
354b3(phal chen): par 'gengs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi
354b4(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongasu grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar
354b5(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang /chos yong su bsdu ba dang /chos kyi yis
354b6(phal chen): kyi rje su 'bri nga ba dang /las kyi ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /zheng gi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang /bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /dus kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang //
354b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
355a1(phal chen): sems yong su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung /
355a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi rjesu 'byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang
355a3(phal chen): chub sems dpe'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byeng ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos
355a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i cho sa gangs chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rdza su 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi yis
355a5(phal chen): rje su 'brang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gtor gyi ye shes kyi rjesu 'byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rdzu su 'brang po ji snyed cig
355a6(phal chen): yod pa drung /mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' baSh+Ti mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub snrums dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang da bung med
355a7(phal chen): pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgra re re nas mngon par 'thon te/sems can gyi lus kyi sprin khe dog sna tshogs can du mngon
355b1(phal chen): bar/chud cing sems can yongasu smon par byed pa mthong //'di lta ste/'og min+da dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /mi dros pa dang /mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i/
355b2(phal chen): lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'dzin cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang /bsod nams 'phel ba dang /sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi
355b3(phal chen): sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //dge rgyas dang /chang med dge ba dang /dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi skyon du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
355b4(phal chen): yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //kun snang dang ba dang /tshad med snang ba dang /snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //
355b5(phal chen): tshangs chen dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun+da ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi spyan du mngan par 'thon cing /sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //dbang sgyur gyi lha'i
355b6(phal chen): rgyal po/lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'o lha mo'i
355b7(phal chen): tshogs dang /lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshigs dang /lha'i
356a1(phal chen): bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus hU~M spyan tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang /
356a2(phal chen): bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byang pa mthong //lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs dang /lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i
356a3(phal chen): lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing /sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang /dri za'i bu dang /dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin+da du mngon
356a4(phal chen): par 'dzin cing /sems can yongasu sbyin par byed pa mthong ngo //grul bum gyi rgyalnga po 'phags skyes po dang /grul bum gyi bu dang /grul blam gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin dri mngo
356a5(phal chen): pa ra 'thon cing sems can+da yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang /klu'i bu dang /klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /sems can
356a6(phal chen): yongasu smin par byang ba mthong //gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po chen po ngal bso po dang /gnod sbyin gyi bu dang /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing
356a7(phal chen): bems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //mo 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang /mi 'am tse'i bya dang /ma 'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems
356b1(phal chen): can yongs smin par byeng ba mthong ngo //lto 'phyo chen po'i dbang po zla gros bzung po dang /lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang /lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'thon cing sran
356b2(phal chen): yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //na mkhar lding gi dadang po shugs drag stobs tshan dang /na mkha' lding gi bu dang /nu mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sgra ni du mngon par 'thon cing
356b3(phal chen): sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /lha ma yin gyi bu dang /lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
356b4(phal chen): yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang /gshin rje'i bu dang /gshani rje'i bu ma lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yang su smin pa
356b5(phal chen): byed pa mthong //mi'i dbang po dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu ma thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu sbyin par byed pa mthong /
356b6(phal chen): de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyung thams cad du gau togs pa'i sam+ba sna can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong //nyan thos dang
356b7(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas dang /drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo //rlung dang /rgu dang //me'i phung po'i lha lta 'i
357a1(phal chen): lus kyi sbyin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu sbyin par byed pa mthong //rgyu mtsho dang /chu klung dang /ri dang /nags tshal dang / tog dang /smad dang /
357a2(phal chen): shing dang /sa'i lha lte bu'i lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'dzin cing sems can yongasu sbyin par byed pa mthong //bza' shing gi ra ba dang /grong khyer dang /snying po byang chub dang /nyin
357a3(phal chen): bar dang /mtshan mo dang /nam mkha' dang /phyogs dang /rkang gis 'gro dang /lus kyi ri su lo togs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par
357a4(phal chen): byedapa mthong ba nas/de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'byam klas pa thams
357a5(phal chen): cad/sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/mtshan mo'i lha mra rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i
357a6(phal chen): sems thog ma bskyed de'i tshe gas la sogs pa/sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongasu bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang /
357a7(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mdab tshogs pa dang /shi 'pho dang /skye ba yongasu bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mad
357b1(phal chen): chags pa dang /lus yongasu bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mdab chags pa dang dag pa'i bshes
357b2(phal chen): gnyen gyi kun du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdo pa chags pa dang /sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gtsug tu brgyud tsong mdab chags pa dang /chos kyi
357b3(phal chen): tshig dang yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mngab chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa
357b4(phal chen): dang /ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgad cang mad ba chags pa dang /ting 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /zhing
357b5(phal chen): mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas ge cig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo mdab chags pa dang //
357b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chag
357b7(phal chen): pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sem sa can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /lha'i rna ba
358a1(phal chen): yongasu dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mang ba chags pa dang /sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta
358a2(phal chen): zhing dbyangs la 'jugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang //
358a3(phal chen): thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mang ba chags pa dang /thog ma sems can phra rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
358a4(phal chen): mdab chags pa dang /thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /thog ma dngos po med pa
358a5(phal chen): la rab tu gnas te/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs
358a6(phal chen): rgyus par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mngob chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpe'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mu ba cha gas pa dang /byang chub
358a7(phal chen): so de'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis me khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /byang chub sems de pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam
358b1(phal chen): par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
358b2(phal chen): yongasu gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mang ba chags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam
358b3(phal chen): la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nang mdab chags pa nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas
358b4(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te/sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang /yang
358b5(phal chen): dag par ston pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yongasu ston pa dang /rjesu brjod pa dang /rab tu 'byed pa dang /shin tu rga cher byed pa dang /'grang ba dang /nges par ston pa dang /rnam par
358b6(phal chen): rig par byed pa dang /nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong //la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis
358b7(phal chen): la la la ni me'i lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/la la li ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/la la le ni sa yongasu g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyis/la la le ni ri chen po phan tshul thug cing
359a1(phal chen): /'a smraT+Ta \u0f7f/lal ldanAn+ta grong khro ga sa pa'i d+hA b+hAR+thad+hA /lam+b+ha wAn ga mo nga gag tsang la nos sa dang shA byung /
359a2(phal chen): sbyin pa mthong ngo //l-i lA la ni lha'i dbyung po'i skad kyis/la lA lo ni kwa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/la lo la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbyung po'i slad kyis/la la la ni dri zla'i dbang po skad
359a3(phal chen): kyis/la la la ni zlum yin gyi dbring po'i skad kyis/la la la ni namakha'i lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/la la la ni mo'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/la lA la ni stod bye ra
359a4(phal chen): skad kyis/la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i skud kyis/la la la ni tsha sna pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/lta la la ni lha mo'i klu dbyangs kyis/la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo logs par
359a5(phal chen): blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/la lA la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyings kyis/la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skyed sna tshogs kyis/rma tshan mAM'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
359a6(phal chen): mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/sems can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyir gyis/byang dubasam
359a7(phal chen): dpa'i sgra skad sna tshogs deng /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul sku'i sprin gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rnam pa tho dang po'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/mtshan
359b1(phal chen): mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam pa sdang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/zlog ma sems bskyod pa dang bcas/yongasu byung ste grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bzlas/
359b2(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtsu ba dang bcas pa/sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs pa byung po mthong ngo //de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang /sems kyi skad
359b3(phal chen): cig re re la/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong //sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag
359b4(phal chen): kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo //sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong
359b5(phal chen): ngongo//sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du spyod pa mthong //sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang /nyan thos dang /rang
359b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo //sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang /stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshad
359b7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs kyis mthong ngo //thos rnam par dpyad zhugaso khong du chu do//nges par rtog so//rje su sheso//rjesu 'brangaso//rdza su rdzog so//mnyam pa nyid byin gyis
360a1(phal chen): brlabs te//de ni mtshon 'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba
360a2(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
360a3(phal chen): pa'i byan gyi brlabs kyi byin du brlab pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i
360a4(phal chen): phyiraro//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drug po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
360a5(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des/mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar nas/mtshan mo'i
360a6(phal chen): lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod//rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab//de la
360a7(phal chen): khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs//bsam pa ci bzhin gzugs rnams kyis//'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan//bdag med mgon med log pa yi//'du
360b1(phal chen): shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas//rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mA yis//lus dang dbang phyug stan mdzad 'gro ba 'dul//shin tu rims bral rab tu zhi//chos sku gnyis med rnam par
360b2(phal chen): dag pa mnga'//'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa//sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul//phung po khams dang skye mched la//khyod ni nam yang mi gnas mi rten te//yan
360b3(phal chen): lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang //dbang phyug yongasu bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul//phyi dang nang lasra rnam par grol//gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phags gyur kyang //
360b4(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i//gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud tu rab tu ston//khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste//nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'//'jig rten
360b5(phal chen): spos mos byis pa rnams//chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad//ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas//bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang //phyogs bcu'i
360b6(phal chen): badra gshegs mchod don du//spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed//sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul//skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugasu chud//sems can bsdu
360b7(phal chen): ba'i sbyor ba rnams//so so'i rkyen bzhin go bar bgyi bas bstan//khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag/las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing //chos kyi sgrib pa med par
361a1(phal chen): lAmra daSh+TAn+ta to//sems can kun kyang rnam par spyod pa mdzad//khyod sgra mtshan bris rnam dag kyang //kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yos//sems can bsam pa'i
361a2(phal chen): dbang tshul du//khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis//mtshan mo'i lha myo rab tu dga' mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bral//rdul dang 'dra ba'i
361a3(phal chen): tshig su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/'di skad ces smras//lha mo khyod blun med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nus ji srid cig ljags//lha mo
361a4(phal chen): khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ni//ji srid cig lags/
361a5(phal chen): donas mtshon mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangasA la tshig su bcang sgra sa pa//dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa//zhing gi
361a6(phal chen): rdul snyed de'i snga rol na//zhing ni rin chen+da mdog bride byung //de'i bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya//gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste//brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su
361a7(phal chen): gang tshad mid rin chen ri bo 'dra//gling bzhi'i bar mi bzang po rnam par bkram//rgyal po'i pho brang byi ba brgya//stong phrag bcu rnams yongasu cheng ba ste//rgyal po'i pho brang
361b1(phal chen): madrangs dga' ba//dbus na gnas pa'i spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od//drong ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa'i bdag/'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung //mtshan rab sum cu
361b2(phal chen): gnyis dang ldan//de'i lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan//pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung //gser gyi mdog bzang 'o da 'byung lus dang ldan//'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad
361b3(phal chen): du//mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengaso//de'i bu ni stong nang ste//kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan//blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang /'dzings shing yid
361b4(phal chen): gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang //btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang //lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas//de dag phan sems bang sems kyis//rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid gnas//
361b5(phal chen): rgyal po de ni sa chen de//ri dang khor yug kun gyi mtha' glas pa'i//gling bzhi phun sum tshogs pa dag/kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed //kho mo 'khor los bsgyur
361b6(phal chen): ba yi//btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus//gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'ong //dpag chod stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'grangs//nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang //rgyal po
361b7(phal chen): sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas//rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhir gyur te//kho mo lam na bde bar nyal nyal na//nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la//sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya
362a1(phal chen): mtsho byung bar gyur//de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa/phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad//rgyal ba'i 'od gzer rgya mchongs//zhing gi rdul stong
362a2(phal chen): 'jig rten khyab par gyur//rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis//phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang //sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos//rgyal ba byung zhes sgra
362a3(phal chen): yangs yongasu brjod//lha dang lha min mi dang klu//kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'//sangs rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas//sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung //
362a4(phal chen): des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas//'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan//rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang //rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmi lam
362a5(phal chen): bstan//zab me'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas//khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur//mtshan mo'i lha mo stong skyed kyang //kho mo'i steng gi bar snang mkha' gnas shing //
362a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas//kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod/lha yi blo gros btsunu mo longs//khyod kyi rgyal po'i khamasu rgyal ba skyes//bsnyil pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu//
362a7(phal chen): de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkon//kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur//'di gsal dri medo rnam dog mthong //'di bzang de ni ga las blta blta na//byang chub
362b1(phal chen): shong rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong //mtshan nyid sumacu gnyis kyis brgyan//bA g+hu na na sa 'ang gzer rgya mtshob kye//ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags//rgyal ba g.yas g.yos
362b2(phal chen): kun tu'ang de bzhin no//mthong nas kho mo rab dga' ste//de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongasu bskyed//sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yang mthong nas//kho mos smon lam shin tu rgyu
362b3(phal chen): tshun btab//kho mos rgyal po bzhi su gsol//de'i 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang //sangs rgyas 'od yang mthong gyur nas//kun kyang bde ba'i lusu gyur//rgyal po de dang lhan
362b4(phal chen): cig tu//gzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis//yongasu bskor te dpung bcas pa//rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dang //lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu re yang //kho mos rgyal
362b5(phal chen): ba de la mchod bkur byas//rin chen bdun yang yon du phul//rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol//mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin//smon lam mtsho las yongasu byung
362b6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan//kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung //bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan//mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig/de tshe snying brtser kho mos pan bstan pa//
362b7(phal chen): da 'drar gyur te myos gsal zhes//kho mos mis pa yongasu skyes par gyur//kho mo'i smon la de 'dra' sems//thig ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur//'khor ba'i rgyu
363a1(phal chen): mtsho gnas pa'i tshe//srid pa'i rgyu mtshos den TIg ma gyur//mA sa rgyas byes zla khrig la//khoms dang pa bskyed mchod pa byas//'khor ba'i lha dang
363a2(phal chen): mi dbusu//yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par skyon//rgyal ba'i dad pa dpal gyi mtsho//de'i 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste//rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal//sangs
363a3(phal chen): rgyas bzhi pa na mkha'i shes rab bo//rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog/rgyal ba drug pa tshags med zla ba'i blo//rgyal ba 'od rgyal chos kyi zla//brkyang pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang
363a4(phal chen): ba'o//rin chen 'od 'phro ri smon te//rgyal ba dgu pa de tsha byung bar gyur//bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te//de dag kho mos drang bas mchod//bcu pa de la sogaspyi pa
363a5(phal chen): dag/mi'i dbang po dge ba kun mchod de//tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i//mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur//de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba//rin tshan thaMd
363a6(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba byung //bskal pa lha'i dpal zhes bya//sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur//thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung //gnyis pa nyi mi'i sgron ma mngon par
363a7(phal chen): skyes//snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas gsum//de'i 'og tu rin tshen reng //me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron//me'i dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog/snang ba'i rgyal
363b1(phal chen): 'od rjo pa la//bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po ro//bcu po de la sogs pa dang //mi'i dbang po de dag kho ma yis//phung po'i gnas la dang dga' zhing //gnas myong chos la
363b2(phal chen): gnas kyi blos mched//de 'og de'i mtshe mos sbyor ba//'jig rten khams bzangs byung bar gyur pa ni//pad+mo'i skyon ma sbyin gyi dpal//de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya//de
363b3(phal chen): la rgyal ba tshang mang //de dag 'khor dang bcas bor kha mos mchod//rgyal ba de dag thams cad las//rimyu gro chen pos kho mos chos kyang thos//rgyal ba'i dbang po rin chen dri//
363b4(phal chen): dedo'o 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste//rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal//chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o//chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od//chos stobs 'od dang nam
363b5(phal chen): mkha'i blo glos te//chos 'dra ri bo sgo mthon dang //de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sbyin dpal//bcu po de la sogs pa dag/mi'i dam pa de dag kun mchod//rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir
363b6(phal chen): zhugs pa'i//chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur//de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs//nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya//zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste//de la bskal ba zla ba'i
363b7(phal chen): dpal byung //de la stobs bcu byung ba no//bya ba brgyang cu yongasu tshang ba ste//de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo//rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas//thog mar byung ba dri za'i
364a1(phal chen): rgyul//de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal ba te//rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ro//de'i 'og tu rin chen smya gshog so//rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od kyi rgyan//chos
364a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi badz+rI dpal//'jig rten dbang po 'od bzung dpal//kun gyi tham chos 'od rgyal po'o//bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ba gshegs de dag thams cad mchod

364a4(phal chen): ldan byung //rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o//de la sems can dag pa mang //nyon mongs dri mas nyon mong shin tu nyung //bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od//sangs
364a5(phal chen): rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan//rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/gnyis pa chags mdo storas mnga'i mtshan ldan pa//rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang //
364a6(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag/rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od //rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o//ba gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang //brgyad
364a7(phal chen): po chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste//snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang //de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o//bcu po de la sogs pa dag/mi'i dam pa de kun kho mos mchod//chos nyid na/
364b1(phal chen): mkha' mnyam pa 'di//rang bzhin yongasu kun nas dag pa ste//de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams//'brum klas kun tu spyod spyang ma dag go//de'i 'og tu medangs dga' bya'i//zhing ni spos
364b2(phal chen): sbron sprin gyi dpal zhes bya//kun nas nyon mongs yongasu dag/de'i bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya//rgyal ba bye ba de tsha byung //de dag kun gyis de tsha bsal ba brgyad//mgon
364b3(phal chen): ba de drag chos gsung ba//kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongasu bzung //rgyal ba'i dang po grangs yangs ste//chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal kha chos dbang rgyal po yin
364b4(phal chen): tan sprin//chos kyi dpal dang lha'i tsang pa no//yis 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal//rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yino//rgyal ba brgyad pa na mkha'i dbyangs//dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i
364b5(phal chen): sgren ma ste//de dag tha mya'i sangs rgyas ni//mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'ang kyi blo gros te//rgyalnga ba mi mchog de dag la//mchod pa byas kyang chags meng mo sbyangs//de'i 'og ma rgyan
364b6(phal chen): rab can//rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste//'jig rten rnam par phye ba'i mtha'//rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog/de tshe bskal pa'i snying po'i tshogs//de la sangs
364b7(phal chen): rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste//rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing //rang byung de dag thams cad kho mos mchod//thig ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor//zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun
365a1(phal chen): sum tshogs//nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag/mtshan gyi sprin skye dbyangs shes bya ba dang //chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/bsod nams ri rab zhi ba
365a2(phal chen): 'od kyi rgyal//bcu po de la sogs pa dag/rgyul ba de dag kun kyang khoms mchod//rgyal po la mA ni der sbyangs te//de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol//'on kyang dadung rgyal
365a3(phal chen): ba yi//tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob//de 'og yang 'ong 'od ldan pa//yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten khoms byung ste//zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i blo gros can//sems can nyon
365a4(phal chen): mongs nyung ba'i gnas yino//bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste//de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung //mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod//rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam
365a5(phal chen): par sbyangs//rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs//rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/lha dbang gtsug pung rin tshan gtso//gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang //
365a6(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal//de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo//bcu po de la sogs pa dang //lha dang mI gtso de dag khro mos mchod//de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung
365a7(phal chen): ba//sgrub pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste//bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya//de la sangs rjes byer khrag khrig drug/zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal//zhe'i smon
365b1(phal chen): sa // sgrum po dang //rnam narnam sa dang //sa/na ma nga / da lang ts+tsha shA ga/
365b2(phal chen): ma dbyung ni//sing ge'i sgra sgrogs mkhas pa sbyin ma'o//bcu po de la sogs pa dge/bdeg shegs zla ba de dag kho mas mchod//rin kyang tshus mtsho 'dir 'jug
365b3(phal chen): baize gnam ma zab par ma/de ga ma rnams s+t+rai da nga//sman byung ba dang la zhes byu ste//bskas pa gnas myed rnam par rkyen//de la seMngs rgyas byab
365b4(phal chen): drug /dang po yon tan kun tu sbyid//dade 'ag ma sangs rgyas rnam po'i zugs//sangs rgyas lpags byung rnam brgyun+ya dang //rgyu mtsho'i chos kyi sbyin gyi sgrog pa'i dbyung sa//rgyal ba ma
365b5(phal chen): dbyings gsung dbyings dang //sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mda'i dang //spangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjid dang //chos kyi rgyu mtsho yongs kyi m+bu yangs dang //yon tan
365b6(phal chen): mo dpal gyi ston//rgyal ba hrI ma dAk+Sha pazung bar gyur//de dag kun gyi tha mo ste//rin chen dpol sman yon tan dpal mchod//rin chen dpal sprin yon tan dpal/nang
365b7(phal chen): gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe//kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te//mi'i dam pa byung cha mchod pa byas//rgyal ba depa ni kho mo la//mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho'i byung ba'i rgyud//gnas
366a1(phal chen): meng rgyun kyang rab tu bshad//thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzung //kho mos mig yangs der thob ste//ting 'dzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs
366a2(phal chen): kyang thob//skad cig re rer zhing brgyud pa'i//rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po la kho mos mthong //byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin//byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste//
366a3(phal chen): snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang //sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshed du yangs par skyes//'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te//rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen pa//gti mug mdongs
366a4(phal chen): gyur ma rig bsgribs//nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa//lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod//lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred dbang gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs bye
366a5(phal chen): brag tu//las kyis rnam par bris pas kun byung ba//'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor//skye bar 'gyur pos kun tu skyer gyur tsong //skye dang rga shri gnod pa rnams//lus dang
366a6(phal chen): sems kyi nyams myong gyur pa//mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir//zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi//bstobs bcu gang las byung ba yi//bla na med pa'i sems kyang
366a7(phal chen): kho mos bskyed//de las smon lam sprin byung ba//'gro ba kun lo bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/tshogs rnams dbyung ba mtha' yas dang //lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa dang //
366b1(phal chen): de nas byung //'jug pa'i sprin yangs zos gyur ba//lam rgyud kun NA sgo gas la shugs ldan te//pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang //chos dbyings 'byam klas kun tu rnam par 'byed/
366b2(phal chen): sa gnan shugs drug yangs ldan dang //dus gsum rgya mche'i tshul gyi sa rnams la//chags pa med por spyod par gyur//skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro//gzhan
366b3(phal chen): yang rgyal sras kho mos ni//spyod pa kun tu bzang pa yongasu gnon//chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi//rgya mtsha'i tshula'ang kho mos rtogs par 'jug/rigs kyi bu de la ji
366b4(phal chen): snyam du sems//de'i tshe de'i dus na//rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba de/gzhan zhig yin pa
366b5(phal chen): tsAm du sems na ni/rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta ste//'jo ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nI/de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba/sangs rgyas
366b6(phal chen): kyi rigs rgyung mi gcad bu la zhugs pa'o//kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo da ni/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po sa sprul pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam
366b7(phal chen): du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo//bud med rin pa che/bzang ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de/gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/de ltar mi
367a1(phal chen): blta ste/kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud myed rin po che bzang po'i blo gros mya zhes bya bar gyur te//ngo mo mtshan mo lham
367a2(phal chen): des sad par byas nas/sangs rgyas blta ba la yang dag par bskul to//rigs kyi bu khro mos ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig
367a3(phal chen): nas bskyed/de ltar kho mo sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/bskul pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/nam yang dran song log par ltung bar ma skyes te//rtag
367a4(phal chen): tu rgyun mo chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing /thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs b+ha blta bya dang ldan par gyur to//tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das dA
367a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgron ma yon tan rgyal mtshon mthong ba tsam gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i
367a6(phal chen): rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i drug ba shin tu yangs shing /d+hI mA mod pa'i shugs kyi rgyu la mtshon zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/de thob pas kho mo sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba
367a7(phal chen): dang /gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin//rigs kyi ba kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i
367b1(phal chen): shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zung na/khoms byang chub sems dpa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing /sems kyi skad cig re ro la/thod
367b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa//
367b3(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi mi'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/spyod pa re re la yang lus
367b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas
367b5(phal chen): pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa
367b6(phal chen): la mkhas pa/zhing thams ca du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gaglegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug par mkhas po/de bzhidru ga shwegs
367b7(phal chen): ba re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i snga
368a1(phal chen): mtha'i bdul pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'a tshogs yongasu bsgrub pa/yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/de bzhin ga/shegs pa
368a2(phal chen): chos kyi rakhyor la shin tu yangs pa yang dag par blangs pa dang /yongasu gzung ba la mkhas pa/dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i
368a3(phal chen): tshul rgyu mtshol 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/yon tun brjod par nus re skan/snong rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
368a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na/kho mo dang rgyud mi rang bzhig na/mtshan mo'i lha yo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis gan du song la/ji
368a5(phal chen): lhurang byang chub sems dpa'/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pur bye ba dang /ji ltar yang sa skyeng bar bya ba dris shig/dri nas tshong dpon gyi du
368a6(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/mtshan ma'i lho mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par
368a7(phal chen): snang ba la/lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/metshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i drang nas song ngo //'phags
368b1(phal chen): pA dus rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba thog pa chen po'i mdo///bam po brgya/tham pa//de nas tshong dpon gyi'u nor bzangs//mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'
368b2(phal chen): ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing /dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya
368b3(phal chen): ba dang /khong du chud par bya ba dang /rtogs par bya ba dang /shes par bya ba dang /yid ches par bya ba dang /rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang /rgyas par dgang ba dang /rje su shes por
368b4(phal chen): bya ba dang /rje su dran par bya ba dang /rjesu gzhol bar bya ba dang /bsgom pa byed cing /dge ba'i bshos gnyen gyi gdams ngag lnga nan tan du bya ba dang /grangadams ngag rje su bstan
368b5(phal chen): pA la bar chud med par bya ba'i phyir/mtshan mo'i lho mo rab tu dga' ba mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas 'gro kar btams pa rjesu dran pa byed cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta
368b6(phal chen): badz+ri rje su sems dpa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba thob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang /daH/
368b7(phal chen): ba'i beshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ba nga rgyal thams cad dang bral ba dang /dge ba ri bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongasu bsgrub par zhe non pa dang /
369a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi
369a2(phal chen): byed pas zhugs pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa yongasu 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongasu skyes pa/bskol pa thams cad du dge ba'i
369a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/mchin mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo //de de
369a4(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon tu gyur pas/
369a5(phal chen): 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongasu grub pa'i lus bstan te/mdzod spu nas 'od gze
369a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od gzer gyi mtha' dang dpung med pa dang ldan par bgyi'o//des 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas
369a7(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to//tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzengs la 'od gzer nges reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid
369b1(phal chen): nga 'dzin shin tu ma dang shul ba zlas bya ba'i ngan lal khrang thab par gyu //dazang pa sgyu ma nAn mAr sa rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gra byur rnam pAr snang ba dang /ma ra/
369b2(phal chen): ma sems can kun tu skyeng ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar g+hi lam ni sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa del me'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i me/sa'i rdul
369b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba 'am/rdo rje'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i ma/me tog dang /spris dang /phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra d+ha /
369b4(phal chen): rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phri ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i rdul shin tu phra pa de dag thams cad la phra mo re re zhing yang 'jig
369b5(phal chen): rkyen gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/chu'i phung po dang bcaso//me'i phung po dang bcas/rlung gi phung po dang bcas/sa'i phyung po dang bcus/'jig rten
369b6(phal chen): kyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/gzhi dang bcas/rten dang bcas pa dbyibs sna tshogs can/sa gzhi rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can
369b7(phal chen): klu dang /mtsho sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyis kun naso 'khor ba/lha rdzas kyis khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyun dang ldan pa/shing sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba
370a1(phal chen): namakha'i dbyings kyi rgyun sna tshogs can/lha'i grong khyer gyi khyin gyi rgyun dang bcas pa/klu'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/gnad sbyin gyi grong khyar rgya
370a2(phal chen): khyim gyi rgyan dang ba nas pa/dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang brnyas po/lha mya yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dong bcas pa/na mkha' lding gi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi brgyan dang
370a3(phal chen): bcas pa/mi 'am ci'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/mi'i grong khyer kyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/phyogs
370a4(phal chen): dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi gnas dang /sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang /byol song gi sku
370a5(phal chen): gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten kyi yul dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi shi 'phro dang skye ba'i yul dang bcas pa/skye ba sna tshogs
370a6(phal chen): kyekyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mtha' yas pa'i bye brag la yongasu gzhol ba rnams 'du zhing 'jig pa gyur pa mthong ngo //'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshog su mthong ste/
370a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la la ni kun nas nyon mongs par mthong //la la ni yongasu dag par mthong //la la ni shin tu kun nas nyon mongs par mthong //la la ni lam rgya
370b1(phal chen): rgyud yongasu dag pa mthong //lnga la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la yong su dag par mthong ngo //la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo //la la ni shin tu yongasu dag
370b2(phal chen): par mthong //la la ni gzhi mnyam par mthong //la la ni spyi'u tshugasu gnas par mthong ngo //la la ni snrel zhir 'dug par mthong //'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems/
370b3(phal chen): can gyi lam gyi rgyud dang /sems can gyi skye gnas thams cad na/mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyongs pa'i gzi brjid dpal/sems can so so nas 'dul ba'i rkyen
370b4(phal chen): bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad la mngon tu gyur par gnas par mthong ngo //sems can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji lta
370b5(phal chen): bu dang ldan pa dang /mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang /lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /ngag rnam par phye ba dang /nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam
370b6(phal chen): pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul ba'i don du sems can
370b7(phal chen): thams cad la me 'dres par mngon sum du gnas pa mthong //de yang 'di lta ste/sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can
371a1(phal chen): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jugasapa rnam par bzlog pa dang /byol song gi sgra gnas sna tshogs skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig zu nga
371a2(phal chen): 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /gshin+da rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud gtogs pa'i sems can+da rnams kyi bkris pa dang /skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jig
371a3(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
371a4(phal chen): 'dod pa'i kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang /'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud
371a5(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mAM mun pa mun nag gis chong pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /mi snyan pa dang /bsngags bram mo do//
371a6(phal chen): pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang /bsngags pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa
371a7(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang 'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor tu bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /'chi bas 'jigs shing spangs
371b1(phal chen): po'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /ngan song gi g.yang sasu 'jigs shing snangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang sa sa 'jigs
371b2(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /'tsho ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsha ba med pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis
371b3(phal chen): 'jigs shing /bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtse ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i
371b4(phal chen): dems can rnams kyi/byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sdig te'i grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams
371b5(phal chen): kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing /bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i
371b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen drang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang /
371b7(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor pa'i gnas sna tshogs
372a1(phal chen): k+Sho sdug bsngal gyis 'dziklas pa rnam par bzlok+Sha pa dang /sems can stsal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bab tsha ba rnams kyi sems can rnal
372a2(phal chen): ba mo mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'dzugs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam pa
372a3(phal chen): bzlog pa dang /rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi/rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sdig to'i las byam kyis 'jigs
372a4(phal chen): shing bag che ba rnams kyi sdig ta'i las byed pa'i 'dzigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /lus dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang
372a5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang /'ching bas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi 'du shes kyi
372a6(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang /'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /sems can thams cad la so sor mngon tu gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo //'di lta ste/
372a7(phal chen): skyong las skyes pa'i sems can dang /mngal nas skyes pa dang /drod ga shar las skyes pa dang /rdzus te skyes pa dang /gzugs yod pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /
372b1(phal chen): 'dra shos yod pa dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongasu bskyangs pa'i smon lam gyi stobs
372b2(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang /rnam par gnon pa shin tu yengs pa'i stobs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes/
372b3(phal chen): pa chen po stobs dang mthu dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho
372b4(phal chen): shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par dag nga ba dang /sems canA thams cad kyi bde ba yongasu bsgrubs
372b5(phal chen): pa dang /dge ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
372b6(phal chen): bar zer ba rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang ldan pas zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya kha la mngon du gyur pa gnas par mthong //
372b7(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa zad
373a1(phal chen): kyi bstan pa yongasu gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /dka dA'i rtsu ba thams cad bstsags pa la mngon du zur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor
373a2(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang sems can thams cad kyi sems lnga sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang /sems can thams cad
373a3(phal chen): dbang po yongasu smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /sems can tham cad//
373a4(phal chen): kyi sgrib pa'i chos rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du gyur pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba la mngon du gyur cing /thams cad mkhyen
