373a5(phal chen): bri'i ye shes snang ba yongasu bskyed pa'i don du gnas pa mthong //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal
373a6(phal chen): gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam por thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas shring /'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa
373a7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu mthong nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho rab tu thob nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo sems ni na kun tu skying ba'i gzi
373b1(phal chen): la sa ldan mnas sa/la /rnamams na rgyu ba'i gan sa sa rtswa rmu lda sa /
373b2(phal chen): dang /mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te/mtshan mo'i lha mo'i gzugasu byas nas/rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'byin cing 'dug par gnas so//de nas tshang ni
373b3(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/mtshan mo'i lha mo sems n+dan kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brting dpal gyi mdun du 'dug skye thal mo sbyar nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag spraso//khyod kyi sku
373b4(phal chen): yangs mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan//shin tu bzung zhing mdzes po badrug gis mthong //na mkha'i skar me'i tshogs kyi so brgyan pa bzhin//dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa
373b5(phal chen): mthong //'od kyi 'khor can sru bzang dam pa'i mchog/mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang ngo steng //kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du//phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyingasu khyab par
373b6(phal chen): gang //'od gzer dra ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam//khyod ni ba spu'i sgo nas 'gyed pa mdzad//'od ga/ng+ge sgo la phadro yid 'ong gnas//khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal so la//spos
373b7(phal chen): kyi na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed//'gro ba'i gzugasu gnas te kun nas mdzes//me tog sgo rnams kun nis dgye mdzad pas//chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba kun tu
374a1(phal chen): khyab//khyod kyi phrag pa'i lhun yangs 'phags pa ni//drin chen 'od 'phro ra bo ra reb 'dra//dri med de ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal//gti mug mun nag
374a2(phal chen): par bzlog pa mdzad//khyod kyi dri med bzhal me dog bzang po las//na bun sprin dang nyi ma yangs paM 'byung //khyod kyi nyi ma'i 'khor 'dra 'od bzang ba//rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul
374a3(phal chen): yangs pa'i byan//khyod kyi spyan nas zla skar 'od 'byung ba//rtog tu dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste//de dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams//rab tu snang byed 'jig rteno ba ri'i
374a4(phal chen): sel//khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i//sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogasu khyab par 'pho//de dag chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas 'gengs shing //sems cani nod meng chog
374a5(phal chen): rnams yongasu 'dul//khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogasu snang //'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba skyed//rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i//'jigs pa thams cad
374a6(phal chen): rnam sel zhi bar mdzad//gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas//yon tan rnam par sems shing nyer phyin pa//de tshe 'od gzer dri med 'khor bzang po//khyod kyi zhal gyi smin
374a7(phal chen): mtshams gseb nas 'thon//phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mang snang mdzad nas//'jig rten snang brgya che yongs bskyed//rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnams bston nas//de tshe
374b1(phal chen): bdag gi lus kyi gseb du zha//gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa/de tsha bde ba rmad byung yangs pa myong //gzungs dang ting 'dzin nga rgya mang yongasu non//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag
374b2(phal chen): yas mthong bar gyur//gom pa rnam por gyen tu bteg pa lnga'ang //rdul phran grangs snyed tshul ni bdag gris rig/rdul phran shin tu phye ba gcig le yang //zhing gi rdul snyed zhing rnams
374b3(phal chen): mthong bar gyur//rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa ze dgu ste//ning mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs//de'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyam su myong //tsho du zhing smre sngags yongasu 'don//zhing
374b4(phal chen): myangal la kun nas nyin mongs dag/de na sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba rlung //rgyal bathugs rje can yang der skye ste//rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhino//zhing tshul la la yongs dag nyon
374b5(phal chen): rmongs ste//byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang meng pos brgyan//skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan bltan sdug/skyon med rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun me 'chad//zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs
374b6(phal chen): shing dri med pa//rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan//de dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi tshe//rnam por snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongasu sbyangs//zhing rnams 'byam klus kun na
374b7(phal chen): rgyal ba dag/shing dbang dam pa'i drung du gshegs pa ston//rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshong yang rgya//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul bston//rnam par snang mdzad spyod//
375a1(phal chen): yul yangs pA la//khyod kyang kun tu rnga su bzhud par mthong //mchod pa stong phrag chad med khrag khrig gis//rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong //
375a2(phal chen): nas tshong dporan gyi bu nor bzangs kyis//tshigs bcad pa de dag smras nas//mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 'di skad ces smras//lha mo byang chub se
375a3(phal chen): dpe'i rnam par thar pa de/de lta bur zab pa ni de mtshar chen/rnam par thar pa de'i ming nI ci zhes nga ni//de khyod kyis brnyes nas yun ni rdo srid cig legs//byang chub sems dpas rje
375a4(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongasu dag par 'gyur//smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgya su bcas pas/
375a5(phal chen): yid ches par dka' ba ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
375a6(phal chen): snying rje chen po lhur len pa/'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa la zhugs pa/mi khom pa dang /ngan song dang /ngan 'gro'i lem thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/sangs
375a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa blon med par bya ba la zhugs pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gtsang
375b1(phal chen): pa la zhugs pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs bzung ba la zhugs pa/bskul pa thams cadang byung chub sa de'i spyod pa lnga gnas pa gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs
375b2(phal chen): pa/che bya rgya mtsho thams cad la bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sbyang ba laM zhugs pa/skad cigau rI re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad ye shes snang bas rnam par gnas pa
375b3(phal chen): rab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus/bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra
375b4(phal chen): ba snyed cig gi pha rol tu/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzod gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba /bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste/bskal pa de la sangs rgyas
375b5(phal chen): rirerab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi rjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni/rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/rdo rje
375b6(phal chen): las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dang /gnas kyis yongasu mdzes par byas pa'i//'jig rten gyi khams de'i gzhi na rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs paM ste/lhun
375b7(phal chen): dang los ni nor bu rin po che thos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o//de ni dbyings kun tu zlum pa ste/rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/lhab lnga ba thams cad spyir gyi na
376a1(phal chen): kun nas khyab pa rin po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/rim pa stong gis yongasu bskor ba/gling bzhi pa bye gadrang khrig brgya stong gis shin tu brgyan pa dang rgya
376a2(phal chen): paste/de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnaso//la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dgu pa
376a3(phal chen): sems can lhas 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gran so//la lnga ni rnam par dag cang kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/sems can sdong su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba skyongs pa
376a4(phal chen): kha na mu tho btung ba rnams kyi gnaso//la la ni shin tu yongasu drag pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi gnaso//'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpa'o zhes
376a5(phal chen): bya ba de'i shar phyogs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na//gling bzhi pa rin po che me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ma rmos ma skyes pa'i 'brung
376a6(phal chen): lnga yongasu spyod pa snron gyi lngas kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang la yongasu spyod pA/'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing
376a7(phal chen): gis 'khor ba/spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi mchad par 'byung ba/'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi shing las 'phreng ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/
376b1(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi chang rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa/phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi shing ga lhun las spos rin po che'i rgyal po
376b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi phye ma'i char rgyun mi 'chang bar 'bab/rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las rta rin po che'i 'bru mang po 'brul ba'i kha dog snang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa lha rdzas kyi rol mo smra
376b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi shing las sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis bskyod cing /na mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/nyin mtshan gyi bde ba nyi ma dang /zla bas dbyung ba/nor bu rin pa
376b4(phal chen): cha kun tu snang bas gzhi byas byas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/gling bzhi pa der rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung bar gyur te/rgyal po'i pho brang de dag ri'i zhing
376b5(phal chen): yang chu klung stong gi sa yongasu bskor ba'o//chu klung de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog sil mas gang ba'o//lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang /klu'i sgra skad snyan cing yid 'ong ba 'byin pa'o//
376b6(phal chen): chung gram rin po che'i shing yid 'ong bas rnam por brgyan pa'o//rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i gru phan tshun du rgyu ba'o//bde ba sna tshogs ci dga' bar yongasu spyad yod pa'o//
376b7(phal chen): chuklung gi mtshams kyi gzhi re re dag na yang grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas gnas pa ste/grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor
377a1(phal chen): /kyis rangs bskor ba'o//grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi bzla' shing gyur ba dang /gzhal mang khang dang /khang pa khyo ba khrag khrog brgya phran
377a2(phal chen): stong gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor ba'o//gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na/rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba yod par gyur to/de ni skyid cing long
377a3(phal chen): spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la rtag tu lo legs shing bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o//lha dang mi mang pos yongasu gang ba'o//sems can dge ba btsu'i las kyi lam dang ldan
377a4(phal chen): po rnams kyi gan su gyur pa ste/rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba de na/rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug bud snying po zhes bya ba 'khor los
377a5(phal chen): bsgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba/pad+mo'i snying po la rdzus te byung ba/mi chen po'i mtshon sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che bdun
377a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa gnas par gyur to//de'i bu dpa' zhing rtul phod la yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa gzhan gyi 'khor rab tu 'jom pa/rnam pa thams cad yongasu tshang ba'i yan
377a7(phal chen): lag dam pa dang ldan pa stong tshang bar byung //de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong phrag bcu yod par gyur te/de dag kun kyang 'khor los bskur ba'i skal
377b1(phal chen): pa dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba 'thun par spyod pa/rin po che'i rgyan dang 'khrungasu byung ba/dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa/lha'i bu mo dang khyad par med par 'dra ba'i gzugs can/
377b2(phal chen): 'dzam+bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa'i lus can/lus kyi ba spu las lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs 'byung ba/lus las lha rdzas kyi 'od dri zhim po dri ma med pa rab tu
377b3(phal chen): 'gyed pa sha stag go/de'i blon po bye ba phrag bcu byung ste/blon po rin po che la sogs pa dag go/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug
377b4(phal chen): phung snying po de'i btsun mo dam pa//bud med rin po che dpal gyi bzhin yongasu rgyas pa zhes bya ba/gzugs mdzes shi ting sdug la blta na yi du 'ong ba/kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas
377b5(phal chen): pa'i dam pa dang ldan pa/sgra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/mig dkar gnag 'byes pa/mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/lus las 'od rtag tu 'byung
377b6(phal chen): ba/'khor kun tu dpagra tshad skyong gi tshad du/ 'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/lha rdzas kyi dri zhim po can 'gyed pa b+h+ring //rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin yongasu rgyas pa zhes bya ba de las/
377b7(phal chen): bu mo pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba/yan lag thams cad tshang ba/gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/blta na yid du 'ong ba/'jig rten thams cad kyis blta/
378a1(phal chen): na mi ngomasna pa byung bar gyu tI/rigasabu 'di lta ste dper na/'khor las sgyur bu'i rgyal po la bston su yang rnams par mi 'gyur ba d+ma /rlung /l+yang+ra
378a2(phal chen): los bsgyur ba'i bu mo pad+mo bzang mo mig yod du 'ong ba'i dpal de la blta bas kyang /su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/shes rab kyis yong su ngoms par 'gyur ba ni mA gtog so//de'i
378a3(phal chen): tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/tshe la gcig tu nges pa med pas bar ma dor 'i che ba ni yod do//de'i dus na sems can rnams kyi dbyings sna tshogs
378a4(phal chen): dang kha dog sna tshogs dang /ming sna tshogs dang /rigs sna tshogs dang /tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang /chu zheng rnam pa tha dad pa dang /mos pa dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /
378a5(phal chen): mthu rnam pa tha dad pa dang /yid 'ong ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /yangs pa dang /dma' ba la mos pa sna tshogs kyang yod par gyur te/de la sems can ji snyed cig/
378a6(phal chen): kha dog bzad pa dang yangs pa la mos pa dang /yan lag tshangs pa dang /blta na sdug cing yid 'ong bar gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to//kye mi dag nga ri khyad pas kha dog ces
378a7(phal chen): bzang ngo zhes zero//de bzhin du sems can ji snyed cig lus kyi dbyibs legs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag kyang /sems can lus kyi dbyibs mi sngags par gyur pa rnams la rlom
378b1(phal chen): ning khyad du gsod do//de dag de ltar gcig la gcig khyud du gsod pa las byung ba'i mi dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe'atshad las kyang yongasu bri bar gyur to//kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba las kyang yongasu bra
378b2(phal chen): bar gyur te//rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de'i byang phyogs logs ni snying po byang chub kyi shing kun tu grag pa'i chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa
378b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan skad cig re re la yongasu ston pa/rtsa ba rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje ltar sa zhing mi 'jig pa/nor bu rin po che thams cad las grub pas/lhun shin tu yangs shing
378b4(phal chen): rgyas pa/sdong po dang /yal ga dang /lo ma dang /mdab ma dang /me tosra dang 'bras bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las grub pa/kun tu cha mnyam par rnam par bkod cing kun tu khyab pa'i yal ga
378b5(phal chen): drung ldan pa/rgyan kun tu rgyas par 'gengs shing mi zad pa dang ldan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba dang /'odra gzer kun tu snang bar 'gyed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul
378b6(phal chen): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyings rjesu sgrog pa yod de/snying po byang chub de'i mdun rol na/spos chu'i mtsho rin po che'i me tog dang glog drang chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod do//
378b7(phal chen): de ni rin po che'i shing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ba nus kun nas bskor ba te/rin po che'i shing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi shing gi dbyibasu 'khong pa sho stag gi/spros chu'i mtsho chen po rin
379a1(phal chen): po che'i ma ti dang /srog dang /chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bla ba de'i 'gram thams cad kyang /no du na pa chu thams cad dkram zhing rnam pa dzub ste//
379a2(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba sna tshogasu dkrigs pa'o//rin po che rnam par dag pa las byas pa'i khang pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis yongasu brgyan pa'o//rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi rgya ni
379a3(phal chen): gyis shin tu brgyan pa'o//snying po byang chub de'i 'khor thams cad kyang /nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/pad+mo'i snying po can sha stag
379a4(phal chen): gis yongasu 'khor ba ste/spos chu'i mtsho chen po rin po che'i me tog dang glog dang /chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba nga'i dbus nas pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas/
379a5(phal chen): dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od gzar gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba byung bar 'gyur te/pad+ma chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul
379a6(phal chen): shAn tu phra ba snyed de dag gi nang nas bskal pa'i thog ma pa/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dngal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur
379a7(phal chen): de ni bskal pa de la thams cad kyi thog mar/bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/des lo stong phrag du ma zhig du chos bstan pas seMn
379b1(phal chen): yongasu sbyin par mdzad nas/lo stong phrag bcur 'od gzer snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas yongasu smin par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa de lo stong phrag bcun 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o//
379b2(phal chen): tshe/pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba de las/sems can thams cad
379b3(phal chen): rdul dang 'byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer byung bar gyur te/'ang des phog pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang /lo stong phrag bcu na ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar
379b4(phal chen): shes so//lo stong phrag dgu na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe//byang chub kyi shing de las rdul dang bral ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od gzar byung te/'od
379b5(phal chen): gzar des phog pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang gzugs thams cad shin tu phra ba mthong bar gyur to//lo stong phrag brgyad na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing
379b6(phal chen): chen po de nyid las 'od gzer sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste/nges phog pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi las rgya mtsho khong
379b7(phal chen): du chud par gyur te/las dran pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur to//lo stong phrag bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'thung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing de nyid las 'od gzar
380a1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/'od gzer nges sems can dri dag la bog nas/dbang po nyams pa med cing
380a2(phal chen): yongasu tshang bar gyur to//lo stong phrag drug na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las/'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam
380a3(phal chen): gyis mo khyab pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/des sems can de dag la pho gnas bsam pan chen pos rnam par 'phrul par gyur te//lo stong phrag ldan de bzhin gshegs pa de
380a4(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag mar sgra 'byin pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa
380a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba byung ste/des sems can de dag la phrog nus/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa thams cad du yongasu dag par mthong bar gyur to//lo skyong phrag bzhi na de bzhin gshegs pa
380a6(phal chen): de 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul tha mi dad pa'i sgro na ma zhes bya ba byung ste nges sems
380a7(phal chen): can de dag la phig nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du song ba la zhugs par gyur to//lo stong phrag gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byung bar 'gyu
380b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mngon
380b2(phal chen): du mos pas mthong bar gyur to//lo stong phrag gnyis na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od gzer dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi glog gi
380b3(phal chen): sgrosgon ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi tshul rab tu sgrog pa byung ste/des sems can de dag la reg nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rtog cing 'jug
380b4(phal chen): par gyur to//lo stong na dra bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od gzeng mos su med pa de bzhin ga 'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/ngas smin
380b5(phal chen): dedag la po gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /zhing thams cad dang //sems can thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mig kun tu lta ba thob par gyur to//de bzhin
380b6(phal chen): gshegs pa de lo brgyan 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las
380b7(phal chen): byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i 'du shes thob par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de zhag bdun na skye bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i tshe//
381a1(phal chen): byang chub kyi shong chen po de nyid las 'od gzer sems n+dan thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang spro ba drung moswA pa yongasu 'byung ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/dus
381a2(phal chen): sems can de dag la phog nas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de ltar 'odi gzer gyis yongasu smin par bya ba'i tshul
381a3(phal chen): tshad med pa rnam pa de lta bus/lo stong du sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par mdzad nas zhag bdun pa la thug pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongasu bskyod pa'i tshul tshad
381a4(phal chen): med pas yongasu bskyod nas shin tu dag par byin gyis brlab so//phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ji snyed pa rgyan bsam gyis mi
381a5(phal chen): khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems kyi skad cig re re la yongasu bstan par gyur to//de nas zhag bdun pa tha ma la bab pa dang /
381a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur bar yongasu smin pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
381a7(phal chen): de'i khor yug thams cad dang /ri rab thams cad dang /ri thams cad dang /chu klung thams cad dang /rgya mtsho thams cad dang /shing thams cad dang /sa'i gzhi thams cad dang /
381b1(phal chen): grong khyer thams cad dang /rab thams cad dang /gnas thams cad dang /gzhal med khang thams cad dang /gos dang /rgyun dang /longs spyod thams cad dang rol na'i shing thams cad dang /
381b2(phal chen): rol mo brdung bu'i dbyangs thams cad dang /sprul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi dmyigs pa re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang /mthu ra ska rab tu sgrog pa'i spros dang gdug spos
381b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sprin mngon par mthon te/rin po tshe 'od 'phro ba'i sprin+da dang /spos dang /gadrug spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phyo dam pa dang /spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang /gos
381b4(phal chen): rin po che dang /rkyen rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang /rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin dang /phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gzeng gyi sprin
381b5(phal chen): rnam par rton pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa/rim mo po rdung bi dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sprin yongs 'khrol zhing brdung ba/de bzhin
381b6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung rgya mtsho'i spyan rab tu sgrog pa/de bzhin gshegs
381b7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu ston pa byed cing /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i bltas sngon du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
382a1(phal chen): bstan te/rin po che'i rgyal ba'i d+mo chen po lo ma rgyams nas/dus gas mAT+Tad+hA shUn+ta gu shAgs pa thams cud kyis la rnam pa na pa'i 'odag na
382a2(phal chen): de'i pad+mo'i 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa chen po sha stag du byas te 'khod do//rin po che'i rgyal po'i pad+ma chen po'i 'khor gyi rin po che'i pad+mo chen po de dag gi ze ba dang /snying po la
382a3(phal chen): seng ge'i khri rin po'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag byung bar gyur te/rin po che'i snying po can gyi khri de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sangs
382a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi shing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyong skyil mye dkrung bzlas te 'khod par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das ye shrIs rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin
382a5(phal chen): gshegs pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas mtheg tu/de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu de bzhin gshegs pa mang po dag
382a6(phal chen): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas te/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to//nges
382a7(phal chen): cang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can tshang med pa rnams ngan sang dang log par lhung ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog//sems can tshad med pa ni mthor du skye ba 'i rab tu zhing
382b1(phal chen): sems can tshang mod pa ni nyan thos kyis la rab tu bkod do//sems can chad med pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub du yong su smin par byas/mas can tshad med pa ni shugs drag po 'ang kyis 'byung
382b2(phal chen): ba'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par bya'o//sems can tshad med pa ni brtson 'grus dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi byang chub tu yongasu smin par byaso//sems can tshang med pa ni chos rab tu bsgom pa'i
382b3(phal chen): gnasu 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do//sems can tshad med pa na/dbang po yongasu dag se rab tu bsgom pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongasasu smin par byas//sems can tshad med pa
382b4(phal chen): ni stobs mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par spyod pa khong du chud pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byaso//sems can tshad med pa ni chos grong khyer mngon du 'gyur ba'i yul gyi thag pa skye
382b5(phal chen): bas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod ngo //sems can tshad med pa na thams cad du rje su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi theg pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod ngo do//sems
382b6(phal chen): can tshad med pa ni spyod pa'i sbyor ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do//sems can tshad med pa ni ting 'dzin gyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang
382b7(phal chen): chub la rab tu bkod do//sems can tshang med pa ni dmigs pa'i yul thams cad yongasu dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do//sems can tshad yod pa
383a1(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod//sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub songa'i lam la rab tu bkod do//sems nan tshang mang pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
383a2(phal chen): lam rnam par dag pa lnga rab tu bkod do//sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la rab tu bkod//sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis po dang
383a3(phal chen): gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa dang /drug pa dang /bdun po dang /brgyad pa dang /dgu pa la rab tu bkod//sems can tshad med pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la rab tu
383a4(phal chen): bkod do//sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smon lam gyi khyad par can la bcudo//sems can ched med pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod ba
383a5(phal chen): dang /smon lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des/sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /rnam par 'phrul bzhisam gyis mi khyab pas
383a6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas/sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa rnam par dul bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad
383a7(phal chen): gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku sna tshogs dang thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos bstan pa yongasu shes par 'gyur to//rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron
383b1(phal chen): ma'o sems can gzugs dang kha dog dang yul dang /longs spyod kyis rgyags shing dregs te/gcig lnga gcig khyad du gsod pa de rnams gdul ba'i don du/byang chub sems dpa' kun/
383b2(phal chen): tu bzang pos kha dog dang gzugs mchog tu byon par mngon sprul te/rgyal po'i pho brang der phyin to//de'i 'od shin tu yangs pas rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad yongasu snang bar gyur te///
383b3(phal chen): rgyal po'i gnas de'i 'od dang /'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug pud snying po'i lus las byung ba'i 'od dang /bud med rin po che'i 'od dang /
383b4(phal chen): rin po che shing gi 'od dang /nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od dang gnyi bla dang gza' skar dang /rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /'dzam+bu'i gling na 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang
383b5(phal chen): bar gyur te/dper na nyi ma shar te mun pa drang ba dang zla ba dang gza' skar dang /rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mi snang la me dang nor bu'i 'od kyang mi snang //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
383b6(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i zil gyis non na/'dzam+bu'i gling de na 'od yod pa thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to//'di lta ste dper na/'dzam+bu chu klung gi gi sder gyi sa le sbram gyi drung du sdug
383b7(phal chen): che'i gzugs bzhag na mdzes par mi rung /lha ger ma rung /lam mer ma rung /lhang nger mi rung ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mdun du/sems ca ni de dag
384a1(phal chen): /gi gzugs kyi lus kyang mdzes par ma rung /lha gong ma rung /lam mor mdung ljang ngor ma rung //de nas de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/de lta su zhig de ltar de'i drung
384a2(phal chen): bdug tsug gi lus sum 'od dam kha dog gA ma/gzi brjid kyis kyang mdzes par ma rung /lha ger maM rung /lam mer me rung /lcang ngor ma rung ba de lta lta'am/tshangs pa 'am
384a3(phal chen): zhig de'i mtshan ma ni gzung bar mi nus sgyu mo//dri nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bas/rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i dbus 'khor los sbyang ba'i rgyal po
384a4(phal chen): rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+ma dpal gyi gtsug pud snying po gzhi la med khang gi steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo pal b+hi gA tsug
384a5(phal chen): budud snying bu lnga 'di skad ces smra so//rgyal po chen po shes par gyi shig/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/khyod kyi khyim
384a6(phal chen): 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kun tu snang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan 'di nyid na rnam par spyod zhes pa dang /rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'pho ba/pad+ma bzang mo mig
384a7(phal chen): yi 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zlabs byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzugs kyi lus dang 'ong dang /rnam par 'phrul pa dang rgyan mthong ste/dbyangs thos nas/dga' ba deng mos pa'i//
384b1(phal chen): shugs rnon po skyes to//de'i tshe sems 'di snyam du bskyod do//bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bsngags pa des/bdag kyang lus 'di 'dra ba thob par shog shig/rgyan nyid 'di 'dra ba dang /
384b2(phal chen): mtshan 'di 'dra ba dang /spyod lam 'di 'dra ba dang /rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bar shog shig/ji ltar 'dis mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na sems can rnams la snang ba chen po bskyed sangs rgyas
384b3(phal chen): skye ba yongasu brjod pa de bzhin du/bradag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bsal te/ye shes chen po'i snang ba bskyed par bya'o//gang dang gang du skyes pa thams
384b4(phal chen): cad byung /dge ba'i bashrIs ga nyen 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog shig/de nas rigs kyi bu 'khor lo sna bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba/rin tshon pad+mod pal gyi gtsug phreng snying po
384b5(phal chen): yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig/rin po che bdun dang lhan cig/bud med kyi tshogs kyi 'a khor dang lhan cig/bu dang blon po dang /ljongs kyi mi dang lhan cig tu/rgyal
384b6(phal chen): ngo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/rgyal po'i glu nas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de nas 'phags te/gyen du na mkha' la dang ge tshong gcig tsam du mngon par
384b7(phal chen): 'badas nas/'jam+bu'i gling thams cad dang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos rgyas pa dngadakang ste/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas blta ba lo yongs su
385a1(phal chen): bskul ba'i don du/rin po che'i ri thams nAd la gsungs brnyan mngon par stan cing /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la
385a2(phal chen): mngon sum du gnas te/sangs rgyas blta ba de tshigasu bcad klu'i dbyangs kyis bsngags pa/lus can thams cad skyabs mdzad pa'i//sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung bar gyur//'jig
385a3(phal chen): rten gtso bo dbalta bar//kun kyang longs te 'dong bar gyis//lus can kun la phan don du//chos rab ston pa gang mdzad pa'i//de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni//bskal pa bye ba'i rgya
385a4(phal chen): lam na'o//'jig rten phyin cir log gyur cing //mi shes sgrig pas sgribs gyur te//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba'i rnams//gzigs shing thugs rje che bskyed nas//sdug bsngal
385a5(phal chen): thams cad gzhi la don du//sems can yongasu smin bya'i phyir//bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/byang chub spyod pa spyod pa mdzad//bskal pa mtha' yas mu med par//sangs rgyas byed
385a6(phal chen): chub mchog don tu/zhabs dang phyag kyang yongasu btang //spyan dang snyan dang da bu yang btang //mthong zhing bsnyon bkur byas pa dang //thos pa don yong 'gyur ba yis//'jig rten
385a7(phal chen): mgon po 'jig rten du/'byung ba bskal pa bye bar dko'o//da ni byang chub gdan la bzhugs//gsung ba'i dam po bltar yang yod//bdud rnams sde dang bcas btul te//byang
385b1(phal chen): chu cag tu rnam sangs rgyas//maud gzer dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa//sangs rgyas sbru las mngon paHzhing //'gro ba tshim par mdzad pa ma//kha dag sna tshogs 'dil bltas//rang gzang sbyi
385b2(phal chen): mang grangs med bri//sangs rgyas sku la/sa 'thon pa rnams//de ni sems can snang gyur na//khedabang po med 'dzub par 'gyur//btsun 'grus chen po rang rnam ste//rang dang rang gi bsam pa yis//mgrin pa
385b3(phal chen): del mchod pa gyis//chur shig nga yi gan du 'ang //de nas rgyal ba rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo pal gyi gtsug pud snying pos/tshi gisu bcad pa de dag gis/bdag gi khams na gnas pa'i sen
385b4(phal chen): thams cad yongasu bskul te/mchad pa'i sprin chags brgya stong phrag bcu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu grub pa'i char pa/snying po byang chub kun nas snang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi dbyangs
385b5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor kun tu mngon par 'brebs shing /rin pa che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis/namakha' kun nas yog par bya ba dang /me tog thams cad kyi bI re'i sprin gyis mamakha' blo nas khobs
385b6(phal chen): par bya ba dang /na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis namakha' kunas yog cing brgyan par bye ba dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyis na mkha'i dbyings brgyan par bya ba dang /spos sna tshogs rgya
385b7(phal chen): mtshos dri zhim par byas pa'i spos kyi 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi rgyan na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlabs par bya ba dang /rin po che thams cad kyi khri la rin po che'i gang na 'phel bar gting ba'i sprin gyi rgyan
386a1(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin mngon par bsgreng ba'i rgyan na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyi brlab pa dang /khang pa dang /
386a2(phal chen): gzhal med khang thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan/nam mkha'i dbyings byin gyis brlab pa dang /me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan/na mkha'i dbyings la
386a3(phal chen): byin gyi brlab pa dang /mchod pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan/na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po yis
386a4(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i
386a5(phal chen): dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sman
386a6(phal chen): sbyar/stan nor bu rin po che chen po phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can la 'dug/de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bu mo ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i pad+mo pozang
386a7(phal chen): mo mig yid 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla bas/rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi
386b1(phal chen): rgyal po la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//de nas rgyan de dag/bcom ldan 'das de'i dbu'i gtsugs gi steng gi bar snang la/nor bu rin po che'i rgyan gyi gdugs chen danor bu rin po che sa
386b2(phal chen): tshogs kyi dra bas yongasu bskor ba/klu'i dbang po'i lus kyis bzung ba/rkyen thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs shin tu legs par kun nas bskor ba/rgyan gyi gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor bcus
386b3(phal chen): yongasu bskor ba/shin tu dag pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/rin po che thams cad kyi lhab lhab kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad
386b4(phal chen): kyi shing ge rgyan gyis kun nas khebs pa/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos thams cad kyi rgya mtshos yongasu brgyan par 'dug par gyur te/de'i dbus na byang chub kyi shing chen po chos kyi dbyings las
386b5(phal chen): byung ba'i rin po che thams cad kyi yal ga dang lhun du ldan pa zhes bya ba/rgyan brjod na mtha' dang dpung med pa/skad cig re re zhing rgyan sna tshogs yongasu ston pa yod par mthong bar gyur to//de'i drung
386b6(phal chen): na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'o//
386b7(phal chen): spyod pa dang smon lam gyis byung ba/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan sna tshogs tha mi dad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par spyod pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun du byas pa dang /'jig rten gyi
387a1(phal chen): dbang po thams cad kyang de la mngon du gyur par mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yang mthong
387a2(phal chen): gyur to//sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgral pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la re zhugs par gyur te//'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'du ba dang /'jig pa'i bskal pa la yang zhugs
387a3(phal chen): par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams der 'odas pa'i sang+yas rgyud gcig na gcig tu brgyad pa la yang zhugs par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po/de
387a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson par gnas pa yang mthong ngo //sems can thams cad yongasu smon par bya ba dang /gdul bar bya ba la
387a5(phal chen): mngon du gyur par yang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la gzugs brnyan du gyur par 'khod cing bdag nyid kyang de'i
387a6(phal chen): rjesu 'brang bar mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi drung dang /sems tsan thams cad kyi gnas dang /'jig rten gyi
387a7(phal chen): lhums de dang de dag thams cad na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan kun tu byung ste/'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re na'ang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba
387b1(phal chen): dkyi 'jig rnyed kyi khams mtsha mas kyi rgyan dang bcas pa dang /gzhi dang bcas pa dang /dbyibs dang bcas pa dang /lhun dang bcas pa dang /rgyan sna tshogs yongasu dag pa dang bcas pa/rgyan snga//
387b2(phal chen): tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas khebs pa rnam par bkod pa dang /ming dang grangs rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud sna tshogs las brjod pa/dus gsum gyi nub sna
387b3(phal chen): tshogasu gtogs pa/phyogs 'byam klas pa sna tshogasu 'du ba/chos kyi dbyings 'byim klas pa sna tshogs kyi khongasu gtogs pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi sna tshog su 'dus pa/na mkhan
387b4(phal chen): dbyings sna tshogs la rnam par gnas pa/snying po byang chub sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis byung ba/sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i gdan sna tshogs
387b5(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud sna tshogs can/de bzhin gshegs
387b6(phal chen): pa'i thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs yongasu brjod pa dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul sna tshogs can/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang
387b7(phal chen): gsung gi nga ro sna tshogs rab tu 'byung ba/skad sna tshogs rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang ldan pa/mdo sde'i sprin sna tshogs rjesu sgrogs pa can dag kyang mthong bar gyur to//mthong nas de bas kyang
388a1(phal chen): dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen bathong bar gyur te/de di ltar dbu' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur pa la/bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od
388a2(phal chen): kun tu 'phro ba'i dbul yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa des/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsgrugs pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde/'a
388a3(phal chen): mang sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/des mdo sde de thos par gyur nas/ting 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu shin tu phra zhing reg na bde ba
388a4(phal chen): thob par gyur te/de ni dper na ma'i mngal du rnam par shes pa zhugs par gyur ma theg pa lta bu dang /'di lta ste dper na/sems can rnams kyi las mngon par bsgrubs pa lta bu dang /
388a5(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/shing bzang po dam pa'i sa bon btab nas ring po ma lon yang myu gu skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa lta bu ste/de bzhin du ti nge 'dzin de dag kyang 'jam zhing yi 'ong ba ste/'di
388a6(phal chen): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du rnam par ngamigris pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba rdzasu song ba zhes bya ba'i ti bye dzin dang /dus
388a7(phal chen): gsum gyi tshul thams cad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dong /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sangs rgyas
388b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rjes gzir ba'i sems can+da 'byung ba'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pas rnam par
388b2(phal chen): dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi mun nag rnam par sel ba'i smon lam gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad sdug bsnga
388b3(phal chen): dang dpral ba'i smon lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa yongasu 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /sems can thams
388b4(phal chen): cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul bas mi skyo ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /
388b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongasu gnon par bsgrub pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /de dag la sogs pa ting 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu rnams des thob por gyur to//nga phra ba
388b6(phal chen): lamanyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang /mi g.yo ba ri sems dang /rab tu dga' ba'i sems drang /dbugs phyin pa'i sems dang /dpag tu med pa'i sems dang /dge ba'i bshes
388b7(phal chen): gnyen gyi rjesu 'brang ba'i sems dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu zab pa la dmigs pa'i sems dang /byams pa'i rjesu 'gro ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa'i sems dang /mngon
389a1(phal chen): par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i sems dang /'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul pa
389a2(phal chen): 'jug pa'i sems dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /kha dog rgya mtshos snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang /'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang /g.yo ba med pa'i sems dang /khong
389a3(phal chen): khro ba med pa'i sems dang /mthon dman med pa'i sems dang /mi skyo ba'i sems dang /mi zlogs pa'i sems dang /zhum pa med pa'i sems dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
389a4(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang /chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang /chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i tshul gyi rjesu song ba'i sems dang /sems can rgya
389a5(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i sems dang /'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i sems dang /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang po'i snang ba yongasu skyes pa'i sems dang /de bzhin gshegs
389a6(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang /sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i sem
389a7(phal chen): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spobs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la snang ba thob pa'i sems dang /byang chub sems
389b1(phal chen): dpa'i tshogs thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i sems dang /phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sems dang ldan pas/kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po lhag par dmigs par
389b2(phal chen): bya bas/smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i
389b3(phal chen): don du mngon par bsgrub ste/'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasasu smin par bya ba dang /gdul bar bya ba dang /chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa yong su shes par bya ba dang /chos
389b4(phal chen): kyis dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyang por bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
389b5(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gnas par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro bya ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur ba
389b6(phal chen): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rI maM glor bya ba yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems kyi skad cigau re r-i la/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgrub pa dang /
389b7(phal chen): rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya bas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gca par bya ba'i phyir/de dag la sogs pa smon lam mngon par bslab pa'i sgo rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing
390a1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba spyod kyis/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam mngon par sgrub par gyur to//de'i byang chub sems dpa'
390a2(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin goshegs pa ye shes rin po tshe'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal
390a3(phal chen): gyi rgyal pos/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskul ba mdzad //rab tu bstan pa mdzad //yongasu bstan pa mdzad//rnam par dbye ba mdzad do//rnam par dgrol ba mdzad do//
390a4(phal chen): yang dag par bstan par mdzad //chud za bar mi 'gyur bya ba'i phyir/rab tu brtan par mdzad//rgya chen por khyab par bya ba'i phyir shin tu yangs par mdzad //thams cad mkhyen
390a5(phal chen): pa nyid lhur len par bya ba'i phyir rab tu gnas par mdzad//de ni 'di lta ste/thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin tshong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho
390a6(phal chen): grangs med pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus/de'i yang pha rol gyi bskal pa bcu pa la/'jig rten gyi khams rin chen nyi me'i 'khor lo rnam par snang
390a7(phal chen): ba'i 'od ces bya bar/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi gsung rab la/bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba pad+mo bzang mo mig yid 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba des/byang
390b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yongasu bskul te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+mo la bzhugs bzhin gceso//bcos nas kyang ri mo briso//ri mo bris nas kyang rin po ches
390b2(phal chen): shin tu brgyan to//dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed do//de dge ba'i rtsa
390b3(phal chen): ba des log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du gyur to//rtag tu lha'i dbang po'i rigs dang /mi'i dbang po'i rig su skyes par gyur to//thams cad du yang gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na/
390b4(phal chen): yid 'ong ba dang /kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas pa dam pa dang ldan par gyur te/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang yang bral bar ma
390b5(phal chen): gyur to//dge ba'i bshes gnyen de nyid kyis tshe rabs de dang /de dag tu yongasu smin par byas//dran par byas so//nga yang des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongasu bsnyen bskur
390b6(phal chen): te/yid byung bar ma byaso//rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par spang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal byi gtsug pud snying po zhes bya ba de gzhin
390b7(phal chen): chag yin pa tsam du sems na ni/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/byang chub sems da pa'i byams pa ni/de'i tshe de'i dus na/'ikhor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba
391a1(phal chen): rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug pud snying po zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi gzhin yongasu rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ba de/
391a2(phal chen): gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems ni yang de ltar mi blta ste/mtshan mo'i lha mo kho mo'i drung na 'dug pa sgra rgya mtshe rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa 'di yi no//rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam sems/de'i
391a3(phal chen): tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ongs pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba byung ba de/gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi
391a4(phal chen): blta ste/kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ongs pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to//kho mo'i bu mo gzhon nur
391a5(phal chen): gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi gsung rab la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+mo la bzhugs pa bcos pa de ni/kho mo'i bla na med pa yang dag par
391a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur gyur to//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bskul ba de ni kho mos byang chub tu sem
391a7(phal chen): dang po bskyed pa yin no//kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal gyi yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po'i drung du phyin te/rgyan gyis
391b1(phal chen): gtor nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /cho 'phrul mthong bar gyur te/khoms bcom ldan 'das de'i drung nas chos thos par gyur pa de'i tshe kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
391b2(phal chen): thar pa/'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di thob bo//de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyang bsnyen bkur te/yo byad
391b3(phal chen): dang mchod cing rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis kyang bkur stir byas//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos bstan pa de dag tham cad kyang kho mos thos te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gdams
391b4(phal chen): ngag dang rjesu bstan pa la'ang zhugs par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos rim gro cher byas te/rim gro de'i rnam pas sems kyi skad cig gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa de
391b5(phal chen): dag thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnas pa'i khams de ni
391b6(phal chen): 'das par gyur/bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor de ni mthar phyin par gyur nas/de'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi khams ni/rin chen 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis klungs shing brgyan pa
391b7(phal chen): zhes bya/bskal pa ni 'od chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/de la sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur to//de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur te/bskal pa 'od chen po la de bzhin gshegs
392a1(phal chen): pa thugs rje chen po sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste/de mngon par 'byung ba'i tshe/kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mor gyur pas mchod pa byaso//de'i 'og
392a2(phal chen): tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu bo che'i dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/de la kho mos 'khor lo bsgyur bar gyur pas mchod pa byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde sangs rgyas tha~Md
392a3(phal chen): skye zhing 'byung ba zhes bya ba/mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor ci dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/de la kho mos thos nas yongasu bzung //de'i 'og tu de
392a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od 'phro ro'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/de la kho mo tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pas mchod pa bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa nges kho la mdo sde/dus
392a5(phal chen): gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/mdo sde 'dza k+Shu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/de yang kho mos thos yongasu bzung //de'i 'og tud
392a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i shugs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/de la kho mos lha'i rgyal por gyur pas mchod pa byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa
392a7(phal chen): des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad shes pa'i bye brag ces bya ba mang sde lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/ngarang kho mos thos nas yongasu bzung //nga'i
392b1(phal chen): 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos zab mo'i dpal rgya mchos yang dag par byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ste/de la kho mo klu'i dbang po'i bu mor gyur pas/nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i sprin
392b2(phal chen): gyi char mngon par phab ste/mchod pa byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa ngas kho mo la mdo sde rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel ba shugs shes bya ba/mdo sde bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang
392b3(phal chen): dag par bstan te/de'ang kho mos thos nas yongasu bzung //de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo'i spro'i 'od gzer sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/de la kho mo rgya mtsho'i lha mor gyur pas/
392b4(phal chen): rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyis nye bar bsnyen te mchod pa byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul zhes bya ba mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba
392b5(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/de'ang kho mos thos nas yongasu blangaso//dran pas yang dag par bzung //de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya ma tshe snang ba'i
392b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/de lnga kho mo drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa/drang srong stong phrag drug nus kun nas bskor bas/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par
392b7(phal chen): 'phrul pas nye bar bsnyen te/spos kyi me tog ri bo tsam gyi sbyin gyi char mngon par pheb nas mchod pa byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa kho mo la mdo sde chos gnas med pa'i sgron ma zhes byab
393a1(phal chen): /mdo sde stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dgu par bstan te/de'ang khro mos thos na snga yong su bzung //de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang /
393a2(phal chen): mdzad dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba byung ste/kho mo yang mnyam pa nyid kyi don 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sa'i lha mo zhig te byurar+ya nas kho bo'i 'khor grangs med pa dang bcus pas/rin
393a3(phal chen): poche'i shing thams cad kyi ldan lasarin po che'i me tog sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi cher yang rab tu phab nas/de bzhin gshegs
393a4(phal chen): pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir spyan sder phyin to//de bzhin gshegs pa des/kho mo la mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas
393a5(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba/mdo sde grongs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan haM/de'ang kho mos thos nas bzung ste/chung zos par ma byas so//rigs kyi bu
393a6(phal chen): de zhin gshogs pa lta bu d+h+ye mo de dag thams cad kyi tha mar+yA/de bzhin gshegs blo chos kyi dbyings na mkha' mdzod spus yongasu rgyas pa'i rtse mo dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba
393a7(phal chen): 'jog rten byu n+ti/ri tshodzam ye ga pamakhan gyi bum bzhin mngon par mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig tu /de bzhin gshegs par za na shegs nas
393b1(phal chen): gang mkhan gyi tshogs kyis rol mo byas pa'i tshe/khams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis/stong gi na mkha'i dbyings las tshigasu bcad pa stong gis/de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon par
393b2(phal chen): bstod de spyan sngar phyin to//de bzhin gshegs pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gzer chos dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba bkye ste/kho mo'i lus thams cad kyang snang bar mdzad ///
393b3(phal chen): 'od gzer des kho mo la phog ma thag tu/rnam par thar pa chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul yongasu 'khyil ba'i snying po zhes bya ba thob par gyur cing /rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag/
393b4(phal chen): la sogs pa/bskal pa 'od chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin tshon 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis klubs shing brgyan par sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang nyes
393b5(phal chen): par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos mchod pa yang byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kho mo la chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang dran te/chos kyi tshul de
393b6(phal chen): dag las yi ge 'ga' 'am/tshig 'ga' yang brjed par ma gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rI re'i drung du 'gro ba'i tshe yang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brjod par bya bas sems
393b7(phal chen): can tshad med pa'i don byaso//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re la'ang kho mos chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi snying po//chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa
394a1(phal chen): /nas pa rnams da rgyu rgyun dran pa nga na rnams dpa smranas par yang dag par gnos brjodang dang rgyu na/rag /
394a2(phal chen): m-i wAn+ti//ngas sa nga la shegs byam pa da nga me po slong su srung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ga/khams mdzad gyu pas
394a3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i glog mngon par snang ba sngan chung ma thob pa/sngun chad ma mthong ba drug byeng kha mo'i sems kyi rgyu de la gnus par gyur te/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kur tu zung /
394a4(phal chen): po'i spyod pa las g.yo ba mid de//de ci'i phyi shrIn/thams cad mkhyen bu'i glog mngon par snang ba bab pa 'di ni mtha' dang nga med par bstod pa'o//de nas mtshan po /
394a5(phal chen): mas na seMnan kun tu myong ba'i gzi brji po b+h+yo rje zeng rje seM 'i re ba ba pa 'jig rten thams cid mingon du zung ngas 'gro brta par 'dus pa
394a6(phal chen): byung 'di brtan tidasbyin pa dang /rnam pa ring bye bar bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyab kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshong dpon b+hi bu nor ba blangs la NAM gsu bcang smras pa//rdzar mo ltad
394a7(phal chen): khong du chud dka' ste/dus gsum dbyings kun tha dad tshul ldan la//chos 'dod rtsol 'kho kun tu 'od 'byung ba'i//kho mo'i tshig 'di ni ring zang ma nyan par gyis//sangs
394b1(phal chen): yon tan 'dod pas byang chub tu//khams thog ma ji ltar sems bskyed dang //ji ltar kho mos rnam thar 'di thob pa//de dag rnam par phye ba'i tshul 'di nyon//'di nas sangs rgyas ning gi
394b2(phal chen): rdul skyed kyi//bskal pa gcig nas gcig brgyud pha rol tu//'jig rten khams yangs dri ma'i skyon med pa//rnam snang rgyal mtshan sgron ma'i dpal byung ste//bskul pa rdul dang bral
394b3(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor byung //de la sangs rgyas rigs ni rgyun ma chad//de tshe ri rab rdul phran rab snyed kyi//stobs bcu skyon med mang po byung bar gyur//de la bde gshegs thog mar rin chen
394b4(phal chen): 'od//kun tu 'phro dpal yon tan dpal rgyal byung //rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab dpal//yon tan seng ge'i dbang po rgyal ba bzhi//rgyal ba zhi ba'i rgyal po skye bcil dang //grags
394b5(phal chen): pa'i ri bo yon tAn ri rab dpal//rgyal ba nyi ma zla zhal bcom ldan 'das//bcu po de dag tshul 'di thog ma'o//rgyal ba na mkha'i gzhi dang kun nas 'ong //phyogasu yongs byung
394b6(phal chen): dran pa rgya mtsho'i sgo//rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mda' ri rab dpal//bde gshegs chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal//thugs rje che mnga' dgu pa pad+mos 'phags//sangs rgyas
394b7(phal chen): bcu pa chos dbyings me tog ste//sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongasu brjod pa las//tshul 'di bcu pa gnyis pa 'di yin no//'od dpal rgyal po ye shes blo gros dang //sna tshogs
395a1(phal chen): don dbang dpal gyi blo gros lha//rgyal ba'i shugs kyi rgyal blo ye shes dpal//snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal//rgyal ba rnam pararA gnon pa'o//
395a2(phal chen): lha stabs dang //de bzhini chos dbyings pad+mo bcu pa ste//rgya chen yongasu bstan las tshul 'di ni//tshul 'dir bcu pa gsum pa bstan pa'o//rin chen 'od 'phro ri dpal
395a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das//de'i 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho dpal//chos kyi 'od dang pad+mo snying po dpal//'gro ba'i zla ba spyan tshul bde bar gshegs//spos kyi 'od dang
395a4(phal chen): rin chen re rab dpal//rgyal ba dri zla lus 'od rgyal po dang //rin chen snying po rgyal dpal gzi brjid ldan//rgyal ba bcu pa zhi ba'i gzugs rtsi stabs//de'i
395a5(phal chen): 'og ma rgyal ba chen blo//rin chen 'od dang na mkha'i sbyin gyi dpal//rgyal dam pa'i mtshan gyi dpal gyur dang /brtul zhugs dkyil 'khor rang gi lus kyi 'od//
395a6(phal chen): mthu chen brtul zhugs ri rab dpal mnga' dang //rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi rgyal//bcom ldan mi 'pham brtul zhugs rgyal mtshan dang //shing gi ri bo
395a7(phal chen): rgyal ba de dag bcu//rgyal ba stsa la'i rgyal po dpal gyi mchog/'jig rten dbang po'i lus ni snang ba'i 'ong //mngon par 'phags 'od dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das//
395b1(phal chen): rdo rje 'od dang sna'i gzi brji dang la//rgya lnga ba zab chos 'od kyi rgyu lnga po dpal//chos kyi rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang //ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal dang blo gros snang //rgyal ba bcu pa rin
395b2(phal chen): cheni rgyal po dpal//tshangs pa'i 'odang rgyal ba na mkha'i dbyangs//de bzhin chos kyi dbyings ni gzugs brnyan dpal//snang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi bcom ldan 'das//thA/
395b3(phal chen): dang phyogs mkhyen ye shes blo gros dang //na mkha'i sgron ma mngon par dga' ba'i dpal//rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpal bde bar gshegs//bsod nams rab tu snang dpal zhi ba'i
395b4(phal chen): dpal//bcu pa snying rje chen po sprin gyi dpal//de bzhin nyi 'od stobs snang blo gros dang //rgyal ba 'gro ba thams cad mngon gzugs dang //de tshe rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od
395b5(phal chen): mda' 'byung //de'i 'og ma zhi ba'i sku yi 'od//chos 'phags bde gshegs de bzhin byung bar gyur//de yi 'og ma rlung gi drag shul dpal//dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan rin chen
395b6(phal chen): lus kyi dpal//dus gsum snang ba'i 'od ni bcu pa'o//smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu snang dpal dang //gnyis pa dgongs pa rdo rje ri bo dpal//rgyal bu gsum pa sang ge ri rab dpal//
395b7(phal chen): dran pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po ches dpal blo//shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal//de'i 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo//rgyal ba chos dbyings tshul gyi ye shes sbyangs/
396a1(phal chen): chos kyi rgya mtsho blo glus ye shes dngal//chos 'dzin pa dang rin chen sbyin dpal dang //rgyal ba yon tan 'khor yug dpal gyi sbyin//bzod pa'i sgron ma
396a2(phal chen): dpal dang gzi brjid ldan//shugs 'ong zhi gnas dbyangs kyi rgyal ba dang //zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan 'gro ba'i sgron ma dpal//sangs rgyas smon lam chen po shugs kyi dpal//bcom
396a3(phal chen): ldan gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan stobs//rgyal ba ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dpal//rgyal ba chos dbang blo gros chags pa med//'gro skad rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang //
396a4(phal chen): thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad dang pa//dbang sgyur mchod sbyin grags pa'i mchod sdong blo//phyogs yul 'gro ba mngon sum bcom ldan 'das//sems can bsam par
396a5(phal chen): mnyam pa sku'i dpal//gzhan yang sangs rgyas gnas dang bcas pa'i dpal//rgyal ba rang bzhin lus dpal bzang po dang //der ni rgyal ba de la sogs pa byung //de dag
396a6(phal chen): byung nas 'gro ba'i sgron ma mdzad//bskal pa ri rab shin tu phra rdul skyed//bdag gis rgyal brgya mtsho de dag mchod//bskal pa sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed pa po//de dag
396a7(phal chen): tu ni rgyal ba gang byung ba//bde gshegs de dag thams cad bdag gis mchod//rnam par thar pa'i tshul ni 'di la zhugs//rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di sgom byed cing //
396b1(phal chen): bskal pa mtha' yas bdag gis sngon spyad kyis//khyod kyis thos nas nan tan myur gyis shig/tshul 'di ring po mi thogs thob par 'gyur//rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
396b2(phal chen): par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di shes par zad na/kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dpung med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
396b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la mos pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gnas pa bsam pa sna tshogs kyi lus dang ldan pa/dbang po rgya mtsho sna tshogs yongasu grub pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /smon laM
396b4(phal chen): sna tshogs shin tu rtogs pa/de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yin tan brjod par nus ri sman song rigs kyi bu snying po byang chub 'di nyid ni/kho mo dang rkyong mi ring bzhig na
396b5(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo smra/rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/pad mo'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/rab tu brgyan pa zhig la 'dug cing
396b6(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa sa byang chub
396b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shigade nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
397a1(phal chen): rgyu mtshan pa mamasasus rgyun du rgyu na gas dad la b+h+yorkang zags la sgyunas byug ma ma tu/rnan pal sgyums sa spyad/
397a2(phal chen): gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //sarba me ga shin
